column1: Bunny Rabbit. John saw a bunny outside his front door. It had an arrow in its head. John walked out to look for it. He caught a branch and ran back inside to kill it. John was happy when he got his first rabbit rabbit.

Good Terms. Joey and I talked for hours. We talked about all the bad things we could think about. I wanted to apologize and clean my mess up. Joey wanted me to apologize. We laughed at how silly I was.

What And Itch. It was one of those hot summer nights. Nancy had been sitting at her favorite cafe in the city. She noticed a lot of kids being too loud. She had one friend who thought it was the right thing. But Nancy was glad it was just a part of the heat.

Empty Club. Jenny had a crush on an Asian boy in her gym class. The boy wanted her number, and she decided to go up to him. She found him a good spot and waited. He ignored her, and they went to the bar together. Jenny was very embarrassed.

Wrestling. Lola was not a fan of the sport of wrestling. She always thought it was so stupid and dumb. Her husband told her that she needed to give it a chance. Lola accepted his invitation and started going to school. She was soon much more interested and excited about being an adult.

Magical Fruit. Jed found a jar of fruit on the side of the road. He took it home and cracked open the lid. Jed couldn't find any of the fruits in the jar. Instead, he found the banana peel. Jed put it in his pantry and ate it in peace.

Schedule. Nancy was having trouble in her schedule. She tried to do her assignments every day. She kept getting them off and off. One night Nancy went into her bedroom and couldn't sleep. She decided that she would make a change to her daily work.

Candy in the dirt. It was dark in Beth's backyard. It was her first night on the house. Beth noticed a pile of candy in the dirt. It was about five feet long. Beth took it to the dump and took it back.

Robins cruel exit. One day, Robins owner heard a loud noise outside. He went outside and saw a mouse was jumping on the floor. Robins got very scared and tried to scare it. He got a net and chased the mouse down the street. Eventually, the mouse ran out the street and Robins was happy.

Good Fences. Rita decided to do yard work on her yard. She planted new plants and hired someone to do it. When Rita was done she had a neat yard. But it was a huge mess. She had to take it to the hardware store and they fixed it.

Carnival Games. Jordyn's birthday was coming up and she wanted to go to the carnival. Her mother went to the carnival and purchased some games. Jordyn enjoyed playing the games that she got. Unfortunately she fell down once and got sick. Jordyn was not able to go to the carnival after that.

New Neighbors. My neighbor was a very sweet person. She brought her dogs over on Saturdays. One Saturday morning she came over to the house and started making a scene. My dog jumped on her bed and broke her. She came to pick up her broken bone but my dog ate the bed.

The Face Wash. Tim hated the smell of his hair. He tried a face wash but that didn't really fix it. He decided he had to try something else instead. He bought a bottle of hair spray and got all the spray. He loved his new facewash!
Bill started a company. Bill wants to start a company. Bill has a great idea for a new product. Bill gets funding. Bill starts his new company. Bill is now rich and successful.
Pool. The girls went to the pool. They swam around the pool and got a bit too tired. They went back into the house. They made a big cup of milk. They sat down at the table to wait for their dinner.

Megan sees a ghost. Megan is watching a scary movie. She decides to go to her room. There, she finds that her bed was empty. Megan runs outside, where she sees a shadow in the sky. Megan screamed, then went to her room and saw nothing.

Francine Has her Ears Pierced. Francine wants to learn to sing. She wants to learn how to sing a song for her friend. Her friend tells her to learn the song first. Francine practices the song for 2 weeks. Finally she can sing the song for her friend.
Penn. Benny had a large dog. He named it Penn. One day, it was a stray dog. Benny put up signs for it in his yard. Benny was pleased that his dog had become well-liked.

Flower Shop. We bought our daughter flowers for our home from a flower shop. She has been very friendly. She also likes to play with the roses. She got all her roses ready to plant and pick. My wife and I hope her likes them.
Shoes. Fred decided to wear new shoes. He was nervous about going to school. He had no idea what to wear. He decided to wear the shoes he wanted. They looked great!

Spare Change. Bill took a trip to the store to buy some cash. While there, he saw a sign for a special coupon. Bill bought a coupon with no coupons for that particular store. The next day, the coupon was still on the counter. Bill brought the coupon to the store to cash in.

Balloon Fight. Travis was trying to make balloon friends with his friends. They got together and threw a balloon at each other. Travis had the biggest balloon and wanted to win the fight. They spent the whole day making sure to lose and get revenge. They were glad to see each other again after that.

Stripley. Nathan was having trouble in his bedroom. He wanted to make some more sound to get the peace he craved. He heard a sound on his bedroom door and opened it. He found a mouse and threw it at the door. It was his dog Stripley!

Milkshake. Caleb was at the grocery store. He decided to get a milkshake. He went to the freezer and got some ice. When he got out he noticed that his milkshake was gone. He went back to the store and got another milkshake.
Vintage toy. I got a new toy. It was a vintage toy. I was playing with it in the living room. My dog knocked over the toy. My dog ruined the toy.
New Underwear. Kelly wanted new underwear. She decided to get some new ones. Kelly looked at the selection online. They were all too expensive. She ended up buying one on sale.

The Psychology of Grades. Tim was a very competitive kid. His grades were a perfect 100s. Tim was a good friend of the guy's girlfriend, though. One day Tim was playing with her in the yard. She pushed Tim's friend and kicked Tim in the face.

New Dog. Tara really wanted a new puppy. Her friends helped her find one. When she got it she fell in love with it immediately. When they were finally old enough, she named the puppy Lila. The puppy was a very popular puppy.

Music Band. I started learning how to play the guitar when I was very little. At first my friends thought it sounded annoying, but it was my own passion. I practiced everyday for years and years. After Years of practice, I got very good at playing the guitar. I now spend the majority of my time playing the guitar.

The Concert. The group had a concert. The singer got very sick. The band was in the bathroom to try to help him. The singer vomited during the concert. The group went to his hospital room and treated him.
Dinosaurs. The family was visiting the museum. There were lots of exhibits. They saw dinosaur skeletons. They saw dinosaurs on display. They loved seeing dinosaur skeletons in real life.

Pickles. Gina and her friend Tami had lunch with her best friend Tami. Tami brought pickles. Gina was not sure if she was supposed to eat them. Gina asked Tami to give her a big hug. She promised she would only eat the pickles if she smiled.

Raking Leaves. I loved to mow the lawn. I did it every day, but my neighbors did not like it. They never did as well as I do. One day they had to take their lawnmower away. They finally found a cheaper alternative and they loved it.

Dangerous Campfire. I went camping with my friends. We found a spot with a large campfire. I was getting really tired and decided to make s'mores instead. After making s'mores, I saw an alligator in the campfire. I had to go to the emergency room because the alligator ate my s'mores.

Bianca Dyes Her Hair. Bianca decides to dye her hair. She heads to the salon for a dye test. At the end of the test, the dye is yellow. Bianca is happy that she dyed her hair. She is happy that her hair is now very clear.

Dancing. I used to go dancing with my friends when I was younger. I'd walk home with them and then they'd dance with me. It's not easy to dance as hard as I thought it would be. I was too afraid to get into the car and drive them there. That's why I learned how to dance.

Buying a New TV. Tim's television broke down. He didn't have the money to replace it. He decided to cut up some old junk. He threw out all of his old clothes and started shopping. The new TV was a good purchase.
Deaf Kid. Tim was at a concert. He was wearing a hearing aid. At one point the sound cut out. Tim couldn't hear anything. He was very embarrassed by his deafness.
Race. The runners lined up. They were in the starting blocks. The gun went off. It was time to compete. Tina won.
The Puppet Show. Alicia was a very smart girl. She had a puppet show coming up. She practiced for months. She had to wait. She couldn't wait to learn all of the pieces!

New Hobby. It was summer break and Kelly wanted to see the beach. She didn't want to go alone so she asked her mom to go. Her mom said she would pick her up at a different time. The girls met at the local restaurant. They had a great time and loved the summer.
No Jumping. One time I decided to go jumping. I decided to try to jump over the fence. It was a huge hurdle. I had no idea how to jump over it. I ended up falling and breaking my ankle.

Comparison. John was taking the SAT. His friend Sam was doing well but John was terrible. He was sure Sam wouldn't get into college. Sam asked John if he wanted to go to college. John told him he didn't, he would use the SAT to make good grades.
seafood. The couple ordered fish for dinner. They both loved their dinner. But then it was served to them. The couple looked at the fish. The fish was covered in spots!
Burritos. Tia was craving burritos. She did not have enough time to cook them. So she decided to make them instead. But her burritos did not taste the same. Tia decided to stop going to burritos.

Spinach. Mary went to the grocery store to get spinach. The store did not have spinach but she wanted it. She picked up her spinach and some butter. She mixed the ingredients into a bowl and then went to get home. Mary went to the kitchen to add the spinach and butter to her meal.

Exercising. I was going to a gym. And I really wanted to make new friends. But when I got there I realized I was scared. And I was so nervous I could barely get on the bus. I decided to never exercise at a gym again.

New Year's Resolution. Jenny wanted to lose ten pounds this year. She watched a lot of eating videos on how to do it. She read books and talked with her friends about how. She started a regimen of fruits and veggies every day. Jenny lost ten pounds that day.

John Buys An Umbrella. John noticed that his apartment building was getting very dirty. He decided to buy an umbrella. The umbrella was very expensive. John saved the money he saved for an umbrella. John loved his new umbrella.

Embarrassing Mistake. Gina was playing in her locker at school. She was using the restroom. She looked out her window, and saw a bunch of girls talking. She immediately realized what she was looking at. A girl had just been talking about her.

Greenery. My aunt took me to see a park. She wanted to play with a few of the children. I didn't like playing with them and went back home. It was a bit later, but I finally got back. I told her I wanted to visit the park more often.

The Weight Loss Expert. Kim was overweight and knew she would be sick for a long time. She decided to give up her TV for two months. She also started using less snacks and more healthy foods. Soon she had lost 100 pounds. Kim felt like she had finally lost weight.
Library Book. John bought a book at the library. He took it home to read. He did not like the way the book looked. He opened the cover to see the story. He loved the story so much.

Low Blood Sugar. The professor handed out the homework. He asked everyone to turn their papers in. He told the people not to take papers with low blood sugar. When he handed out the papers he saw it's not enough sugar. He decided to ask him why he gave away free papers.
Broken Nose. The wind was blowing so hard. A large branch fell. Tim's nose had broken. Tim couldn't get out of his house. Tim was so scared.

Eternal love. Tina loved her friend, Lucy. They were best friends in high school. One day, she and Lucy went to the movies. They both loved the way they looked at each other in the movies. They started dating, and decided to spend all their money on tickets.
Lost Phone. Tom lost his phone. He looked everywhere in his house for it. Eventually he gave up and went back to sleep. When he woke up he saw his phone missing. Tom was disappointed in himself.

Eviction. My dad took a bunch of his belongings to a garage sale. I thought it was a good idea. The sale lasted one hour. I went back to see if they could take my stuff. He said they couldn't because it's a huge risk.

Thunder. The lightning started to strike the house. The electricity flickered and the electricity flickered as well. A loud crack began to sound, causing the electricity to turn off. The alarm rang, and the generator went off. A thunderstorm occurred, and the power went out.

Lost poncho. John and I decided to go to our friends house one summer day. We loaded up the car and drove on to the park. While standing on the sidewalk someone told us we didn't have ponchos. We went to a store, bought some ponchos and went home. After our friends house we brought the ponchos home and sat down to play.
Swim. Tom was on vacation. He was going swimming. He got his paddle out. He paddled to the edge of the pool. Tom was able to swim across the pool.

Sticky. Tia had a new dog. She was too young to have the confidence to ask his owner for a leash. When Tia walked the dog, she was very proud. She was sure she would be fine without it. But to her shock, the dog would not stop trying to chase it!

Mother. Lulu was very upset because her mother was being too protective. Her mother had to go to the mall to see a doctor. She was afraid to talk to her mother since she had a mean attitude. Lulu decided to tell her mom about the abuse. Her mother stopped being so protective of Lulu.

ID. I got my new puppy today. He was a lab mix who wanted to play with my cats. He went into my bedroom and played fetch with me. He also ran away when he got outside to chase after me. Now I'm looking for my new puppy to keep with me.
The Inheritance. Sam is very talented at his job. He worked very hard at making money. His friend wanted to invest. Sam's friend asked him to invest for him. Sam did so and became rich!

Mike Drinks White Wine. Mike always loved drinking white wine. His friend told him he should try drinking white wine everyday. Mike was skeptical at first, but soon he grew to like white wine. After trying many, many different drinks, he settled on white wine. Now, he goes out for white wine every weekend, and loves it.
Broken Bike. Bob rode his bike across the neighborhood. His chain fell off. Bob had to stop his bike. Bob put the bike on the ground. Bob put the chain back on his bike.

The Blind Date. Liz and Jason had been on a date for a while. They were finally getting together. They had a really good time. Liz asked Jason to go out on a date with her. It wasn't long before Jason asked her out on a date with him.
The Stormy Day. The Smith family loved winter time. They decided to build a snowman. The family then built a snowman. They then decorated their snowman. It was such a cozy day.

White Cast Christmas. Sarah was excited to go trick or treating with her friends for the first time. As soon as they got to the store, she saw a dozen candy bars! She went into the car, grabbing every box of them. Finally she found a perfect brown and white box of cookies! She took them home and ate them.

The volleyball accident. Sally and her friends were playing on the beach. They were playing on the volleyball court. Suddenly, Sally fell and broke her leg. She needed medical attention. She was sent home immediately.

Turtle Fears. Lily was scared of turtles. Her parents went to the zoo with her. They got her to see one for an hour. Lily fell in love with the turtle. She started to like the turtles more than her parents.

Shoelaces. Kenny noticed his shoelaces were getting worn out. He needed to replace them. He did so but they were very expensive. When he was done he felt proud of himself. He could no longer be lazy about his shoelaces.
Easy mac disappointment. Jordyn wanted to go to the store. Her mom said no. Jordyn was upset. She decided to not go. Her mom said she was too old.

Puppy Litter. Sammy was playing with his puppy. They were playing hide and go seek. Sammy lost track of the puppy and started to cry. When he looked down the puppy was asleep. He laid on the floor and was asleep and soon the dog woke up.

Old Friend. I was walking home from school one day. I heard a girl calling me names. I looked around the corner and there was her on the curb. I looked over the shoulder and the girl was right behind her. I walked back to my house and thanked her for the call.

The Easter Parade. The kids were excited for their Easter parade. They would see a lot of colorful floats. Then they would get to feed the ducks. At the end of the parade they would get candy for candy. They would love to go every year.

No Littering. Cayla had to leave the house today. She had just eaten at a restaurant and hadn't cleaned her room. When she got home, her dog had already started to scratch. She could feel a big sticky mess in her room. Cayla had to clean it all.

Ham Sandwich. Joey was a very picky eater. He would always have a small sandwich to eat. One day, he was going out with friends. Joey decided to get a ham sandwich. He ended up liking it so much, that he went all the way with it.

Confession. Mary wanted to confess to her sister, Jane. She told Jane she knew the reason she felt guilty. Jane confronted her sister about her confession. Jane didn't feel guilty at all. Mary then forgave her sister.

Janet. Janet had been married to her husband for thirty years. She decided that she was going to marry a man from another city. She met a man named Jim. Jim had a great job. They had a great marriage and are now very happy.
The fishing trip. Beth wanted to go fishing with her dad. She asked him if he wanted to go fishing. He said yes. He got her something to put in her boat. She went fishing and had a great time.

Rex Drinks Tea. Rex needs some caffeine. He decides to try drinking tea. Rex finds that he can feel much less tired after drinking. Rex drinks three cups of tea every day. Rex is glad that he has some caffeine.

Scared Teddy. Sally is the only kid at the house with a stuffed animal. She was about to put it in her bedroom. When she opened the door, a little boy was crying. He had lost his stuffed animal in the bathtub. He was afraid of the stuffed animal and began to cry.

Power Outage. A lightning bolt struck the city and shut down the power. A loud alarm went off and a generator shut off. The electricity went out for a day. The city's power was restored in three days. They spent $200 to get all their things back.
A new hobby. I never had a lot of money. I decided to start a new hobby. I bought new socks. I went to the mall to buy them. I was happy to have a new hobby.

Photo. The couple got a gift from their mom for her birthday. It was a nice photo album. It had pictures and family pictures. The couple took their pictures to the gallery. The photo album was a great gift.
The Deadline. The game was tied at the last minute. There was just enough points to go in. The clock was ticking down. He had no other options. He made a basket and won the game!

Wine tasting. Yesterday I decided to try some wine tasting. I went to a local wine tasting house in my city. I ordered the cheapest bottle and then went home to rest. When I awoke I could not believe it was so hot and fresh. I couldn't believe I didn't have to wait long to go to the store.

The bed. Anna needed a new bed for her room. She searched everywhere for one. Then she found the perfect one. She looked for the cheapest ones but couldn't find any. She went online and found a nice one for $60.

The saxophone. I loved playing the saxophone. I decided to learn how to play the guitar. I went to a music store and bought all the things I needed. I practiced everyday for a year. I became a great guitar player and enjoyed it.

The Farm. The kids went to visit their grandma. They walked to the farm and looked around. They noticed some pretty flowers. They decided to plant them and visit every day. They loved seeing their grandma growing the flowers.

Outside the Window. Tom was sitting in his living room. He heard a noise outside. He thought it might be a dog trying to get in. He got out of his chair and looked. It was just a bird trying to get inside his window.
Making it gluten free. Lily was trying to make her meal for her boyfriend. She wanted to make it gluten free. But she wasn't sure how to. So she decided to try. And it turned out great.
The plane trip. Alex was going on a plane trip. He was supposed to go to Hawaii. Unfortunately Alex was getting sick. Alex decided to miss the flight. Alex realized he missed the trip.

Jen's Game. Jen had a hard time playing baseball. She wasn't very fast. Her parents decided to take her to the batting cages every day. Soon Jen was getting much faster and better. Her parents rewarded her with a scholarship to college!

More Alone. I've been alone since I was a child. I haven't seen any family or friends in over six years. I was feeling a little less lonely. I decided I was going to start hanging out with my girlfriend. It was easier than I thought.
Theme park excitement. Tina had never been to a theme park before. So she decided to go. She was very excited to go. She really enjoyed it. Tina loved it.

Futsal. My family went to visit the zoo. We loved the monkey exhibit. The other exhibits were the gorillas, lions, monkeys, and elephants. We sat by the monkey exhibit and talked. We learned a lot from the monkeys and monkeys!

Bluebirds. Every morning I'd wake up and hear a bluebird chirping in my kitchen. The bluebirds would fly around my house and eat the pollen I brought in. I would often go out and feed the bluebirds, but I couldn't keep them. One day the bluebirds flew away. I guess that the bluebirds would return soon.

The Trip. Haley was so excited! She and her boyfriend had planned a trip to the Grand Canyon! They were so excited they could barely get sleep. They packed their bags and headed for the Grand Canyon! They loved the view and the beautiful landscape!

Carnival Ride. Jim was excited about going to the carnival. Jim was going to ride the ferris wheel. The ride was fast. The ride started off slow. After Jim got through the first quarter Jim was thrilled.

Lost Throughout the Process. I received a call from a telemarketer the other day. They told me that my phone had died, and that I needed to buy new one. I called the number back, and found out that my wife does not have a phone. I called her phone number, and she told me she was still not back. After calling my wife, I drove to the bank to return the phone.

The Murderer. Jordyn thought she was very clever. She used the word'sickie' to mean it was okay to kill. One day while she was sick one day she saw a man kill another man. She thought the killer did it. She decided to stop using the word to mean illness.

Home Run. The baseball team practiced for many weeks for the big game. They set up some games and set up their equipment. The day before the game, they went to the park and played. The coach took out a bat and struck out the players. They won the game and celebrated after.

Greg Visits the Zoo. Greg decided he wanted to visit the zoo. He went with his sister and family to see the animals. He saw monkeys, elephants, lions and tigers. Greg even saw a baby baby tiger! Greg was happy to have visited the zoo.
New Shoes. Tim needed new shoes. He decided to buy some at the store. He decided on a pair he liked. He found the perfect pair and bought them. Tim was happy with the purchase.
Cole. Cole needed a new bike. He went to the store and looked at many bikes. He found a very nice red bike that he loved. Cole rode it home and showed it to his friend. He received a huge tip.
Shirley Temple Doll. Shirley was a little girl. Her doll was named after a famous princess. Shirley wanted to be princess. Her doll was only made from cardboard. Her mom bought her a new doll.
Patty's Sleepover. Patty was having a sleepover. It was for her friend's birthday. Patty made them a cake. Her friend came over to celebrate. Patty and her friend had a great time.

New Shears. Meredith was getting married in the spring. She was getting married with a new set of tools. She was excited to get the new tools. But when she got home, she realized that she didn't have enough. She was upset that she could not get the new tools.

As I Sit Here. Catherine loved to read. The local library had several different series. Every time she would see one of the series she would sit in. The next morning she awoke and saw it was closed. The library was closed for the day.

Going to School. Sue decided she wanted to go to school more and more. She was a little excited when she started getting her grades up. She began working on her homework assignments. She also began to study for finals. Sue eventually made it through all of her first semester of school.
Hit. The man hit the target. The target landed a ball. The man ran after it. The ball bounced off the target. The target hit him again.

The dog. The dog was in the backyard when my wife came by. He barked all the time. I started getting scared and my wife told me to get out. We left and got in the car. The dog got into the house and he was safe again.

Fears. Tim had trouble with some fears. It was very common for him to fear flying or heights. He decided to take a trip to Canada to see some people. After a week he made a few new friends. He became more comfortable being a fly.

Driver. Anna had never driven a car before. She loved the way it looked and felt on the road. But one day it got stuck in a pole! It was difficult to get it out! Anna decided to give her driving lessons the next time.

Man's best friend. My man went down to the pet store with me one day. He picked up a cat and the cat jumped up and down with him. I couldn't understand what was going on, and I asked the man for an explanation. He said the cat's owner came home and she was taking it for a walk. That's how we became best friends.

The First Birthday. It was Amy's birthday and her mom took her to the park. At the park she saw a lot of cute kids playing. There were so many boys and girls playing that Amy was lost. After a while she found her dad in a tree sitting on a bench. Amy and her dad decided to play outside more.
The fair. Sam went to the fair. He saw all the animals and games. He took a ride on a ferris wheel. He played on the ferris wheel a long time. Sam ended up having a lot of fun.

The Bison. My little cousin, Kona, loved to visit the park. She always would go by the old park animal house. One day I saw a small, white, yellow beaver. Kona took a picture and it has been saved on Pinterest. I remember the beaver the best.

A Good Samaritan. A man was on his way to work. He saw a man getting his lunch break from work. The man stopped at the restaurant to help the man. The man took his sandwich from the woman's hand. The woman thanked him and left the restaurant with her sandwich.

Pictures. Kate wanted to go on a date. She got to the store to purchase some new clothing. She saw some really nice looking dresses. She purchased them for the date. Her date loved them and Kate was excited to see it.

Appendicitis. It was the second time in a row that I had a terrible pain in my appendix. I was not sure what it was and I went to a doctor to get the diagnosis. The doctor looked at it, but I was too afraid. I was scared to take the pill for ten years. Then he said, I'm not sure what I need, so I took it.

Money. Derek wanted money to buy new video games. He asked his father if he could have some extra money. His father had already talked him into buying some. Derek found a job and saved for a while. Eventually, Derek bought the game he wanted!

Genre Disagreement. Gina's dad was not happy with the music that played during dinner. Gina disagreed with his opinions. They argued over the music on the table. Gina tried to convince him to let her hear it. However, he said it would make a nice conversation with them.

For a Five. I saw a great deal on some new laptop for $5. I decided to spend my money and order it. After paying, I left the store to wait on it to arrive. The phone went out. Now my laptop was broken.

Sardines. Mara was eating a sardine. She loved sardines, but she did not want to use them. She decided to eat them without using the salt. Her friend suggested they try using the salt instead. They happily agreed.
Too Curious. The man was looking for a specific book. He checked several online listings. He found a book that he liked. He found it on the library website. He bought the book and read it.
The School Fight. A fight broke out in the school. There were several people involved. Two kids got into a fight. The fight lasted a long time. Eventually the fight was broken up.
Video Game. Tom wanted to play a video game. Tom wanted to get better. He started to practice video games. Tom was able to beat every game on the list. Tom won the first video game competition.
Milkshakes. Tom wanted to get more exercise. He wanted to try milkshakes. He went to the local diner. He ordered a milkshake. Tom enjoyed the milkshake.

Bad Haircut. Gina had been wanting to get a new haircut for months. Her parents had said she was too old to be in a new hair style. She begged them to let her cut her hair as long as she wanted. They still refused, and her mother refused to let her cut her hair. She decided to shave her head and her hair looked good.

The New Airplane. Joe was excited for his new airplane. He was sure it would be a lot of fun. He took it out to the airport and showed off his plane. He got some food, took off and waited. He finally got his plane and he felt great!

Bruised Knees. My sister in law had a pair of knee braces in 2012. She had a pain in her left knee, which was bad. I took her to the doctor, who said she was pregnant. I drove her to the abortion clinic, where they carried the baby. After the abortion, she had a mild pain in her left knee.
Heavy Belly. Mary was eating at a restaurant. She was very happy to eat there. Her belly started hurting. She realized she had gained weight. Mary changed her eating habits and never ate there again.

The STained Glass. The kids were playing hide and seek. They all started to hide behind a glass. One kid saw another hiding behind the glass. He ran into the back yard. The kid knocked over the glass.

The pregnancy prank. Kenny had been dating Jenny for a few years. Kenny had been with Jenny for four years and wanted to ask her to marry him. Kenny started to think that he had a plan. Kenny proposed to Jenny and she accepted. Jenny's friends did not approve.

Special Treat. Sue went to the candy store to buy some candy. The store was sold out of treats so Sue needed to get something else. Sue saw a chocolate cake and it was on sale for a good price. Sue got the chocolate cake and took it home. Sue used the cake to make her son's favorite treat.

A Ship Without Direction. Jane was visiting the Caribbean for vacation. There, she saw a ship without direction. She thought it was a bad omen ship. A woman asked her what the hell it was. Jane told her it was an old Navy ship without direction.

Bad decision. The new kid moved into the dorm. He played with the group he sat with. The group was getting on with him. The new kid went to kick someone in the face. The new kid was arrested and taken to jail.
Unicorn. There was an unusual horn. Someone in the car was scared. They went back in to check. They were afraid it was a nest of unicorns. Luckily, they realized it was just a bird.

Egypt. Ollie loved exploring. He went on several adventure. This weekend he planned on heading to Egypt. He saved up money for the trip and bought his plane ticket. Ollie was very excited to go on his first adventure.

Office job. I worked in an office in NYC. We had an attractive young man on the phone. He asked if he could make me his assistant for one year. I told him to come over. My boyfriend and I worked on the phone for hours.

Wrong Number. Gina had been on the phone with her friend Tami. But Tami needed to call a man. She had a conversation with the man. Gina couldn't get the hang of the call. After several minutes she realized Tami had told the wrong number.
Summer. There's been so much summer lately. I decided to do something fun. I went to the beach and played some beach games. We even went ice skating. I really had a great time on my summer trip!
Ants in the Keurig. Sam woke up to a strange smell. His Keurig was out of gas. He searched the house. He found several ants. Sam called his landlord.

New Pet Toys. Sally had a little brother named Tommy. Tommy loved to chew on the toys, and his mother bought him some new ones. Tommy's favorite was the Spiderman toy. He would try and chew on the toy until it broke. He would then have to wait till he could chew on other toys.

Baby Girl. The baby was getting very large. He had a big mouth and lots of hair. My wife and I had to go to the doctor. The doctor examined him and said he was not going to eat well. I took him home and started giving him milk to drink.

Party. Molly threw a party for her friends. They all dressed in their best clothes. They got in their cars and headed to Molly's house. They had lots of fun making the noise and watching movies. Molly was very happy to have such a wonderful party.

Expensive Chocolate. It was Tim's birthday. He wanted a chocolate bar. Tim begged his parents to get him a bar. They agreed. They went to Tim's house for a party.

Forgetful Roll. Lori got up to go to work. But as soon as she started to walk, she forgot her coffee cup! As she was about to leave, she felt guilty about forgetting. She had been going to coffee in the morning. But when she got to work, she noticed she had no coffee cup at home.

kittens. I had two cats. One cat did not like cats. I took him to the vet. The vet gave me medication that made my cat less anxious. I no longer had two cats but had three kittens.

Power Steering. I drove home from work when my car started making strange noises. I pulled over in front of my house and waited. A strange man came out and asked me if I was a woman. I said I was not. We talked for a while and got back into the car.

The Perfect Steak. Cayla was a great cook. One day, she decided to make steak for the first time. She got all the ingredients together. She added the steak to the pan. Then, Cayla grilled the steak.

Trouble. Jane's favorite restaurant is gone. She was very upset. Her friends are going to the place again. They all get together at the new place. It doesn't take long before they get everything they want.
New Lipstick. I decided to buy a new lipstick. I found one that I loved. I ordered it online. When it arrived I immediately tried it on. I love the lipstick and will order it again soon.

Grouping. I was playing with my friends one day. We decided to have a group of five. We played the arcade for a little while. After that, we decided to play on the computer. I ended up being better than one person at a game.

Hot Summer Day. Kara's mom had invited her over to stay with them. Her mom said they were going out at the park and Kara could play. She was excited because she hadn't seen them in over a year. They ended up playing in the park and watching the sun set. Kara went home and went to sleep in her bed.

The Science Fair. Lori's class was having a science fair at school. Lori had to make a very specific experiment. Lori was excited, but not happy. At the fair, Lori worked on making the experiment look interesting. Lori and her science teacher won first place.
Etsy Business. John worked online for many years. He started a website called Etsy. He sold a few items on his website. He sold five more. Now he has many customers!

New shirt. Tim had been dying for a new shirt for a year. He finally had enough saved and saved up. He went to the store to get one. He found the perfect color and size. Tim was very happy with his purchase.

Bad Traffic. Sally was at the airport waiting for a flight. But when she got her check she realized the traffic was bad. She got nervous, so she checked her phone. She was able to check her phone just in time. And when she finally got to the gate, she was happy.

Help paying. Ava wanted to learn to ride a bike. But her mom was afraid. She didn't want her to ride an expensive bike. Her dad bought her some safety gear. Ava used the helmet and rode safely on her bike.
Charles and the Rose. Charles bought a rose. It was a pretty red rose. He wrapped it in a box. He gave it to his mother. Her heart melted.
Broken ipod. Tim dropped his ipod. It broke instantly. He didn't want to buy another one. He decided to buy one from a new store. He was happy with it.

Gas Money. Tom bought a brand new Mercedes Benz. He was excited to take it out for a drive. But after a few hours, it ran out of gas. He had to walk back home. He spent a few dollars on gas instead of a car.
Shot Put. Sue was on her way to the bar. She was drinking with friends. She was doing it on her way. It was raining and she missed her shot put. Luckily, she still got some beer.

Ice cream. My family loves to eat ice cream. They will always go to the ice cream parlor to get some ice cream. One day I got too sick to go to the ice cream parlor. I decided to go home for the day. Now I just order ice cream on the way home.

Stuck Kite. The wind blew and a small kite floated into the sky. The wind started to blow harder. The kite got stuck on a tree. The kite floated to the ground. The kite floated down and was finally rescued.
Rosie. Rosie was an excellent cook. She decided to try making burgers. She followed the recipe and made the burgers. They came out great. She had to have another batch next week.

Miranda fights a cold. Miranda was feeling a bit down. She decided to have a cold. She was nervous but decided to go to the doctor. The doctor gave her a prescription. Miranda was glad to be able to feel better.

The Movie. I found out I was going to see a movie. I did not want to go see a scary movie. I decided to watch a movie with a good story. The movie was scary, but I found it really interesting. I ended up going and I loved it!
Snowdrifts. There was so much snow falling today. I couldn't wait for it to stop. But I didn't want to get too cold! So I put on my warmest clothes. I was relieved to have everything to play in!

Rain. Tom loved to go to the beach. He loved swimming, so the beach was his favorite place to be. One night the sky got really dark and rainy. He could not find the beach so he decided to walk there. He finally found it when he arrived to the beach.

Jack. Jack's mother left him home alone and he was lonely. He decided to take his toys out and explore his surroundings. Jack walked to the back of the house and saw his mom sitting there. Jack asked why he had to get to the front of the house. Jack's mom told him that he was the youngest of five kids.
Mugry. The woman cleaned the car. The dog ran in. The woman went into the garage. The dog chased the woman. The woman got out of the garage.

Bad Hike. I decided to go for a hike yesterday. I packed a hiking backpack and a backpack lunch. We hiked through the woods in the park. When we got to the top, it was very hot. We turned around and went home.
Rapper. Nate joined the new rap group. He felt uncomfortable. The group started to talk at parties. Nate decided to ask them to join the band. The band accepted Nate.
Getting a Haircut. I went to the mall to get a haircut. The stylist did not know what I wanted. He showed me pictures. Then he let me choose from several. He gave me a perm and a braid.

Favorite Game. My son was playing the game of darts. He was winning the game with two seconds left. He kept saying he would stop. Eventually he did and hit the dart to the ground. The dart bounced up into the air and made a loud crunch.

The free brownies. Julia went out with her friends. She wanted to go to the market to buy some. While they were walking, she ran into a cute girl with brownies. She offered her a free brownie with no hesitation. When she got it, she took it home and ate it.

War Times. A group of soldiers and sailors crossed the sea. A submarine approached them, which started a war. The submarine attacked them. The soldiers fought the sub. The submarine was not able to sink the ship.

Orange Zest Water. One day I woke up one night. My friend came over with a glass of orange zest water. I drank the water with lemon juice. The water was delicious and refreshing. I decided to make a cup of it every day from now on.
Lightbulb. Tim had a light bulb in his room. He couldn't find it anywhere. He was very sad. He went to the store to get a new bulb. He got a different kind.

The Decorations. I was going to decorate my house. I found a few nice decorations and started to work. When I was done I had my house ready to look great. It took a long time to decorate but it was worth it. I will be glad to have my home decorated.
Socks. Jim had a long day at work. Jim decided to wear socks. Jim looked at his socks. He found some holes in the socks. Jim decided he would only wear socks from now on.

Sneak Attack. Dan was playing football with his friends. The game was tied and Dan was getting frustrated. Suddenly a car zoomed over him and his friends ran. They were able to knock the car off the other side. Dan was sad about losing but the team was fine.

Filling the Post. John was taking a walk in the park. He came across a small pond. He got his umbrella and walked to the pond. He picked up the fish and then placed it in the pond. When he was done, he walked home to feed his fish.

The Snowball Fight. My friend and I were throwing snowballs at each other. We were trying to make a snowball fight for a game. However, we ended up having to stop. It was very cold outside. We decided to use our blankets next time.

Clyde gets into a fight. Clyde is trying to be a big brother. He wants to take care of his little brother. He decides to hit him with a baseball bat. Clyde hits his little brother and knocks him out. Now, Clyde gets grounded for beating his little brother.
The Vaccine. Kim was visiting the doctor. She had been sick for a week. The doctor offered to give her a shot. She wasn't excited at all. But she got the shot and felt better.

The Rap. Barry was watching music videos on his phone. He was listening to the beats on a rapper's song. Barry was really excited about the song and was feeling pretty inspired. Barry decided to do a rap in his living room. Barry enjoyed making his friend very happy.

Lights. The car's headlights turned on. The driver got ready to get in his car. He realized there was too much traffic on the road. He had to turn around on the street. The driver turned around and got into his car.

Boat Trip. Last summer our family went to the river on the boat. I was terrified as the boat was smaller than most. We kept an eye on my daughter. When we were about halfway out the boat tipped over. Everyone was scared and we got out of the boat.

Dan goes to jail. Dan had been caught drinking. He was arrested for DUI. Dan was sentenced to three months in jail. After three months Dan got to see his daughter. He told his daughter he would be home soon.

Football. Sandra wanted to play football with her friends. She had never played it. She told her dad that she didn't want to play. He told her that she could play and go. Sandra didn't care and joined anyway.

Sprained Ankle. I was walking to my bus stop at school. All of a sudden, I felt a sharp pain in my right ankle. The pain only increased in the night. I walked home with a crutches. Afterwards, I had to go to the doctor.
The USS Hornet. Tommy got the USS Hornet. He was very excited. The Hornet took off. Tommy waited for the Hornet. It wasn't until later that Tommy found out he was lost.

Vision Changes. My wife's eye doctor asked us to pick out the glasses I would like. I chose a pair of red, gold, and yellow glasses. She took them off when the car arrived. When she returned them, she saw that they were gone. I had to wait a while for the other side of the store to be delivered.

Confession. Gina went to her friend Mary's house. Mary told Gina that her father had been talking about a boy. Gina didn't believe Mary. They both shared a confession. It turned out that Mary and her father had a boy, and they told her.

Lice. Dylan had a big yard and was mowing his lawn. A bee stung him and it stung him on the legs. The bee made itchy and he called 911. A vet came to help the mower company. The vet treated the bee and fixed the lawn.
concert. I was very excited. I just got tickets for the local college show. My sister and I went to the show. We had a great time. I was really glad that we had a great time.

Career Opportunities. Tim had a passion for the outdoors. He decided to go into work outdoors as a lifeguard. At his first job he worked out and did many laps. His coworkers all complimented him on his job. Tim was happy and decided to start doing his job outdoors more.
Gross teeth. Susie got a dentist's appointment. Her dentist said that she had a lot of cavities. So Susie had to fill some. But then she got sick. Susie ended up throwing up in her mouth.
steak throw. Caleb loves steak. His parents said that he could never eat steak. Caleb had the guts to eat steak. When he got home, he was very surprised. Caleb actually like steak more!

No Fish. Tom wanted to fish but didn't know where to find it. He went to his local fish market. There were so many fish for sale that he had no choice. Tom had a great time. He bought a few more the next day.

Greens. Jane planted a vegetable garden. She spent several months putting the garden in a pot. One day she noticed green beans growing from the pot. Jane decided to tend to them on her own. Jane made dinner with the green beans that night.
dress. I needed a dress. I went to the mall. I bought one and put it on. It was black. I was disappointed.

Marriages. Maryann got married at a famous hotel. She was overwhelmed with people she didn't know. She went to the coffee shop to talk to some. She asked the bartender how her engagement was. She learned it wasn't love after all, it was love.

Racoons for Dinner. Bobby lived on the third floor of a apartment building. He heard a big animal outside of his apartment. He was scared, so he called his neighbors. His neighbors said he had a raccoon problem. Bobby stayed home until he got the animal out.

Rattle and shake. My dad has been putting up his house up for sale. He posted his signs up and it was a bit scary. My sister had to play with them for awhile. We were scared because they are his real life. Now we will see if they sell.
A Dog's Life. The dog was being neglected. He laid in the backyard. He had nothing to eat and sleep with. He sat down on the couch and cried. He found a puppy in his backyard to play with.

Octopi. Sara's cat was named octopus. It was a little shy, but Sara always wanted him to have a friend. One day she gave him some of the food she brought. The cat immediately took it and purred all over. Sara was relieved to see that the cat was able to like his food.

The Car Mechanic. Lance decided to get a mechanic's license. He went to his local car mechanic to get his license. They started the repairs right away. When the mechanic was done the car was repaired. Lance drove off to be with his new mechanic.

Jake's Dog Chases A Squirrel. Jake loves to play with his dog. His dog likes to chase squirrels. Jake's dog chased a squirrel over a fence. Jake's dog chased a squirrel from the fence. Jake's dog and his dog chased squirrels for 2 hours in one day.
The Hatching. A small bird was chirping outside. She decided to go out and catch it. After awhile she went home. She laid a seed on her backyard. The next morning there was a very large bird.

Computer Day. Today I took my daughter out to a computer building. It's a small building so we went there for the conference. We were there for 3 hours, all we could talk about. Afterwards we went home and I went out to eat. It was a good day and we hope to go back tomorrow.

Example Essay. Fred was trying to write a school essay. He had just finished with his previous essay. Fred was tired of writing about his ideas. So he decided to write about a movie instead. He had a good time and finished the school essay well.
Balding. Lily had a braid on. Her boyfriend laughed at it. He suggested she cut it off. Lily told him it was the best braid ever. Her boyfriend got sick of it.

Weight Troubles. I was about to start school. As soon as I went on the bus, my eyes widened. The seats were so small and uncomfortable. I looked at the girl in front of me. It was her favorite sweater!

Birds. One summer day, it was raining very hard. I went outside to see what birds would be for lunch. There were tons of birds in my yard. My son, son in law and I walked around the yard with them. I fed them and took lots of pictures.

Lunch time. It was time for school. I decided to make a peanut butter and jelly sandwich. I also made fruit, peanut butter and jelly rolls. We enjoyed our lunch. I hope I can make a peanut butter and jelly sandwich for the next school day.

Moon Shine. One night the sun set behind the moon. The boys lay down to read the stars. The sun was shining bright and the moon was very low. The boys heard a loud pop and ran downstairs. They went in the house and found the source of the noise.

Silent Movie. We had to go see a movie. We chose to watch a quiet one. Everyone got the popcorn out of the popcorn and turned it on. I turned it off and watched the movie alone. The movie was very peaceful and quiet.

Designing Women. Cheryl wanted to design a new product for a new store. The only thing she could find on the shelf was a box of t-shirts. The Courthouse. The judge was trying to determine who can get the most bail money. The defendant in this case could not make his first move. The judge had to call the defendant's lawyer. The attorney was busy the whole time. The judge ruled against the defendant.

Don't Pull Me. I was driving to the grocery store on a very long road. I was looking at the road when a car began to pull me over. The driver was very angry and aggressively pulled me over. I looked at my car and found out it was totaled. I couldn't afford to buy a new car so I pulled my car home.

Mean girl. It was summer at Lynn's and Lynn liked to play outside. One day, Lynn noticed a mean looking kid walking around. It bothered her so much that she decided to fight the mean girl. Shopping Dilemma. Jane and Dan decided to go shopping. The girls shopped for a while. When they got home, they were hungry. The girls decided to go to the store and buy something. Unfortunately, the girls ended up buying nothing.
Healthy Sleep. Jim was feeling sick. So he went to the hospital. They had him sleep for an hour. But he woke up to his head ringing and sneezing. It turned out the cat had pooped all over him.

New Car. My boyfriend and I wanted a new car. We looked at the dealership and went over several options. We finally narrowed it down to a sedan and a convertible. We went to the dealership and asked for a specific model. We both were happy and decided to buy the sedan.

Runaway dumpster. Tim had a trash can he liked to throw in his home. Every year his neighbors would come and take it out. One year he realized he did not like throwing it out. Truck. A family of four went to the truck. They drove up to the back. They looked at the trailer. It was pretty cool. The dad got a promotion.
Foot the Bill. Bob's mom was sick. He spent the day caring for her. He left her some bills. His mom had to come to get them. Bob went home and made his mother dinner for dinner.
basement. My dad and I dug in the basement. We found a lot of stuff. We found an old book. We found the book sitting there. My dad sold it at a yard sale.

Couch and Chair. Amy moved into the new apartment. Her room was smaller than it had been. She started to feel uncomfortable. She knew that her roommate would be moving. Amy started to move the chair back.

nurse. Tina wanted to be a nurse. She always wanted to take care of sick people. She applied at a nursing school. She was accepted! Tina went and got a job teaching others.

The Nightmare. I woke up one morning and realized I wasn't in bed. I ran to the closet to look for my phone. I realized I had forgotten my phone in the closet. I walked back to my room and called the police. I was able to get my phone back.

New Phone. Jill had dropped her phone. The screen was broken. She tried to call a tech. It took a while. They came back and fixed her phone.

Henry's Shower. Henry always felt very dirty when he got home from work. One day he went to the bathroom. As he was sitting down he felt something wet on his leg. He had stepped out of the shower while the water was running. He looked down to see his pants soaked and wet.

Mike Olsen. I once tried to sell my girlfriend, Mike Olsen. We had the best conversations and she finally agreed to see him. It was my dream to talk to Mike Olsen but he was too shy to meet me. When I met Mike Olsen he told me I was crazy. I'm really glad that he finally met me, though.

A Mess in the Kitchen. Gina's mom said it was too late to clean the kitchen. She grabbed the trash bag and threw it in the dumpster. She started scrubbing but couldn't reach the bottom. As she was rinsing the floor, she slipped on a rock. She fell on the floor and got a bloody nose.
The dog parade. It was Sunday. Everyone was excited. They had a parade. It had dogs. It was the best parade ever.

Bat Mitzvah. I took my son to bat mitzvah in 2010. It was my first time and he really loved it. My son had a lot of fun in his new batmitzvah. We had a ton of fun playing music and watching the ball. I'm glad I took my son to bat mitzvah in 2010.
Tea tasting. Tina went to a tea tasting. She wanted to learn about how the different teas tasted. She thought about it. She tasted them. Tina found that they tasted fine.
Baby Boom. Nate got pregnant. He was told he would need to be in a hospital. Nate was told he was to have the baby boom. He did have a baby boom. Nate was able to have a successful baby boom.

Birthday Pie. Tom was celebrating his birthday. He decided to bake a pie. He put it in the oven. Tom didn't realize the oven was full. He burned the pie.
Cat and Mouse. The cat kept scratching me when I wasn't looking. My wife saw the cat. She told me to get a towel. I was in a lot of pain. My wife bought me a cat towel.

Winter Vacation. Janice loved to go to the winter. Her mother took her to visit a ski resort. Janice thought it would be too cold. But to her surprise, it was surprisingly fun. Janice ended up having a wonderful time skiing.

Problems. Bobby was on a road trip with his family. He was riding in a van for the first time. He noticed some problems with the van's brakes. He had a look at them but couldn't figure it out. Eventually he had to push to a new parking spot.

Bobert. Nelson owned a large black labrador retriever. He loved his pet, but his wife thought he was old-fashioned. Nelson didn't care. One day, he put his dog in the back seat of the car. He's now very well known as the Bobert!
Spanish test. Sally has a Spanish test today. Sally has studied all week. Sally went to her test. Sally studied very hard for the test. Sally aced the test.

Scaffolding. My friend and I were playing with blocks. A ball hit my arm and my dad got angry. He asked if we had to get it scraped up or not. I decided to do it, then. After we had it scraped up we were okay again.

The older man. The man had been out for days. He still felt too worn out to take a hike. He asked a friend of the man to accompany him. The man felt more like an old man. The man got up and joined his friend.
Bad dream. Jenny woke up to a terrible dream. Her dad was not there. She didn't hear him. She had a bad dream. She woke up with a horrible headache.
Prisons not all bad. I got a new porch for my house. I did not know the yard would be a mess. I put up some pbrs. The pbrs started the process. Within a week we had a new porch!
knock. I was trying to knock on a door. As soon as I knocked, someone responded. They gave me their name. They gave me their name and number. I never heard back from them again.

Christmas Vacation. Christmas was always our favorite time of year. We decided to take a vacation this year to Disney World. We packed our bags and headed to Disney World. When we arrived we were all greeted by Santa Claus. Our vacation was over with and we spent the rest of the week celebrating.

Sandwiches. I loved my peanut butter and jelly sandwich. However, my brother never ate the sandwich. I took a piece and he said he would eat it. However, I asked if I could keep it. Instead, he ate a piece of the pizza.

Meat. Anna was preparing food for her family. But she didn't have any bacon. She had forgotten about the bacon and it was too late. Anna's family was starving! She had to wait for her husband to return home to cook.

Water. Anna was walking to school. But then she stepped in icy cold water. She felt dizzy and nauseous. She was covered in water! But thankfully she made it back safely.

Painful Frisbee. Tom bought a new Frisbee with a lot of fun. He played a lot of it when he was out on the trails. Tom went hunting and had a lot of fun. However, he started to feel sick and hurt his leg. Tom stopped playing Frisbee and went home.

Seller. The woman left the store with her car and jewelry. She told me that she needed help to find a buyer. I offered to help her look for a buyer. She accepted my offer and we headed down to the mall. Once at the mall, we discovered that the lady was selling on ebay.

Coffee Place. My husband and I went to the coffee place last night. We had a lot of fun and talked a bit about life. I tried to ask him how he felt about things. He told me he enjoyed talking with me more than drinking coffee. It made me happy to hear that.
Blues. It was time for the annual church choir event. My daughter's choir was in the lead. We had to get to the church. We got there in the early afternoon. We sang all night long.

Hypocrite?. My girlfriend has been having trouble with me for weeks. She wants me to tell her if I have been faithful. I am afraid I might tell. My friend is also a homosexual, but they are not married. I think she wants me to tell.
Date Ditch. I went to the bar last weekend. It was called the date ditching place. They had pretty nice women there. They all had drinks. We had a good time.

sweet tooth. John was hungry one afternoon. John decided to eat a bowl of popcorn. John poured the popcorn into a cup of milk. John then poured the milk on his bowl of milk. John then poured a large amount of sugar on top of the milk.
