Chicken Soup. Dale was feeling a little sluggish. He wanted some chicken soup. His cat came over to him. Dale was happy to see his cat with the soup. His cat got to have the soup.
Return to sender. My nephew was in the military. He returned to us last week. We talked to him for several days. We then made plans to go on a vacation. I hope we can return soon.
Future Engineer. Dan was in high school. Dan had never been a engineer. Dan decided to major in business. Dan got a great job at his job. Dan now is a successful engineer.

Growing Plants is Hard. Liz decided to grow some tomatoes for dinner. It was difficult to get the plants to sprout. Luckily, she made several batches in a large pot. The plants were much smaller than the pots and pots before. It took her weeks to finally get the tomatoes sprouted.

No Patience at All. Nancy didn't like to take the elevator to the top floor. She decided to wait until the last minute before going up. But when she saw the train pulling away, she stopped. She realized that the train hadn't been coming very far. Instead of waiting, she ran straight to the front of the train.

New Attitude. Samantha was really nervous around her boyfriend. He was always being annoying and mean to her. She decided to break up with him. She was very sad to leave him but he was very nice. She was happy to move on from the relationship.

Careless Accident. Bob was out for a walk one day. He had not been paying attention in the road when he was hit by another car. He was hurt so badly it took him months to heal. He was very upset that he had no choice but to get back home. He never took the same route without thinking again.
School Play. John was in a play. He auditioned for a lead role. He was chosen and made the lead role. John and his friends had a lot of fun. John loved being a part of the play.
Champ. I went to a bar last night. I met a new friend named Steph. He was a college grad. I saw a photo of Steph on the internet. It was a cool photo, but I didn't get the message.
new boyfriend. I met a guy at the bar. It wasn't long before I started dating him. We spent the next few months together. I had my first date with him and he was so cute. Now I'm in a relationship!

Sydnee's Song. Sydnee wanted to sing her favorite song. She had tried to remember it but it was so hard! Sydnee started writing and recording it on her computer. She sent it to her friends to try to find it. To her surprise, a few people shared it and offered to help her.

Novel. Ned's grandfather loved going to the library. He would read and re-read old books and take them out. But as he was an adult, he never finished a novel. Instead, he had to make a collage. Ned used this collage to write his novel.

Water bottle. Tina went to the restroom to put her water bottle away. When she came back she realized that her water bottle had broken. She went to the store to buy a new water bottle. She found one that was pink and pink. She bought the pink water bottle and put it in her sink.

Bad Joke. Gina's sister was always telling jokes to people. Gina hated her sister's antics. One day she decided to tell a good one. She began to tell jokes about the person she liked. Gina learned to be more considerate of her sister's jokes.

The Speaker. Tia was working on her laptop in the library. She kept hearing voices in the background. Finally she heard them speaking to each other. Tia turned on the computer and saw her screen beeped. She saw a new speaker next to it that sounded a lot better.

Visit. Anna's best friend, Nellie, was in a car accident. Her friend's dad was taking Nellie to visit her. But Anna's grandma didn't want Nellie to get lost. She tried to make Anna look sad, but it was impossible. Finally, Anna's mom got her and they went to visit the girl.
Sleeping Early. Tim went to a party with friends. He was a little too drunk. They tried to sneak him to sleep. Tim wound up sleeping on the floor. He woke up feeling much better.

The Noisemaker. My husband bought a loud noise-dance machine for our bedroom. We did not use it for a while, until it started making some noises. We asked him to try to fix it, but he refused. Then one day he woke up from a nap and noticed the noise! He realized it was the noise-dance machine he bought!
Banana Peel. My mom bought a banana peel. She gave it to me. My skin was puffy. I tried to peel it. It made my skin puffy all over.

Soggy. Seth noticed it was still pouring from the bathroom faucet. He went to the sink and grabbed some drain cleaner. After he was done it was not as bad as it looked. But then Seth noticed it tasted funny and gross. He cleaned the drain cleaner, and it was still soggy.
Fencing. The other day my friend invited me to play matchmaker. We had to go to a house in a condo building. It was very small. We did not get any shots. My friend was disappointed.

Raul's Cat Costume. Raul is excited to wear his new cat costume to school. He has a few friends with suits. The cat costume looks great. Raul's friends make fun of him for it. They tell him that cat costumes are silly.
Pool trip. We have two kids in our pool. The kids have all different personalities. They love the water and the air. They love the fresh air. We all wish we could stay forever.

New Kittens!. Jan was feeling sad about getting rid of her kittens. She decided to adopt a few. She drove over to the pet store to look around. She picked out two cute kittens to adopt. Jan gave each kitten her name and loved them forever.

Black Friday. The Black Friday sales started out like anything but a breeze. I got a phone call and went inside to watch the sale. At one point a man came running through with a big screen tv. I ended up being able to find a few deals before it was time to leave. I got in touch with the manager and he agreed to work with me.

Puppy. Benny wanted a puppy, but his parents said no. He asked his mother if he could get a puppy if he tried hard. His mother gave him one that looked a bit like a guinea pig. He played with the puppy and tried to eat it. But the puppy ended up knocking Benny to sleep.
A dog. Tommy had a dog. Tommy didn't see the dog often. The dog liked the light so much that he kept coming back. He had to use a light and a door. He finally realized the dog had become sick.

Ready Supper. The food was ready for dinner and I couldn't wait. When I got to the table, my friends were waiting. I was eating my burger and fries. The man took my sandwich and placed it on the table. I didn't take a bite because the man took the last bite.

The Dress. It was the very first day of school. Brianna had her dress ready in her closet. She put the dress on and walked outside. When she walked out the door she saw her dress ripped. Her mom had to go out and buy a new dress.

Teased. Tom was a teacher in high school. One day Tom received a new student for the school year. The new student was a little bit creepy. Tom noticed that he wasn't able to get along with him. He decided to stick out for a while and get a date for another student.

Paws. Kenny was working on a project on the computer. He was trying to make a lot of money. He was only working on one game. He needed his hands full. He found an extra source of money and finished the game.

No makeup allowed. Tina was an elementary school student. Her teacher was asking her to get her makeup done. Tina said she wasn't sure how to get it done. Tina's mother tried to explain but it wasn't working. Tina got a huge red eye in her eye and couldn't do anything.
Super Mario. Tim was playing Super Mario Kart. He didn't think he did a good job at it. His score was really high. When he got to the final, he couldn't do anything. He was so disappointed.
False Alarm. Tom was late for work. He had a few drinks. Tom accidentally overslept. Tom's boss heard him. The boss made Tom throw away the drinks.

The Card Collection. Cathy loved collecting cards. She collected many different types of cards. Cathy found a card that was very rare and beautiful. Cathy bought the card and took it to a shop to be appraised. Cathy was excited to find the rare card was worth $200.

Migraine again!. I got a migraine the other day. I went to the doctor the next day. He prescribed me some medicine. I took the medicine and it made me feel better. I am now able to function normally again.

Snake in the grass. The couple went on a hike in the woods. Suddenly, they heard something squeal as a snake crawled out of the bush. They thought the snake was a raccoon. They got back in their car to get their tools. When they returned, they found the snake was a lizard.

Too Much of a Wait. Tim's friends were coming over for dinner. They were supposed to bring an order. But Tim and his friends waited for an hour. When they finally arrived, they were surprised. Tim and his friends realized they'd left the wrong order!
Erin and the dog. Erin wanted a pet dog. He begged his parents for a dog. One day, they got a new puppy. His parents were sad at first. But soon they understood and they were happy.

Statistics. Maurice wanted to be a statistics major. He was very good at statistics. He got a great job working with data sets. Maurice took a statistics course at his local university. Now Maurice is a Statistics major at his local university.
Comeback. Tim always loved to try. He was not able to get a good grade in school. He decided to retake his test. The next day he took the same test again. He was able to pass this time.

Tadpoles. Gina was at a picnic with her friends. She was looking through the basket. She was surprised to find a baby turtle. It was still alive and still breathing. Gina realized she must have left it inside the basket.

Big Test. Jill was taking a big test. She wanted to pass the class. The teacher gave the students a note about the test. Jill tried her best to not cry but her nerves overwhelmed her. She failed the test.
Space Heater. I went out on a date last night. We decided to go to a local bar to have some drinks. We walked into the bar. We had the best drinks of our lives. It was a nice night.

Perfect polish. Marissa was working on her nails. She applied a nice green polish. Marissa took the polish to the bathroom. She put the polish on her nails. Marissa was proud of the polish she was painting.

Free Food. Trent didn't like to cook but he wanted to go out one weekend. He went to the store to buy food. He found some delicious, local food. He ate it right away. He was satisfied with his purchase and was happy.

Family Strife. My dad and I went to a family reunion. We went by the ocean, and my dad fell in the water. He was so embarrassed, I don't know how we can swim. Everyone ran out to try to help him out. We all laughed, as the water was not so deep after all.
Reader. Tom was a new reader. He tried to learn a new book. Tom would always read books that he hadn't read. He became annoyed by it. He would read whatever it was offered for his attention.

The Bank Robber. Two robbers walked through a bank with their guns drawn. They approached a woman working the counter. They demanded $200 from her purse. The woman told them that they were thieves! The bank robber ran off with $100 and two men!

Roadtrip. My friends and I took a roadtrip for a few weeks. We had some really good luck in the long drive. Unfortunately the road was so bad we couldn't make it back. The other way we went was really, really bad. We decided to take a different road trip the next week.
Stinky Feet. Manny was not feeling well. He threw up on the carpet and felt awful. He realized he was not wearing any shoes. Manny went to the store. He bought new shoes.

Awkward Shave. Mina was excited to have a new hairstyle. She went to her stylist for a short, sexy haircut. Mina was excited to be doing her hair in the mirror. When the stylist came in, the stylist cut her hair. Mina was shocked that she didn't like the new haircut.

The Free Burgers. The Smiths were looking forward to a barbecue. They were going to have burgers. The kids were excited to meet their parents. They got all their friends together. They all had a great time at the barbecue.
Cookies. Mary loves to make cookies. She makes cookies every morning. This morning, she decided to make more cookies. She ate a dozen of the cookies. Mary was happy to make more cookies.

Runaway Dog. We have a very old dog who has recently been out of our home. We have found her hiding under our couch for days. When she got there she found a dead cat. She was happy to see her owner come pick her up. When we went outside she ran for a while but then got out.

Small Box. The little girl found a small box with an envelope on it. She couldn't believe it when she saw the contents. Her mom had left the old box in the hallway. The little girl wondered if she had seen the old box. She went upstairs and opened the old box.

Gas Station Blues. When I was little, we got in trouble in the school. We'd sneak out and use the gas station to do tricks. We even ran it as fast as we could. I got a bit of a leg cramp after a few times. So now, I'll never do anything silly again.

Gus the Zombie. Gus went to visit a friend in the woods. Gus heard a cry as he approached. He came closer to see a man holding a young boy. Gus quickly approached the boy. Gus's friend turned and threw a rock at him.

Clean Numbers. Jane decided she needed to get a new set of bathroom numbers. She needed the numbers to complete her bathroom renovation. Jane went to the store and purchased some. She returned home and started the installation. After Jane finished the bathroom she was proud of the work.

Cold Shower. Joey is always cold. So he takes a shower in the freezing cold water. This was cold enough today so he could hardly get comfortable. Joey's parents let him in the shower but he was too hot to sleep. Joey still hasn't slept in the cold yet.
Runner. John was a great runner. He ran track and ran high school. He was a captain of his high school team. He won many awards. He got a scholarship to college.

Slippery Situation. The man got on a roller coaster. He saw that it was sliding down a slick hill. He went inside to wait for the ride to end. His legs were all wet. The ride ended up making a huge water spill.

Making Dinner. Lily decided she wanted to make dinner. Her mom told her she would do the dishes. Lily got ready to do the dishes. She opened the fridge and got a bowl of soup. She started to make dinner and it was great!

Trial. Kimmy wanted to be a lawyer. She had all the qualifications, but she needed to practice. So she hired a tutor. He taught her the importance of her courtroom skills. Kimmy now has her own practice courtroom to work with.

New Crush. Tom was meeting friends at a bar. His friends were looking for a girl to dance with. Tom didn't like that look and decided to ask. He asked the girl if she liked him but she didn't seem. Tom left the bar feeling very awkward.

Poetic Success. When i was in high school i decided to become a poet. To my surprise i've become a popular poet. i had many fans who wanted to meet with me. I've been a very popular poet for over a year now. I think i have a chance to get a book published.

The big storm. Cindy was excited for her morning walk in the park. It was a nice clear morning. She decided to walk for an hour before heading back home. However, a hurricane came through the area. She ran inside when it stopped, and then ran outside again.

Searched. The man was caught sneaking out of the building. He went to the window and looked at his keys. He saw the window was open. He decided to just walk in the house without a word. The man was caught.
The quick move. I went on vacation with my girlfriend to the desert. I was very excited. But when we got there, she was very sad. We had no idea where to go. So we left and went home.

Pool closing. The Smith family was planning on going to the pool one day. The kids all decided to bring their swimsuits. Unfortunately their pool was closing. The whole family was upset. They didn't want to go back to the hotel.

A Neighbor's Passing. Jim lived in a large apartment with his wife. Every day Jim would go outside to check his mail. One day Jim decided to check his mail himself. He found out his mail was being delivered to the wrong address. Jim paid his neighbor a small fee to get the mail delivered to him.

Game-Winner. Kevin was playing goalie with his hockey team. The puck was being pushed really far across the ice. The puck was moving slowly as it passed a couple people. It was hard to see but he saw it hit a friend and knocked him out. He didn't win but he gave his team a small trophy.

The movie. Molly was looking for the perfect movie. She wanted to see a romantic comedy. She read reviews of it online. She decided to call the studio and tell them the good review. She got an extra part in the movie.

Eyesight. Gina didn't want to wait in line to use the bathroom. But she didn't want to leave her room until she got there. Her eyesight wasn't good enough. But it didn't matter because she knew she'd be in the bathroom for a long time. Gina was going to be late for class again.

Lifting Weights. Jane is lifting weights for work. She has to go to the bathroom. She does not want to lose the weight. Jane has a big cup of coffee and a bowl of cereal. Jane goes and uses her bathroom to do the work.

Plaque. Toby was at the aquarium with his family. They had all the different types of fish. He tried to pick one out that would be the most colorful. After a while he got very frustrated. He decided to just hide from it.

Free Haircut. Tom was excited for the new school year. He went to the barber's shop with his parents. After getting his haircut he was very excited. Tom did not think much about it. When he got back he noticed his hair had gotten completely shaved.

Cookies. One of my favorite snacks for breakfast is chocolate chip cookies. I am always buying them as a snack. This week I decided to make some with almond milk instead of peanut butter. They were so delicious, I decided to make them all the time. Now I have a new favorite snack that I love to make.

The Grand Slam. Ronda always wanted to be a world champion. She trained every day to improve. When it was time for her match, she was ready. She started out doing very well. She ended up losing by two strokes.
Sam. Sam was a pretty good baseball player. He was not great at pitching. He practiced everyday. He eventually got a tryout with a team. He failed it and never played baseball again.

Rain OUt. Amber went to the park with her family to play in the rain. She got some rain clothes and headed to the car to go. She got to the park and everyone was happy to be out in the rain. They had fun and then the rain stopped and Amber was fine. Amber then headed home with a fresh cup of hot chocolate.

Dessert. It was Anna's turn to bring dessert. She decided to bake some cookies. When she got home from work she started to smell something bad. She didn't know what was wrong, so she opened the cookie jar. Then she realized that the cookies were burnt.
Box of Candy. The boy found a box of candy. It was hard to open. He tried to open it. It was too small. He decided to eat the candy that he found instead.

Spy. Bob was a secret agent in the Navy. He was hired to get a man's daughter's phone number. Bob tried to find the number himself. Bob's daughter answered the phone. She got him a man to call on her behalf.

Jasmine's Ring. Jasmine has lost her ring since she was five years old. One day while walking around the mall she noticed something shiny on the ground. Jasmine examined the object and saw that it was a diamond ring. Jasmine cried that she lost her precious wedding ring. Her parents bought her a new ring from the jewelry store.

Mistake. I just got a job and needed to make a lot of money. My friend recommended I try applying to a grocery store. I decided to go to a grocery store to get the job. Unfortunately, I got the job by mistake and had to give it up. I decided to get a part time job so I could make enough money.

Late night Snack. My friend went on a date with a boy at the bar tonight. His date wanted to see a movie. The two met at the theater. He asked her to go see a movie with him. She declined and went home.

5 Years. The woman called to her sister for money. Her sister did not accept money from her. She told her sister about her situation. Her sister said she was not doing anything and not to worry. The woman was not happy about the situation.

hostage. A man tried to sneak out of his home. His car had been stolen. He was in trouble with his brother and his parents. The man was arrested for his attempted escape. He was sent to prison for three years.
Caldwells. Caldwell's friend had a cat. Caldwell's cat was not happy with the cat. He put the cat in a closet. The cat didn't like the closet. Caldwell tried a new type of food for the cat.

Bad aloe gel. Allie was putting on her hair. She had a lot of aloe. It was going to be a bad smell. She tried wiping it off but it still burned. Allie had to call the repairman and had to get it fixed.

Zoe for President. Zoe was a hard working woman. She ran a successful campaign for President. Zoe ran the campaign by staying on the stump. A Democrat Candidate won the election. Zoe is now president of her husband's business.
New guitar. Fred bought a guitar for school. He went to the guitar shop to pick one out. The salesman didn't show up. Fred called the salesman. He finally picked out the guitar he liked best.

Cheesy. My husband and I just got a new dog. We got the dog from the pound. When we took it out we noticed some people were standing over. We decided we needed to keep the dog. The dog was really delicious and we bought another.

Jay at the concert. Jay was going to a concert with his friends. He thought he would go with them but it was way too loud. Jay was having a really good time, though. Jay was surprised to see that his friends had fun. Jay had a great time at the concert.
Gun range. John was at the gun range. He was shooting several bullets in his gun. He accidentally fired a stray bullet. It was still in his gun. John picked it up and fixed it.

Stylist. Tom was hired to be the manager at a new company. He was nervous and wanted to impress the new staff. Tom's co-workers were impressed and loved him. Tom showed them his stylist and they loved it. Tom was promoted to manager and had the best stylist ever.
The Garden. Lulu was on a date. They were in a small apartment. Lulu was very hungry. They decided to eat at a food truck. It was the best date she's had in awhile.

piano lessons. I had to go to my piano recital. The instructor was very good. I practiced for months and months. When I went on stage, I was nervous. Thankfully, I was able to get the performance very good.

Special Ingredient. Ben decided to try to make a special meal for his brother. He went to a store and bought all the ingredients. Then he got home and began to cook. Ben got distracted from the cooking, however. After many hours of trying he was able to find a good recipe.

Too Busy. The family decided to visit a local farm. They had a lot of fun. But as they left, a large truck came up and began to follow them. The kids jumped and yelled at the truck. They learned their lesson.

The bus ride. My brother took the bus home from school one day. He was driving very slowly to avoid a car. The driver did not notice. One of the tires was flat on the passenger side. They both sat in traffic in the back for the rest of the ride.

Best Formula. I have a lot of health issues. I've been dieting for months and I haven't even been sick. The other day I was really hungry. I made a big bowl of my favorite formula. It turns out the formula is delicious.

Card Games. My brother in law used to be a card game player when I was younger. I never really saw any of it in the world. When my family visited, we visited the casino. One of my brothers in law lost a lot of money on cards. I was very upset to see his lost money.
Questioned. Allie was in school. She was playing video games. Allie got detention. When she got back her dad was very upset. He grounded her for a week.
The Race. Tom joined a race with his friends. The car was very fast. Tom kept going faster than everyone else. Tom was on his way to first place. He won the race.
Dunkirk. My wife and I had a great time in Dunkirk. We were on a boat in the bay. We boarded the boat and it stopped at a large lake. We got there and started walking around. We had a great time.
Pimple Face. Timmy was a shy kid. His mom had a pimple. Her mom tried to get it out. Unfortunately it got stuck in Timmy's face. Timmy cried in his room the rest of the night.
A Lap of Coffee. Jane had a cup of coffee at the cafe. She didn't know how it tasted. She poured water into it. She put it in the refrigerator. She went to sleep instead.

Rated R. My wife had an overweight daughter who wanted a car. She asked her mom to buy her a car and a bike instead. Her mom did not like this idea. She told my wife she would get the car and bike. She bought the car and bike and we bought the car and bike.

Pizza. A group of girls went to the kitchen. Their favorite thing to do was eat pizza. One of the girls bought a dozen of pepperoni pizzas. She loved how they came out of the oven. The girls decided they would eat pizza a lot more.

Gossip. A man liked to gossip on the internet. He made jokes about all sorts of different people. He even insulted his friends. One day his friends found out. He was banned from the Internet for life.

Ikea Store. Ikea was looking forward to working with me at Ikea. We met there at 9:00 sharp. Ikea started to talk and laugh with me and her husband. It was very nice to finally be involved with Ikea. Now we have to find a new home to buy together.
Breakup. Jenna had a crush on Tom. She had heard from Tom that he was gay. Tom's friends didn't know. They went to a dance. Tom broke up with Jenna.

The Blood Drive. A group of volunteers got together at the local gym. They donated blood on Saturday. After that, they had a pizza and watched movies. It was a fun day with no problems. The group had a great time.

Spree. I went out to the bar last night. I noticed a girl waiting for me outside. She had a boyfriend and had no money. I went to the bar to find her. She was so drunk I forgot she was looking for me.

The Missing Pie. John was walking along the park when he spotted a beautiful pie. He pulled up to the woman who'd left it all by herself. He asked her how it was but she said she had stolen it from the store. John looked around until he saw a stranger looking at it. She was standing in the middle of the park holding it.

Deep-fried. Sally and her friends went to eat at a fancy restaurant. They ordered their food and waited for it to arrive. It was then that the waiter brought Sally her food. Sally was not very excited. She was surprised when she was given her food as well.
Burger. John loves eating fast food. He ordered a burger on the way home. He thought he would eat the burger as soon as it got there. John ended up eating the burger. John went back for more.

Gratitude. I was asked by a friend for my help on a project. I am not that proficient in math. I asked him for help, but he told me not to. In return, he gave me some homework for free! My grades went up, and my friend was happy!
Annie's Test. Annie has a test tomorrow. She has studied all week. She decided to skip her test. Annie had to take the test later that day. Annie failed her test.

Little League, Big Dreams. Ralph was always the first one to play Little League baseball. Ralph was a little boy. Ralph's team was in the championship. Ralph wanted to play. He was on the first base but could not play.
Soccer. I went to the park for some fun. There was a soccer field. I started playing with my friends. I was really bad at it. I did really poorly on the game.

Breakfast. My mom got up very early this morning. She had a long day at work. She decided to make herself breakfast. I was so happy to finally get her out. I ate all of my cereal, and she was so happy.
Messy Studio. I was working on a piece of code. I took a break for a bit. A friend decided to come and help me. We built a nice table. We hung out and talked about our work.

Trying To Stop A Thief. Nora's mom kept her in bed all day. She decided to take her to school. She said she would take her if she got an A on her report card. Nora got an A on her report card. She was glad to have an excuse to go to school.
Icy Roads. A man took a road trip on icy roads. It was very slick. A large pothole broke through. It caused a lot of damage on his car. He was so happy to get his car fixed.

Pool and ice cream. The Smith family wanted to take a family trip. They had been looking for a summertime tradition. One day they decided to have a pool and ice cream for the family. They loaded the car and drove to the local ice cream parlor. They were delighted when they could finally enjoy ice cream.

Too Old To Trick Or Treat. Sara was getting ready to go trick or treating. She realized that it was her birthday and she didn't know which candy to get. Sara called the local candy shop and decided to buy some candy. The store's owner came by and told her to get her own candy. Sara then walked to the store and picked out her favorite candy.
Tough Test. Tom's family was taking an important trip. They were going on a cruise to Florida. Tom was worried that he would not make it. He studied hard all week. Unfortunately it didn't matter.

Messy theater. Linda loved the new blockbuster that came out. The movie was really bad and so Linda decided to leave. She tried to find a theater that had good reviews. Her favorite one was very crowded and a little claustrophobic. Linda did not like her new theater so she went back home.

Between the pages. Jenny loved to read. She loved to read so much she could only read books. She would read so many books that she felt like her books were too large. Her doctor told her she had to stop drinking so much coffee. She stopped drinking coffee and found it very rewarding.

Nick Goes to England. Nick was excited to go to England. Nick was planning to travel there for a weekend. He booked a tour with his friend. They arrived at the airport. The tour guide helped them explore the British city.

Breakfast Noodle. We went to the park to eat our breakfast nog in the park. My brother was eating the nog while we were there. He picked his nose with the nog and started coughing. I helped him clean up the nog and he felt better. I gave him one of my nog.

No Self-Service. Karen couldn't afford to buy a new TV in her house. She decided to do online research online. She looked online and found her local retailer. She was told they were out of stock of her TV. Karen purchased the TV from the store the next day.

Car Keys. Gina went to her room to retrieve her keys. She realized they were nowhere in the house. She was forced to sit and wait. She was unable to get the keys out of the lock. The car keys were in the back door lock.

Jake Takes A Test. Jake wanted to take a test for the SAT. He looked online for a good book to read. He found a book that was about a lot of important things. Jake read the book. Jake got a great score on the test!

Wide Feet. Jane's feet were really wide. Her friend was having a birthday party. Jane knew her friend would need a pair of shoes. Jane got her friend a pair of shoes. Jane's friend was thrilled with her gift.

College. Cory loved going to college. He really loved it so much that he didn't care. After school he would do whatever he wanted. He went off to the college right away. After a while he got kicked out of the school and lost his college experience.

Summer Reading. Lorraine decided she would read books this summer. She signed up for a summer reading class. She got to take out some reading books and read. The books made her happy and she wanted to repeat it. Lorraine was happy she was going to summer reading classes.
The Lottery Win. Jared had lost his job. Jared decided he wanted a new job. Jared decided to purchase a lottery ticket. Jared purchased the ticket and entered the contest. Jared won the jackpot!

Ben starts a food fight. Ben is having lunch with friends. His friend Ben wants to eat some food. Ben starts to eat some food. His friend's friend Ben grabs his food. Ben doesn't want to have his food back.
Too Much Rain. Bob had a long day at work. He had just finished his shift. When he got home he was exhausted. He took a shower. When he got out he was soaked!
The Drums. Bob was in a band. He practiced everyday. He started to practice really hard. Bob tried to go on tour. It was too hot and he decided not to go on tour.

Baby Bird. When we were kids, we had a baby bird in our backyard. We put the bird in the bird house and put it outside. But the bird got in a tree. The bird flew down to the ground. It laid down there and I had to find it.
starfish. Ivy was walking along the beach. She saw a starfish. She picked it up and took it home. She took care of it. It eventually became her pet.

Long Distance. Bill had been driving his truck for a long time. He was trying to get a bit more fuel to get it back on the road. His truck had a flat tire and needed to be towed. Bill had to take a long trip to get there. When he got there the tow truck was already there!
Friends. Eve was having a very good day. Her best friend came to visit. They talked all day. Soon, they were best friends. The next day, Eve couldn't be happier.

The Baby. Amy was pregnant and waiting for her baby to be born. She couldn't wait to watch her baby's first steps! She was ready to give birth! Amy was sure she would feel happy. Her baby was beautiful, full of energy.

Let It Go. Tim was in his car with his girlfriend. He was having a lot of fun on the road and felt that it would be nice. Unfortunately Tim's girlfriend would not listen and she got out of the car. Tim tried to calm down but she was furious. Tim and his girlfriend spent the rest of the day getting in trouble.

John's Idea. John was tired of not having any hobbies in life. He decided to start doing something that was outside his comfort zone. He started working on building model airplanes. The airplanes took several Years and John was really proud. He knew he was going to be excited to do them again.

Saving For The Future. Amy's mom was an 80 year old woman. The 80 year old woman was in the hospital with a minor heart attack. Her doctor was planning a visit. Amy wanted to meet her for the visit. She put an online ad in the paper to make friends.

The game payment. Mark loved video games. He knew that he was not old enough to be on it. He asked his mom if she would give him a video game. Mark was so excited. Mark finally got his own video game.

Peanuts. I was sitting at my friends house one day. My friends were smoking cigarettes. I tried to have a cigarette in my hand. But I accidentally stubbed a piece of my thumb on a needle. I never wanted to smoke a cigarette again.

Treatment. Sally was very worried about her little son. She took him to see the doctor. They made an appointment for him to see a doctor. The doctor gave him an evaluation. Sally was relieved when he was prescribed some pills.

A Break. Gina was walking to her classroom. She saw a pretty girl she wanted to talk to. Gina approached her to ask if she needed help. The girl didn't say anything but started walking away. Gina followed her.

Monster Truck Show. Karen wanted to learn to ride a monster truck. Her mom and dad taught her how to get on. But they thought it was dangerous. Karen's mom and dad bought her a monster truck. Karen's dad and dad decided to let her ride her monster truck.
lost boy. Tom lost his son. He looked for him everywhere. His wife found him in the bathroom. They looked everywhere. He wasn't found until a few weeks later.
The awful truth. Tina was in the cafeteria. Her friend came and took Tina with her. Tina thought her friend liked her. However, Tina was wrong. She was so hurt by the truth.
The meal. Tiffany was starving. She went to the kitchen for some food. She looked for something easy to cook. She settled on a chicken sandwich. Tiffany ate her sandwich.

Babysitter. Janice worked as a secretary at a restaurant. She had to babysit five children. At one point, the children became extremely angry and started screaming. The children became upset that they had to sleep at a friend's house. They started to cry so Janice moved away.

Amber's Weekend. Amber loved to spend weekends with her friends. Amber would go fishing, riding her bike, or playing. One day, Amber's friend asked her to go on a trip to Vegas. Amber did the trip, and found a beautiful hotel in Vegas. Amber then spent her weekend at the hotel, having a blast!

Return Policy. Sally needed to return her new phone to her local store. The store denied her. Sally decided to return the phone to her local phone store. However, Sally's phone was confiscated by the cashier. Sally was never able to return the phone to the store again.

Dancing. Lana liked dancing and was always on time. Her friends invited her to go dancing for fun. Lana thought it would be fun. She told all her friends they were out of time. Lana's friends told her she needed to learn some new skills.

Refusal. Jan was at a party with her friends. The girls were having a hard time agreeing on what to watch. When they were on the last one of their screens the other girls wanted. Jan was upset because she did not want to watch a movie. Her friends agreed they should watch the movie.

The Bank Job. My wife was at a bank this afternoon. She had to fill out a job. She had to sign up for the part she was supposed to do. She was very nervous about it. Luckily she got it done in no time.

Christmas Tree. I bought a tree for my living room. I spent days cutting down the branches and putting them in the tree. I watered and cared for the tree every day. I loved how my tree looked and felt. I ended up buying another one for the living room.

Ceramics Class. Today my daughter was invited to an art class. She showed up at the class with a red box of markers. The teacher gave her a marker to hold up. She started to draw. She drew a picture of a man.

Missed Bus. Jake had missed a bus on the way home from school. He wasn't able to get a cab after work. Jake missed the bus home. Jake called his boss to see if they could go to the next bus. Jake went to the next bus.

Baseball game. I went to a baseball game with my wife. We were getting ready for the game. We looked over the game and we saw that the stadium was a lot. We decided to go to another stadium. We loved the game and it was great.

Senator. Joe liked to talk to people in the local town. It was the kind of town where people were more interested in politics. So Joe thought about running for Senator. He decided to run for senator as a Republican. Joe became a senator and never looked back.

Always late. I needed to buy a new bed. I looked around but didn't find the right one. I called a lot of friends but they couldn't find one. I decided to go to Walmart and ask. I finally found the bed I wanted.
Death. Tim was a great driver. One day he was hit by another car. The driver was severely hurt. Tim was hospitalized. He died peacefully on his way home.

Trouble Cats. Lizzie's cat wasn't getting along with her cats. They were always fighting and barking. She tried feeding the cat treats but it never seemed to calm it. She was determined to train it but could never. Finally she had to go back to the shelter.

Crying. My wife's coworker, Sally, started to cry on Friday night. Sally started crying on Friday morning, so the coworker called 911. Sally called her boss, and her boss made Sally go to her work. Sally sat in the office, and her coworker yelled at her. Sally went to bed in the office, and she had a good night.
Cautious Taxi. Tom was driving around. A homeless man stopped to pick him up. Tom didn't have a card and wanted to pay. He had no money to pay but did so anyway. Tom was able to do it on time.

The Van. Tom's girlfriend was going out on a date. He took her to a fancy restaurant. The girls spent all day drinking wine. It was so much fun that the girls kept looking. When they were back home, they found their keys under the couch.

Gold digger. One day I was digging through my garage. I found a silver dollar on the floor. It was in a little puddle and very shiny. I put the dollar in the trash to be picked up. I went home and was sad when I had no dollar to buy food.

Parasailing. The Jones family wanted to go parasailing. The first thing they did was get a small boat. Next they bought new sails. The family took the boat on a fishing trip. The first fish they caught was a nice brown snook.
Hockey Fight. I was skating with a friend. We were skating across a bridge. A group of guys started to argue. My friend started to yell at the guys. I pushed one of the guys out of the way.

Snow Storm. Sam was having trouble staying awake. She was tired of not being able to fall asleep. Sam read online that it was due to the heat. Sam decided to have a warm cup of coffee in the morning. She was able to stay awake by having coffee every morning.
Expert Boxer. I am a boxer. I trained hard for a very big fight. I sparred with the champion. I knocked him out in the fifth round. He still trains harder than me.

Book. When I was a child, I loved to read. I had a favorite book that I would go into every day. One day I went to the bookstore. There, I saw a small book that had a few pages. I bought it and started reading it every day.
Hound Control. Tom was in a dog walk. He kept getting a bunch of barking. He kept checking for problems. He eventually asked a vet for help. The vet told him there was nothing they could do.

Loud Party. My brother has been fighting in a big house. His neighbors say he is making a lot of noise. They complain that he is so loud. He has been doing it for a while. He ended up having to move to a smaller house.

The First Pay. Jenny worked in a store. She needed to buy some snacks. She tried walking past the cashier. Jenny was so nervous she was having to leave. She went into the kitchen and bought some crackers.
Free Samples. Toby was shopping for groceries. He noticed a bag of free samples. Toby decided to get some. He purchased a lot of samples. He was happy with the amount of samples he bought.

Fun day at the Carnival. The Smiths had been going to the carnival all summer. It was their last stop before going to work. They bought a giant water ride for the afternoon. They rode it all afternoon on it. They came home exhausted and happy but tired.
Drinking. Tom was at the bar. He was drinking some beer. Someone asked him for a glass of water. Tom declined. Tom was embarrassed and decided not to drink alcohol.

STAR TESTING. I was bored at home. I decided to check the internet. I looked at my favorite sites and looked at youtube. I also watched movies on tv. I left my computer on my couch and watched tv for a whole hour.
Friend. The man asked his friend to get him some ice cream. His friend agreed. The man got his friend some ice cream. His friend was surprised. He asked him for another scoop of ice cream.
Dead end job. The woman was a nurse. One day she had to give a dying patient some oxygen. She was really scared. She ended up dying. That made her a very good nurse.

Movies. Randy went to the movies with his girlfriend. Randy's girlfriend did not want to go to the movies. Randy decided to go alone with his girlfriend. Randy and his girlfriend had a great time at the movies. They went home together.

Pool Party. It was time to go to a pool party. They were throwing lots of water balloons. I loved the party and was excited to throw my own. I bought a big bucket of water balloons. I couldn't believe how amazing the party was.

Try It Now. Liz was having a bad day. Her friend invited her to the restaurant to eat. She went anyway, and ate nothing but a small amount of food. After eating, Liz felt much better. She decided to stay in the restaurant for another couple of weeks.

Misery. Neil was visiting Misery, Louisiana. He wanted to see the big cat, but he was a kid. He took a tour to the bay, but it was too dark. The only place he could see it was in the shade, in the back yard. He was surprised to find that Misery didn't look so scary.

Valentine's Surprise. The couple was married in 1981. They got their daughter married in 1999. One day, the son of the husband left a note on their wedding day. The note was a Valentine's Day card. This was a big shock for them.

Lost Girl. It was the first day of school. I was at the playground when I noticed a girl crying. The crying girl told me that she had lost her parents. I searched the school and found the girl. The girl was okay and I went back to play.

Vivian Cuts her Hair. Vivian has long hair. She decides she wants to cut her hair to lower her appearance. She buys a razor blade to cut her hair. Vivian uses the razor blade to cut her hair to about two inches. Her hair looks much shorter now.
Bar. John loved having people over. His bar was just as good as any other bar. Everyone came over and ordered. It was the most popular bar in town. He eventually went out to make more money.

Facebook Drama. Marlene found out her friend had posted something on Facebook. She wanted to break up with him, but it was too much for her. Marlene decided to take it personally. She posted photos of her mom and a friend she did not like. Her friend then decided to block her from Facebook for good luck.

Steak Sandwich. Sammy had worked at the same job for Years. He was recently promoted to a higher position. One day Sammy felt sick and went home early. He called his boss to tell him he missed his day off. His boss was very upset and gave Sammy some work to do instead.

Goog. Barry took a bus ride to the local Goog website. There, he learned about a new type of tech. Barry read about its benefits and uses. Barry made his own computer for free. Barry was happy he had visited the Goog website.

calming nerves. Susie was feeling anxious about a date with John. She was afraid because she felt uncomfortable with him. She was so nervous, she couldn't sleep that night. So she told her friends about the situation. Luckily, John told Susie she wasn't too far off.

Lucretia Packs A Lunch. Lucretia's lunch was always a banana slice. She always tried to make a new banana slice but couldn't. Finally she decided to make a homemade banana cake. It was a success. Lucretia could not wait to make another banana slice!

Turning Point. I saw a man driving a sports car in my driveway. The car was headed the other way. The car ended up hitting a telephone pole. I turned on the light and saw a man standing on the street. I turned on the headlights and he drove away.
UUA. I've always been an atheist. The problem was I didn't care much about religion. I tried to join a church. But they forced me to convert. I realized I had to do something about it.
Ants. Karen went for a walk in the woods. She walked a bit past a swarm of ants. A few of the ants started chasing Karen. She started running and ran. Karen ran very fast back.

Reverse Psychology. Jane was a psychologist who lived in a small apartment. One night a man came in with a broken leg. She looked at him and started crying. He told her it was because his knee hurt. Jane was happy it was just a big bruise.

You'd Think They'd Require a Commercial License. I was driving down the road in my car. I noticed a police car driving very slowly. The officer asked me why I was speeding. I told him I thought I saw something in the back of the car. He said it was a cigarette, which is illegal and I was lucky I had it.

Tyler gets hacked. Tyler had been having trouble at work. He was told he was being hacked and fired. Tyler was upset but did not say anything. He was fired for being too polite. He had no choice but to get a new job.

Financial Issues. My friends and I decided to have some fun. We decided to do a credit card exchange. Everyone received their cards. Afterwards, we decided to do some deals. We got a lot of money and had a lot of fun.

Hide and Seek. Tommy likes to play hide and seek. Tommy's mom took him to a friend's house. Tommy played hide and seek with his friend's family. He found his friend's hide and seek game but his friend's house. Tommy and his friend had to go to his friend's house to hide from his dad.
Fault. The girl lost her tooth. She looked for the tooth under her pillow. It wasn't there. She then found it under her bed. She got an x-ray done.

Torn Jeans. Tom went out with friends. Tom got into a fight with a friend. Tom's friend pulled a knife on Tom's pants. Tom was unable to beat the knife off. Tom lost all his friends friends over the next few days.
Horror Movies. We live in the city. So we bought some old Halloween costumes. I was in the back yard and ran into some children. The kids were scared and looked away. Then we watched a scary movie.

Stray Cat. Lucy found a stray cat outside a store. She wanted to adopt it, but she was nervous about it. She asked her dad what she could do. He said she could take it inside for a while. Lucy took it inside and let him in for a while.

No Vacation. Bert's parents had promised him a vacation. Bert decided to get an extra job and take the vacation on their own. Unfortunately, Bert wasn't able to find work. They told Bert that they didn't like him. It made Bert extremely sad.
Cherry Pie. My friend loves cherry pie. He gave me one last time last week. I had the recipe. I bought all the ingredients. I am going to have pie this morning.

Follower. My dog Follower was a dog. The dog likes to eat my food. Follower chews up the other's food and drinks it. Now Follower is getting too old and dirty to follow me around. I decided to get a dog.

Zoe Speaks. Zoe was a teenager. Her parents thought it would be funny to send her to the library. When Zoe got there she noticed the librarian was speaking. The librarian spoke about Zoe and boys and boys. Zoe was upset and embarrassed that her parents were so mean.

Baby. Logan's baby began to cry. The baby's father asked Logan if he could take the baby home. The baby's father drove Logan home and placed the baby in a crib. The baby was in his crib for almost three hours before he was quiet again. The father gave the baby to Logan's wife.
The Lake. Jim was walking along a stream. He spotted some pretty girls. Jim decided he would talk to them. Jim asked his best friend, Sara. Jim and Sara had a great time talking.
Porch Swing. The kids went out to play. They wanted to play on the porch swing. They climbed on it. The swings had a hole in them. They had to climb out of the swings.

first beer. Sam wanted to try to buy a beer for the first time. He went to a beer shop and looked around. He looked for beer with high alcohol content. He found some that had a high alcohol content. Sam bought the beer and loved it.

The Box. Toni's family was going to go camping one weekend. She was excited but worried she wouldn't have the right materials. She asked her mom for advice, but she said she had nothing. Then she had a big box of supplies for the camping trip. Toni was glad to have the supplies, and she was so excited about camping!

Losing Streak. Tim was out in a new city with friends. He was hanging out with friends and getting drunk. After a while he was trying to go out. Tim couldn't find his spot for a bit. He decided to turn around and go back home.

Sad On Easter. Lucy loved Easter. Her mom took her to a store on Easter morning. Her grandma told her to go home. Lucy thought it was pointless, but she had no choice. Lucy felt horrible when she went home for Easter.

Football Fever. Tom was a football player. He always wanted to play professional football. He had a job interview that he was scheduled to attend. Tom made an excuse that he didn't want to go to the interview. Tom was never offered a position at his job.

Flowers. The flowers on Tom's tree were starting to turn yellow. Tom was afraid that the yellow would stop growing. Tom tried several methods, but they didn't work. Finally Tom got his hands on some green tea and mixed it with the yellow flowers. Tom successfully watered the yellow flowers with the green tea and it grew well.

Fast and too Furious. Gina's father was angry at her. He wanted her to stay after school to finish the final exam. Gina decided to cheat so she could go to the bathroom. She went back to school. She failed her exam because she did not study.

Not Tired. Amy was really tired of being in school. She was so tired of being told she had to stay up. One day her friend told her to stay up. Amy decided to try and stay up. But she fell asleep as soon as she got to school.
red dress. Lila wanted to do something unique. So she made a red dress. She bought the fabric and began sewing. She was really proud of the dress. She loved to have something unique.
Stale Cereal. Remy was trying to prepare some cereal. He couldn't figure out what he was doing. He asked his mother. She told him it was stale. Remy went and got a fresh bag of cereal.

Cookie Sale. My mom and I decided to go to a local cookie sale. My mom and I drove through town to find one. We sat down and waited for people to buy a cookie. We all looked at the sale. We bought lots of cookies and went home.
New Show. Tom's favorite show was on. It was the night before his birthday. He was excited about how much to watch it. He waited in line all night. He finally got his wish.

Workout. Mandy was training for a marathon. She was feeling ready but hadn't run the marathon. She was at a cross country meet. The meet was only half a mile so she went to the gym. She did the marathon run on the same day.

Valentine's Brownies. It was Valentine's Day and everyone else ate. I made brownies for everyone but myself. I did not have a recipe but I thought they would be delicious. All my friends told me to stop because they thought I was crazy. I finally decided to make the brownies.

A Dozen Roses. I wanted to grow my own roses. I decided to try putting them in a vase. I watered and carefully placed them in a vase. I then put water in the vase and added the roses. I was happy to have my own roses!

Expected Delivery. Jenny waited for her dog to come home from the park. She was excited that her dog was finally getting her food. When the dog returned home, Jenny was surprised to see it was empty. The dog had left the food in the car. Jenny was so upset.

Driving Lessons. Jim always wanted to be a driving instructor. He decided to get certified. After a few months he graduated from the course. He drove the van all over the city. He ended up with a license!
Pokemon. I found a huge collection of Pokemon cards. They were all different colors. I put them in a box. They were so hard to find. I finally had found ten!
Peanuts. Tim loved peanuts. One day he bought some peanuts for his kids. He showed them to his son. His son said they were a bad idea. Tim never bought peanuts again.
Lunch. The man made a sandwich. He put it in the oven. When he took it out it was burnt. He asked his wife about the sandwich. She said that she was eating it when he asked.
Moving Day. My daughter and son are going to move today. We all have a lot of things we need to move. We have been looking for awhile. We are hoping we get it done. Moving Day is finally here.

Cheer. The cheerleading squad was ready for the big game. They were ready to compete. When the game began they were very nervous. They had to compete in every part of the stadium. They won the game and were awarded the trophy.

Bay. I bought a house in Kansas City and moved there in 1987. The building is in a large old oak tree in the south of the United States. There is a bay in the bottom of the tree that is very nice. I moved my furniture into the bay because it was too big. I have a beautiful new house that looks so good.

The Brother. The kids wanted to be a part of a secret society. They tried to find a job in a secret society. One of the spies found a family that allowed them to join. The secret society made great enemies with them. They ended up joining a different secret society.
Too short. Susie got a new dress for school. She was excited for it. Unfortunately it was too short. She tried to wear it out to get her old one. It didn't fit.

Sam Catches a Fish. Sam loved watching his fish, but he had no bait. He got up early to go fishing. The fish kept disappearing at his bait. Sam asked his mom for some bait. Sam's mom gave him a pair of fishing lures.

street ball. A man wanted to play street ball with friends. He looked in a grocery store for cheap balls. He bought one in the local store. He showed up to play it with his friends. He won a lot of games with his friends.

Music Software. I went to an electronic music store for a song to listen to. I bought an Apple iPod and downloaded it. I walked down to the store to buy the software. The music store employee had an Apple iPod for me, but it was very expensive. I bought a CD instead and listened to a song on my iPod.

The list. The girl was in the market for new shoes. She had so many choices, she couldn't decide. She decided to look through the local magazines. She found one that was perfect for her. She bought it and was very happy.

Desktop Christmas Trees. My friends are looking for a gift for their kids. They were going to have a Christmas tree made. They went to a hardware store. They bought all the supplies. They are decorating their tree on Christmas.

Garrett's Basketball Journey. Garrett is the best basketball player on his high school team. On the last game of the season, Garrett had the ball. The ball goes to Garrett. He reaches down to catch it. Garrett reaches the hoop and has the game winning shot!
Family dinner. Allie had to make dinner for her parents. She made spaghetti and sauce. She got everything ready and waited. She was about to sit down when her son came by. Allie loved her dinner.

River Bank. Jim and Frank were playing catch in the yard. They wanted to play fetch with the other children. Jim threw the ball too high and it sailed over the river bank. It fell to the bottom of the water. Both children ran to the surface to play catch.

Knife Safety. Tom's dad always carried a knife. It would usually be in the car or on a bed. One day he slipped on the bathroom floor. Tom fell hard and it cut him badly. Tom vowed to not go anywhere near that bathroom again.
The Rally. When we went to the rally it was really fun. There were all these people there. They played music and drank lots of beers. I had a great time. We ended up going back.
Too Big. Kim was at a wedding. She had to fit in her dress. But she was too small to fit in her dress. Her mother offered her a big, long, red dress. Kim accepted happily.
The Olives. Anna loved eating olives. Her favorite were grape-flavored. She was going to eat a few when her phone rang. Anna rushed to answer it. Her eyes lit up at the delicious olives.

Santa. I took my dog with me to the shelter to adopt a dog. We saw many dogs who were very sad or malnourished. I picked up a young boy who wasn't very happy. He was very cute and loved to have me over for dinner. Then he snuggled under my lap, snuggled up, and played with me.

The camping trip. I was at summer camp with a bunch of my friends. I thought it would be fun to have a camping trip with us. We all made plans and went camping. My friend forgot his tent so I went camping alone. We had a great time together.
Bad food. Lina wanted to go out for dinner. But she didn't have a few days before. She decided to make herself a nice meal. She made a bunch of chicken. But when she got home, it was burnt.

Too Old To Go. My dad went to the store today to get some cigarettes. My sister's cousin Joe had also gone to the store. Joe went home and told his sister he was going to get the cigarettes. My sister ran to my dad and said he could have the cigarettes. Joe got back to the store and was sad to have to go home.
Fried Chicken. Tom was at a BBQ restaurant. He saw that some people were frying their food. Tom thought it looked really good. He thought it would go great. It was very tasty.

Steve and His Cats. Steve's family was having a cat food contest. One of Steve's cats wanted to win a toy for Christmas. Steve's cat tried to sneak into the Christmas car. Steve's mother tried to scare the cat away from the car. The cat ate the toy and ran away from the car.

Retirement fund. Kari was a senior in high school. She decided to invest in her retirement fund. She was so excited about her retirement savings. On her twenty-year retirement she had $10,000. It was her dream to have enough money to retire.

Trash in the Closet. Dan was a middle school student. One day Dan's friend Tim told him about a new boy. Dan did not believe him and asked if they could meet. Dan's friend said no because he didn't know about the boy. Dan's friend said he was wrong and they could talk to the new boy.
The Lollipop. I was cleaning my room and found something weird. It was a box of lollipops. It had a little hole in it. I couldn't figure out what it was. I decided to eat them as a punishment.
afloat. Allison went skydiving. She went for a very high angle. Allison's friend told her not to fly up. So she took an alternate. Unfortunately, it was far too high to go.

Home Run. Tina is a great hitter in her family. One day she hit a homerun and won her first home run. The fans were thrilled and hugged her. They took her out to dinner for the next week. The fans even gave her money.

Bend To My Metal Will. When I was 10 years old, I played in a metal band. I got an instrument with a bunch of my friends. I began to play music that I couldn't play at home. I tried to play with my friend. We couldn't understand why I couldn't play without my metal.
Taco Tuesday. It was Taco Tuesday. Nancy and her sisters decided to make a taco. They each made a big casserole. Then they mixed up their toppings. It was delicious.

Dishes. Today is the day for my family to wash the dishes. I am going to pick my family up from their house and we're going out. We're going to go to the park and pick them up. When we arrive at the park we all get their dirty plates. Now, we can go out to eat later that night.
Delivering the baby. Dina was delivering the baby. It was a natural way to do it. Unfortunately, she ended up hitting the baby. Her son was hurt. She decided to do it again next time.
Band. Tom went to his favorite rock club. He looked at all the bands playing. He decided to find his own. Tom bought a new shirt and hat. He bought a pair of music video tvs and a new jacket too.

The Bar. Lance was at a bar. He ordered a few drinks and talked to several people. A woman he liked saw him and asked for a date. She said she would but she only liked him to hang out. Lance got the woman to go home and was excited.

Hail Mary. The kids in line for the football game were getting restless. They were not used to playing football. The coach was on the verge of calling an upset at the quarterback. The coach threw a pass, but it was intercepted. The team cheered and cheered as the coach was announced the winner.

Beauty and The Beast. There once was a girl named Kiley. She was a beautiful and popular girl at school. One day, she decided to enter a beauty pageant. Kiley won first place. She was very proud and felt that her fame was deserved.
Child support. The man took his children out. The kids were supposed to pick up their parents. They picked up their parents. They forgot their parent's address. The parents were angry.

The Baseball Game. It was finally the last baseball game. Jim sat in the stands and watched the game on tv. The game began with Jim's brother throwing the ball. Jim was so excited to see the baseball game he began crying. Jim's brother came up to his and yelled at Jim, telling him to keep the ball.

It Was Supposed To Be Their Apartment, Not Just His. My neighbor's old boyfriend's apartment was next to his car. He didn't notice his car was going too fast, and swerved to avoid a traffic accident. His girlfriend noticed his car's tires spinning on the road. She stopped his car and helped him change them. Now he can drive home from work without a scratch!

Winter Storm. I was sitting on a bench in my house watching the news. A terrible snowstorm had come in that day. I turned off the TV and tried to stay inside. A few hours later I heard thunder outside. I couldn't believe I was soaked and wet.
Into the abyss. We used to live in an old apartment in Brighton. The unit was really dark. One night a fire started and fire trucks poured in. They put on flashlights. It was almost like a nightmare.

Christmas Problems. I was going to get a Christmas gift for my wife. She told me that I need to buy a new tablet. I wanted her to be happy. I did some research online. I found a great tablet at Best Buy that we liked.

Putting the Cat Down. Kenny and Jane were trying to put the cat down. Jane was trying to give the cat some hugs. After a while the cat was laying in the chair. Suddenly the cat jumped onto the table. Luckily the cat did not get hurt.

The Brown Bag. Beth always carried a bag to her favorite store. Beth had the same bag for twenty years. One day Beth decided she would start looking for a different bag. Beth found a beautiful brown bag for $10. Beth purchased the bag.

Pig Eye. There was a kid named Tim who liked to eat. One day his dad went and bought him some pogs. Tim's eye became itchy all of the time. It took him years to get rid of the pogs. Eventually his dad gave him some gum.

Baking. Tara wanted to bake cookies. She asked her friends for ideas. She went to the store and bought lots of ingredients. Then she went home to make the cookies. Her friends complimented her baking skills.
Tacos. Sara wanted some tacos. Her husband said she could have two. Sara refused. She was a good cook. She made them herself.

Lorraine Makes her Bed. Lorraine is laying in her bed. Lorraine feels a sharp pain on her leg. She looks at the floor, then sees her bed. Lorraine puts her bed up. She is happy to have something to feel better.

Timmy Loves to Dance. Timmy likes to dance. His mom always tries to teach him how. This summer, his mom brought him a new video game system. He played his new video game game system and learned all kinds of new things. His mom is proud of him for learning a new game!

Over Sleepy. The last thing I wanted to do was get up to play for a few minutes. I did so when I woke up the next morning. While I was trying to get ready, I fell asleep with the lights on. I was too tired to get up and get ready for school. Since I fell asleep in the car, I missed the bus.

The Cheeseburger addict. Tori worked very hard on her own cheeseburger. She started the recipe and took her time. The next day, there was no cheeseburger. Tori began to feel very sick. When she woke up in the morning, she realized she had eaten a lot of food.
Grapes. I love grapes a lot. They're my favorite part of the fruit. I'm never going to give up buying some. I always have a bottle of wine with them. I'm so glad to have a bottle of grapes.
The Work Event. Tim was at work. His boss had set up a huge work event. Tim worked very hard. Tim was able to complete most of it. He was excited to receive a bonus!

Food network star. I used to always get on TV with my friends. They always told me to go away and eat. They never told me about their meals. One day, I decided to go to the store. So, my friends all went shopping.
Sleazy. Tom was getting bored. He decided to get up. He didn't want to get in trouble. Tom went out and bought an alarm clock. Tom went back to sleep instead.
The new show. I went to the new show yesterday. I was excited for the first part. I watched all the first ten minutes. Then I got to the ending. Then it was time to go.

Sue's Trip. Sue had never been to the Caribbean. Her boyfriend took her to an old place called Cabo. They had so much fun and talked about their vacation. Sue knew this was going to be a special moment. She couldn't wait to get back home to tell her family.

The Broken Toy Box. Janet went outside to play. She got into the truck and began to drive towards her house. Suddenly, the front of the truck began to bend. Janet pulled over to check on her toy box. It was completely broken, and she was disappointed.
Pizza Place. Tom wanted to eat pizza. He went to the store. He bought the ingredients. He made the pizza. He had pizza for dinner.

Missing. Tom had a cat named Kitten. Tom didn't notice Kitten was missing when he went out. Tom went home and searched everywhere. Tom asked his neighbor about Kitten's death. Tom's neighbor called the cops and said Kitten was found.

Signing up for a library card. I just got my library card, and I was so excited! It took me thirty minutes to get my number printed out. When it was finally mine I went to the library for a tour. They let me sign the card on the first day. I am really glad that I signed up for the library.

Stripped down. I fell off the top of the ladder, my dog was hurt. I cried and thought my dog needed help. I asked my neighbor to help me, she said yes. We went to the vet and my dog was okay. We are going back for more treats to be sure he's ok.

The Big Win. Mike was an avid football fan. He'd go all day to see his team play in the big game. The day before the big game he got a text. He received a call from his girlfriend saying they would be playing. She wanted to be the captain of their team and decided to be!

A visit to Grandma. It was Mary's first visit to grandma. She wanted to visit her grandma's house. Grandma didn't know how to drive. Mary asked her mom for a ride to the house. Grandma's mom was very happy.
Always do Your Homework. I was working at the library. The librarian wanted me to do the reading. It was time to read. I looked up a list. I picked it up.

Picking a Movie. My girlfriend went to a movie last week. The movie I wanted to see was playing in the theater. The ticket vendor put me in the seat. He also gave me a sticker. My girlfriend was happy that I got to see the movie I wanted.

Video Games. Bob went to a store to buy a new game system. He did not want to wait in line, so he bought one at a different store. After Bob was the only one who had the game he took it home. After opening the box Bob played the game. Bob was happy with his purchase.
Lost remote. Tom was getting ready for work one morning. He didn't realize that he lost his remote. He tried for about an hour. It just wouldn't turn on. Tom ended up going back to bed.
Itching. Tom had a bad itch. He went to the store to purchase a lotion. Tom got home and put the lotion on. Unfortunately Tom was allergic to the lotion. Tom had to leave the store without a lotion.

Bracketology. I was an elementary school teacher. I decided to take students to see the basketball game. We had the kids watch for the winning basket. The kids watched for ten seconds. In the end, I counted for twenty seconds.

The Man Across the Street. The family came across a man in a park. He looked upset that they were standing in his street. The boy ran up to the man to ask for help. The man didn't say anything. The boy left and the father walked home.
Catfishing. The man started to catfish. One of the fish escaped from the tank. He began searching for it. He gave up after the fish got away. The fish was caught with a stick.

Unlucky Good-Luck Charm. Jane's birthday was coming up. She decided to get her friends some lucky beads. Jane bought a dozen and hung them up on their porch. She was waiting to see what she would see when she walked in the door. Jane was happy when she saw her friend's favorite ring.
Lion. Juan was on vacation. He went to the zoo. He saw a lion. He stopped and snapped pictures with the lion. It was so close to the water.

Homeless Heart. A little girl was in a homeless shelter with her family. She tried to find a shelter but didn't know the address. A man offered to take her. The man's heart broke when he saw the girl. The man took the girl to a shelter for the homeless.

Moving Up. Joe always liked going up to the top of the pyramid. But his friends never got to see him up there. One day, he had to take a big step. But he fell and hurt his knee. Now Joe always stays on top of the pyramid.

Comedian Carrie. Carrie was a talented comedian. She started a stand up comedy troupe and made the money. She went on several shows that were popular. One day Carrie was offered a job doing stand up at a local bar. Carrie accepted and now loves her job.

Big Day. Bill wanted to go to the movies. He got all the stuff together. He bought a movie ticket at the counter. He got to the theater and found out the opening date was today. Bill spent the night at the movies that night and loved it.

Carlos Meets a Girl. Carlos has always liked girls. He has always been single and lonely. One day Carlos decides he needs to meet a nice girl. He attends a coffee shop to meet a nice girl. Carlos is happy that he met a nice girl.

Olson Opposes Octopus. Olson was always scared of sea creatures. One day he was invited on a whale watching trip. He was very nervous that it would be so scary. But he spent the entire time in the water. Now he never thinks of the ocean.

Used Music Store. One night my friend offered me a job working at an antique store. He gave me two books to rent from a used music store. I decided to go to a different store and ask for the books. I ended up going to a more popular store for the books. When I got home, the store manager called me to pick up my books.
Fred. My son called me today. He asked for my name. I told him I am a name he liked, he told me. He told me he liked the song. I think he will buy it.

The Bad Attitude. A man wanted to meet a woman but didn't want to speak to her. He tried to talk to a girl and then tried to talk to a man. The man ignored her when she asked him questions. He was too stubborn to be approached by her. He was happy with his lack of luck at talking.

Sad story. Lucy and her friends were at the zoo. Her friend wanted to go on a horseback riding ride. Lucy was hesitant but she wanted to. Lucy's friend agreed. Unfortunately they were not riding horses.

Repaying the Pastor. Dana was a great mom. She told everyone she was the happiest in the world. One day she heard a knock on the door. The pastor had left a check for $1,000. Dana immediately stopped repaying the $20K bill.

Writer. Ella had always wanted to be a writer. She knew she should get a job but she always failed. Finally, she decided to get a degree in creative writing. She went to college and applied to all the college schools. When Ella graduated, she became a successful writer.

The Lost Dog. Sam was walking his dog through the park. Suddenly, Sam noticed a dog running away. He called the park owner for help. They finally got help from a dog rescue group. Sam and the dog were reunited.

Birds. My dad has a cat. He makes it a daily ritual. One day the cat came out and my dad didn't like it. He wanted to play, so he put the cat back in its cage. Now the cat is gone, and I don't have to worry about it.

The Bridge. One day, the kids were playing in the snow. They decided to play on the big bridge in the park. The kids jumped on the bridge. They then went for a long run through the park. They were exhausted after playing in the snow.

Sam Walks the Dog. Sam and the dog got along great for the first time. Sam wanted to take the dog to the park. He got his leash ready and the dog followed him. The dog got along the leash until he got outside. Sam walked the dog back to the house and went to sleep.
Bad sale. Allie went to Target. She was looking for some new clothes. All the sudden she saw it was sold out. She was upset. So she had to walk home.

theater. Tina wanted to see The Wizard of Oz. She looked in her history book and in her book. After much searching she finally found her ticket. She got to the theater and got a ticket. Tina got to see The Wizard of Oz and had a great time.

Sandy's Allergies. Sandy loves candy. Her mother gives her some everyday. Sandy's mother took her to a candy store. Sandy ate a lot of candy while her mother was gone. Sandy's mom told her it was okay and she did not want to go back home.
Hospital Visit. Tom's girlfriend was sick. She died after being in the hospital. Tom felt bad about her. Tom decided to visit her in the hospital. Tom felt good that he found out she was okay.

Fear Returns. Gina was waiting for her mom to pick her up. Gina was sad because she was scared and afraid. She was not getting to play with the toy for a long time. She didn't like the new doll. It was her first day of school so she had no choice but to wait.
Drawing Class. The class at my high school was drawing. They drew funny pictures. The teacher made fun of them. The kids stopped drawing. The teacher never let them in again.
Carmen Plays Softball. Carmen decides to play softball with her friends. The boys play hard for three hours. They win by a single point. They all drink and talk. Carmen feels better that she won.

Jersey. Natalie wanted to wear her favorite t-shirt to school. But she didn't have enough money to buy one. So she decided to knit her own. She made a new t-shirt and showed it off to everyone. Everyone was impressed and bought her a new t-shirt.

The Blog. A new blogger wrote a blog. It featured everything she ever wanted to hear. Soon, she started to have her work published. She even got a few friends to write with her. It was the best blog they had ever had!

Retiring from Teaching. I got up early in the morning to go to work. I drove over to my computer. I logged onto the server and made a few changes. Then, I changed my background and background colors. I left for work and retired.

Getting Dressed. The first thing to do was get dressed. I took the shower in the tub. The sink was hot and the water was freezing. I took a hot shower and put my clothes on. I went to the kitchen and got dressed.
Tom's Drink. Tom was out with friends. Tom had a drink that he kept drinking. Tom drank so much he got drunk. Tom got into a fight and lost his friend. He learned his lesson.

Gertrude Slips. Gertrude has always been afraid of the dark. However, she recently learned she could see very well. She began taking regular walks with her eyes open. Her friends soon began to tease her. She has not been afraid since that day.

Lost Job. Mike has been a freelance writer for 3 Year's now. He has written several articles for the newspaper. Mike's boss announced that he is being laid off. Mike has not gone back to work since then. He decided that he should try to make money more from work.

No Spare. John was driving home from work. He noticed the traffic was backed up and he felt out of place. He decided to stop in the parking lot and check the weather. It was a very bad snowstorm and he had to slow down. John made it home safely.
John Runs Errands. John is feeling very tired. He decides to run errands before work. He does not want to go to work. John feels very tired. John has to leave work early to be safe.

Catching Burglars. Dan and his buddy John were at the mall. John was trying to buy some expensive things. Dan spotted several burglar watches. Dan offered the watches to John. John accepted the offer and they got free food.
