Arra. Arra had always wanted to go camping in Alaska. He saved up for a vacation months ago. He was finally able to pack up his stuff and head north. He packed up all his gear and packed the car. After driving ten miles, he finally made it to the campgrounds.

job interview. Tim had just quit his job. He applied for the job but did not get the job. He was desperate to find something good. He decided to ask a friend about it. After much difficulty, Tim was able to get the job.

The chicken baby. Lucy had just given birth to her first baby. It was a baby who was all black with a white head. She had never seen it in person before. It was so strange and beautiful. Lucy knew she had to be patient.

Lary's Lasagna. Lary decided that he wanted to make lasagna. He bought the ingredients for the sauce and cheese. After cooking the lasagna, he left the house. He bought the toppings for his lasagna. Lary ate his lasagna and decided to make the sauce and cheese.

First day of classes. Allie was excited to be taking her first class today. She was excited when she got to class. Allie then waited in line for a couple hours. When she finally got into class she started her class. Allie was happy she made it into the class.

Bankrupt. A group of people at a gas station took out a gun and began to rob the pump. The owner was not aware and tried to scare them away. But he didn't get much sleep. By the time the police arrived, he was in a bad mood. He didn't even bother to speak to the police!

Home Away. Bobby needed to get his daughter to go with him. They'd just gotten divorced, but were still together. They were both worried about how she would fit in. But after their reunion, she immediately hugged him. He was the only one she'd ever gotten to do that before.

Fixing the Sink. It was the end of the rainy season so he could fix the toilet. So Tim didn't think he'd make it to the bathroom. He called someone else to come over to fix the toilet. Tim's new friend arrived an hour later. Tim's friend fixed the problem and Tim didn't have to fix it.
Too Close. Gina was texting her crush on the phone. She was about to say goodbye. He tried to catch up but was too close. He ran out of the room and called her back. It was too late for her.

The Fire. Tim was working on his computer one day. Suddenly, he noticed a light on fire. Tim ran inside to see what was going on. He looked all over the house to find a fire extinguisher. Finally he was able to extinguish the fire.

Biographies. Joe went to the library to look for a book. He found a book by some old friends. He read the book and started to learn it. Joe read the book every day for several months. He became a great writer.

The busy day. Sam had just made a big deal on a new bike. He went to the store and looked at everything. He saw a lot of things, but they were too expensive. Sam decided to wait till he could afford the bike. When he got it home, it was exactly what he wanted.
Knife. I bought a knife from the store. I brought it home and turned it over. I began cutting the skin. I was shocked by the sharpness of the knife. I had to be more careful next time.

Last to the party. Natalie was the last one in line at a party. She was waiting in line for hours to meet her crush. Finally he walked up to her. He asked her to be his girlfriend. She couldn't believe that.

Bill's Bar. Bill loved to make a new bar and made the best bartenders. He started the bar at a cheap place. The bar was very popular. He was happy to be the bar's manager. After a couple of months, Bill had sold out of his home bar.
Dead Mouse. I took my mouse outside today to use the restroom. The mouse ran away. I got up to find it dead on the ground. I took it to the dump and it died. The cat had killed the mouse.
The Fishing Pole. Jack was on a boat. He caught a huge trout. He brought it home. He put it on his bed. He knew it was good for him to do.
sick day. Sasha woke up and started feeling better. She decided to go to the beach. Sasha got on her beach towel and got in her car. She drove down to the beach. She had a great time.
The Race. Bob was the star of his team. He was going to a big race. It was in the state championship. He got sick and did not finish the race. He was embarrassed in front of the whole team.

In The Mitt. Sophie was at school when a bully came up to her. She tried to say hi to him but couldn't see the bully's eyes. The bully didn't bother her so she started to walk away. The bully decided he was not going to walk and stood up to her. Sophie was so scared that she ran away and ran away from school.
Coffee. Tim took a cup of coffee. He did not want to drink it all. He poured it into a cup of water. The coffee was not strong enough. Tim drank his coffee out of the cup.
The bird flies. Sammy saw a bird. He was going too far in the window. He threw his glass of water at it. It was flying too high. Sammy was disappointed.
Knee. I was playing football with my friends. I wasn't sure how I was going to score a touchdown. I ran for the ball. But when I got there, my knee was red. The knee was hurting a lot.
Sandwich. Kate was hungry. But she hadn't bought a sandwich in days. Her boyfriend made one for her. But Kate hated the taste. But he made a sandwich anyway!
Rapper. Mike wanted to be famous. He was very good at making music. Mike started a new band. He worked hard for the band for years. He became famous and eventually went to a record deal.
On set. The man set a fire. The fire burned the house on fire. The fire started to spread and spread. He made a plan to move it. He moved the fire away and put it out.

Gusty Winds. Dan had spent the night in his cabin with his wife. After their first night at their cabin, a gust of wind blew Dan into his wife's bed. Since Dan was naked, the next morning he was covered in red. When Dan came out of his bed, his wife was standing behind him. Dan said that it was the best night he ever had.
Ted buys a car. Ted is tired of getting a car. He decides he wants to buy a car in the future. He goes to a local dealership. He asks for a used car. Ted buys a used car.

Kids Chair. One day our new kids sitter decided to sit on our second floor. We went out one day and bought a nice chair. She sat on it for a while, then she fell asleep. The kids woke her up, and she had to sleep on the floor. We had to find a new chair, and it cost us nearly $100.

The Bowling Match. Mark had just gotten invited to go bowling with friends. He had never bowled before and really wanted to be good. Mark practiced every single day for several months. Finally, Mark went bowling with his friends. He bowled very well and was thrilled to get invited.

The Park at Night. Jim liked to go hiking at the local park. One day, Jim was excited to check the new sign. The sign said the park was closed. Jim was disappointed. The next day, Jim got to hike the mountain in peace.

Fireworks. Bob had planned a surprise party for his friends. He wanted to get the whole neighborhood to come over for it. On his way to his house he heard a noise. He got out of the car and looked out the window. He found out it was a big firecracker.

Magic Kingdom. We arrived at Magic Kingdom the day before Thanksgiving. We rode every ride and even the ferris wheel. There was a large roller coaster that scared the family. The ride was huge but we managed to ride all the rides. By the time we got to the car we were exhausted.

Gym Rats. I recently got a new job working at a gym. It's a long way to drive, but I enjoy driving. I go every Tuesday and Thursday. Yesterday I was really sick and I had to miss my job. It's a lot of fun but I'll miss the long drive.
McDonalds. I had to go to McDonalds for the first time. I was so nervous. I was walking past people I knew. I felt more confident. I walked right by a group of my friends.

The Twins. Nancy and her sister were having a baby girl. The baby girl was small and a little girl. Nancy took the baby to get some milk. She noticed a twin baby. She knew that would be a good baby to help her.

A lost day. Sam was at the pool with his family. He didn't understand why his parents were taking him. His mother asked him why they were taking him. Sam said he was lost. He said he didn't know where to go but he was still there.
My phone plan. I needed a phone plan. But I was broke. I decided to get a second job. And the money I made saved me money. But it was not worth it.

Southie. Kim's favorite restaurant was called Southie. There was only one thing she disliked about it. They had no chicken sandwiches! Kim couldn't eat that. She gave them to her brother, who enjoyed them.
Fleas. Tara noticed something in her house. It was a flea infestation. She went to the store. Tara got flea medicine. She also got flea cream.

Good Signs. Sandy was driving through the city. All the sudden she noticed some signs. One sign stated that it was almost time to leave. She tried to make the right turn. Unfortunately it was too late and she ended up on the side of the road.

Nick. Nick was the quarterback for the football team. He had a lot of fun on his football team. The game had been going well for the past few games. He was worried about how he was going to perform in the final game. His team won the game and he was able to take the MVP trophy.

The Puppy. The Johnson family wanted a new puppy. They found a puppy on a local farm. The Johnson family took the puppy home. The dog followed their commands and ate all of their food. The family bought a new puppy and loved him.
Baseball. There was a big game last week. We decided to go to the bar to see who won. We decided to get beer. We drank the beer and watched the game. We drank it and watched the game.
Sandals. I needed some new sandals. I saw some at a local outlet store. They were very cheap. I decided to take them home. The next day, I found out they were the perfect size!
Waffles. Sarah made waffles. The first one she made came out well. But Sarah didn't know how to use it. So she decided to eat more. So she made the waffle recipe again.

Rockstar. Tom was an engineer for a large company. His job was to build new engines. Tom was hired because of his engineering skills. He worked on a very big engine. It was named Rockstar and Tom and his crew saved a lot of money!

Frozen in Place. Nina's dad was a mechanic who repaired cars. Nina was always late for work. But one day her mechanic told her to come and get frozen. She was nervous but didn't cry. She went and fixed the car and was very happy.

Lost Bird. Alfred went to his backyard to watch his birds. Alfred noticed that one of his birds was missing. Alfred went to the tree and looked at it. Alfred looked at the bird for hours and hours. Alfred was relieved that his bird was not injured.

Facebook isn't for everyone. Kim really wanted to learn how to make a picture. So she bought a new computer and some software to help. But there was no software to teach her how to make one. So she spent hours in the mirror trying to draw. And she couldn't make any good pictures.
Let's Party!. Tim was at his friend's house. His friend brought him a drink. Tim started to get drunk. His friend brought out a bunch of the beer. Tim threw up into his friend's drink.

A Robbery. Charles was at a bar one night. Suddenly he felt something in his pants. He pulled on his pants and it had a note. The note said they would have a cashier. Charles told the police and they were able to catch the suspect.
Sandals. Anna needed to buy some sandals. She went to the mall to shop. Then she saw a store that sold sandals. Anna bought the sandals she wanted. Then she went home to wear the sandals!
Chain. Nathan was very skinny. He wore a lot of skinny clothes to work. One day his friend Rob tried to help him. They tried to find a belt. They decided on a chain to hold them together.
Great lunch. Allie wanted a great lunch. She called her friends to go and she got a good lunch. She invited all her friends. Allie had a great time at her friends. She was happy.

Green Hair. It was Tina's first day of work. She was excited about getting a new job. She didn't want to get stuck in a green haired office. However, Tina did not think her hair would look good. Tina found out that her hairdresser had a green hair color.
Parting Ways. My parents got a divorce. The kids had no place to go. They tried to find a place to live. They put all of their stuff in storage. They now have a lot of room for a lot of things.

Slip and Slide. Cynthia and her family went to a local slide in the woods. The slide was really crowded. The kids climbed on top. The slide was very slippery and slippery. Cynthia and her family had to run off of the slide.

The Tumor. Nancy was worried about a lump on her face. Her mom put it under a mole to stop it from getting bigger. She watched intently while her mom watched. She finally started to get nervous. Luckily she didn't get the cancer.
Tom Gets A Dog. Tom was a lonely old man. He was always a lonely man. Tom bought himself a dog. Tom went to the pet store to buy the dog. Tom adopted the dog and lived very happy life.

The Home. I was looking for a home to rent. I saw a picture in the paper that I liked. I called the home and set an appointment. My next door neighbor got the picture and mailed it to me. I moved in next door and loved my new home.

Kicked Out. I was walking down the street with a friend. We were about to eat. Then, we saw the police, and their car pulled up. The police had to take everyone out. They got a lot of people into jail.

Philly Cheese Steak Sub. I have always been afraid of going out to eat because of this fear. My friends and I decided to go out to a Philly Cheese steak subs restaurant. The subs were tasty but everyone was talking about it. As soon as I tried it, I felt so happy that I got out of my shell. I am no longer afraid of going out.

Havoc. My friend was going to the store. She needed to be in town by noon. She asked me to come pick her up, and I reluctantly agreed. We left a little late, but she made it to the store on time. She was upset to see her friend was late, but we drove back home.

The Interview. Sarah wanted to work in a new field. She was looking for a job in the area of marketing. Her friend recommended she apply to a marketing firm. Sarah applied for a marketing job. She was hired on the spot.

Firework. The firework shot over the fence into the street. We watched in amazement as the car of children drove towards the fire. The children jumped onto the car in order to save themselves. They ran towards the vehicle with firecrackers in hand. The children caught firecrackers with their hands.
The Perfect Haircut. Jack had been wanting a haircut. He went to the hair salon. He ordered a large, dark blue hair. The stylist cut his hair. Jack decided to go back to his normal self.
Doug cleans house. Doug was cleaning his apartment. He noticed a stain on the floor. He took a broom to investigate. The broom got stuck on a wall. Doug cleaned the wall and then cleaned the stain.

Corey Deals with his Stress. Corey had been dealing with his family problems for years. He finally got up the nerve to confront them. He wrote a letter to them and delivered it to his house. They all read the letter and understood the situation. Corey and his family dealt with their problems for the rest of the year.

Car Buying. Kara was shopping at the mall with her husband. She was at a car lot trying to find a car. Kara ended up buying a Toyota, which was her perfect choice. She showed the salesman to her husband. The salesman was amazed and gave her her new Toyota.
Fishing trip. I was looking forward to going fishing. We arrived at the river. We set up our bait and reel and tackle box. We then set up our tackle box. It was a peaceful fishing day.

Pharmacy. My mother's house has been on the block for a long time. She was in her 60s when I was five years old. I remember visiting her with her elderly husband when she was ill. One day she died, and I had to leave to visit the funeral. My father and I went to see the funeral and had a lot of fun.

Pickpocket. Karen was walking home from work one day. A man in a car pulled out to get her attention. He pulled her purse from her hands. He took off his shirt. After the man walked away, Karen was in trouble.

The Move Out. Tom hated the house he lived in. His roommates were a little rowdy. Tom decided to move out. He packed his things up and moved into a small apartment. Tom enjoyed his new home and his roommates.

Angela. Angela was a very nervous teenager. She had been fighting with her parents for years. She was afraid that they would call her parents. But on the bright side they called her and said they were happy to see her. Angela realized that she was not going to get into trouble anymore.

Bull Ride. My friend went on a bull ride in our garage. We put him in the front row. We had him do tricks and stunts. He came home a few minutes later with bruises. I was so angry that I was angry all day that day.
Declined. My son had to take a math test at school. It was the last day of the term. He had not studied. He failed his test. My son was not allowed to take the test again.

Ride Along. Bob went on a trip with his friends. His friend was a big fan of Star Wars. Bob bought some tickets for the new Star Wars movie. He was very excited. He got to see all of the new Star Wars films.

Stainless. Diana was doing some yard work. She went down to the basement to cut some grass. She started to cut it but it was really dark. So she started to use her bleach to get the stain out. After a few minutes, the dirt was completely white.

The Nickname. My son's name is Nick. He hates the nickname, but we still call him that. My wife found out he was born with a genetic disorder. We started calling him Nick because of his nickname. He likes it so much that he starts to call me that every day.

John's Social Life. John had a very low self esteem. He was always being made fun of. One day, John decided to make a change. He started eating healthier foods and spending less money on things. In a few weeks, John had lost ten pounds!

Jailbird. We were playing baseball in the living room. I saw a small ball sailing by. It landed on the front porch. We looked up and saw a tiny bird perched on its wing. I called the cops and they came to our house.

Swap Shop. Barry got a new job. He was very proud of his hard work and dedication. He wanted to impress his boss, and he had many hobbies. He took care of the customers and did a good job on his shift. Barry loved his new job!

Stuck in traffic. One day I was stuck in traffic on my way to work. It was very long. It took me over 10 minutes to get there. Then I realized I was in the wrong place. When I got to work, everyone was laughing at me.

Chicken and Waffles. Brett went to a diner with some friends. They ordered chicken and waffles. Brett thought it would be boring. Instead he ordered a large coffee instead. Brett had a great time at the diner.
Pizza. It was Amy's turn to make the pizza. She put it in the oven. When it was done, she took it out. She put the toppings on. She liked the way the pizza turned out.
The lake storm. Ruth was outside with her friends. The water started to spill. She was scared. They didn't want to go inside. They decided to run out the house and get help.

99. I was working in a department store yesterday. I went on a date to see a movie I liked. It was called 99 and the theme was disco. I went home happy that I didn't get on a date for this film. Now I'm working on my 99 book.
Caught stealing. I was in a bad mood. I wanted to get out of my house. I went out with a friend. They thought I was stealing. He was caught and my mood was ruined.

The Phone Call. James got a phone call from his friend. It was his sister, asking him for a ride to school. He had never driven to school but he wanted to get there quick. He called his sister and they met at the school to pick up the car. After a quick ride, they left and his phone rang.

Interview. I was interviewing for a job with a small company. He was very strict about my work. He never let me use any of his equipment. One day I noticed him looking at me on his computer. I had my phone taken away from him.
Retirement. I retired in November of 2015. I spent a week in my house. I had a beer and a few snacks on my porch. I retired home. I had a good time and went to bed.

Across the Alley. One time I was walking around outside. My dog ran under the fence. The dog started chasing me down the hallway. I ran back to my house and put my dog down. I got my dog from under the fence and my dog was happy.

Dishonest. Tom noticed some dirty dishes in his bathroom. He noticed his wife didn't want to clean them. She told him it was gross. He agreed and they had fun scrubbing the dishes. Afterwards they cleaned up the dishes.
The Shoes. Joey had a new pair of shoes. He needed some new shoes for work. Joey went to the shoe store to try them on. He liked them. Joey bought the shoes.

Dehydrated. Jim had been drinking water for a week. He had recently broken his leg and wasn't able to walk properly. He had to go to the doctor for help. Jim was dehydrated from drinking too much water. The doctor gave him a bottle of water to take with him from now on.

Building the shed. I had to build a shed. I looked online to see what I needed. I chose to buy lumber and nails. I went to the store to get the materials I needed. When I got home I finished the shed.

Handing out candy. Cathy had just gotten a job at a local candy store. Cathy was assigned to sell candy to the customer's in the store. Cathy began to hand out candy to the customers. Cathy felt great when she received several orders. Cathy was able to make extra money selling candy.

The Pasta Dinner. One day the Kelsi's decided to make pasta for dinner. They all made it from scratch but her mom wasn't there. The whole family couldn't finish the pasta they were making. Her mom decided to go out and get more ingredients. The whole family enjoyed eating the pasta dinner.

Music. Ethan was in a big rock band. He was a drummer and lead vocalist of his band. After he quit his band they needed some new music. They found an old country song and wrote their own song. The new song was called Music from the 90s.

Tutoring Help. A teacher decided to give help with homework assignment. She asked her students to copy her textbook. They copied it. She gave them a letter asking for help. Their parents came by to see if they finished the homework.

Dave needs a new car. Dave needed a new car. He saved up his money and decided to take the car shopping. He visited a lot of vehicles for several weeks. He found the perfect car and went into the dealership. He finally found the car he was looking for.

Local Ad. Jim found an ad on craigslist for an open mic night. He got in line to go in to his hotel room. When he got there, he realized he didn't have any music or snacks. Jim went home feeling disappointed. He couldn't believe he had never had a chance to go to a local bar.
Too Much Soda. Tom was at the beach. Tom was drunk. He got a soda. Tom got stuck in the sand. He died of dehydration.
Dog. Tina had a dog. It was a pitbull that loved to eat everything. Tina brought him food at all times. He would chew everything she had in her house. Tina put him down.
Doves cry. One evening I was eating dinner. I heard birds chirping. The loud music scared the ducks. The ducks ran up and down my food dish. I was glad that I didn't get sick from the loud noise.

The Earthquake. Dan was taking his trash out one day. It started to rainy and he thought it would be nice to check the mail. However, Dan ran out of his trash can. The next day, a strong earthquake struck. Dan's garbage was crushed by the earthquake.

The musical student. Ana wanted to be a great singer. She practiced singing everyday. She auditioned for a music video. Ana took part in the musical and sang beautifully. She ended up being cast in the video.
Rita chokes. Rita was out with her friends. She was very drunk. Rita decides she needs to stop. She decides to get up and walk. Rita starts choking on the sidewalk.

Large Ego. Dan wanted to grow a beard but he didn't know what size. His doctor suggested he cut his hair in half and grow a beard. Dan had to go to the store to buy the supplies. He picked out the biggest, straightest beard he could find. When Dan shaved his beard, he felt like he'd grown a large beard!
Beer run. My friends and I went to a local beer run last night. There was some good beer there. But it was really expensive. They gave us free samples. We were happy to have gotten free samples.
Tom the Drunk. Tom was out at a bar. He started to get drunk. A random stranger came up to him. He told him he had a lot of drinks. Tom apologized and got drunk.

Tim gets in Shape. Tim has been feeling a little out of shape lately. He decides to do some of his gym work. Tim sets up a weight loss goal and works very hard at it. He achieves his goal of losing 30 pounds. Tim is very happy to have lost 30 pounds.
Criticized. Gina's siblings were being mean to her. She wanted to stand up for them. But she was too scared. Her siblings wouldn't listen. So she decided to go home and cry.
Stale Dale. Tom had just had a baby. His wife tried to get rid of it. But it just wouldn't turn on. The baby was just too old for anything new. Tom's wife threw away the old clothes.

Bathrobe. Lena had a big, dark bathrobe. It had the right stripes and colors. One day she stepped out to put it on her hair. To her dismay, she accidentally stepped in the wrong color. Lena was so upset that she had to buy another bathrobe.

Teaching Lesson. Gina's siblings would play tricks on her. They told her to wait until the teacher spoke. Finally, the teacher talked to Gina about the rules. Gina was upset at this. She refused to listen as her siblings played tricks on her.

seeing eye dog. My dog has trouble seeing the other dogs in the neighborhood. He has been trying to get me to see him for a week. I finally got over the fear of having to see him. He has learned that I have to let him use the leash so he can go outside. He is very happy that I have allowed him to use the leash.

Fire. Ivan was driving down the road. He suddenly saw a spark from a cigarette in the road. Ivan pulled over to see what was going on. He realized the cigarette had exploded in his engine. Ivan stopped and called a repairman.

Veteran's Day. Lori is excited for Veteran's Day. Lori is going to a new city to visit. At the hotel, Lori will be honored. Lori and her family will celebrate and eat at a new restaurant. Lori will be so proud of her visit to the city.
Hitting the curb. I was sitting on the bench today. I was sitting on the bench waiting for the people. A man came up to me. He started to yell at me. I ignored him and continued to sit on the bench.
Travel to Hawaii. Jenny wanted to travel to Hawaii. She booked a flight with a friend. The flight was very long. It was over a week long. Jenny was sad because she didn't get to fly to Hawaii.
Married. Marcy wanted to get married. Her mom refused to let her. Marcy thought it was the last straw. Marcy and her mom decided to get married anyway. They are now getting married.

Turtle Violation. Tina was walking her dog. She noticed a turtle under her walk path. She approached the turtle and tried to pet it. After a few minutes, the turtle tried to escape. Tina felt bad for the turtle, and the turtle escaped.

My Best friend Andy and Larry. Andy and Larry are best friends. They decided to take their sons on a trip to Florida. Larry decided to go with Andy. Andy and Larry went on a trip to Florida. The boys were happy to see their friends again.
Bad purchase. Susie was going to buy a new laptop. She had a very high hopes for it. But she did not get it when it came. Susie was very upset. She had to return it.

Sisters Fighting. I was sitting in a cubicle at work today. My two sisters are fighting. I don't have enough time to watch them. I asked the boss if he would watch them. He agreed and I'll start to watch them in the future.
Stomach. Kate was very hungry. She couldn't decide what to eat. She went to the grocery store. Then she put some frozen pizza on her plate. She sat down in the food and ate.

Spot the Dog. Spot the dog ran around barking at the door. The door bell rang and the dog began barking at the door again. The door rang and the dog ran back into the house. The dog waited for his owner until the dog left the house. The dog's owner returned to bed when the dog left the house.

Nasty Attitude. Gina wanted to skip school for a month. But she was scared that her friends would find out. She was hoping to find them as soon as she could. But the next day they had lunch together. She never skipped school again.

Lake. A man found a lonely lake. He felt sad that no one would swim there. He sat at the edge to rest his thoughts. He heard a noise, he had found a bear. He decided he needed to leave and never went back.

Bagpipe. Caleb was an amazing musician. He wanted to have a show at his school. He hired a music director to come up with an idea. Caleb began recording music that was very difficult. He then got a lot of attention and had an awesome performance!
NYC. We went to NYC last weekend. My nephew went with us. My nephew was going on an expensive plane ticket. My nephew got a hotel room. We all had a great time.
Italian Food. The man put a chicken dish in the oven. He turned the oven on. He waited for it to be done. He turned the oven on. The dish was not cooked.

Skydiver. The air force was carrying an aircraft to the runway. The pilot flew into a high speed area. The pilot felt turbulence on his flight. He was distracted by the noise. The plane skidded off the runway and crashed.

Trapped Dog. Sam was walking his dog. They both found a trail and began searching. Sam began to feel sick and could not find his dog. He called animal control. Luckily, they were able to find the dog right away.
Broken Television. My brother got a new tv for Christmas. It was supposed to work. However my brother accidentally broke the television. He needed to buy a new one. He had to send me a gift card.

Hamsters for All. Molly had been asking her parents for a pet hamster all day. She wanted it badly, but they said they were broke. Molly felt very sad for the rest of the summer. But her parents made a surprise for her on the way to class. Her parents surprised her with a hamster of her own.
Not what expected. Tom loved sweets. He would eat them every day. He was having a hard time staying awake. He got very sick. He had to quit sweets.

Friend. Jim lost his mother in the war. He lived with his uncle, who was always very supportive. They always visited their mothers to comfort her. When the war ended, Jim was forced to move away with his brother. He moved far away and missed his mom all of the time.
Shane goes to a play. Shane had always wanted to go to a play. He saved up for over a year. He finally had enough to go to the play. He did not expect to go but he was surprised. He had a great time.

Chalky. Chalky went to a dance on Saturday. She met several of her friends at the club. She saw her friends playing pool as well. They also drank and drank and danced. Chalky had a good time at the dance.

Jorge Cooks Beans. Jorge decides that he wants to cook something a little different than his usual. He decides he wants to try to cook beans instead of rice. Jorge has to go to the store to buy the beans he wants. Jorge cooks beans all day and night for dinner. Jorge is happy that he decided to try a different way to cook food.

Jack buys car accessories. Jack wants to get his car accessories. He visits the dealership to browse their selection. He looks for a few cars to buy. Jack finally gets everything he wants. Jack feels great about his purchase and loves his new car.

Not Mad. I was walking down the sidewalk today. There was a large crowd on my way. Suddenly, a large man in a black shirt approached me. He asked me what my son was doing for me. I said that my son was walking with a group of kids.
Pool. Cheryl went to the waterpark today. She found a nice little pool. It was very dark. Cheryl tried to put her son in the water. The water didn't come out.
Cheap Move. I took a cab in the city once. When I got back home I noticed something odd. When I opened the door it was gone. It was a large flat screen TV! Now I have to buy a new TV.

Safe and Sound. Cathy lived in a basement apartment in a condo. One night, she heard a loud noise. She looked out the window and saw a baby mouse in the room. Cathy yelled at her husband to get out of the apartment. But she didn't stop, so Cathy left the baby mouse in the living room.

News. We live in Brighton, Massachusetts. Last week the mayor issued a warning about trash. It said trash must be removed. The city collected the trash in its garbage bins. The garbage company is doing a cleanup now.
Broken Arm. My dad had a car. He let me borrow his truck. While I was driving my car a car went over me. The truck slid into the street. My arm was broken and I had to go to the hospital.

Mary's Kitten. Mary was watching her toddler's new kitten. The kitten liked to roll around and fetch. She had a plan to buy the kitten a ball. Mary put the ball in the kitten's toy box to play with. Mary's kitten went and got a ball from the box to play with.
The Mattress. Sam's family was having a party. He wanted to buy his brother a mattress. He made one out of wood. He used it when he played in his yard. Sam's brother loved it!

Tooth. There were so many cavities in John's teeth. John started brushing them more frequently. The cavities slowly began to come out. After a month, the cavities went back to normal. John decided he would brush his teeth more often.

Migraine. I have always had migraines since I was a child. Every single time I would get angry, my eyes would light up. After I grew older, my headache went away. I was able to get better at being angry about migraines. I used this knowledge to have a very good career.

RMV. John was driving home from school one day. He was having a great time driving with his son, Josh. Josh was speeding. John almost lost control of the car. The car went into a ditch and John was okay.

Basketball Rim. Sam took his kids to the basketball arena. The basketball team was playing a friendly game of basketball. Sam played really well and scored the most points. His kids were amazed by the great game. They couldn't wait to see how Sam's team performed next time.
To much of a good thing. Tim was at the pool. His friends were having fun. Suddenly, someone dared him to jump in. Tim was scared but didn't want to hurt them. He just ran to the edge.

Rotten Luck. A man went to the beach for the first time. When he got there, he saw that there were many trash cans there. He asked around the neighborhood if anybody had picked up any. No one had. The man started a petition to throw all of the cans away.

Lilly has a stroke. Lilly had suffered from a stroke. She had not been able to walk since she had it. She decided she would take a walk one day to make herself walk. She walked for an hour and then went home. When she got home she started walking again.

The Gym. Amy decided to get into shape. She decided to start working out at the gym. She did push-ups, sit-ups, and pull-ups. After several weeks she was back to her old routine. Amy was disappointed that she could not get into better shape.
Reading. I hated reading a text book. I tried to stop myself from falling asleep. I tried to take a nap. I read the book while I was still awake. I was tired of being so lazy.

An unexpected accident. I was at home all day when I got a phone call. I answered the phone and found out my neighbor had just moved in. I told her I'd be happy to help her out, but then I saw something happen. I called 911 and asked for my neighbor's name. Then I got a call from my neighbor telling me she was alright.

Selfish People. My neighbor has a cat. She had it for years, but she was always busy. Today, she had the cat for fifteen minutes. She was upset and demanded that I leave the cat alone. When I told her, she immediately called animal control.

Ruined Mailbox. Barry was driving through the mailman one day. He tried to put his car keys in, but it wouldn't work. Barry tried to pull the wheel, but that failed too. Barry tried to pull a door handle out, but that wasn't working. Finally Barry just put his keys in and drove away.
Bleach Cap Search. Tom was running around looking for a bleach cap. He couldn't find one. He looked in a bowl. He checked a lot of containers. He found the cap he was looking for.
grocery. Tina needed some groceries. She went to the grocery store. But there was a line. And she realized she had no food. But then she found some at a dollar a can!

Padding. Tom bought new flooring. Tom's wife hated the way it made her house look. He hired a carpet store to do it for him. The company installed the new flooring. Tom's wife was happy with the outcome.

mike walker. John had a mike and walked to work. He noticed his coworkers were walking behind him. One day he saw they weren't walking with the other people. He approached the walker and asked for directions. The walker directed him to a restaurant instead.

Movie rip off. Mimi was at a movie with her friends. They wanted to watch something new. Mimi thought she would want to see the original Star Wars. Mimi got a ticket to see the new Star Wars. Mimi watched it to the horror of her life.

Tyler saves the baby. Tyler is an only child who is playing outside. Tyler sees a large tree. He runs over to the tree and saves the baby. Tyler is happy that he saved the baby. Tyler is very thankful that he saved the baby.

My Mom Lost Her Job Today. My mom just got laid off. She received a call back from a job fair. Her boss offered her an interview. My mom did not want to go. I was sad when she called and told me that.

Wedding Party. My friends and I have a wedding tomorrow. We all went to the wedding planning office to set up. The lady in the office had a great time, and everyone was friendly. She had a lot of ideas for the guest. She decided to invite my daughter's friends.
Lost Deal. Tom bought a truck to help with gas. It cost him $50. He decided to go to the mall and take it. A couple of months later it was sold. Tom was able to get the truck back.

Lansing Trip. Sam took a trip to Lansing, Michigan. He was going to a carnival. He arrived at the carnival and played on many games. He also spent time learning about the carnival. Afterwards, he went back home.

Easter Bunny. Alicia was excited to see the Easter bunny that had been left out. It was Easter Sunday, and she was determined to catch it. She waited in a field outside her house until she found the bunny. She put up all her signs and hoped for a rabbit. The bunny was nowhere to be found, and Alicia went home sad.
Bad Dessert. Tim went out with friends. They were supposed to have dessert but they didn't. Tim felt bad about it. He decided to eat some candy. Unfortunately the candy wasn't that good.

Mike Fixes His Overheating PC. Mike had been having trouble playing his video games on his PC. He couldn't see anything in the game and his laptop was freezing. He tried to check the Internet but he couldn't see anything. He decided to fix it himself. After it was fixed he played the game again.
Loud music. Kelsi was sleeping soundly. But then she started hearing noises. She woke up and looked around. The noises were coming from her room. Kelsi yelled at the noise.

Tax Evasion. Sam decided to steal a taxi for a while. However, the taxi didn't care and picked him up anyways. The taxi then drove towards Sam's location. Sam felt like he had a good time. However, the taxi's security guard found him and confiscated him.
New York Vacation. Karen wanted to go to New York City for the first time. She saved for three months to go there. She booked a flight. She packed her bags. Karen took the plane and went to New York.

College Applications. Sandra was on a campus tour. She was looking at some of the colleges. She was interested in visiting several of them. She decided on one of them that seemed interesting. She was happy to discover that she had her degree!

Generations. Jan is an old woman with a retirement home in her city. Her children are just as old as Jan. All the children are grown up. The youngest child in the family is a girl. The oldest child in the family is a boy.
Vegas. I went to Vegas to go with friends. The only place I could find was in Vegas. It was so loud! They put on a lot of noise. I realized I should be able to sleep at night.

No Hesitation. I used to be a big fan of my favorite movie. It was about a young boy who got into a fight. I hated that the kid got into the fight. He almost hurt himself in the fight. However, he came out of the fight with no injuries.

Car in Parking Garage. The car was parked in the garage. A young man got out. He had to drive the car to the parking garage. The young man got in and drove the car. He drove the car around for several minutes.

the song. I was watching an episode of tv. Suddenly, I noticed that my son was singing the same song. I was so excited. I went and bought a song and memorized it. My son loved the song and got a new song in the next season.
The move. Janet needed to get a new apartment. She went to the furniture store. She tried on a few different rooms. They gave her an apartment in a new place. Janet was very happy.

Coupon Clipping. My sister-in-law went to the grocery store for food. She needed a coupon to buy her wife dinner for two. She went through all the coupons in the registers and paid for her food. Then she drove home to use the coupon for dinner. When she returned she told me the coupon had no coupon code.

Online Shopping. The couple wanted to buy groceries. Their grocery list was very long. They decided to make a shopping list. They went to the grocery store and bought everything they needed. They were happy with their purchase.
New Router. Tim had a very old router. It was broken on the outside. Tim asked his wife to buy him a new one. She finally picked one up. She had a very great new router.

Firebug. Jed was working at the fire station. He noticed a fire in the building. There were sparks flying everywhere. He went inside and put out the fire. A firefighter helped Jed get back out of the fire.
New handbag. Susie needed a new bag for a party. She went to the store and picked out a bag. The bag was huge and soft. When it was all over, she loved it. She loved it so much, she bought one more.
Space Mountain. My parents took us to a space ship. We watched the ship for hours. Then we went on a spaceship ride. When the ship was done, we climbed on it. We couldn't wait to ride in space.
Movies. Anna was very bored. She didn't know where to watch movies. She decided to go on a Netflix search. She found a few good shows. Anna binge watched a lot of shows.
amnesia. Jim had a stroke in the sixth grade. He could no longer walk or talk. His mom got him to read a book. She taught him about memory loss. He learned to forget many things he would say.

Getting Ears Pierced. Cathy had been wanting her ears pierced for a while. Cathy was nervous about the piercing. Cathy's friend told her she should give it a try. Cathy and her friend got the ears pierced. Cathy had a wonderful time with her new earrings.
Total heat stroke. Allie had a crush on a boy in school. So she decided to ask him out. Allie's crush was not happy. So she tried to make it worse. She ended up being a total disaster.
To the Beach. Carmen decided to go to the beach. He put on his beach sandals and sandals. He ran into the ocean. The ocean was cool. They laid down on the beach.
The Hair Band. Lily wanted to dye her hair brown. She looked online for ideas. She found some cute green hair bands. She bought them from the store. Lily loved the look.

Army Recruit. Bryan had always wanted to be an Army recruiter. He worked hard in school, but wanted to do more than just study. On the day of the big recruiting day, he got to pick his friends. He was so excited about his day at the recruiter, he could hardly contain his tears. When he was called back, he was excited to begin a career in the military.

Graphing Calculator. I worked hard to earn a few dollars from a friend. My friend was rich, and wanted me to spend it. I decided to go to him for a job. I bought a graphing calculator and worked hard. The calculator helped me earn a lot of money.

Tail. I was walking along the beach one day. I walked through the beach and noticed a little animal. The animal was a huge tailed turtle. I picked the turtle up and placed it in the water. I gave the turtle a name and then he swam away.

Road Trip. The Smiths were driving for the first time in their lives. They wanted to see all the places they'd never been before. They drove to the ocean and sat on the beach. They looked at the waves. It was a very lovely trip and they'd been dreaming about it ever since.

The Paper. Tim loved to write things down. He spent all of his free time writing. One day, he realized that he was lost. He started looking through his notebook. Finally he found the pen he was writing on.

The old town visit. My friend and I went to the old town one summer afternoon. We walked through the old buildings and old houses. We saw a few historical sites. Then, we went inside. It was very fun and memorable!

In Trouble. Dan broke his windshield wiper blade on his motorcycle. He decided to use it to fix it when he got home. When he opened the wiper blade the gears were dirty. Dan was not satisfied and threw the wiper blade away. Dan took off the wiper blade and replaced it with a new one.

The Goat. Raul was the best chef at the best restaurant in town. He always made a wonderful meal to take to the party. One day he saw the goat eating out of a carton of bread. He decided he would make it his own and make it. It turned out to be delicious, he made a huge fortune with his new recipe.

Ferns. Gabby was looking forward to the visit to her friends house. She had been invited to come along with the others. She was excited to see her friends' house. She met with them and walked in the door. When she entered, they were very happy to see her.
Siblings. Amy's brother got a puppy. He gave it to her friend's older brother. Amy thought it was too much. Her mother made him put the puppy back. Amy's brother got a new puppy the next day.
Rex Can't Sleep. Rex has been up late every night to read. He wakes up at 7AM to read. He read through an entire book. At 5AM, he overslept. Rex fell asleep on his back at 4AM!
Camping. Bob had gone camping with his friends. He got very sick. His friends called his parents. They called the hospital. They gave Bob antibiotics to stay healthy.

The Game. Tommy had been practicing playing basketball for months. He was confident he would win the game. He jumped for the ball and scored a shot. The ball bounced from him and hit another neighbor's window. Tommy broke his windows and apologized.

The Pistol. Jared bought a new pistol to protect himself. He was worried about his first crime. One night he shot the wrong way and the gun went off. The cops were not expecting it and arrested Jared. He was fired for a reckless act.

Leaf Collector. Dan loved to collect all kinds of plants. He was determined to get the biggest leaf he could find. After years of research he found the biggest leaf he could find. The leaf turned out to be the biggest he ever had before. Dan felt very proud.

Frank Finds a Friend. Frank notices that a friend he used to be a bully with no friends. He decides that he needs a friend. He looks in a book at the local library to find a friend. He finds a new friend and asks if he can hang out. He meets that friend's name and is happy.

Driving School. Gabe was a teenager who wanted to drive a car. His parents encouraged him to do it. However he was too young to drive and his parents did not care. Gabe drove his car for 12 years. He eventually made it home safely.

Summer 1987. Summer 1987 was a really hot summer day. It was a very hot summer day, and so I stayed inside. I could barely breathe, it was so hot. My water broke in my room. I had to go to the doctor and he prescribed me cold medicine.

The Expensive Bill. Mike wanted to play a prank on his roommate, Tom. He put a fake bill on Tom's door and set it for $100. He tried to break the window but it was too heavy. A day after the fake bill, Tom opened it. He saw the bill that Mike had put there had gone missing.

Sanitary. My sister and I went to the pharmacy to buy tampons. The pharmacist took a look at our purchase list. She told me that the tampon I was interested in is not sanitary. I had to argue with her. I returned the tampon and bought a new one instead.

Wednesday Dinner. It was a week after Halloween. Nate had not gotten invited to dinner. Nate knew he had to make the effort. He decided to cook his girlfriend dinner. Nate made dinner and his girlfriend loved it.

The Letter. When he was in high school, Bill wrote letters every day. He wrote them to his parents, his teachers, and his friends. One day he wrote that he would write the letters to his friend. His friend asked if he would write the letter. Bill got in trouble for writing a letter to his friend.

Fast Cars. I have been driving my Ford Tiva for a year now. It was time to make a move on buying a new car. I knew something was going to happen. I put an offer in on a Ford Tiva and waited for a response. I was told the car was only going to be picked up within a week.

Wedding Disaster. Mary and Charles were married and raising their daughter. Mary was in the hospital for a broken leg and couldn't walk. Cathy's daughter was in school, so Charles drove to Mary's hospital. Cathy's daughter saw Charles and waved him over. Cathy said Mary was in the hospital for good and Charles waved her off.
The Rug. Tom was having a tough time sleeping. His sheets were really thin. He didn't know what to do. He finally decided to go to a dry cleaners. It turns out he had a brand new rug.

Hair Spray. John went out to the store to buy some hair spray. He saw one in his size and ordered it. The person working next to him poured the spray. The spray did not seem to do very well. John realized it was not the spray but the shampoo.
Jake Finds a Friend. Jake is at school. He doesn't like any other students there. The kids are loud and annoying. Jake asks for a friend to help him study. Jake finds a new friend at school.

Writing a Song. Lacy had been writing a song for months. Her boyfriend told her she should get the lead. Lacy was very sad and sad. She didn't like to play her guitar and the song was no good. She decided to not write another song after that.

Sandwich Thief. I got a new sandwich for lunch today. My boyfriend and I went to the sandwich shop to get it. As soon as I got the sandwich it was already gone. I looked around and noticed that the place was empty. My boyfriend did not have anything to say about the sandwich.

Scuba diving. I decided to take a trip to scuba dive with my family. I had to decide between diving or scuba diving. I decided that it was time to dive. My father said he didn't believe me. So I felt very embarrassed and we ended up deciding to go scuba diving.
The Dry Milk. Gretchen was trying to make breakfast. She had no milk but just some cream. She poured it into a hot cup. She got the milk out and tasted it. It was a huge hit.

Vladimir Plays Pool. Vladimir loves to play pool. He knows the game very well. He plays a lot of games with his friends. One day he played pool to the point where he lost his first game. Vladimir was very disappointed.

Playing graveyard. John wanted to learn how to play graveyard. He decided to look up youtube videos about it online. He watched as many videos as he could to get the hang of it. He eventually learned the game and started to practice. It made a big difference in his life and he felt good about it.

Accident at Home. I was home with my children. One of my children dropped off her shoe on a chair. The chair fell on the ground. I saw her step on the chair. I had to call the police to come help her.
Justin breaks down. Justin is driving down the road. He is making sure his car is safe. He gets in a bad accident. He breaks down. The police catch him and take him away.

Cathy's Garden. Cathy planted a vegetable garden. She got a few seeds and watered them for a month. One day she noticed the vegetables were wilted. Cathy realized she had left the soil too long. She removed the wilted vegetables and watered them again.

Favorite Letter. Tom wanted to start a letter to his crush. He sat down and read a letter he found on Facebook. Tom wrote the letter. He put the letter in the trash. The next morning Tom got a new letter from his crush.

Head Stuck. John was trying to find his seat at a movie. But he was too tired to sit still. And he couldn't stop walking. He decided to sit by the window. And he was relieved that it wasn't the worst situation.

Lost CD. My friend was out of town for a while. He brought my friend a CD to sell. When my friend came home, he found his CD missing. He called me to ask why he left it there. The CD was actually taken to the wrong house.

cringey LDR. Tim was in love with a girl from school. They went on a date to get married. The date went great and it took a long time to get there. The girl wasn't happy and broke up with Tim. Tim decided to end his relationship immediately.

Losing Faith. It was the first day of school. Nate was excited to go to school. He was afraid of how people would react. After a while, he saw a friend walk by with a pretty girl. She immediately took Nate's eyes.
Woods. Kari went outside for a walk. Her shoes were too heavy. Kari couldn't walk up the hill. She had to walk home. Kari went back inside and cried.

Alex's Sickness. Alex woke up one morning feeling extremely sick. He decided he needed a shower and take some vitamin C. He brushed his teeth and went to the bathroom. He ran a bath and got the day's work done. Alex felt much better after feeling better.
Don't Do It. Lila and Mary went to the beach together. Lila threw sand at Mary. Mary walked away from the beach. She got sand on her back. She cried all the way home.

Ken's First Day. Ken has never been in a hurry, but he's been training for months. Today, Ken has to wait until the last minute for his first day. Ken and his instructor don't have time to get to school early, though. He arrives at school 15 minutes late. Ken is still a little nervous but realizes it's okay.
Not crazy. Tina wanted to see a scary movie. She had already bought a ticket. She was in a panic. Tina tried to calm herself down. Tina still wasn't too sure.

Protest. Ana was invited to a protest. But she couldn't afford a t shirt or bandage. Then the police officers gave her a discount. Ana protested her lack of protest! But it only strengthened her resolve!

Fate. Lana was walking to school one day. Her teacher told her to stop, as it was dangerous to walk alone. She didn't listen and continued walking without stopping. A policeman saw her walking, and told her to stop. Lana ignored him and went to school anyway.

Tom and the Turtles. Tom loved turtles. Tom went to the local pet store with his friends. Tom bought a turtle for his pet turtle. Tom fed it a lot of food. Tom got the turtle sick and had to take it to the vet.

The Lasagna. A man and his wife decided to have a lasagna party for their anniversary. They drove to a fancy restaurant that serves the best lasagna. The man's wife loved everything, but they weren't having much. They ordered pizza, and it was delicious! They decided that the pasta was the best part of the dinner.

Nurse Talitha. Talitha had a lot of doubts about herself. She decided to get a real job. Talitha was afraid of going into the community. A co-worker suggested she apply for a job there. Talitha applied and got the job.

Lost and resentful. Tom was having trouble with his ex-girlfriend. He was always talking about his ex-girlfriend with her. When the ex-girlfriend was out, he tried to find her. Eventually his ex-girlfriend got back home and confronted him. Tom was embarrassed and embarrassed that his ex-girlfriend found him.
Swimming team. Alex loves swimming. Alex wants to be a swimmer. Alex works very hard. Alex swims all the time. Alex is very good at swimming.

Campaign. I spent a week working on an online campaign. I made a huge hit, and received hundreds of visitors. I went to several conventions, and made several connections. After a few months, the campaign stopped. I still received the money for the campaign, though.

Final Match. I was watching the wrestling finals last week. I was rooting for the wrestler who lost. I was cheering for the wrestler who won. My team cheered for their team. When the match was over, we felt very good.

Painting. Sally decided she wanted to paint her bedroom. She went to the art store and purchased supplies. Sally bought paint. When she got home Sally began to paint her room. She then took a picture and enjoyed her work.

Lindsey's first drive. Lindsey has never driven a manual transmission. She is afraid she will be a terrible driver. She decides to go out for a drive. After a few minutes, she finds she likes the manual transmission. Lindsey decides to buy a manual transmission car.
Karen makes a sandwich. Karen is hungry. She decides to make a sandwich. She cooks the sandwich. Karen puts the sandwich in the oven. After it is done, she enjoys her sandwich.
Ron Buys A Phone. Ron has always loved smartphones. He decides to buy one. Ron goes to a smartphone store. He picks out a phone that he likes. Ron is happy to have a smartphone.
Moving. Dylan's parents had finally decided to move to a new state. Dylan was so excited. She cried all day. When they left, she was still sad. But when they came home, she was excited to see them!
Key. Tiffany couldn't find her keys. She tried getting into her car. The car key didn't turn. She had to call her husband. He came to her to fix her car.

Ten Year Reunion. Dan took a 10 year old boy to the mall to hang out. The 10 year old boy had a hard time falling asleep. His mom was very tired and took him to sleep. Dan had a good time at the mall and didn't sleep for a week. Dan was glad that he was able to go see his friends again.

Cleaned Out. The Smith family wanted to take a trip. The only thing they could afford was a hotel. They stayed in a hotel for two weeks. When they got to the hotel they noticed something wasn't right. It was so filthy that they had to throw out the food.

Summer dreams destroyed. Sandy decided to take summer vacation from work. Her kids were very excited to go. Sandy went out on the beach and laid out the beach towels. A man appeared and started yelling at Sandy. Sandy was so upset she ran out the door.

Inconsiderate Neighbor. I had just moved into my new house. I decided to make a potluck there. My neighbor told me that he had a dog. I told him that I would not let him keep it. He gave me a week to complain.
Hide and Go. Kim was looking for a new dog. She saw a stray dog outside of her home. Kim walked outside and saw that the dog was gone. Kim called the police. Kim's dog had been found and taken home.

Overwhelmed by technology. I was walking down the street and noticed something strange. I walked around and noticed that my friend and I had no wireless speakers. I found a few different ones but the ones I found were too expensive. I decided to buy a pair of wireless speakers online. I ended up being a little bit surprised.

Crazy Neighbors. A couple of neighbors moved in next door to my house. They were very eccentric. They had a lot of things that were not supposed to be there. One night the house was broken into and the neighbors left. It took me weeks to learn my lesson.

Back Pain. I went to work and was told I needed to take a few minutes. My back was getting back and forth a little. My boss asked me if I can see a chiropractor or acupuncturist. I decided that I would rather go to work without the back pain. I went home, and relaxed until my back felt better.
True Challenge. Tim and I were playing video games. He wanted to beat me. I tried to give him an easier game. Tim never played games before. He beat me.

Linda loses. Linda is running for president of her school. She has all the good ideas that she has. Linda is a great leader and very popular. Unfortunately Linda loses the election and loses everything. Her popularity starts to wane.

Stranded Island. I once spent a day at an island on the ocean. The island was about to go into the waters, so I decided to stay. After I got there, I realized I had to board the boat. My boat was very close to shore, and my boat wasn't moving. I made it to shore and walked out.

Social Media. Cindy wanted to join social media. Cindy decided to get a social media account. Cindy began tweeting a lot of content that she liked. Cindy had a great time with her social media account. Cindy decided to use social media more often now.
Nick and the Doll. Nick was playing with his toy doll. It didn't seem to work, though. He thought it would probably stop working. He decided to try putting it together. Luckily, it worked just fine.

Drinking. I was out to dinner with friends last night. I wanted to drink beer, but I could only carry one bottle. I decided to drink wine and my bottle got too big. I ended up spilling my wine everywhere. I had to go buy a new bottle to keep my mouth clean.
Old Bed. My old bed was an antique. I was sleeping with it every night. I finally decided to get a new bed. I put on the new bed and slept well. I did not get any more sleep that night.

Slump. The man was trying to find a job. His current job didn't hire him as he was very unproductive. He applied for a new job in the bank. The new boss rejected his application. The man went back to his old job.
Fun pizza party. It was the day of the pizza party at school. I was so excited! I brought my friends and family. We all went out and ate pizza. Then, we all had ice cream.

Celebrity Look-alike. Amy wanted to look like a celebrity in school. She was only 5, but she would have to wear a bikini to class. She put her bikini on and grabbed a swimsuit. On the day of the school photo she looked at all the girls in the swimsuit. She looked just like the girl on the picture with her bikini on!

Gun. Bob and his brothers wanted a new video game system. They decided to build a rifle and get a gun together. Bob's brothers spent all of summer building the gun. They went to the gun store and bought a rifle. They then went home and took it back home.

Snake in the Yard. One night while I was at my house I heard a strange noise. I looked outside the front of the house but I didn't see anything. I found a snake in the yard and realized it was there. I grabbed the snake and went outside. I called my husband to come take me out and look around.
Math Tutor. I needed help in math. My friend was a tutor. I asked him to help me. He tutored me on math for two weeks. I am much better in math now.

Prom Night. Tim's dad was having a small yard sale. Tim got in line for a prom for $5 and bought a few things. The people at the yard sale were also a bunch of high school kids. Tim's dad and mom talked for awhile. Tim felt good about being a part of it.
Iron. John found a piece of iron in his bedroom. He decided to get it ironed. He got all his kids together. They worked on it for an hour. It was perfect when the iron came back.

Goodbye Love. Sara met Fred while on the bus. She was so jealous. Sara had the biggest crush on him for 2 years. One day she tried to find the courage to ask Fred out. When she did Fred walked away and she was crushed.

No Money No Honey. Timmy was doing homework one afternoon. The teacher told him to turn his work over. He refused to turn it over. He did a quick google search for a good tutorial. After many hours, he finally found it and finished the project.

Erin and the TV. Erin's older brother told him not to watch TV anymore. Erin told his parents. His parents finally decided that they had to let him watch TV. Erin was devastated. Now he had to watch movies instead of TV.
Old Stove. My daughter used an old stove in her room. She would go and check the stove after it was full. The stove didn't turn on. I got her an old stove fan. She loves it!
Book of Mormon. Ethan bought a book of Mormon. He started reading the first chapter. He did not like any of the words. Then he thought of a clever joke. Ethan read the entire book in one night!
The College. Jack has always been afraid of going to college. He decided to go to school. He studied hard. He got a great job. Jack is no longer afraid of college.

baby. I love to play games and collect video games. When I was in kindergarten, my mom took me to the game store to buy some games. On the way, I found a baby dinosaur on the ground. I immediately took it home and nursed it to health. My mom was thrilled that I was able to keep the dinosaur in my house.

Glare. Gina's brother had a big crush on her friend Tami. He was the only boy she knew in her class. One day Tami asked Gina to be her friend. Gina refused and said Tami didn't have any friends. Her brother had his friend over to talk to her.

Where is my refund?. Nate was going through the mail. He needed to get a refund for a phone. He looked under the bed to see what was inside. He found his phone in there. He paid the phone off and was happy.
dead dog. Samantha had a dog. The dog kept biting and scratching. She took the dog to the vet. They ran some tests on the dog. They found the dog had rabies.

Seriously, They're Everywhere. The big day was here. We were so excited to be going to Disney World! We loaded into our car and headed to the airport. There, we checked in and headed to the theme park. It was such a great trip!

Samuel's sandwich. Samuel was hungry one day. He looked in the refrigerator. Samuel saw a peanut butter sandwich in the refrigerator. Samuel was tempted to eat the sandwich. He decided to eat the sandwich.

A miscommunication. Tina bought some new hair ties from a department store. They had a coupon for 10% off. Tina decided she wanted the tie in a different color. The cashier said she'd have to give her the coupon, too. The manager gave her the wrong tie in the wrong color.

Infection. I was swimming in the ocean at a beach. I felt a lot of water splash in my hand. After I was done swimming I felt a lot of pain. I realized that I was bitten by a jellyfish. I immediately pulled my hand out of the water.

Picking just one. Lisa wanted to pick a pair of shoes for school. She was going to the store but didn't want to pay for any. She decided to pick a few that were very expensive. Lisa picked three pairs. When she got to the register she paid for her shoes.

maracas. Anna wanted a maracas to go with her dinner at a local restaurant. But she didn't have the money for one. She decided to take it home instead. And she found it was very cheap. Anna ended up getting an apple instead!

Jam or jelly. Tim was at the gas station trying to fill up his tank. He liked to try different types of fuel and things like that. He saw some gum, and decided to try it. He was in heaven. He felt great about it.
The Manual. Jill wanted to make a smoothie. But she didn't have a blender! She went to the store and bought one. Then she set it up in her kitchen. Jill found she made a delicious smoothie!
Forgetful Sam. Sam was a forgetful person. He forgot to pay his bill. He thought it was okay because he was sure he'd be late. Sam had a plan. He was going to forget to pay it right away.

Cold Soup. I decided to make cold soup one day. I bought all the ingredients. I poured the soup into a bowl and left it there overnight. When I woke up the soup was cold and bitter. I had to buy more cold soup.
Wednesdays. I don't like Mondays. My wife's friends are all on Mondays. She has a soft spot for Fridays. So this week is going to be a week of Fridays. I won't work on Mondays after that.

Hiking Trip. Lily was hiking in a local trail with friends. One of her friends tripped and fell down. Lily took off her backpack and helped her friend up. The friend told her her friend was okay but not quite healed. Lily was disappointed to be the only person who needed help.

Every time. Jed was getting frustrated. He was always being asked if he would like to go. Jed went over to his room and asked if he could go. His brother refused because he was only 15 years old. His brother was embarrassed to tell his parents that Jed would ask.

Salty. I wanted to have fun at the beach with my friends. I went to the beach and tried to surf, but I got sick. I started to cry so I ran to the car to pick up my friend. I sat in the back seat, feeling sick for the whole ride to the car. When I got to the car I was glad to be there.

Over-reacting. Tina went to the store to buy some food. When she got home she realized that she ate way too much. She realized that she had over-reacted. She decided to order a smaller lunch instead. When it was delivered she was not upset about it.

Ironing Clothes. I was watching TV when I realized I needed ironing. I looked online, but it was so expensive. I decided to go to my local store. When I bought all my ironing supplies I set up my iron. I was happy to be ironing my clothes after all.

Lizzie's Locks. Lizzie locked herself out of the house. She heard a rustling noise from her bedroom. She peeked outside, and saw her son was climbing a tree. She began laughing hysterically. She climbed the tree, and found her keys under the tree.

Jacob's Lawn. Jacob was worried that his lawn would get damaged by a car. He bought some grass sprinklers at the hardware store. After he went outside, he watered it diligently. He watered it for many days. By the time it was springtime, he was happy with his lawn.

Banana Split. Cameron's sister asked him to try a banana split for lunch. He made the best banana split of his life. His sister ate the whole banana and gave a little to Cameron. Cameron ate the rest of the banana and was disappointed. He had never had so much banana split before.

Speech. My class took a speech history class. Each of the students was assigned to deliver a speech for the class. The class was divided into two teams. In addition, the teacher assigned each student a topic. The speeches were delivered by the coach and he left.

Snacker. Jenny loves to drink, but her mom does not. She snouts about it to everyone but she keeps drinking. One day she sees a cute little boy and buys him a soda. Her mom buys her a new toy. Now Jenny no longer has to drink.

Sushi. It was a hot summer day. But the Smiths always went out and eat. The family sat down and ate the best sushi ever. When they left the house, the family went to their house. The Smiths ate their food for days!

Last Work Sandwich. Amy was looking forward to a peanut butter and jelly sandwich for lunch. She went to the pantry to find the ingredients. In the pantry Amy saw the ingredients she needed. Amy took the ingredients from the pantry to the store. Amy had her sandwich for lunch.

Clark Watches Birds. Clark has always wanted to be a bird watcher. However, he cannot afford to spend much money. Finally Clark gets a job. Clark works very hard to save up the money he needs. Now Clark spends his money on tickets to the next flight.

Egg. Sally was preparing an egg hunt. She thought she would be all by herself. She ended up being very lucky. She was able to find almost a dozen eggs. She won the contest with her best egg hunt ever.

Not Realizing. I've been working at my job for 10 years now. Today I had to move to a different city. I didn't understand how I'd find the new place. As I got there I was greeted by a couple of older workers. They were all in college and working together.

Best in Class. Gina always got bad grades in her math class. She thought she would make a big deal and quit. She decided to hide in a closet. Gina hid in the closet because she knew there were no friends there. She ended up not getting the best grade in class.

Trip to Australia. Cynthia wanted to visit Australia. She went to Australia and found a flight ticket. She paid for the flight ticket and boarded the plane. Once she got on the plane, she was surprised. It was very far away from her home.

Our New Kayaks. My father's older brother had a kayak. One day he decided to sell it to me. The price was over $200 to keep. It was worth a lot, so I decided to take it. I decided it was time to buy another kayak.
The actor. Benjamin always wanted to be an actor. He practiced his lines in front of a mirror. He practiced his stunts as well. Benjamin finally went to auditions. Benjamin was cast in a movie.

Kiera. Kiera was the best cook at school. She often won the class's contests. One day, she got out of the contest with an open mouth. The teacher called her into his office and told her. Kiera never won a contest again.

parking ticket. I used to go to a parking garage and get a ticket. They would put a ticket for my car to my car. I would take the ticket to the mechanic. The mechanic said I was not going to get it fixed. It took me a while to get the ticket back.
Ruts. Gina wanted a new set of ruts. They were black. She begged her grandma to give her one. But her grandma was so sad she cried. She didn't have a new rut anymore.

The Pizza. James and Sue decided they wanted pizza. They couldn't decide what kind of pizza to eat so they looked in a grocery store. They bought a few things and made a list of what they wanted. They arrived home and sat down to see what they wanted. They had no idea what kind of pizza they wanted so they ordered a pizza.

New calculator. Jenny bought a new calculator for her home. When she started to use it it started acting weird. Jenny kept checking the battery and it had been out for hours. Jenny tried everything to fix the problem. Finally she found her old one sitting in her front yard.

Giant Squid. There was a giant squid in the ocean. A man went to take pictures of it. A squid turned out to be the biggest fish he'd ever seen. The man was not impressed with it. He tried to get a closer picture next time.
Gorilla. The gorilla lived a nice life. It was a tropical forest. One day the humans came by. They came by to look at the gorillas. The gorilla's eyes widened.

Sid is the life of the party. Sid was so good at playing sports. He challenged his friends to a game of football. Sid's friends all bet on Sid. Sid played a great game and won the bet! His friends congratulated him and told him he was the greatest.

Skateboarding. A little boy named Tom got his skateboard for Christmas. He rode it around school everyday. He rode it around his neighborhood and rode it. He broke his arm one day. Tom was very sad to lose his skateboard.

President. I ran for President of my school. I campaigned for many hours and days. I talked to people from across the district. I went door to door in my community to speak about my views. A group of students voted me out of the race.
Wild Jump. Ned took his dog for a walk. But he forgot to close his gate. The dog escaped and ran all around the neighborhood. It was an all out walk. Ned had to leave his dog to wait.
Mike is stuck. Mike is a lonely child. His mother does not have the strength to take him outside. Mike stays inside the house. Mike is always crying. His mother is very upset at Mike.

Sneaking In. Kendall was at school and was taking pictures. She was talking to a group of people and a man approached. She was uncomfortable and began walking away. Suddenly, a boy in the group came up to Kendall. They awkwardly asked Kendall to take a picture with him.
Virginia Beach. Our family went on a trip to Virginia Beach. It is a beautiful beach. It had many sand bars. The beach is a great place to relax. We had a fun time at the beach.

Learning how to cook. I always wanted to learn how to cook. I went to the community center for lessons. I learned how to cook a lot. After a while I learned how to cook. Now I make good meals for my friends.
Promotion. Caleb received a promotion. He told his coworkers and boss about it. They congratulated him. Soon Caleb was promoted. Caleb was happy with his promotion.
Stephen gets bullied. Stephen is a high school kid. One day he is bullied by a guy. The bully tells him to stay. Stephen does not fight back. Stephen gets beaten up.

Sports. Joey is a very athletic boy. He loves to run and play sports with his friends. Today, Joey played football for the boys. Joey got hurt and needed to sit out for a while. Joey is now unable to play football.
Keeping Score. Tim wanted to learn to play chess. He watched a few instructional videos. He took up chess online. He watched many videos on a weekly basis. Eventually he became a good chess player.
Cat. Anna had a cat. She didn't know how to take care of it. She decided to take it to the vet. The vet explained the problems. Anna felt relieved.
Shuttle. The bus came to a stop. I got on the bus. It stopped in front of me. I had to move a lot. Thankfully I was able to get back on the right bus.

Mutual Attraction. Jane wanted to start a relationship with Tom. Tom told her that he felt he had more time to date. Jane thought it was a bit creepy. They decided to meet up after work for some coffee. After meeting up, they were both happy.

Jimmy Drops History Class. Jimmy is failing his history class. He has been procrastinating this year. His professor gives him a warning. Jimmy drops the class for the rest of the semester. He loses his grade, but he doesn't drop classes anymore.
Chipped tooth. Catherine was cleaning her room. She found a tooth. It chipped under her hand. She rushed to get a knife. She used the knife to get the tooth.

Games. Gina had been playing with her friends at the park for several hours. They hadn't been spending too much time together. So they were on the same team this time. The other girls were also in the same team. Gina was excited to learn there were many more games to play.

Digging. I found the box of eggs in the garden. I grabbed the egg, and started to dig in the dirt. After a while, I found a small hole. I then pulled the dig in the hole and found an egg inside. I put it in the backyard and buried it in the dirt.

The Cheating. A man was trying to find his girl in a movie. He noticed one of his friends talking to another girl. He asked her what he should do to find her. She told him she was just shy. He found the girl with a guy's name and confronted him.
Sandbox. I found a sand box in my garage. I opened it to look at the sand inside. It was a dirty, black plastic box. I put the dirty box in my trash. I went inside my house and closed the box.

The ice cream truck. I walked to the ice cream truck to get some ice cream. It was packed with ice cream truck. I wanted some hot chocolate as well. Unfortunately, it was closed. I was left with ice cream and a flat tire.

Jane Opens a Candy Shop. Jane really wanted to try new candies at the local candy shop. The store was only 2 blocks away and Jane was sure she'd love to try. She took a walk through the store and tried all the different candies. Finally she tried the biggest chocolate bar she had ever seen. It was so amazing, Jane was elated.
