The Bar. Tom wanted to drink more. He went to the bar to see what people were talking about. There was a lot of alcohol there. Tom got too drunk and insulted someone. He was never drunk again.

Lonely elders. Joe is a lonely old man. He decides he needs someone to play with. Joe goes to the store to buy a new toy. Joe picks up the newest toy and plays with it. Joe is very happy to have a new toy.

Taxi Fight. The woman in front of me offered to pay me a small fee. I agreed and drove her to the curb. We stopped by the gas station and exchanged money. I tried to argue with her but she continued to argue. We went out to eat.
New Job. Bob was looking for a new job. He applied to many interviews. One company decided he would be a receptionist. Bob interviewed well for the job. Bob now works at a local burger joint.

Alone away from home. Benny was looking forward to school. He knew it was the last day of school. The day before the last day of school came. He ran outside to find his new class. He sat alone in the classroom, and made his way to class.

Figure Skating. I was sitting at the ice rink with my friends. My friends had invited me to go down the slides. My friend was going down the first slide. He fell down the slide. I laughed at him because I didn't know how to do it.

Haircut. When I was younger I decided to get a haircut. I went to the hairdresser with my father and I got my hair cut. The haircut was short and I was nervous at first. I was so nervous that I cried when I was done. When I got home I did not even cry again.

Obvious but Truthful. Tom was trying to sell a house. He offered a house that he was a realtor. Unfortunately it was more than he could sell. It was a simple fix but everyone else in the process thought it was. Tom was very embarrassed.

Limitless Embarrassment. The kids had been having fun with the beach. They found some cool places to go. They had been taking turns at the edge. They ran into a lot of people. The kids were so embarrassed they ran into the water.

Food Challenge. Jackie's class went to the cafeteria for lunch. They had been offered a free lunch. Jackie and her friends were offered a free lunch too. The girls were excited to play catch with the food. They threw the food at each other and ran away.
Mountains. I met my best friend in college. We had a great time. I moved from Boston to New Hampshire. I ended up moving to Mountains. He was very happy to see me there.
Unknown Fees. I got a job. I never received any cash. I had no idea what to do. I went to the bank to make some deposit. The manager gave me some money, but I didn't get much.
Bird. Evan was sitting on the bench in the park. He was relaxing in the grass. He had a bird in his hand. Evan got a knife from his friend. The bird flew away.

Candles. Nina bought some candles from the store. She loved them but had no idea how to use them. She asked the store clerk what she needed. The clerk showed her how to use the candles. Nina then was able to enjoy a candle.

Figure Skating. Kim wanted to learn how to skate. Her friend had her sign up for lessons. Kim spent months learning how to skater. Her friend took her to a skating rink. Kim was not very good at skating.

Restaurant. Benny and the girls were eating out at a restaurant. The boys were talking about their favorite food. After their food came out they left the table. They were going home to do laundry. They decided to eat a different food and the boys enjoyed the food.
Last Minute Decision. Tom was watching a game. He had a crush on the girl he liked. He was also the only guy in the group. He decided to ask her on a date. She said yes.

The Quota. Tia's soccer team was running late for a game. Tia was playing and wanted to stay on the field. Tia's mom decided to let her stay behind. Tia was late for her soccer game. Her mom grounded her for not playing enough.
Arrested. The man was arrested for a robbery. He had not robbed the bank. The officers thought he was talking about it. The man was arrested anyway. He received a life sentence.

Pixy. Amy's friend Lisa wanted her to pick her up at her house. Amy had no plans on driving the car so she just went home. Lisa asked if she could pick her up but she said no. Amy decided to wait until she left the house. After waiting for an hour she got the car to pick her up.

Presentation. My nephew has a history presentation at work tomorrow. His friend Joe was attending the presentation with his wife. Joe asked my wife to come with him to the presentation. My niece came to Joe's office to say her goodbyes. Joe was surprised that my niece came to his presentation.
Adoption. Sophie adopted a baby girl named Sarah. Sarah was adopted by a Catholic family. Sophie brought Sarah home. The baby girl died. Sophie felt terrible about it.

Sign Language. Amy was learning how to sign language with her dad. She thought it would be a lot of work and thought she had to get it done. Her dad signed her name and her teacher yelled hello. She thought that would take her a long time but the practice paid off. After a few weeks she was fluent and could sign the name.

Going Fishing. The Jones family went fishing. They got their lines and poles out and set off for the lake. After many hours they were almost there when they realized they forgot the bait. They were disappointed to realize the fishing trip was over. They drove back home to get their catch and eat at a diner.

Parking Spot. Tim was trying to get home for the night. His car had a flat tire. Tim called AAA to let them know he could park for free. A AAA agent showed up to the spot Tim was parked in. Tim drove home safely and got home.

Burned cookies. When I was in high school, I was doing homework. I was having trouble putting it all together. I kept thinking about putting the dough in the oven. My teacher was angry at me. I had to go to the bathroom and throw up.

Risk. Tom loved the game Risk of Rain. He was obsessed with it for many years. Once his girlfriend got sick, she couldn't play the game anymore. Tom started to cry. He decided to go get her a book on how to overcome it.
Front step trout. Sally bought a new house. She was a very frugal shopper. Her first purchase was a basset hound. Sally loved having the fish. She was so happy when the basset hound was over.

Hillary is determined. Hillary wanted to be the president of the United States. She went to the ballot box and was excited to vote for her candidate. Hillary voted for her candidate and got her vote on election day. She watched the news and heard about an announcement that day. She watched as her candidate's name was called and she was the president.

Purse envy. Jane and her best friend are best friends. It's been awhile since the two of them were best friends. One day, Jane lost her purse. She thought she lost it forever. Her friend found it and was very grateful.

The Catch. The basketball game was tied with the other team down by 3 points. The team got up the ball and passed it to the coach. The coach ran to the line to shoot the ball. The ball went into the goal, and I jumped up to catch it. I ended up with the ball in the other team's goal!

teacher affair. Karen was a great teacher. One day her teacher decided to have a relationship with a boy. When the boy asked, Karen confessed her affair. The boy was crushed. Karen was kicked out of the school.

Cowboy Doll. Jill wanted a cowgirl doll for her birthday. But her mom wouldn't let her get it. Jill finally had to work up the nerve to ask her mom for the doll. The cowgirl doll looked even more scary than Jill's imagination! Her mom finally gave in, and Jill got the cowgirl doll.
Fish. Jill took her catfish fishing. Her catfish caught five fish. Jill gave the fish to her catfish. She gave the catfish some food. The catfish ate the food.
Wet Ending. Tom was working on his report card. He got a really good grade. He hoped his parents would be proud. Tom kept getting droning on. It caused him to mess up his final grade.

Gravy. Toni wanted to make gravy for her family's Christmas dinner. But she didn't have any gravy mix! She went to the store and bought everything she needed. After shopping, Toni began to make her own gravy. It was the best gravy she ever tasted!
Baby. Our daughter got a brand new baby last week. The baby was a little yellow. We were thrilled. She is growing quickly. We are so happy.

The Eyesore. A dog ran towards the yard, looking for something. It found a small pebble and began chewing on it. The dog looked at it and saw that it was not in its food. The dog followed the pebble to the trash can and started throwing it. A farmer stopped the dog and the dog ran to the neighbor's house.

The Thief. I was walking to the store when my car was hit by a car. I was walking on my own when the car bumped into me. The car sped off and hit another vehicle. The car owner tried to run away from the car and the thief. He was caught and I was given a speeding ticket.

Walking to school. Every day my family and I walk to school together. We walk through the park for two miles. On Friday we walk through the school grounds. On Friday we go to the park. One day my sister left for work.

Jumping. My sister is a very jumpy person. She has been jumping everywhere in her room. I had to catch her from moving everywhere again. I kept jumping until I got up to her room. She has been jumping since she was 3 years old.

The Shopping Cart. It was time for her kids to go shopping. The two oldest kids loaded into a cart. They left the house and took a long way around town. Once at the mall, the oldest was overwhelmed. She didn't want to leave to go back again.
New iPad winning. My nephew is playing basketball. The other team is losing. My nephew wins the game with a buzzer. The ball goes in the basket. The team was thrilled.
The Pizza. Jake loved pizza. He ate it every day. One day he saw a pizza on the corner. He picked it up. He brought it home to his girlfriend.
Sparklers. The Sparklers decided to go see the local casino. First they got in line. Then they looked at the floor. They bought some sparklers. They then went to the casino.

Classic car. I wanted a classic car for my 18th birthday. I begged and begged my parents to buy me one. They just couldn't get rid of the old car. They finally agreed to give in. I had one of my favorite cars for years.
The Game. It was time for the big game. The family gathered on the field. They waited for the ball to roll. Finally, it went in. They clapped when the home team won.

Clara's Algebra. Clara was the smartest kid in her class. She got an A on Algebra for her high school Algebra exam. Clara was excited and thought she would pass Algebra. Clara did not pass Algebra. Clara was upset and cried when she failed Algebra.

Getting Mugged. Liz was in the mall with her sister and a few friends. Suddenly, a person approached her with a gun. She thought she was robbed, but the person turned out to be her old school friend. The person threatened to hurt Liz but she ran away. The man was caught on security cameras and taken home.

Cleaning Windows. I have a huge windows in my apartment. It's really messy. Last week my landlord said he would take them to the cleaners. He cleaned them up and set them in order. Now, my apartment looks clean.

Milk. Betsy's dog, Burt, wanted a drink of water. Betsy looked for an empty bottle of milk in the fridge. Burt wouldn't let Betsy get any milk. Betsy decided to pour Burt a glass of milk and milk. Burt was able to eat the milk.
What the Earthquake Made. A big earthquake occurred. The quake struck the village. There was no power on for several weeks. Water came in. The townspeople lived in fear of the earthquake.
Torn Socks. John was trying to make his work uniform. He got his socks on and tried to walk. However, he tripped on a rock. He fell off his work uniform. He was unable to finish his work.
The new friend. Joe was at the mall with his friends. He was walking up to a girl. They made a small talk. Joe went up and introduced himself. The girl loved Joe and they became friends.
Hangover. Joey needed to go to the bar. When he got there his friends were at the bar. Joey was on the wrong one. He ended up hitting on a girl. Luckily his friends didn't find out and they left.
Beat the game. I was out on my Xbox. I was playing my Xbox. I was walking home. I looked up and saw that there were no cars nearby. I took the walk to find the nearest cars.
Home. Jim's parents were always very mean to him. Jim was afraid of them. One day his parents were mean and took it too far. They hurt his father's feelings. He was hurt by this.
Frozen Pizza. Kendra wanted to make dinner. But she wasn't sure what toppings to put on it. She went to the store. But they didn't have any toppings at all. Kendra decided not to make dinner.
High Blood Pressure. Diane took a pregnancy test. She was relieved it was negative. She was relieved and felt better. Her doctor told her she could not have the baby. Diane cried herself to sleep.

Yoga. When I was young I was taking a yoga class. A lady came in and told me to try yoga. We watched videos and practiced together. We felt more confident and better after we were done. I felt much better after having that time with her.
The Dog Race. The boys gathered around the pit. The dog had begun running. When he saw them, he barked at them. He ran after them. Eventually, he caught them.
New Television. Ben wanted to watch television. He didn't know what he wanted. He finally picked one. It was black and yellow with a large screen. Ben turned it on and it played the movie.

Apple Tree. Anna wanted to plant an apple tree in her yard. She planted the seeds in the backyard, watered them every day and planted them. After a year, the seeds were tall enough to grow! Anna was proud of her work. Soon, she had a beautiful apple tree in her yard.

Slurpee. Jordyn's boyfriend was out of town for a week. Jordyn went to the kitchen to make her own drink. Jordyn put her frozen drink in the fridge. She was going to drink her own slurpee when her boyfriend came home. He asked if she wanted to make him one instead of a normal one.

Fun Times. John wanted to do something with his family. His mother agreed to take him to the amusement park. They all went on the ride. The ride got very crowded and loud. They decided to just relax instead.

Video Games. Tom loved playing video games. He watched videos everyday. One day he was out playing video games all day. Tom broke his arm while playing video games. He no longer wants to play video games.

Cartwheel. Nathan loved to run around and catch up with his friends. He decided he would race one day. He set up his cartwheel in the road and ran around. When he was halfway through the race, he started to feel sick. Nathan decided to give up and stop running.

Food. Jim was hungry and tired of all the food he ate. So he made a big sandwich. When he took a bite, he smiled at how delicious it was. It was the best sandwich he ever had. He decided to keep eating.

Race to victory. Bobby was a football player. He always had to make it to the finals. He was always late so he would make sure to make it. Bobby practiced for every game. Bobby was always late but finally made it to finals.

Chinese Food. Luis really loved his dad's cooking. His father was a chef and the only one they cooked for. But he was going to be a teenager and couldn't cook himself. Luis got his own job so he could cook with him. His father loved the cooking and gave him the best meal ever.

Orchard. The family decided to go to the orchard. They found a large selection of apples. They picked off the first one and took home the rest. They were thrilled with the outcome. They couldn't wait to eat more apples!

Turtle Encounter. Meredith found a turtle at the water park. She took it to the park ranger who gave her a turtle. Meredith named the turtle Turtle. She put Turtle in her cage. Meredith took Turtle home to her.

Fire. The firemen were on their way to the town's town hall. They found a suspicious fire. The fire began to spread and spread to their town. A few minutes later, an ambulance arrived. The ambulance came and helped the fireman.

New Phone. Jenny bought a new phone. She was excited to be able to use it. When she got it she was shocked by how bright it was. She dropped the phone by accident. Jenny didn't get a new phone anymore.

Animal Instinct. Evan had a cat. He liked his cat and his cat likes his house. His cat was always scratching and knocking the furniture around. One day Evan got fed up and threw the cat away. After the cat left, Evan saw the cat sitting on his bed.

The Celery. Rosa had to cut her lawns, but she'd rather wait! She decided to make a celery. She chopped the celery and sliced it into thin slices. When it was done, she added a bunch of fresh veggies and vegetables. She decided to make a casserole with all the veggies and vegetables she'd grown.

Bishop. Bishop was scared of heights. One day he decided to try one of his jumps. Bishop was scared at first but soon he was on his feet! Bishop decided he was ready to face his fear and try again. Bishop's jump was a great success and he went on his next jump!

Jimmy Races. Jimmy was an avid racer. He raced a lot of different vehicles. One day, a friend challenged him to a race. Jimmy accepted and ran as fast as he could. He beat his friend and won the race.

Playing in a Band. Tom was interested in the new music coming out in town. He liked the bands he was in. They told him they were interested in playing with him. Tom agreed and went to the band's. He met the band after the show and enjoyed it.

Spaghetti. One day, my grandmother cooked spaghetti. She decided that she wanted to use different ingredients. She looked up a recipe that was going to be great. After reading the recipe, she decided on using green peppers and cheese. After adding all the ingredients, she placed the spaghetti in the oven.

Coming Out. The boy had been in the closet for the past 20 minutes. The teacher had to go check on him. The boy ran out of the classroom. He went home to tell his mother. The boy cried when she found out he was leaving.
Dylan's new car. Dylan has recently purchased a new car. He drives his new car all over town. Dylan gets pulled over for speeding. The officer tells him he is speeding. Dylan gets his car back.

New App Department. Ricky needed to hire new people at work. He hired an ex-worker to his business. He thought he would have to do a lot of work to get it done. He ended up hiring a new employee. His former employee became his best employee.

Bob and the Donkey. Bob loved animals, but he was really sad about it. He always wished he could have a donkey. He decided he had to start working on a donkey farm. Soon, Bob had built an amazing donkey farm. He was very happy that he finally had a donkey.

Tail rider. The tail rider was on the wrong side of the road. He ran as fast as he could. The tail rider hit the other car. The other car was severely damaged. The tail rider had to pay the rest of the money.
Lost charge. Allie needed to charge her phone. But it was lost. She called to make sure it was charged. Unfortunately she couldn't. Allie was frustrated.

Becca's Christmas Kitten. Becca was sad to find out that her kitten was sick. Becca called her friend, and asked her what she knew. Becca's friend explained that her friend had the kitten, but didn't know how to care for it. Becca got a job as a nanny, and learned the cat was cared for by the vet. Now, Bella's kitten is healthy, healthy, and healthy,

Science Dissection. My teacher told us to do a science dissecting test. I got home from school to help my father. My father helped me dissect the frog and explain its anatomy. The frog was very fat and squishy, so we ended up in a field. I sat on the ground with my belly full of guts.

A Hot Day. Dan decided to go play some baseball today. He went outside and saw it had been really hot outside. Dan was sweating a lot and could hardly walk. Dan decided to go back inside. Dan was glad to have a hot day.

Robot Fighting. Toby and his brother wanted to fight. They had a lot of fighting robots. They made a bet on who could be the last robot. They fought with each other for the longest time. Eventually they both beat each other by about half a minute.

Knitting. I have been learning how to knit a lot of different things lately. My favorite thing is the scarf I knitted last week. I had the scarf for three years. My grandma gave me a gift in the mail. It was my grandmother's favorite sweater.

Large water slide. John had never been to a large water slide before. His friends told him they were afraid but he had a plan. He convinced them to go with him. He went and had a blast. He couldn't believe how big the slide was.

Cat eats the Dog Treats. Sarah's cat liked eating the dog treats. She tried to put the treats in her bowl but she just couldn't. She tried putting the dog treats in her bowl but she just couldn't. Then she tried putting the dog treats in her bowl. Finally she put the treats in the bowl and the cat was happy.

Jane and Cat. One day, Jane was walking home from school. She spotted a stray cat in the middle of the street. Jane felt bad for the cat, so she let it in. Jane went home and her parents were upset. Jane was grounded for a week.

Surfing Scare. Sara was on the beach with her friends. They were playing a game of surfing with a metal bucket. Sara noticed that they were very excited about it. She jumped on the bucket and started to surf. To her horror, Sara's bucket was too small and she fell in the water.
Girl Friend. Abe's friend was a girl. They were best friends. Abe did not like the girl. One day Abe decided to break up with the girl. He was so sad about breaking up with the girl.

Chatty Kathy. Kathy loved to be on the phone. She was called into her mother's room after school. She waited till she heard the door beep. The family went outside for the evening. They talked, and drank a glass of water.
Scuffed. Tom was playing baseball with friends. Tom was playing hard. His friends tried to hit the ball hard. Tom was too scared to get too close. Tom's friends had to come out to apologize.
Slow Internet. Bob was using his laptop. He tried to connect to the wifi. It was slow. He called the tech support. The tech support could not fix the issue.

Baseball Slide. Last night I went to a baseball game. I was hoping to see the base ball slide. When I got there it was not open. I was scared it would be closed forever. Thankfully it was opened and I got to play the game.

Lester Jumps Rope. Lester decided he wanted to learn how to jump rope. Lester decided he would learn to jump rope at the gym. He bought rope and put it on his trampoline. Lester began jumping rope every day. Lester was able to get really good at jumping rope.
Peanut. Tommy went on a camping trip. He forgot to bring a peanut butter sandwich. He made one out of scratch. Tommy's mother didn't like it. Tommy's mom never ate it.

Water Skiing. Jack and Jill went water skiing. They had never been so excited. They went to a lot of different places. They even went to a pond near the river. The water skiing was an amazing way to experience something new.

Angkor Wat. Neil took a train to the capital city of Cambodia. He saw the ancient temples and temples of the Tham Nga people. He learned about the history of Angkor Wat. He even learned about the temples that were built. Neil returned home with a wonderful new understanding of Angkor Wat.

Worse Than Before. The coach was very strict to the players. His team was really good at the game. The team worked so hard and tried really hard. They won the game and received a medal. The coach told the players to do the same thing next time.

Horatio Finds a Job. Horatio had been jobless for a week. He decided to look for a new job. He applied for many different jobs at his local mall. Horatio was interviewed and interviewed again. He was hired on the spot as a cashier at a restaurant.

The Cookie Burn. Sam was baking cookies. He was about to put them in the oven. Suddenly, the cookies were burned. Sam went to the store and bought some more. He was able to fix the cookies and get a refund.

Construction Workers. Jim was a construction worker. He would help load the trucks with large boxes. He also helped load the cars with large crates. During a storm Jim didn't see a truck that crashed into a box. The box fell on top of Jim's boss.

Borrowed Money. Bill was late to the bar for a friend's birthday party. Bill was a bit drunk when he arrived to the bar. When he arrived, all of his friends were there. Bill realized his wallet was missing when he arrived. Bill returned the wallet, but was in a bad mood about it.

Scuba Diving. Sam was feeling sad and afraid. He went scuba diving for the first time in his life. He loved the thrill. Sam had an amazing time. His friends thought it was the best birthday present ever.

Preacher. Bert was raised in the Baptist church. One day a man came and said he was a Preacher. The man didn't want Bert to go back home. Bert was scared and did the right thing. When the man left, Bert never looked back.
The evil dad. The dad was a scary guy. He went out with the kids in his car. They heard a thud from the car. They didn't know what it was. The dad ran off from them and never showed them again.

sad news. Lisa had been depressed all day. She decided to call her friends to see what was wrong. Lisa asked her friend if she was okay. Her friend said her mom was having an affair with another man. Lisa cried and hung up the phone.

College. Tina and her family lived in a small house. Tina knew she needed to go to college to graduate. Her mother and father knew she would be living with her for the rest of her life. Tina decided to apply to college. Tina finally graduated high school after all her hard work.
Punishment. The little boy was a bad student. He was always late. He did not study. The teacher took him out to lunch. The boy got detention for being late.
Skip almost drowns. Skip was playing with his toys. He was playing with his toy paddle ball. Skip wanted to try his hand at paddle ball. He tossed the paddle ball hard. Skip almost drowned.

Dog. I've always wanted to have a pet dog. After many years of searching I finally found one. I finally bought it and named it Al. Al is my dog and loves to run around the house. Al is the best pet for me.

A big hike. When I was in the park one day, I decided to go for a walk. While walking I noticed some deer, so I started walking towards them. While walking toward the deer, I noticed it was far away. I ended up running into it as it began to walk away. I ended up getting scared and decided to stay where I was.

Ice Cream Day. It was a warm day and Jen loved to go to the ice cream shop. She always wanted ice cream so she went to get some. She got some vanilla ice cream and whipped cream and strawberries. Her favorite part was the chocolate. Jen left with an ice cream cone and some chocolate.

I love her too. Tina has been married for a long time. She is getting older and is getting tired of his work. I sent her a note from my work saying I love her. I was so happy I sent it and I hope she sees it. We are not ready to let her go yet.

Jeff goes to the lake. Jeff had never been to the ocean before. Jeff had recently moved to the city. Jeff decided to go to the local lake for a day. He got to the water and started swimming. Jeff loved to swim and had a fun day at the lake.

The Saturation Point of Swiss Cheese. Sally was at the restaurant with her family. They were eating the last slice of Swiss cheese. Sally couldn't believe how expensive the cheese was. The waiter showed her a way to get her one slice. Sally was thrilled and gave her one slice to keep.
Easier Sanctimonious Than Done. We had a little dog last year. It was old and skinny. We used to get food for him everyday. He was a bit too picky about it. We gave him to a friend for the winter.

Tara's Hat. Tara wanted a new hat. She looked in her closet, but there weren't any left. She finally found a nice, gray hat. She bought it and wore it to school that day. Tara was happy that her hat was the only hat she had!

Recycled Cans. My 99 year old neighbor retired a few years ago. His neighbor has many cans for collection. One time he collected a hundred cans in his home. He gave a few to his son. Now the two have many boxes of cans.

Cake. Maggie always wanted to make her own cake. One day she found out her mom baked a cake. Maggie began to cry because she hated to bake. Maggie's mother had another idea. She gave her a glass of ice water instead.

Jake Falls Off Ladder. Jake had to get up a ladder to get to his room. He looked under his bed for something good to do. He found a large wooden chair. Jake decided to try using the chair on the bed. He decided to use the chair as his new desk chair.
Slide. I got stuck in the bathroom. I was trapped. I screamed. I ran downstairs and into my room. I screamed even louder when I crawled out of the door.

Grocery Games. Tom's girlfriend told him to go to the grocery store. He didn't have time to do anything and didn't care. Tom's girlfriend saw him and she decided to yell at him. Tom was mad but didn't have a way to defend himself. Tom's girlfriend dumped him after that.
Track and Field Star. Lilly was on a football team. She was great at running and hitting the ball. She did very well on the team. Lilly won a gold medal. She was so happy she celebrated.

Officer Helps. Tina was a very nervous wreck driver. Tina was driving down the road. Tina passed a police officer. The officer told her he'd help her out. Tina felt a lot less nervous after being helped.

Sharing. One night, I went to watch a movie. There was someone who was watching my DVD player. He kept playing movies to annoy me. I stopped watching the movie because of this. I left the movie in my living room.

wallet. John needed to pay for gas. He went to his gas station to get some money. He was going to get a twenty dollar bill. He found a twenty dollar bill in the machine. John paid for gas with the twenty dollar bill.

Roller Coaster. Jane's birthday was in a week, and she really wanted to go on the roller coaster. Jane begged her parents to allow her to go on the roller coaster. Jane's parents agreed and gave her a ticket to ride on the roller coaster. Jane loved the ride on the roller coaster. Jane had a great time on the roller coaster.

The water on the books. Diana was at home one morning. Suddenly, she noticed a sudden stream of water outside. She ran outside to see if there was a fire. The water splashed water all over her. She was very angry that she couldn't get her books cleaned.

Christmas Shopping. I went Christmas shopping last year. I went to the store and got everything I needed. I took it home and put it in my car. When I got it, I looked everywhere. It was full of clothes I didn't need.

Dave goes fishing. Dave is going fishing with his friends. Dave is really hungry so he asks his friends for a slice. Dave's friends suggest he take a bite. Dave decides to try one and he loves it. Dave has so much fun with his friends he goes back to the truck.

Rick's Poor Time Management. Rick was a really slow driver. He was driving down a busy street. A car was going at pretty fast, and Rick ran to get back in time. He didn't see the car before he hit it. He barely managed to stop the car but he lost his driving privileges.

Faker. Dan was a college freshman. Dan's brother Dan told Dan that he had cancer. Dan started talking to the boy on social media. Dan became suspicious of the boy's fake cancer diagnosis. Dan was convinced that Dan was telling the truth.

Cookies. Cindy decided to make cookies. She put everything in the oven. But then she saw that she had forgotten about them. She looked around and realized the cookies were all burning. Cindy learned to always put everything out before she forgot to.
Stage. I went to my second day of work. I made a new boss. The boss made my work easier. We both gave her lots of good advice. The next day she made me an assistant.

Great American Story. Jim heard a news story about a child who was sick. He rushed to the doctors and called the parents. He told them he wanted to meet them to talk about the baby. Jim met them, and they talked about the story. Jim felt great that he had helped his parents so much.

Soapmaking Disaster. Jen was making a batch of soap to put in the shower. She didn't know which soap to put in but she thought it would be good. Jen was wrong and the soap did not work well. Jen decided to just try and mix the old one and some new. Then she put it in and immediately burned herself.

Bacteria. Kate had to stop at the store on a morning. There was a large line of people waiting. Kate was in line for awhile. In the corner was a woman holding a bottle of cola. Kate spit it out and started to cry.

Eyebrow pulling. Jenny was at a party with her friends. It was her turn to ask for a glass of water. She asked if she could get her hand in. She got her hand in and was surprised at how good it felt. She then thanked the bartender for making it easy for her.
New Bag. Joe wanted a new bag for school. But it was too expensive. So Joe saved up his money for weeks. And he was surprised when he was able to buy the bag. But Joe regret not buying the bag.

The Dog. The dog ate all of the soup. It was all gone and the food had spoiled. The dog started licking his bowl and it was sticky. He tried to lick it but it wouldn't come out. He had to go to the bathroom to take his food.

Choose. Tom bought a new computer. He wanted a new monitor for his desk. He wanted it to be a black monitor so he bought it. He found out the monitor was too big for his desk. Tom decided to get a smaller monitor instead.
Ridiculing. Tom was late for work. Tom's boss wanted to talk to him. Tom refused. Tom complained. Tom was told not to speak for the rest of the day.

Low Carbs. Sara always liked to cook. However, she couldn't afford to buy a fancy dinner. She realized she wasn't having enough money for food. Sara decided to try to eat healthier foods. She found that she was no longer cheap.
Ice Cream Truck. Sophie was very hungry. She went to the ice cream truck. She bought a giant bucket of ice cream. She was able to finish it in an hour. Sophie was full and happy.

Snow Cone Surprise. When I was little I went to sleep in my snow cone. We had a snow cone party. One day, we went outside and heard a rumble. We all got so excited and excited to get snow cones. We all ate snow cones that night.

First day of Seventh grade. When I was seven I was a very bad student. So when I first went to school I was very scared. I had no friends. So I had no friends to hang out with. I ended up in a school and that's where I met my family.

Expired plan. Lucy and her friends were at the mall. Lucy wanted to go to the food court. Her friend Lisa wanted to go to the music store. Lucy and her friends were shopping together. Lucy and her friends could not agree on a place to shop.
A Milk-Tooth. Sam didn't like milk. He didn't like milk-tooth candy. He bought a cream-tooth. He took it to the store to get milk-tooth candy. He bought milk-tooth candy.
Mantis. Trey was playing in the basement. He heard a scream from inside. Trey ran outside to investigate the noise. He saw a mantis trying to eat his shoe. He screamed in terror and jumped inside.

Mother knows best. Rene was going through her childhood memories. She went to see a little girl who was crying and crying. She comforted the little girl. Rene had a nice dinner with the girl. The girl thanked Rene for her help.

The Eyebrow Burn. Ava was in the bathroom when she noticed a bad smell. She pulled the water out of her water bottle and noticed something was burning. There was something burning her eyebrow! She got some eyebrow wax. The wax helped the burning smell to pass.
Scared. Tommy heard scary noises outside. He decided to see who was up there. Tommy went outside and turned on his lights. He saw a man standing in a dark yard. Tommy freaked out and ran back inside.
The Kitten. Tina's dog had been sick all week. She was worried about the puppy. She went to visit the vet. Tina found the puppy and took it home. The puppy seemed well, and Tina took it back home.

Gloves. Tom was playing football. He had his glove on but it broke. He took off his glove and ran to the store. He found a pair of gloves he liked and purchased them. He gave his new gloves to his friend and they both got excited.
The Bonus. Tom had a good job. His paychecks were very generous. Tom saved his money up. He had a bonus of over $100. Tom felt good about his financial accomplishments.
Tired. Liz wanted to go to the beach. She wanted to go to the beach and have fun. Liz was too tired to go to the beach. She started to cry. She finally decided to go back to sleep.

Group Activity. The school was having a group activity. My mom told me I could bring my friends. I brought a bunch of friends and we met up outside. We ate food and played games. We were very interested in each other after that.

Need a Job. I was unemployed for a few years. My last job was online and the pay was very high. I saved for a year and saved for my dream job. I applied for a job in retail and got hired. Now, I am a full time employee.

Study Up. Tom wanted to become a doctor. He went to college but didn't get a doctor's degree. Tom studied harder and harder. He went to the doctor's office in high school. He got the doctor's degree he wanted.

The camp pen pal. Kelsi went on a camping trip with her friends. They stayed for three days. Kelsi started to get bored with all the activities. She started writing a letter to her friend. She finally got a letter back from her friend.

Jane's nail party. Jane was at the nail salon with her friends. She started to cry. Her friends kept trying to comfort her. Finally she calmed down and got a bottle of water. It made Jane feel better.

New Music. Amy was out with her friends on a weekend trip. They were talking about music to get her pumped. She decided to join in. She listened to a song by Blink 182. After the song she left feeling a little better.

Sam's Sail. Sam and his wife decided to go out on their boat. They decided to sail out into the ocean. Sam's wife thought he would be crazy to try. Sam did not give up and tried anyway. Sam's wife screamed and yelled at him.

The Casino. I decided to go to the casino. It was amazing how crowded it was. I had to stand on line for a while. When I finally made it into the building, I played the slot machine. I won all the money I could ever dreamed of.

Construction. Jenny's apartment was infested with bugs. Jenny's landlord informed her she needed to get it out. Jenny was too scared to get out of the room. The landlord told her she could move out later. Jenny decided to move out later, and the bugs were gone.
The Little Pig. A little pig got loose. His owners looked everywhere. They found him laying in the grass. He was so hungry. The owners took him home.

Thief. I bought a brand new pair of shoes from the store. I forgot to lock them in the house. When I got back, I found my shoes. The clerk noticed that I left the shoes in the bathroom. He told me that I would have to pay him.
The Garage. I looked up and saw the garage door was open. I ran downstairs to investigate. It was just the car door. I opened it and walked in. The whole house was open, too.
Total scare. I went to the park today. While I was walking there I saw something terrible. The first thing I saw was a large spider. I freaked out. Thankfully, it was just a toy spider.

Oogum Boogum. Kerry and Tom were driving home from the mall. They were both making faces at people for no reason. Tom was mad Kerry's car wouldn't start. Kerry tried calling for help but Tom wouldn't stop. Tom ended up breaking the phone.
Boredom. Gina had been at the park with her friend Tami. There had been a ton of noise outside. Gina wanted to leave. However she was too tired. She decided to go back in the house and wait for Tami.

Too Much. My daughter bought me a new iPod. I have not used it. I had to read the instructions on it's packaging. I took it into the Apple store and they told me I needed a warranty. I paid and went home and opened the box.
Lilly's Song. Lilly was doing a song on the radio. She was trying to get a good part of it. She had a great rhythm though. Lilly was really enjoying the song. It kept her busy for a while.

Money for Groceries. We were walking to the supermarket. The parking lot was covered with snow. It looked so cold that we had to walk through the snow. Finally we went to a store that had a parking lot. When we got there, it was snowing but we still got cash.

The Cave. Lydia had a crush on a boy in her class. She asked her teacher if they could go to the cave. The teacher agreed and they went there. They looked at the stars and caves in awe. They had a wonderful time!
Messed up baking. Jenna was baking a cake. Her mother came over to help. However, when she came out, everything looked bad. The cake was not quite finished. Then, Jenna had to go and get a new one.

The Rental Car. Lance needed to get to work on a business trip. His car was out of gas and he had to take the wrong one. He called a friend and they had an extra spare. Lance got the rental car he wanted from the friend. He drove to work on time and saved some money.

Mystery. Bob found a pair of blue headphones in the back of the store. He had a lot of trouble getting them to work. He went to the music store for more. There he got a great deal on the headphones. He couldn't wait to buy them!

Albert's Girl Problems. Albert's girlfriend didn't make much sense to him. He knew he wasn't going to propose. He didn't propose on his own. He had a surprise party for his girlfriend. His girlfriend didn't want to go to the party.

Coup d'etat. The old lady went to a grocery store. She decided to check out the coupons for some cheap items. On the way out, she accidentally dropped the coupons in the parking lot. Her coupons had fallen and ripped and ripped apart. She took the coupons to the car lot to retrieve them.

Wine. Candy loved her grandmother's sweet wines. She had over 20 bottles when her grandmother died. Candy wanted to share some with her grandmother. Her grandmother was too sick to drink, so Candy got her a bottle. Her grandmother agreed to share one of her wine with her.
Trade Argument. Tom bought a used car with a lot of money. He wanted to trade it for a brand new one. His friend agreed to trade. They traded the used car. They both felt good.

Danny moves out. Danny has been out with his friends for over 3 years. He is bored with his life and decides to get rid of his friends. He moves out on his own. Danny gets to move on his own. Now he is a much better person.

The stolen bike. Jared was riding his bike down the road. Suddenly, a man started chasing him. The man got too close to Jared's bike. Jared tried to get away, but he could barely. He decided he was going to never ride that bike again.

Relaxing Weekend. I went to the beach with my friends the other weekend. We all drove for a while looking at the ocean. We relaxed by the water and played beach volleyball. After the drive we all laid in the sun and sunbathed. The heat was so relaxing and it made me feel good.

The American Dream. Derek went to the mall to buy some clothes. He was looking for a brand new video game system. He couldn't find anything that he wanted, so he looked at a different store. After searching for over a hundred minutes, Derek went home. He was relieved that his money was more than enough for the new game.
Mile Club. John went to the Mile Club. He saw a sign for a girl who was single. John thought about a girl he met. John decided to give her a phone number. She called john and had a date with John.

The Swimming Test. Lisa was swimming in the pool with her cousins. She was really nervous about how she would swim. She stayed at the top of the pool as she was swimming. She tried really hard. Lisa ended up passing and was happy.

Elizabeth's Bedroom. One morning Elizabeth went into her room to get her laundry done. As she was washing the clothes, she got distracted. Elizabeth fell asleep on her bed. When she woke up, her husband had scolded her. He told her that she would never come back into his bedroom again.

Migraines Or A Career. I had a migraine every time I went into the bathroom. I went to the bathroom and found I had migraines again. I found that my migraine therapist had suggested that I be a waitress. So, I began applying to jobs. Eventually I was hired and working as a waitress!

Deadly consequences. Jane got in her car and started to drive to work. After parking, Jane realized her car had a dead battery. Jane looked around to see what the car was but there was no one around. Jane stopped to get out of the parking lot. She was able to change the batteries in the car before leaving for work.

Acting strangely. My son's daughter was acting strangely. Her mother was getting suspicious. She said that she's seeing a ghost. She said the mother was making an act. She asked my son's teacher if she could stay in class.

Digs. Tom was working on the new tablet. He loved the idea of making things with a clay pot. One day he was working on the tablet when he accidentally dropped it. The tablet shattered into a million pieces. Tom decided to be more careful from then on.
Highway. The road was covered in snow. My daughter's car slid into the snow. Her car slid into the ditch. She had to wait for an hour to be fixed. The car would be towed.

Expensive Accident. Tom was at the grocery store. He was trying to pick up some items. Unfortunately his car got in an accident. Tom suffered from a lot of damages. Unfortunately it cost him a lot of money to fix.
Rick and the Ball. Rick went to the park. He spotted a ball on the ground. He began to chase the ball. After three hours he was exhausted. He never found out where the ball went.

Prom. Last year our daughter went to the prom. The prom was in the county. We had a nice dinner at a nice restaurant. Afterwards she went to the prom with her friends. We had a great time at the prom.

First Night. Ricky's parents told him they'd be moving. He was very excited about the move. He thought he'd love living with his parents. It was a very strange day! He decided to wait until the next day.

An Amazing Woman. Tommy's brother was a doctor. He was a successful and great doctor. One day, Tommy was called for a routine checkup. The doctor said Tommy was extremely sick and went back to sleep. Tommy was thrilled and very happy when the doctor told him he was sick.

School play jitters. Jill got her license for her very first day of school. She was excited and ready to go. She began learning to drive and taking it slow. As the day went on Jill became more anxious. She eventually crashed her first traffic stop.
Cheap candy. Tim got some cheap candy at the store. He wanted it to taste good. So he bought some more. He tasted it again. It was really bad.

Drained Battery. Joey was playing with his cellphone. He was about to turn on his music. The music had run out of battery. Joey had to take the music to a nearby store. He was able to turn his music back on.
College Graduate. I met this woman in the bookstore. We talked for awhile. She agreed to marry me. It's been two years since we've seen each other. I am happy for her.
Elephants. I went to the zoo. I saw many elephants. I saw lots of baby elephants. I watched some babies climb out of trees. I was disappointed that I couldn't see anything.

Bedroom. My bedroom looked amazing. I did not realize how big it was! It took me a long time to get the room cleaned. I went online and made a new budget. Now my bedroom is no longer messy and is in much better shape.

Cooper and the tadpole. Cooper was sitting at his home and decided to get a tadpole. Cooper brought the tadpole home and placed it in a tank. Cooper left it there for a few days and the tadpole grew. Cooper had two more tadpole before he had to stop. The tadpole then disappeared into the night.

Bad Bridge. Jane was sitting at the park. It was very crowded. The bridge under the park was very narrow. Jane was looking forward to going back to the river. Unfortunately the bridge was a total wreck.

Work. I needed extra money for the gas bill. I decided to take some overtime. I got two days of work and saved for a few weeks. When the bills came I realized I had wasted my money. I went back to my usual job and saved for more time.

All You Can Eat. Ralph was trying to eat a piece of fried chicken. He had just gotten out of the shower. He was still hungry. He decided to order a large chicken wrap. Ralph ate the wrap and continued his hunger.

The Last Bus. Tobias worked hard for a company. The company closed down the last bus line. Tobias asked his boss what he could do to help the company. His boss told him to start a new bus line. Tobias agreed to start a new bus line.

Note. Bob had a note in his desk. He tried to read it but couldn't grasp the letter. Bob was going to tell his teacher about the note. He left it out at his desk in class. When he went home, his mom noticed a note on his desk.
Trapped Cat. I went outside to do my yardwork. I saw an injured cat. The cat was tied up with a dog. I looked around for the owner. I saw him with the dog.
Caught in the rain. The rain clouds were heavy. He could feel it on his face. Finally it came to a halt. He turned around to look up. He found himself soaked.
The Sunscreen. The sun has set outside. The kids want to play outside. The moms suggest they put on some sunscreen. They gather some blankets and pillows. They play outside for two hours.

Bicycle Accident. It was a sunny day and I took my bicycle in the park. It went up and down a lot of hills. I was riding when the sun went down. My bicycle became wet and I ran inside to go home. I had to call a tow truck and my bike was wrecked.
Going to the Park. Teddy went to the park with his mom. His mom was running a couple of miles. He tried to be a good boy. He ran too fast and fell down. His mom gave him a bruise.
Lost. Karen was driving home from the mall. She saw someone with a bag of chips. She looked at it, but it wasn't her. Karen turned to go back home. She couldn't find her.

The Climb. I was playing guitar in a garage with my friend. We sat in the garage looking at the ceiling. One of the wires snapped off. I could no longer play guitar with the wire. We decided to use the ladder to climb the fence.

Water for Cats. Amy's cat wouldn't drink a bottle of water without her. She tried to hold it in, but it was too slippery to hold her hand out. She tried giving her cat water. It didn't work very well. She finally tried giving it some shampoo.

Paycheck. Samantha needed a paycheck. She did not have enough money to pay for the bills. She went on a weekend to the local store. At the store she purchased a check for ten dollars. She paid for the check on the day it was mailed to her.
Gymnastics. Jenny wanted to join gymnastics. She had been practicing all summer. Her parents let her try out for the team. Jenny was happy and excited. She was ready to join gymnastics!
The Wedding. Dani and John were getting married! They were going to be so happy. They were getting ready to say a good night. They went to the reception early. Everyone clapped for them!

Internet Addiction. My daughter has a netflix subscription to watch netflix. Her parents told her not to use the internet. My daughter watched a lot of netflix and started to have anxiety. She took the netflix subscription away. She now uses the internet and the netflix is better.

Fallen Tree. The couple went out in the country. They were taking a shortcut around a large oak tree. Suddenly the couple stepped on the tree. The tree broke and fell over. They had to wait until a tow truck picked them up.

Lazy. The cat sat on the floor by the couch. I went to get the cat a toy. The cat didn't want to play with it. I picked it up and let him sleep on it for a while. I went back to bed and decided to let him sleep on his own.
Break. I saw a flyer for a break in. I was afraid I would be robbed. But the police came and told me I had a job offer. They told me I needed a month's notice. I made it work and I was not robbed.

Bryan and the song. Bryan was on a road trip with his friends. He decided to record a song on his phone. He then saved the song and downloaded it onto his phone. Then he listened to the song over and over again. Bryan realized he never really recorded the song.

Roberto's Job Search. Roberto was looking for a new job. His old job had just been laid off. Roberto had his resume in his hands. He decided to go on a second job interview. He got the job with his new resume in hand.
Fast car. Caleb was a fast car driver. He often sped past people at the crosswalk. One day a car hit Caleb. Caleb was rushed to the hospital. He was paralyzed from the bottom of his spine.

Sabrina is crushed. Sabrina had always been a good cheerleader. When she was seven, her parents decided to switch her to the junior high. Sabrina was so upset that she decided to stop being a cheerleader. She didn't want her parents to be upset. She decided to just stay home and cry.
Vacation. Joe has never been to a beach. One day he decided to go. He packed his gear and set off in his car. He arrived at the beach that morning. Joe couldn't believe the great ocean view he had.
Scary Snake. I heard a noise in my basement. I looked around. It was a huge, red snake! I screamed and ran downstairs. I put on a mask and called an exterminator.
The candle choice. John was making some candles. He needed a certain flavor of candle. He went to the store to look around. He couldn't decide. He finally chose the one he wanted.
Lacrosse. I wanted to try out for the lacrosse team. I went to try out but wasn't sure I would make it. I practiced a lot and worked really hard. I finally went to tryouts! I made the team!

The tractor. Dan got a tractor for his birthday. He and his friends decided to go for a drive. Dan realized that he forgot the tractor. The tractor did not even start. Dan's friends laughed at Dan and he was embarrassed.

Showing Is Believing. Tom liked a girl in his office. He was very shy around the girl. One day Tom walked up to her and tried to talk to her. The girl was very uncomfortable and ran away from Tom. Tom was embarrassed.

Crushes. Ava had been dating Ben for a year. But Ava was so happy that she would never admit to him. Then Ben confessed to a friend that he had feelings for her! Ava's crush was thrilled! He had never been happier than before!

Onions and Garlic. When I was in kindergarten, we had to make soup. We decided on some onions and garlic. Then we added other ingredients like tomatoes and peppers. We put the soup in the fridge and waited for it to cook. When the soup came out of the oven, it was too cold.

Just Beachy. Joey was a lonely man. So he decided to take a walk in the ocean. And he was surprised by how warm it was. Joey felt like a real person again. So Joey decided to spend more time at the beach.

Student Loans. I was always getting loans in my high school. When I was younger, I got an odd part of my allowance. I decided to start paying it back. I got a job, got the student loans, and paid them. Now I pay my loans on time and do not get loans!

Forgetful Daisy. My dog Spot always wanted to be outside, but he knew no one would let him. Spot could run very fast and it was getting dark. So I put up posters on the door to let him outside. After a week, a neighbor offered Spot a spot on his new bed. Spot loved his new bed.

Aaron. Aaron never liked girls. His friends were always trying to give him a date. He did not like it but they didn't like him enough. Finally Aaron got a girlfriend that he liked. Aaron had a date with her and had sex with her.
Cold, wet lesson. Yesterday my son went to a gym. He loved to workout there. The weather was freezing. He had to do it on a t-shirt. He ended up getting wet.
Tails. Joe loves to hunt. He wants to hunt all year round. But he spends the winter in the winter. He goes out every morning. He doesn't mind winter time because he is hunting.

William loses the game. William was playing in his first basketball game. His team was down by 10 points. He dribbled the ball down the court. His shot goes through the net. William loses the game in the final minute of the game.

Blood Plasma. Tom's mom had a bunch of blood drawn. Tom went to the doctor to get it done. The doctor ran tests on Tom's blood. Tom's blood got tested and he got a few results. Tom's mom got blood drawn for tom as a result.

Hummingbird Day. Today was hummingbird day in our neighborhood. My wife was at the house today. We could hear the hummingbirds through the window. The birds did not come around the street. My wife is not happy that the day is over.

Out. The teacher told us that we were to be quiet. The students had a loud party. My brother didn't want to stop talking. He told me that it would be best to leave. We made our own path and went our separate ways.

Question. Kate was talking to a friend on the phone. They had a lot of questions she had to answer. She began to write down her answers. She sat down and tried to explain the questions to her friend. She felt frustrated and hung up the phone.

Loss of Energy. Tim had a really important exam coming up. He was very tired. His teacher encouraged him to stay up for the test. Tim had some sleep and took a break. When he got back he was energized and ready to go.

A Car Purchase. Karen went to the dealership to purchase a used car. She drove down to the dealership and looked at all the cars. She saw a blue car that was very nice. She decided that she wanted the car. She paid for the car and was very excited.

Trying. We went camping last weekend. We went camping in a quiet forest and it was beautiful. After the campground was closed the trees looked beautiful. The rain started to fall. We stayed inside and the rain stopped.

IHOP. I took my family to IHOP on a Saturday afternoon. I ordered a sandwich with cheese and lettuce. The cashier took my order from the counter. She told me that I could get another sandwich. I thanked her and headed back to my car.

Runaway Bride. I got a letter from my ex-boyfriend's daughter. She wrote me that she had a horrible boyfriend. I felt like a fool and sent the letter back. Later I received the letter and it was a thank you letter. I wrote her back and thanked her.

Colorado. One day, my father took me and my brothers and sisters to Colorado. We packed a picnic lunch and went out to the mountains. I loved that place so much. When we got back home, we looked at all of the cool sites. The only thing I did not like was the cold weather!

Insecurities; or How I Learned That Even Your Friends Will Hold You Back Because of Theirs. Jenny felt insecure. Her friend Sally told her she was beautiful and smart. Jenny decided to be herself. She dated a man named David. They married and had two kids, and Jenna never felt insecure again.

Driving. I got a new car and loved driving. I was nervous about being behind the curve. I went down to the city and saw all the cars. I passed every street with a smile on my face. By the time I drove home, I was at home.

Mexican Food. I was going out with my friends. We decided to order pizza. When we got there, we ordered our food. The man picked a steak and cheese pizza. He said they looked amazing and gave us a free one.
New album. Kelly got a new album. It was new to her. She loved it. She opened it. The album did not sound good.
New Car. Joe needed a new car. So he saved up all his money. He was able to buy one. He drove it home. He put the car in his garage.

Stampede. Mandy's favorite holiday was the stamp. She bought one as a gift. It was her favorite toy and she played with it all the time. Her friends would always ask her to stamp their gifts. Mandy decided to keep the stamp as her own.
The Tie. It was time for a formal party. Sally needed a tie. She looked at her options online. They were all too expensive. She decided to use a fabric store instead.

Puppy. The Johnson family decided to get a puppy. They went to the pound to pick out a puppy. After looking for awhile, they found a dog that they liked. They decided on getting him a poodle. When they got home, they were happy to have a puppy of their own.

The Scam. The man advertised for a meeting. He was meeting people for a big fundraiser. He started out well but began to get suspicious. They tried to make him leave but he wouldn't budge. They gave up and reported him for fraud.

The Swimming Lesson. John's dad was swimming in the pool. John and his friends were all swimming. He couldn't swim but he liked to splash in the pool. John fell in the pool and broke his arm. His parents had to take him out for his arm to heal.

Power Plant. Nancy wanted to power her house with electricity. She had the perfect power plant. Nancy bought a gas and oil tank. She installed all her equipment. Her house is now powered by electricity.

Snake Eating. Molly was hiking with her friends one day. She found a snake and started to run it off. She was startled when she started to chase the snake. Molly tried to get the snake back but she couldn't. When she got back to her friends they all laughed and congratulated her.
New Friends. My dad bought me a new ball. It has a rubber band and rubber sole. It's very soft to the touch. I tried to walk with it everywhere. But it became my new best friend.

The Orange. Molly loved oranges. Her mother was allergic to orange's so Molly decided to eat a jar. She took a big bite of the orange, but felt very sick. She immediately got a shot at her eyes and nose. Molly was very happy that she could eat her favorite food.

Jake Goes Fishing. Jake loved going fishing with his Dad. Jake went fishing on a warm day the very next day. Jake fished with his Dad and caught many fish that day. Jake bought new fishing equipment. Jake was able to go fishing with his Dad.

New Dog. Kelly's mom found a dog in the street. The dog had been abandoned by it's owner. The dog was very cute and Kelly was jealous. So she brought the dog home. The dog's owner adopted it immediately.

Jimmy's Weight. Jimmy was at a weight loss meeting. His trainer talked him into eating only one half an apple. Jimmy began feeling good. He lost a lot of weight. He realized eating only one half an apple was a healthy thing to do.

Boiling Corn. I bought a bunch of corn from the store. It took me about an hour to boil the corn. I put the kernels in the pan and turned on the burner. I waited for the flame to get bright red. Finally, the fire burned out and the corn was ready to eat!

Todd Helps Out. Todd was playing video games. He got some money from his brother. He decided to go on a date with his friend. His friend was really happy to see Todd. Todd felt very good when his friend and his date became a couple.

Reading Challenge. Cayla was at her second-floor class. The teacher handed out a test. The kids had to read a long story to be good. Cayla finished the story in record time. The class was awarded with a prize.
Bad reaction. A man came to me for a massage. I didn't want to. However, I thought the pain was nice. When he touched me I immediately started crying. Then he just smiled and apologized.

Dead Plants. Tom had a large garden. Tom did not appreciate the smell of dead plants. Tom would always water the plants but kept them dead. Tom decided to get a sprinkler system. Tom now had a clean garden.
Skydiving. Cindy wanted to try skydiving. Her friend told her it was risky but she tried it anyway. Cindy was really nervous. She landed safely in the pool. She decided it was worth the risk.

Dancing shoes. Sally's mom always bought her shoes when she was little. She decided to buy new shoes one day. She went to the mall and picked out shoes. Her mom bought her shoes. Now Sally could dance all by herself.
New Shoes. Tim was a college athlete. He had a basketball game. His shoes were old and ripped. His mom took him to the mall to buy new ones. He bought new ones and was able to play the game.

Scary Sleepover. Julie and Mark went to sleep over their first time. They were scared, but Julie and Mark decided to stay. They got their costumes and went to their friends room. They both jumped out of bed, and ran to their room. They stayed in their scary costumes and watched scary movies.
Phone. Tim needed to call his friends. He had no phone in the house. He looked in the fridge. He realized he left his phone there. He decided to go buy a new phone.
Ladoo. Barry was a young boy. He liked to eat the food from his grandparents. One day, he decided to buy his own food. Barry went to the store and picked up some beans. Barry made beans for dinner.

Spider. Kya was cleaning out her room and found a huge spider. She tried to kill it with a vacuum, but it wouldn't work. She grabbed her towel and pulled hard on the wall. The spider flew up and tumbled into the air. Kya screamed and covered the spider in dirt.
Classroom. I had a crush on a girl in high school. She had been in the same year as me. The class ended up talking for hours. We made plans to hang out again. I had to sneak back into class.
Katie Courier. I was walking to work when i noticed something. It's a kitten cougar. It was sitting near the road. The kitten cougar seemed to be very lonely. I decided to bring him home with me.

Stamp collector. Kelsi had a passion for stamp collecting. She would visit her grandparents and relatives. They would give her stamps in return for a trip to the farm. Kelsi was excited and excited to go to the farm. She found a lot of stamps and left with a large collection.

Loud Snoring. Candy had always heard terrible snoring. She heard it every night and could not sleep without it. She finally decided to buy a dog to keep her company. Soon she heard a noise again and went to the kitchen. It was the barking of a small puppy.

Tavon. Tavon was going to marry the love of his life. But he didn't think he was ready yet. He was so scared he didn't know how he'd do. So he tried to avoid being in any of his wedding planning. But when he was asked to marry, he couldn't resist.

Karate Class. Tom loved to work out. He got into karate class one day. He wasn't very good but he loved his instructor. The instructor helped him really improve his karate skills. Tom became a better karate player.

The concert. Jenna loved watching live music. She found a local venue for her birthday. She was really excited and excited. When she got there she was in heaven. They played her favorite song that night.

Piano. Kari wanted to learn how to play the piano. So she went to a music store and got some tools. She went to the piano and started playing. The piano teacher smiled at her and congratulated her. He helped her learn to play the piano quickly.

Fundraising. I was asked by a charity to make some money. I decided to go to the local high school to have them open. I helped a lot of kids with money. The kids got to do all sorts of fun things. I made good money and was really glad to do it.

Money gambling. Lily loved to bet money on the Olympics. She would bet a lot of money on it. When the Olympics were over, she decided to make more. She then gambled even more. Lily ended up winning the lottery, but lost her money.

Happy ending. Sally was not a big fan of her teacher. She got up and left the house and got into her car. Sally hit a deer on the way home and injured her shoulder. Her teacher did not believe her and was not mad. Sally was thankful that she was not mad.

Soda. Tom was in a long distance relationship. He wanted to go drinking with his girlfriend. She refused and didn't allow it. Tom tried to go for it anyway. Tom got drunk and fell in love with his girlfriend.
Delivery. I needed to deliver a package to my sister. It was not until after I left the house that I finally got it. When I got home that I opened it. I opened it to find her cat. She was surprised.

Ants. I was eating on the patio when I noticed a swarm of ants. The ants were chasing me and meowing at me. I tried to run as quickly as I could but the ants got too close. I went inside and screamed as I ran to the window. I had to close the door so I wouldn't be attacked again.

Forgetful Bob. My friend Bill is lazy. One day he forgot to pay his check. He ended up having to pay someone else's one. That's all he could think of for many weeks. He got his bill and thanked me by buying some coffee.
New Hair. Sally wanted to get a haircut. She decided to dye her hair. She got to work dyeing it. Soon, she had a very lovely new blonde. Sally decided she would dye her hair more often.

Eggs. I had a friend that used to buy me some delicious fried eggs. When I was at a party I saw him selling eggs. I bought some and we went to the restaurant. He told me that he does it on a weekly basis. I was very impressed and now we share the same recipe.

Surprise at school. Jena had had a rough day at school. Her friend was in trouble and couldn't wait to get back at her. One day, she decided to throw a surprise birthday party for her. The next day she had to stay home for a few days. Everyone came to her house and surprised her.
Fruit. Nathan was feeling sick. So he had to go to the doctor. The doctor told him that he had food poisoning. And he went to the hospital. He recovered and was fine again.
Bank. Tim always liked the Bank of America. It was located on a high rise. One day it opened but all the windows were open. Tim had to go to get a window. Finally he was able to go in and find it.

Desk Builder. Tia liked to play games on her computer. She was playing one day when she dropped her keyboard. It was a big blue piece. She couldn't even fix it. She had to give up and go back to the desk.
Doctor. I wanted to learn how to swim. So I signed up for lessons. They showed me how to swim. I had fun swimming and it made my legs strong. Now I am a swimmer.

Arcade night. I played a video game today. I was playing a game that really went too far. I went to the arcade to play the game. I played for ten minutes. It was a lot of fun and I played several more.

Vegan. Sam had a girlfriend that he didn't like very much. He wanted to make it a relationship and started going to a vegan restaurant. He noticed they were really open and friendly to him. Sam was happy about that. He decided to just get the girlfriend over it and they could get along.

Big Deal. Macy got a new car for her birthday. When she drove it to work, she thought she got a raise. But when she took it to the parking lot, she saw her car had been towed. Her car was in horrible condition, and was stolen. Macy was glad her car was totaled.
Night Terrors. Jim had had trouble sleeping at night. He would go to sleep while watching movies. It gave him nightmares. Jim couldn't sleep for his life. He stopped going to sleep for about a week.
Yummy almonds. Tara wanted to eat a bowl of almonds. She did not have time to make them. She decided to make them herself. They were very yummy. Tara decided she would make her own almonds.

Deep Cut. I walked into the living room of our building. All of a sudden I felt a deep cut on my shoulder. It wasn't deep enough to bleed, so I put some bandage on it. I wasn't sure how much longer I had. I still don't think I'm a fan of the bandage.

Tow Truck. I was driving a tow truck. I was looking for a trailer to tow my car to a friend's place. A man was standing in the driveway waiting for a truck. I pulled into a small empty lot. I let the man pick my truck up.

Hidden Keys. When I was at the hardware store they had a lot of hidden keys. I wasn't able to figure out how to unlock the door. I thought of using the key to get in. I could only imagine a lot of things. Finally, I found my keys in a small corner of a drawer.

Bills big idea. Bill wanted to open a restaurant. He had always loved cooking, so he tried his hand at cooking. He found it hard to get enough customers to start his restaurant. He then got a loan from the bank and bought all the ingredients. Bill was thrilled with the success of the restaurant he started.

Online Dating. Cory found an ad online for dating services. He looked into them and realized they were really good. He did not want to do it himself, but he took a chance. He got a call from someone he liked. They said they were interested in him and they agreed to date.

The kitty finds a home. Janet went to a cat shelter to look at the kittens. The kittens looked very sad. She gave them a food bowl to keep them company. The next day they came in and made a big home for them. Janet is glad to have helped these little kittens.

Lamb. We used to have very good tomatoes in our yard. I thought we would buy some more every month. Eventually, we had too many tomatoes for one year. I decided to move to a smaller town with a lot less tomatoes. The tomatoes are still here but they don't last very long.

Amazing sunglasses. One day I was at the mall with my friends. I had to purchase new sunglasses. The salesman told me I could get a discount if I got one. I had no idea he could even tell. When I was ready to leave he handed me a brand new pair.
Sick Day. I was so sick. My stomach was killing me. I called into work. I told my boss it was a sick day. He said I had a few days to go.
Jenny's Accident. Jenny was speeding down the road. She was hit by a car. Jenny fell on her face. Her face started to hurt. Jenny called the cops and filed a report.

The Genius Was The Intern. Jim had a very important test coming up. Jim thought he would do very well on his test. He spent all week studying for the test. During the test, he became totally distracted. He failed his test because of his forgetfulness.

Sparky's Fish and Chips. Sparky loved eating the food he grew. He bought a dozen chips and went to the market. Sparky bought everything on sale. Sparky ate a large meal of his chips. Sparky lost his appetite after a few hours.

Snitch. Amy was waiting in line for a movie. When she finally got in line, she noticed a snoop. He snooped around her and found the movie he wanted to see. Amy tried to sneak out of line to watch her movie. She ended up being the one who got caught by the snoop.

Radio. Sally was listening to her favorite radio station on the train. She had the station on the radio but no other stations were playing. Sally was worried her ears would be damaged. Sally's ears were very sensitive and she was worried. She put the radio away but still had earwax on her earrings.
Teacher, Teacher. The teacher asked for more money. The student refused to give. The teacher was unhappy with that. The student went to his room. The teacher got angry and made the student clean.

A piece of italy. Karen went to the grocery store to get some bread. But she found out that she was out of milk. Karen realized she must be out of milk. She asked the cashier and she happily went back to the store. She bought the rest of her bread for a discount.

Personal space. Anna had a small apartment with two bedrooms. She thought that she could do her laundry. So she decided to go to the bathroom to have personal space. At first her room was really crowded. But when she used the bathroom she was not disappointed.
Wild Concert. Joe was nervous. He decided to go to a concert. When he got there it was incredibly loud. He tried to cover up but it still got worse. He realized that it was a bad idea.

New Business. Bob was trying to open up a new business. He had just recently learned how to run a business. He called a few friends for a list of business contacts. The friends showed him the pros and cons of each location. Bob ended up with five different locations to start with.

Spaghetti. I loved eating spaghetti. But when I was in high school, I didn't know what sauce I should use. I decided to research spaghetti sauce online. I found the recipe for a great sauce, using fresh tomato. I used the sauce and loved it.
The Railing. Eddie hated walking on the railroad. He heard some noise. The train was going really fast. He heard a strange noise as well. He tried to keep his eye open but he was terrified.

Boredom. I was tired of being bored. I decided to look for something new. I found a game on the internet. It had several different levels and several characters. It made me feel like I was having fun!

The Shot. Sue's boyfriend was always getting really angry. His girlfriend told him he needed to stop. Finally Sue tried to do something to make him stop. She gave him a shot of cold medicine. He stopped getting angry about the shot.
Speak. The man spoke to the man. The man understood. The man told the man what he thought. The man did not like the advice. The man quit the conversation.

Art To Food. The art teacher saw a student who had an art to food painting assignment. The student thought he would do okay and gave the assignment. The art teacher asked what the student was doing. The student gave him a blank and told him not to. The art teacher called his grade to find out where the student lived.

The Planets. I went to my house to look for some furniture. I found a lot of cardboard. I bought some planks and a hammer. I arranged the boxes and arranged the furniture. I finished the planks and my family was happy.

Lost Cause. Gina's brother had stolen her lunch from her desk. Her mother offered Gina a free lunch if she didn't call the police. Gina's friend Stacy tried to explain what happened to her. Since Stacy wanted to go back and apologize she couldn't. The two sat on the phone, waiting for the principal to call.

Wrong Guilt. I decided to take my son out for a walk. He was supposed to run up the hill and then stop. I put my phone down, then left my house. I found my son in the grass with a huge grin. I realized that he had been playing with it.

Jim Opens A Taco Truck. Jim wanted to earn more money. He decided to open a business in the city of Atlanta. He bought the equipment needed and opened a taco truck. Jim's business is very successful. Jim has made his business very successful.

One Flew Over The Woman's Head. Jane was a nurse in an assisted living home. She could not get her co workers to listen to her. She asked her boss why she was there. She said her co workers were too lazy to listen to her. Jane was fired for not following her directions.

Sparky's Homework. Sparky decided to write a story today. He looked through his entire night, but nothing seemed right. He decided to play a game and try to write an answer. The next morning he did his best and got the idea he wanted. Sparky got to use the story he wrote.

Soaked. Tina's friend told her about a special surprise. Tina's friend gave Tina a huge box of goodies. Tina loved them and wanted to keep them. She opened it and found water all over it. Tina immediately cleaned up the mess.

Finding God. Nancy was afraid to ask God for forgiveness. She told her friends she was just not as nice. She was forced to confront her fear. She started taking a prayer every day. In the end, her fears were resolved.

The nerd. A nerd is a man who liked to build things. One day, he built a toy car with his hands. He was excited and didn't want to stop, it worked. He would have to wait for it to cool down before it would do anything. After a few days, he was able to get the toy done.
