voting. My 99 year old neighbor's wife left us a $500 dollar check in September. It was for her birthday. The check was for her and her wife. They live alone. I called my wife the following day.

Dad saves Son. Bill was playing with his son. He went into the woods to look for food. The boy was running off with a knife and a branch. Bill called 911 but it was too late. Bill saved the child and returned home.

The Pens. Nina liked using pens. She had to keep them in her purse for safety reasons. But she wanted to take them to school. She could never remember to go. Her class was always having trouble remembering.

A Helper. Eli was on a trip. He needed help finding his hotel. He called a hotel but they didn't help. Eli finally called a hotel room but they didn't help. He had to leave at a hotel but it was still too far away.

Gary. Gary has wanted to make a living doing what he loves. Gary decides he wants to sell his house. Gary hires a realtor to look at his house. After many hours of research Gary has a better plan. Gary's realtor comes and puts his house on the market for him.

Pizza. I decided to make pizza for my family. I wanted to make a good pizza with some vegetables. I spent weeks making the dough and the cheese. I then followed the instructions. The pizza turned out to be great and everyone loved it.

Being Greedy. I worked hard to save up money. I started to have trouble making ends meet. My husband and I decided to get the rent money. I got paid and my credit was good. However, my credit was terrible and I lost all of my money.

Asked to be a bridesmaid. Liz thought that she was the best bridesmaid at her wedding. She asked all her friends if they wanted to be her bridesmaid. None of them wanted. So Liz thought of a plan. She bought some makeup at a discount store.
Birthday Cake. Jill was going to bake a birthday cake. She put it in the oven. Jill then turned the oven on. Jill then turned the oven on. Jill started to bake the cake when it was too hot.
Kilt King Ken. My friend and I decided to knit a kilt costume. It took us all three hours. We got everything together. We looked at the picture and made it. We presented it to my friend.
Staples. My mom bought me a huge pack of staples. I was happy to get them. I decided to use them to make a shelf. It was so sturdy and sturdy. I used them for many years.

Lost Wallet. John needed to pay his rent. He was looking for his wallet at the store. When he came back to pick it up, the wallet was gone. John tried to look through all his pockets for his wallet. He couldn't find his wallet, but it was still in his pocket.

Audio recording. My wife listened to our anniversary. Her neighbor's audio had her husband say Happy anniversary. My wife was very upset that she had no audio recording. She complained to the manager. She was able to get a replacement for the recording.

Princess. My niece and nephew in law died of a heart attack in 2013. We had our nephew in law's ashes sent to Boston. My niece and nephew in law's niece had been the wife to the father of the man. Her niece was a very active wife. The relatives in the community gave her a medal.

Kilt wearing dad. One day I wanted to wear a kilt. I went to a local store and bought one that looked good. I got my dad to help me put it on. After that, I was happy. I bought it every week to wear with me.
Diet. Tom was a vegetarian. He felt it was very unhealthy. He decided to go back to eating meat. He decided to switch to a vegetarian diet. Tom lost weight and felt great.

Lost Shoe. John bought a new pair of shoes to wear to school. While walking to school, he ran into the bushes to get a better look. John forgot his shoes inside of the bush. John's mother yelled at him for forgetting his shoes. John had to take his new shoes back home.
First date. Jill was at her first date. It wasn't going well. Jill didn't like the guy. The date went worse than she expected. Jill ended up dating another guy.

Heart. I couldn't sleep last night. I kept tossing and turning and falling asleep. My heart was racing and I was afraid it was dying. I decided to see a doctor. They performed tests to prove my health and gave me medication.

Going Overboard. Jake was at a carnival. He was playing a game he had been playing for months. Jake got caught and started crying. Eventually his parents had to go and take him to the principal. Jake's parents punished him for going overboard.

Long time to dry. Sue went to the store to buy new dry cleaners. She was happy when she was able to buy some. Then she discovered that they had an expiration date. Sue was disappointed. She decided not to buy them.
New Wallpaper. Bill's walls looked bare. His wife asked him to buy some wallpaper. Bill bought some nice green wallpaper. His wife loved his work. Now Bill's walls looked great.

Jan goes to the dentist. Jan had a dentist appointment at 6:00. She wanted to make sure she would be well prepared before the appointment. She decided to bring an extra bottle of pills and a toothbrush. After a few hours at the dentist, she waited. The dentist cleaned up her teeth and she left.

Tennis Coming of Age. Gavin loves playing tennis. His friends often go to his local tennis court. There are many people playing at this court. Gavin loves having a tennis court at home. He also likes having his own courts as well.
Trumpet. The man played the trumpet. The crowd loved the song. The man asked for more. The crowd didn't know how to play the trumpet. The man took out a drum.
Squirrel. There was a squirrel running down a street. I ran after it. It was not moving. I pulled my broom to the side of the street. The squirrel ran away with my broom.

Richard Grows a Beard. Richard had recently grown a beard. He did not know how to shave it. He decided he would make one himself. Richard spent a few days shaving and then applied lotion. After several weeks, Richard had a good, neat beard.

Silver Coins. I used to collect silver coins. They looked like old silver quarters. I found some old coin collectors at a garage sale. They were selling a few for a good price. It's so cool that silver coins are still so affordable.

Tea Time. Bob has been feeling a little sluggish lately. He decided to try to get more exercise to combat his sluggishness. He decided to go to the library for a cup of tea. When he got there, he read about the benefits of tea. He decided he would start drinking more tea from then on.

The Phone. Tori was walking into the office when she received a call. The person on the other end of the line had an urgent message. Tori took a quick look at the messages on her phone. Tori saw a text that was sent to her. She had forgotten her phone charger so she would be late for work.

The Dog Park. Molly loved dogs, but her favorite was the dog park. She and her friends decided to go every Saturday morning. One Saturday she saw a little boy with a black dog. The dog seemed so excited that Molly could barely breathe. She was sad to see the black dog, but it was a beautiful one.

Tom's Diner. Tom loved working at a diner. One day it started to rain heavily. Tom went to the diner but could not find a place to work. He was sad to lose his job. Tom was glad he was able to work in a diner again.

Felix Makes a Friend. Felix has never been friends with a boy in his class. Finally Felix decided he would ask the boy out on a date. Felix went to his office at the school. When he entered the office, the boy was standing behind him. Felix gave the boy a kiss before going to the bar.

Mylar Balloons. Ava and Beth decided they wanted to have fun at their birthday party. They took a pair of balls to the pool and floated them all over. Soon they were all tired but ready to go. They played all the games they could remember and had a great time! They couldn't wait for next year's party.
Normal. Benny saw something shiny in the dirt behind a tree. He walked slowly to the object. There was a spider in the tree. Benny screamed in terror. The spider was crawling into his shirt!

Fred Eats Salad. Fred was feeling hungry. He went to a salad restaurant. Fred ordered the most delicious salad there. After eating his salad he felt much better. Fred had had a really good meal at the restaurant.
Riding Lessons. Tom was learning to ride a bike. He asked his dad if he could go along. His dad agreed. Tom took his bike to the park. He rode his bike back to his house.

The storm. Linda was on a trip in Florida. The wind picked up and it began to rain. She stayed inside to watch the rain. It continued to rain and Linda couldn't get home. She had to take a cab to the beach to swim.

The Powder Room. Jane had recently moved to a new home. She bought a powder room for her room. She loved having her own powder room. Jane was so happy she never wanted to leave. She got a few friends to help her paint her room.

Lost Keys. Tim was driving down the street. He noticed a familiar look on his car's dashboard. It looked as if there were missing keys in the ignition. Tim pulled over to ask where they were. Unfortunately they were in the passenger side of a vehicle.
Condo Values. Tom wanted to move out of his apartment. He was offered a new condo. Tom was scared about moving. He bought the condo immediately. He saved a lot of money and moved out.

Sled. Sarah was taking her sled down the hill. Her husband helped push the sled down the hill. Sarah accidentally threw the sled over the top. The sled rolled over the top of the hill. It broke and Sarah couldn't retrieve it.

Engagement. My wife has been trying to get pregnant. The doctor told us we had three months to go. Today she and her husband had an anniversary engagement. We had an evening out. We ate a nice dinner.

Shots. Sally's boyfriend was very controlling. His wife would always try to take away his guns. But he would always keep his distance from her. One day Sally was angry at him. She said he would get shot.

Poisonous Gift. Tim's mother had a bad smell. Tim was playing with her when she got it. Tim's mother told him to clean it. Tim kept on doing that and it got stronger. Tim's mother found a nasty spot on the carpet and left him alone.
Carrots. Tim bought some carrots. He was going to make some stew with them. He got to work and cut the carrots. He did not get enough carrots. Tim decided to eat them all at once.
The Excuse. Sam was lying about his missing phone. He blamed his roommate. They were both friends. Sam was embarrassed. They decided to have a small talk.
The Monkey Emoji. There once was a child named Dan. He went to school as a monkey. He was mocked every day and every day of school. He was so sad. So one day Dan made a joke to get back at his bully.
The Meat. Teddy was at a local market. He found a great steak. He asked if he could try it for dinner. They gave him a coupon. Teddy then went home and enjoyed the steak.
Bald. The woman bought a new hair style. She did not like it. She decided to cut her hair. She had it professionally. The new style worked perfectly.

Hair Gel. Bob always thought that everyone else's hair was too curly. So he would always go and buy his own hair gel to smooth it out. Eventually he noticed that most people he didn't know were very thin. Bob tried on his hair and he found it to be very thin. So he bought a wig so he could put it on.

The Stolen Shirt. Kendall was shopping at the mall. She had purchased a shirt and took it to the register. The cashier realized she had a stolen shirt in her cart. She gave her back to Kendall. The cashier felt so guilty that she did not allow Kendall to go shopping again.

Coney Stew. My family went to visit the ocean. We made homemade corny stew. We went to the kitchen and started boiling the meat. We had all the ingredients ready to cook the stew. We were so good at making homemade stew.

Food order. Jane wanted to go to a restaurant with her friends. Jane called her friend Sara to ask for a place to sit. Sara said she didn't know if she wanted to. Jane picked up the phone and called Sara's phone number. Sara's phone number was answered by the front desk person.
A Ride Home. Tom wanted to get home. He called his friends. They all went to Tom's house. They had a ride home. Tom enjoyed the ride home.
Math Test. Tim was doing his math homework. He was taking the test. The teacher asked him a questions. Tim's answers came out wrong. Tim failed his math test.
Drowsy. Mia was taking a nap. She suddenly woke up. She got up to go to the bathroom. She realized she was drunk. She was late for work.
Holey skirt. Rita went shopping at the mall. She had a beautiful new skirt to buy. She tried it on, and loved how she felt. Rita was happy. She had decided to buy a new skirt!

Lick My Walls. Candy's mother told her to put on a lint mask for her house. But Candy had to ignore the request and continued to lick her walls. One day Candy ran to her room. She put on the mask and licked the floors. She thought the lint mask was cute so she put it on again.

The Fishing Trip. The family decided they would take a fishing trip. They packed their bags and went to their favorite lake. They cast out their line. One fish tugged the line out of their line. They all waited for a few minutes to try to reel it in.

Snacks. Gina had to take a road trip. She only had her favorite snack at home. She had to get ready and get out of the car. She grabbed a banana and some juice. Gina was stuffed after she picked up her snacks.

The Lost Cellphone. Tim was taking his son to the park one day. He noticed the kid's phone wasn't in his pocket. Tim looked around in the car and found the phone. It was on the side of the road so Tim couldn't find it. He found his phone but the phone was destroyed.

Incommunicado. I woke up late this morning to a huge thunderstorm. I was very worried the hurricane would cause an inferno. I was able to find a room with no one in it. I found my friend in the room, so I could have him check out. When I turned on the news, it said the hurricane was over.

Paintball Challenge. I played paintball with my buddy. We were on a large game. One of my balls was shot right into someone's eye. My friend was knocked out, and my teammate was hit in the head. My buddy got knocked unconscious.

Beach Day. It was Kelly's first day of school at the beach. She walked along the beach with her best friend. At the end of the day, they went to the water and had fun. It was a fun summer day at the beach! Now it's Kelly's first day of school tomorrow.

Pick Me Up. Tim and his friends loved to go bowling. Tim's brother wanted to go as well. Tim was hesitant because they didn't know each other. They decided to get together and try out for the team. They all ended up making the team and they got to go bowling every Sunday.

Video. Ida's new phone was in the last week of its run. She couldn't wait to get her hands on the new one. When she saw it in the store, it was brand new. Ida's friend had bought a few weeks ago. Ida could have bought the latest version.

Related After All. Bob had been a high school football star. Bob had recently been diagnosed with cancer. He thought the time would come to go. He talked to his friends about the cancer he had. His friends thought he was wasting his time because of it.
Bad date. I was having a terrible date. I was so nervous. He was so awkward, I could barely move. I finally got the courage to ask him on a date. We ended up going out on a date.
Bird Attack. Jared was playing in his backyard. He heard a noise. He looked at his dog. The dog had jumped out of his yard. The dog was barking and jared took him out of his yard.

The Slide. Toby was scared of heights. He was convinced his friends would be going up the slide. His friends arrived at the park. They all jumped off of the slide. Toby wasn't afraid after he jumped off of the slide.
The dog. Karen is afraid of dogs. She never wanted to own a dog. One day her dog was running around the neighborhood. Karen chased the dog away. She found out the dog had gotten out and ran away.
The Estimate. Jane was on a budget. She had no money for groceries. Jane called an estimate company. They suggested a better price. Jane followed their advice and saved a lot of money.

Mitch's Accident. Mitch was playing in the park. He noticed someone hitting a ball with his baseball bat. Mitch ran into the park and stopped running. He saw the baseball hit a large rock. Mitch fell into a rock and was injured.

Strict Coach. Bill wanted to help his football team win the championship. His coach told him to play with a minimum of 35 yards passing. Bill threw the ball to the wrong receiver. Bill's coach gave him a week to fix it or they wouldn't be playing again. Bill spent that week practicing and got better at his job.
Pet Snake. I went on a fishing trip. My mom brought home a large pet snake. I couldn't believe how beautiful it was. The pet snake was huge and cool. I put it in my room and kept it there.

Picking up Trash. John was trying to pick up the garbage in his apartment. His wife asked him if he would do it. John agreed and took the trash out to his car. They both had to walk home. Once there John put the trash into his car and waited.

Bad Tip. Tom worked as a cashier. He had a few good customers that left their check on the counter. Tom didn't tip the customers. When he got back from checking the check, he noticed it was gone. Tom never tipped again.

Taking a Chance. Tom was at the carnival. He was having a great time. He saw a booth he wanted to play with and bought a ticket. The booth he wanted to go to didn't have a slot machine. Tom didn't go to the carnival again.

Camp. I used to go camping at my friends house. My friends used to live in the mountains. We would build a fire with sticks and sticks. Sometimes we would sit around and watch movies. I loved camping.

Puppy. The kids wanted to have a puppy. The mother said no because she was too young. The dad went to a store to find a puppy. The kids begged to get a puppy. The dad bought the kids a dog and they had a puppy.
Bathing Suit Failure. Tom loved to swim. His family never took him to the pool. One day his mother bought a new suit. She wore it to the pool. Unfortunately it broke when she put it on.
Fire. Tom was out camping. He decided to go out to eat. While Tom was out, he was followed by a large fire. It started to get really big. Tom had to run back inside.
The lockdown scare. Sue was feeling very scared. She called the school. They had to make a lockdown. She had no idea where to go. She tried to leave but the guards stopped her.

Sister, Sister!. My little sister in law has two cats. She had a stroke in 2011. She is now seven months old and has a new cat. She gave me a note from the cat telling me to get a puppy or else she will be sad. She said to get a dog because she is going to love me and love me for it.
Missed Trash. The garbage truck came down the street. I saw a big pile of trash. I tried to collect the trash. It was too late. It was just too late.

Broken Toe. Alicia was playing basketball with her friends. Suddenly, a branch snapped on her toe. She had to pick it off. When she was done she decided to wear flip flops instead. Alicia's friends were disappointed with her decision.

On the roof. I saw a homeless man on the side of the street. He was bleeding from his wounds. I wanted to help him, so I called the cops. They took a ladder to help him. They took him back to his house.
Grand Canyon. Cameron took his son to the Grand Canyon. His son loved the grand canyon. They spent all day swimming in the pool. It was a fun trip. They returned home exhausted but happy.

Jan's Jilted Jawing. Jan was playing in her living room with her kids. She noticed her daughter was being particularly loud. The loud child was crying when her dad went to the closet. Jan told her kids that they were going to go to bed early that night. She put her daughter in bed and she was quiet and quiet.
Disappointment. Tom bought a new car. He thought the car was a great deal. After a while Tom had a problem with the car. He was afraid of driving it out of state. He finally gave up on his car.

Diary. Anna's mom had a special book collection. She would often check Anna's favorite book, a diary. One day, her mom left the book in the garage overnight. The next morning, Anna was excited to check the diary. She found a note from her grandma, thanking her for the book.

The Jury. Jim sat alone in a courtroom for a trial. The judge announced that the defendant had been found guilty. Jim began to cry with emotion. He had to go back to his room to cry alone. He got out of the courtroom in a huff.

Severe Storm. There was a terrible storm that moved up a hill. Tom got caught in it. It went through his bedroom and into the living room. Tom tried to clean but the whole house was soaked. He didn't go out to the mall again for days after that.
Bad Treatment. Tom got a new haircut. His hair was very long. He decided to cut it off for two weeks. His hair didn't get cut back to normal. Tom was too ashamed to wear a hat ever again.

Friends. My friend's son's wife is a nurse. She has a baby girl. The child was born just before her due date. The hospital had only two healthy children. My friend and her husband decided to raise their child together.

Jump Rope Accident. Sam was jumping rope in his backyard. He was swinging up on his brother's rope, too. The rope broke in half. Sam tried to fix it but it was too late. Sam hurt himself and had to call a professional to fix it.
Fight Sleep. Sammy wanted to get to sleep. He snuggled up under his mom's bed. He fell asleep in the backseat of his car. He fell asleep on the seat. Sammy fell asleep on the seat.
perfect attendance. Tim was at school. He wanted to be on the basketball team. He worked hard for one year. After that he got the coach's attention. He made the team.

The hide and seek winner. I was playing hide and seek with my brothers and sisters. We were getting tired of looking for each other. My siblings had just turned on the radio. My brothers looked in the middle of the field. He was still alone, I knew.

Mitch's Money. Mitch lived in a cheap neighborhood, with no money. He needed a way to make extra money. Mitch decided to take a loan from a bank. When Mitch got his loan, he got more than he could afford. Mitch decided to always take a loan from a bank.

Monkey See Monkey Doo. There is a local zoo in my town. The monkeys are huge. They eat all sorts of animals, such as the monkeys and elephants. A monkey eats the elephant's elephant meat. They go into the elephant show and see monkey shows every summer.
The Kite. I wanted a new kite. I was in the backyard one day. I saw a giant kite flying overhead. I put it up and took off to fly it. It was a great kite.
Lost Keys. Tom was late for work. He had lost his keys. Tom needed to find the right one. He went back to his hotel and asked for help. He got a key out with his own hands.

The New Phone. Kia was excited to buy her new phone. When she opened it up, she was very excited. But she had to wait a couple of days before she could buy it. Kia went through her steps to ensure she was right. Luckily, she was able to get it within 2 days and was happy.
Solar Power. Tom lived in the sun. He loved it. He decided to install solar panels. Tom saved up for a few years. He installed the panels in under a year.
The Leak. Mike went down to his room. He saw a large leak. He had not put up the floor. Mike called his landlord. He was offered a free repair.
Rex. Rex loved making things. He made everything. But one day his girlfriend dumped him. He broke down. He got even more depressed.

Emergency. Jenny was at a restaurant with her boyfriend. Suddenly, the waitress asked to see Jenny's phone. Jenny tried to turn off the phone but it wouldn't work. The waitress yelled at Jenny since she left it on the counter. Luckily, Jenny was able to get the phone back.
Quarters. When I was a kid, we had quarters. My brother's quarters were dirty. My brother did not know why. He started collecting quarters. He had them for twenty Years.

My Favorite Binky. My favorite binky broke. I have to take it to the store to buy a new one. The salesman took my measurements and sent me to the store. I got my binky and started it. I love how my new binky feels.

Lost Puppy. Jim's family went to the zoo for a new puppy. Jim and his mother searched the cages. Jim found a puppy hiding behind a fence. Jim's mother brought the puppy to her. She was too far away for the puppy to come back.

Successful Mediation for Shared Child Custody. Amy and Lynn lived in the same apartment for four years. They started dating in college and decided to move in together. Amy and Lynn argued for three months over their shared child custody. Finally the judge granted the couple custody of their child. Amy and Lynn moved back into their parent's house.
The Marathon. Tom was a great runner. He wanted to go to the marathon. Tom did everything in his power to win the race. Tom trained for two weeks. Tom did his best to win the marathon.

Wordsmith. The boys were having a competition for a school project. It would have to be about how they could spell words. They decided to write a word about a horse. They were going to test it and then write their word. When they finished, it had a big mark on it.
Floor. The couple walked down the street. They were at a corner that had a very low step. One step was too low to reach. The woman pushed the step down to be lower. The husband pushed it back down.

Pink Underwear. The other night I saw a pair of pink underwear. They were pink with blue stripes. I wore them to the grocery store to buy food. I had to buy an item with blue stripes. I did not buy any items with pink stripes.

The Almost Revolt. A group of students sat down and debated about how to move. They decided to take a walk. They were being a little too much. The principal noticed. She called the student group and took them to the principal's office.

Stepping on a Nail. Tom got home from work. He noticed a nail on his floor. Tom got up to see it was still there. He then realized it was a nail that had broken his shoe. Tom decided to wear a shoe from now on.

Cake Disaster. I had to make a cake for the birthday of my cousin. My cousin was a great baker so I decided to go with a chocolate cake. When we were done baking it, the cake had a terrible smell. We tried to remove the cake and clean it up. The cake turned out to be so badly burnt that it wasn't edible.

Gym class. Sara and her class were going on a trip to the gym. Sara had never been and was looking forward to going. The day of the trip she did not want to go but everyone else wanted to. Her friends convinced her to go and she reluctantly agreed. Sara was excited for her trip to the gym.
Cutting my own hair. My husband and I got in the car. He asked me to cut his hair. I said no. We pulled over and got his hair. Then we went back home.

Movies with girlfriend. Shelby and Tim had dated for years. They were going on a date tonight. They decided to go see a movie. They watched a romantic romance movie. It was such a fun and romantic night!

Orange Seed. We had an orange seed recipe from my grandmother. I had never tasted orange seed, so I did not think I would like it. When I tasted it, I realized I had just added the seeds. My mother told me it was very delicious. I was so happy I could taste my grandmother's recipe.

Not Creepy At All. John was walking to his classroom late one night. Suddenly he heard loud voices in the back of the school hallway. He looked around the corner and saw the lights were on. A student had been murdered. John called the police and they arrested the murderer.

Nap Time. Bob was always late for work. His boss decided to have him get in trouble. Bob got into trouble by getting out of bed earlier than everyone else. His boss gave him a big raise that Bob took. Bob was happy about his decision to be on time.

Cora. Ivy's mom was very frugal. When she died, her only inheritance was a jar of cora! Ivy ran into it when she saw it for sale for $200! She put an ad on Craigslist asking for $50. That afternoon, a friend sold it to her for $60!

New Job. Aya was tired of her boring old job. Aya called up her friend Tina for help. Tina suggested she get a new job. Aya agreed to go on a date with Tina. Aya and Tina were happy that they both felt happier.
Modern Dating. Erika and Jack went on their first date. Jack really liked her. He also really liked her friends. Jack and Erika both really liked each other. Jack decided to go on another date.

The Paper. Nate was writing a paper for a project. He had just finished it and needed to put it online. He thought about some ideas and made some. He posted the idea on craigslist. Several people got the job!

Santeria. Anna was feeling very hungry. She didn't want to eat anything because she didn't know what to eat. Then her friend gave her an idea. He suggested that she try suntanning. Anna signed up and went to the beach.
Clip. I bought some scissors. They were very sharp. I cut into my neighbor's window. I saw something. A clipper had fallen out of her glove!

Lost Dog. Dan was walking his dog through the park one morning. Dan found a dog that looked missing. Dan searched for the dog for many days. Dan found the dog near a tree. Dan called the police station for help locating the dog.
Lost Phone. Fred wanted to call his girlfriend's number. Fred realized that the number was not working. Fred called again. His girlfriend answered the phone. He was happy to have his phone back.

Neighborhood thief. When I was a kid I did not like being in the neighborhood. One day, I decided to steal something. The neighbors stopped me and yelled at me. I then ran away but my dad caught me. I learned not to steal in the neighborhood anymore.

Making Lisa mad. Lisa was in a fight with a girl she used to fight with. She got mad and threw a punch. However, her parents weren't watching her. She didn't hear her parents. It caused Lisa to get into a fight with them.
Frisbee. I played Frisbee with my brother last week. He beat me on the first game. After that, he won me the second game. We played for an hour straight. He won and I lost.

New World. A few months ago, my friend Joe moved to the United States. He's an Asian and Mexican immigrant. His family lives in New England. He lives in Queens, New York. Joe says he hasn't gotten used to it yet.

An Extra Treat. My nephew took me to a Mexican restaurant to have a meal. We ate a lot of corn and hot dogs. We also ordered Mexican tacos for dessert. I ended up losing weight. Now I'm working out more than doing laundry.

c-section. Susie wanted to get her c-section done. She was going to do it at the hospital. She had a small pain in her belly. Susie decided to go in for surgery. It turned out it was not all bad and Susie was able to get it done.

Aluminum Foil Swords. Barry and Ron had a lot of mechanical swords they needed to replace. They both had a few, but none would stay in for over a week. They decided to go online and order the swords. When they got home, they were both very excited. They were happy to finally be able to replace the swords.

Shelby goes to new york. Shelby had just moved to the city of new york. She had always wanted to see the city in person. Shelby bought a ticket to the city. She had a great time. She had a great time visiting the city.

Kim's big test. Kim had a big test in math today. Her teacher let her stay up all night and study. But at 1 AM, Kim decided to get ready. She set her alarm for 2 o'clock to wake her up. Kim was able to get to school on time.

Meatloaf. Lucy decided to make meatloaf. She put some vegetables into the toaster. She followed the instructions to cook the meatloaf. When the meatloaf was done it looked gross. Lucy couldn't believe her food had not been done.

NYC. Kate and her boyfriend were getting ready for their first day of New York City. They were excited about their trip there and wanted to show off. So they headed out early to try their luck on the streets. The weather was so great the whole trip was perfect. Kate and her boyfriend had a great time.

The Farmer's Market. The farmer in her field got a phone call. She went to the farmer's market. She was happy to see all her favorite items. She bought lots of things and planned to do more next week. The farmer made a lot of money on her new produce!

Camping Disaster. Fred and his friends decided to go camping. They decided to go to the mountains and camped out in a big tent. It rained heavily, so it was very cold. Fred was sweating and very anxious. He was too scared to go in the tent.
The Boat. Tim was on a fishing trip. His father took him out on his boat. They sat on the boat and took turns fishing. They all caught lots of fish. They decided that they had the best day fishing.
Kind Acts. Tom was going to help out. He wanted to do something good. He volunteered at a soup kitchen. The people he helped helped there had a lot of kids. Tom was very happy to make a difference.

Soup Kitchen. The man opened up his soup kitchen. His wife told him she didn't know what he was doing. He went back inside. He waited for her reaction. She told him not to make it and it would be nice to go elsewhere.
book. Beth had lost her book. She asked her friend for help. She put up flyers all over town. Some people called her and invited her to their party. She ended up making her book more useful to them.

New pair of louboutins. Kelsi loved to shop at a local department store. She bought louboutins a lot. One day she saw a nice pair of louboutins. She got an extra one. She bought her new louboutins for the rest of the year.
Conduit. Bob was walking down the street with his dog. He wanted a water fountain. He asked me if he could borrow one. I lent him one. I put it up for sale on the internet.

The Snake. Beth loved snakes and didn't like the idea of them killing her. One day her dog was playing and it bit a snake. Beth and her dog were scared and decided not to pet the snake again. They made a new dog. The dog ran away and the snake stopped bothering Beth.

The Prescription. Julie was very nervous. She was going to be late for work, but she knew she had to go. She called her doctor's office and asked about the medication. Julie's doctor told her it was very important. She immediately got it done.
The Stand. Jim liked playing the guitar. He had a stand outside. He put a guitar on it. It sounded cool. Jim liked to stand there every night.

Sleepaway Camp. Bertie was in camp for 2 days in the middle of the summer. At the campground a group of people left a fire pit. As the sun came up Bertie was awakened by a fire. He ran over to the fire and it went out. Bertie then felt very relieved.
Presley. I met Presley at the park yesterday. It was a beautiful spring day. We had a really fun time sitting and having fun. Then we played a game of basketball. We will see her again tomorrow.

Dog Ate My Homework. Samantha was not paying attention in class. The teacher made her write out the formulas on the chalkboard. She put a piece of chalk in her mouth and swallowed it. When her teacher came in the room, she felt sick. She asked if she could be punished by using chalk.

Wet Pants. Jasper was working outside one day. He accidentally spilled water all over the ground. He put his pants inside and ran inside. He went to look for his pants, but they were soaked. Jasper's parents had to help him out of the water.

Presidential Campaign. Tim wanted to run for President of the United States. He bought a nice house and spent a lot of money on a campaign. He was excited for the campaign and was happy about his work. A month later a big scandal was uncovered and Tim lost his position. Tim decided he would not run for President anymore.
Taffy. Alfred's wife told him to make a taffy. He looked it up. He went to the store and got it. He tried it, but the taste was awful. He couldn't help but spit it out.

Fishing Alone. I took my girlfriend fishing one day. She asked me if I wanted to go with her. I was hesitant, but she convinced me. She cast my line and a fish bit my line. After that, we had a lot of fun fishing together.
magic mug. I wanted to look different. I went to the store to get some magic mugs. I got a small silver mug. It was bright orange. I had it shipped.

Bluebirds. The family went to a park to enjoy the beautiful scenery. They saw bluebirds on the trees in the park. They caught the bluebirds and brought them home to feed them. The family had a great time feeding the birds. The family planned a trip next week.
Street Fight. I was at the bar one night. While drinking a man started picking on me. He told me I was so ugly. I turned to him and asked why he was doing it. He got out of the bar and walked away.
No Mail. My mailman didn't come out this morning. It was late in the night. I didn't know what was wrong. He left his car in the driveway and called me. My mail was late for me.

GO HOME. The woman put her dog in the back yard. She tried to check on him but the dog was gone. She searched everywhere in the house. She was scared but couldn't find the dog. Eventually she found him in the living room.

The Grapes. John was at home while watching television. Suddenly, he saw a lot of grapes. He decided to cut the grapes and make a granola bar. He went to the grocery store and bought some grapes. John was happy to have a granola bar and eat grapes every week!
Turtle Rescue. Sam found a turtle on the side of the road. He didn't want the turtle to die. He took it to the vet's office. The vet removed the turtle. Sam took the turtle home.

Coin Return. Lana wanted a change in her life. She decided to do something that would get her through the day. She put her coins in the safe, and gave them to a local bank. She gave the money to the bank for a new car. She felt great that she had something she could do.
storm. The weather had been horrible all day. The clouds were changing colors. The wind picked up a few feet in front of us. There was a lot of rain. The storm was fierce and the wind felt the pain.

Ray Rides a Bike. Ray wants to take his bike to work every morning. He drives to the bike shop. Ray picks out a nice bike for the price of $60. He buys the bike. Ray is happy that he has been able to ride his bike to work.

Careful Driver. Tia loved to drive fast in her car. One night, her car went out of gas. She was scared to drive because she thought her car was going to explode. She ended up passing it with ease. Tia now avoids going out of gas.

Backup Receiver. Jim's favorite team was in danger of losing their game. The quarterback threw the ball in to his teammate. Jim could catch the ball but couldn't catch the back up. He tried to run towards the end zone. He fell in and was able to catch the ball.

The Dog. Amy and her mom were playing with their dog outside. Amy's little sister ran up and started barking at her. The dog growled and bit her. Amy tried to get her sister to stop but she wouldn't. She ran inside and called her mom's phone number.
Bike. I was sitting in a bicycle shop looking for a bicycle. I asked a man if he wanted one. He told me he had a blue one. He rode it over and over again. He finally gave up.

Chiggers. Linda was an older lady. She had several gray, yellow and black chickens. One day her chickens were attacked by a lot of male chaggers. The females fled and Linda cried for help. Linda's chickens are now her family's pets.
Loose Shirt. I have a favorite shirt. I wear it everyday. It got loose. I tried to fix it. It was useless.

Sounds Like The Plot To A... I worked in the office on a summer day. The office was on a field with a small pond. My coworker and I went down there to investigate. We got out of our car and stood on the water to see what was in it. We found a snake, and ran away with it away from the office.

Taken for granted. Lucy and her mother were shopping. Lucy's mother had a pair of shoes Lucy wanted. She gave Lucy the shoes and the mother. When she returned the shoes they were gone. Lucy felt upset and sad.

Providence. I was walking to the local park one day. A stranger came up to me with a new puppy. I introduced myself and he started to pet me. He was cute and soft. I got home with him and named him Providence.
Funeral. John was excited. He had lost his job. He was going to the funeral. He was very nervous. John couldn't wait for the funeral.

The Furry Blanket. Rita had a furry blanket that she liked to wear. She would spread the blanket around her neck. She also used the blanket to cover her bed. Rita loved her blanket. She slept great that night.

Best Present. Tom wanted to give his mother a Christmas gift. He decided to buy her a gift card. Unfortunately the card was declined. Tom felt embarrassed. He decided to ask a different company for a gift card.

Violence isn't the answer. Mitch was in the seventh grade and he was bullied. The bully took his hair out and threw it behind him. Mitch was confused, so he told the teacher. The boy told Mitch to go back to his desk. Mitch was confused and said he didn't know if his hair was black or white.

Pentatonix!. I used to work in an office that was in a basement. One day a man came into the office and offered us a new job. I was sad because I thought it was a bad idea. When he offered the job, it sounded good. I was relieved when I saw I would get a new job.

breakfast. Maggie wants to make breakfast for her family. She decides to make breakfast for her family. Maggie cooks a big batch of pancakes. When the family gets hungry they eat all the pancakes. The family thanks Maggie for making them breakfast.

Fostering A Dog. There was a local shelter. The shelter had a large number of dogs. It was getting crowded as the dogs grew older and older. Sam decided to take a dog to the shelter. It took him 2 months to get the dog back to him.

The Christmas Tree. The Jackson family decided to build a Christmas tree for Christmas. They got together with their friends to get started. They started with one strand of red, orange, and yellow twinklers. They worked all day on a perfect design for the tree. They brought the tree home to the house on Christmas morning.

Sunglasses. I put my sunglasses on when I was five. They worked great! But I could not find them after that. Then I saw them in the backseat. I was in a huge hurry and grabbed them and started driving.

Landon's Lakehouse. Landon had always dreamed of being a water park ranger. He saved up for over a year. His family and friends were very excited. On opening day, Landon realized it was a nice lake house. He was very excited to learn that water parks are the best.
Painting. The girl was painting. She saw a frog in the grass. The frog was bleeding. She saw blood everywhere. The girl was able to get it out of the way.

Cheer tryouts. Josie was nervous about her tryouts. She was really worried about making the cheer squad. She practiced really hard for days. She finally tried out for the team. Josie made the team and was very happy.

Dead Battery. I had been driving my car for several years. On one road, I noticed a car start to stop. I tried to find the source of the problem. I saw my battery was dead. I pulled over and the car restarted.

Laura's Flowers. Laura always loved flowers. She would go into the garden often. One day she planted a large garden of red roses. She watched them blooming into beautiful flowers. Laura was very proud of her hard work.

Snack Bars. I was having trouble falling asleep last night. I needed to take some medicine for my insomnia. I tried taking some snacks, but couldn't finish them all. I ended up sleeping in my room instead. I was glad I didn't have to go to the doctor for the headache.

The Sand Dollars. Mary bought a huge box of sand. She carefully set it in her bedroom. She then opened the box and started collecting sand. She opened the box and found a pile of sand. Mary put it all back in the box and left.
gunfire. Tim was camping with his friends. His friends told him to bring his own gun. Tim ignored their advice. His friends got a surprise. Tim and his friends got shot.

Branching Out. Kim had been out partying all night. She decided to go to the store for a snack. She was very excited to get back home. She got home and went to the bathroom. She stayed in the bathroom while her mother cleaned.

Bank Trip. Nelson was at the local bank. The teller asked him to deposit money into his savings account. Nelson had a lot of money that he wanted to deposit. The teller informed him that there was no balance in his account. Nelson was upset he couldn't deposit money into his account.

Tickle. My cat tried to scratch the floor with a small tinkle. I got my ball and gave him some medicine. He rubbed the tinkle with his paw. He scratched the floor more frequently. The cat stopped scratching the floor.

Worst musical. Samantha was going on the school musical. She went to the auditorium to ask for a standing ovation. She stood to receive it when she was told. After she was handed a large orange soda. Samantha had to walk out of the auditorium crying.

Rupture. Bob was very nervous before going on a road trip. But as soon as he was behind the wheel, he crashed. He tried to make a quick right turn but his car stopped. His truck tipped and he almost hit a tree. Bob was too nervous to go back to work.

Rat Problem. Jared was sitting in his room when he heard something run by him. It was a rat running in his room. He looked everywhere but couldn't find it. Jared finally got out of bed. He was relieved to find out it was just a raccoon.
Taking the Dog for a Walk. Bob was walking his dog down the street. He stopped and saw there was a small dog. He took the dog for a walk. The dog was still hungry. The dog ate Bob's bread.

Serving Time. Sara's husband and sons were having a party for her birthday. They decided to hire a limo service. Sara's husband and sons were very excited and nervous. They decided to make the limo a comfortable spot for the guests. Sara's husband and sons had a wonderful party with the limo.
Plan Ahead. Cynthia was nervous to start school. She was afraid to leave her friends. Cynthia called her friends. Her friends encouraged Cynthia to leave school. Cynthia agreed and left her friends.
Closing down the A&P. The family decided to close their A&P. They decided on a diner for it. It had good reviews. They were excited to go back. The diner closed down quickly.

The Parrot. Molly was walking in her new apartment with her new parrot. She was having trouble walking and it kept trying to sit. She told her friend, Tia, what happened. Tia told her how the parrot got stuck in the door. Molly cried a little and apologized to Tia.

Spray Paint. Timmy painted a picture on the sidewalk. His friends noticed and told him to paint a new one. He didn't want to because he hated the old color. They thought that was a good idea. He decided to paint another one.

Football. It was the last game of the college football season. They played Notre Dame and Alabama. My team was down in the last minute. My dad's car was totaled, so I ran into the field. We made it into the playoffs.

Hair. Anna wanted a new look for her upcoming dance recital. She looked in the mirror for a style that would work. She couldn't think of a good hairstyle. So she decided to go with bangs. She went to the barber and got bangs for her long hair.
Putting away groceries. Betsy needed some new clothes. She got her mom to get rid of some old things. Her mom found some old clothes. Then she put them in the washer. Then she put them in the dryer.

The Piano Lesson. I had been playing piano in the park for many years. One day I found a beautiful piano for sale at an auction. I paid $50 for the piano, and it was worth it. The piano would take months to fix and was very expensive. I decided that I would spend my money on a car instead.

Foggy problems. Lily was driving home from school. Suddenly, a small fog began to form. She decided to pull over to investigate. It turned out that she had the wrong gas gauge. When she drove home, she realized that she would have to call for a mechanic.

Space Heater. Gina's room was getting cold. Her brother was heating up the space heater. Gina wanted the space heater to stay on for the summer. But she didn't want to risk it to miss the summer. Gina's brother was just a good boy, so she stayed home and waited.

Lost. I was out walking on a busy street. When I saw a lady walking in, I stopped to chat with her. She told me she was married. She showed me a picture of her husband. I had a heart attack because I felt so bad.
The Field. The children were playing in the field. They had some dirt and a ball. They threw the ball and it went over the fence. The kids ran out the door to go play. Their teacher caught them!

Slump. We were at a party at a friend's house. We were getting out of the house. I accidentally hit my friend with a slump stick. It landed in his mouth. I was embarrassed but relieved it wouldn't hurt.
Allergic to Cats. Lisa had a cat. She kept it on her chest and on her bed. One day her cat got up on her chest. When she got up, she noticed a scratch. The scratch was on the cat's chest.

A spill in the bag. Allie had a special bag she used every time she carried her kids. She always put a lot of things in it when she was at home. One day she decided to leave her bag at home and forgot. Her son found her bag and spilled a few things. The family was really upset.

Cooking is Important. I was working with the wrong recipe. It was for a casserole I made last week. I was so embarrassed that I burned myself. I decided to hire a professional to help me figure it out. To my surprise it was not as bad as I thought.
Book. We needed a book for our class. The first choice was a mystery. We went to the bookstore and looked at different books. The mystery book was best. We bought the mystery book.

Mountain. Jane and her friend lived in a small town. They loved the local scenery and felt they could explore the mountain. They decided to go to the top, which had a few views. It was very fun, but Jane started to feel sick. They decided to never visit that small town again.

Todd's First Bike Ride. Todd was excited for his first day of school. He got on his bike to try out for the team. Todd felt nervous at the start of his first ride. Todd began to enjoy himself. He learned to ride his bike every day and felt very happy.

Dress caught. Ava had just had a huge party. Her friend invited her to a dance for some party. But Ava was embarrassed to go. She was very embarrassed of the look in the mirror. She decided to go somewhere else.

Dollar Store. Tina was looking for a pair of shoes. She went to the Dollar Store for shoes. She tried the dress shoes. Tina didn't like the dress shoes. Tina ended up buying the shoes at a different store.

Losing balance. Sandra was driving on the highway. She was going so fast she was barely moving. Suddenly, she lost control and slid on the ice. She almost crashed into a ditch. Thankfully she was okay but her windshield was smashed.
Kujata. The couple loved to go kujata. They would take the river and lay out on the sand. They would sit there for hours and hours. They thought their days would end. But they had such fun.
Biking. Ben took his bike to the park. He saw many dogs running around. He started to walk with them. He didn't want to run away from them. He walked by, and had a great time.

Checker Floor. I decided to take a break from playing checker. The floor was covered in chess pieces. My neighbor's checkers table was covered in chess pieces. He was disappointed that I had taken so long. He said I would have to replace the chess pieces.

fridge. Tiffany opened her fridge to get milk. But after getting milk, she realized she couldn't open the fridge. Tiffany realized her husband had stolen the milk. She confronted him and he apologized. Tiffany told him to get out of the fridge.
Pool. Molly had a pool in her backyard. She went out and played in it every day. Then, it was a very hot day. She thought of going inside. But, she just didn't want to get sunburn.

Wires. I was late for school yesterday. My school called me an hour late to the school. I got to class but my mother didn't see me. She didn't say why she thought I was late. I realized I needed to stop being late for school.

Dream Team. I wanted to be a member of the school cheerleading team. I studied hard for my cheerleading tryout and was ready to go. I was a bit nervous but I practiced my routine. During tryouts I was extremely prepared. I made the team and won the cheerleading tryout.

Sara's Big Move. Sara and her friends wanted to move across the country. Sara thought she could make the trip and be a stay at home mom. But Sara didn't realize how hard it would be. Her friends helped Sara get a job and car. Sara and her friends were now living in their own homes.

Not Solid. Gina's brother had a baseball. He wanted it to be in the sand. She was happy to go back to her room, but it was too cold to go. She decided to go check on the baseball. There was no sand on it, and it was stuck in the ground.

Metal in a Microwave. I was making dinner for my family. I wanted to have a microwave in a metal box. The box wouldn't fit in the microwave. I searched the entire house, but couldn't find it. Finally, I finally found the box on the ground.
Operation Table. My cat was acting up. He decided to get a medical procedure. The doctor put him down on a table. He got a tetanus shot. The surgery went smoothly.

Crayons. Jim wanted to be a big fan of cartoons. He went to the library and bought some. He looked through them and found some good ones. Jim decided to make his own box to put all of the crayons in. He was able to keep them in their original box after all!
Philip Got Punched. Philip was playing basketball with friends. A group of guys wanted to fight Philip. Philip thought it was a joke. However, he got hit and knocked down. Philip was upset.

The earthquake. The Smith family lived in an area with earthquakes. One day the Smith's went outside to investigate. They heard a loud bang and found the house had fallen down. They called their insurance company and waited to be heard back. Luckily, the insurance company was able to help them fix the house.
The Train Delay. The family was headed to Europe. They were stuck in traffic. It was taking forever. The train came at the last minute. It was the best trip they ever took.

Cells. Maurice decided he wanted to grow potatoes. He went to his garden supply store to purchase the supplies. He spent a lot of money and bought lots of vegetables. He bought them in the spring. Maurice's potatoes grew really big!

Glass down. I just purchased an all glass screen TV. It has a large screen with 3-4 inch black. I had no idea how to install it. I looked up online tutorials and learned everything. It took a few hours but I finally was able to install it.

Family Vacation. When we went on vacation, our daughter and son had to stay in their rooms. We were on the way home from dinner and we saw a man in the apartment lobby. The man was an old widower with an eight year old boy. The boy had to get a job so we had to leave the apartment. I never went back with my son and we all agreed that he was lonely.
Megan Makes A Fire. Megan was camping with her friends. She wanted to make a campfire. Megan put her wood on a pile. Then, she started a campfire. It was a great campfire that helped her have fun.

Lost Game. I was playing a game with my friends. We were having fun for a while. Suddenly, we realized it was gone. We looked everywhere and found it in the basement. We apologized to each other and it turned out to be our game.

Thanks for the Pictures. My sister in law's wife came over to take a picture. Her husband showed up wearing white shoes and a hat. When he walked in the room he turned on the lights. My sister in law screamed because I was wearing my red shoes. My father told her that she looked like an idiot for taking pictures.

David loses his wife. David is a very successful man. He never wanted to lose his wife. One day David gets his wife drunk and passes away. He is very sad and leaves for his wife's funeral. David forgives his wife and leaves for his funeral.

Cheap Frames. Nate saved up for months for his car. He saved his money for months. When he had enough, he decided to shop for cheap. His friend was a mechanic, and he needed to pay him the difference. The mechanic said he would pay for Nate's car in a few weeks.
New Job. Amy was out of work, and had no job. She looked around the house. Amy finally saw an ad in the newspaper for a job. Amy applied and was interviewed. Amy got a job!

Chris. Chris was scared of heights. He went to the hospital and stayed there until they could go home. The next day his mother said he could come back. He was ecstatic when he saw a helicopter at the hospital. Now he could fly safely to see his parents.

I'm Not A Cry Baby. Lucy got in trouble at school one day. She had accidentally slapped her friend. The teacher was not happy and wanted to see who made the wrong move. Lucy's friend made the move. Lucy was grounded for a month.

The Sunburn. Samantha and her friends were at the beach. They decided to take a nap in the sand. At the same time, they started to sweat a lot. They ended up leaving their sandals at home. By the time they got home, they were sunburned.
Partner. My friend has three sons. He always got me to go with him. I never thought he had kids before. My husband has one, and I have another. My son has a daughter and one son and I have three.

Drive Away!. Dan was at a small hotel for a vacation. He was nervous but excited. He was getting into the car and ready to leave. He went to the driver's side and took out his keys. The keys worked just like usual and he made it home.

They all ditched him. I was a very popular student in my senior year of high school. One day I ran around the school asking questions. A girl I was talking to was doing it. I got so uncomfortable that I walked off. The girl later told me I wasn't welcome.

Do the Right Thing. Gina had never been to the library. She always wanted to check out books. She went to the library and went through several books. She went in and took out her book bag. She was able to check out 3 books and returned home.

Buying a cell phone. Lucy was looking for her new cell phone. She went to the store to see what they had. At the store she got a new cell phone. She couldn't wait to use it. She then was sure she was going to buy it.

Garden. I went out to buy a vegetable garden in the city. It was so hot, that I could hardly stay inside the house! At the end of the trip, my fingers became very hot. I couldn't eat anything because of the heat. I decided I will be more careful about purchasing the vegetables in the future.
Jan pays rent. Jan has been feeling sick one day. She does not want to pay the rent. Finally, she gives in and pays the rent. She is glad that she finally paid the rent. She is glad she did.

Skip has dreams. Skip is a middle aged guy. Skip got a flat tire last week. He wanted to look cool and get some attention. Skip decided to get a new convertible for his old friends. Skip now has a new car with new friends.

Dad's Secret Profession. Nate is very passionate about running. He started his own track team with his cousin. In the middle of their first race, his cousin ran a really fast time. He fell off the starting block and broke his leg. After his recovery, he was able to run track again.
The Pillow. Sally was going to sleep. She looked in her closet and there she found a pillow. She opened it and put the pillow on. She fell asleep instantly. When she woke up she had a sore throat.

First Football Game. Benny was very excited about the new football game on tv. Benny decided to bring his dog, Max, with him. Benny and Max played in the game. The dog played hard. Benny was very happy that he got to watch his dog play.

Falling in the Handstand. Cindy wanted to improve her handstand. She was a new gymnast, and wanted to improve. Her trainer would help her do all the right moves. She practiced with her trainer. It made it a lot easier for her to do handstands.
The Flu Shot. Jane was sick with the flu. Her mom was out for her. Jane called her mom to say she would have a flu shot. Jane went to get the flu shot. Her mom got the shot and Jane got the flu.

Grass In The Bed. Tom was trying to clean his room. He saw grass growing on his floor. Tom looked at the grass. There was a long, dirty pile of leaves growing there. Tom picked up the leaves and cleaned up the grass.

Nervous Mom. Tom was about to go to a family reunion. The family went to an unfamiliar place. Tom wasn't familiar with the area. He stayed in the unfamiliar area for over an hour. When it was over, everyone had to leave.
Saint Patrick's Day. It was Saint Patrick's day. We decided to go to a bar. The line was long. We drank and ate a lot. We felt proud of ourselves for having fun.
Dust. Joey is having trouble breathing. He wants to go to the doctor. The doctor gave him a sample of dust. Joey started to breathe again. He ended up feeling much better.
Popcorn. It was my first time going to a popcorn show. I was excited to see all the different items. The prices were very good. I also had lots of snacks and sodas. It was one of my best days.

Ninety Years Old. The baby had just had her first baby. Her baby was a boy, but Jane had two girls. One was named Emma, and the other was named Bella. They loved to tell ghost stories and dance for the baby. One night, the baby had a seizure and died.
Hot Water. Tom wanted hot water. But his water was too hot. He asked his girlfriend if they could have some cold water. She agreed. Tom enjoyed his cold water.
Bad Donuts. Lola was driving to school. She saw her friend making donuts. She didn't want to ruin them. She asked her friend if she wanted a donut. Her friend decided to make her donuts.
Right Racquet. John's wife went to the pool. He tried to set up the right racquet. He swung too hard and it broke. It landed on the floor. He gave it to her for free.
Taxes. Kate needed money. She decided to make a video game. She uploaded a video to Youtube. A lot of people paid to watch the video. Kate made lots of money from the videos.
Bad consequence. Ben was walking outside. All of a sudden he heard a loud noise. The sound came from his ear. Ben looked down at it and saw it was broken. Ben had to go to the store.

Friend of a Friend. My friend is gay. Yesterday she said I was her friend. She said she was married to my friend. I told her that I didn't see her anymore. Now she says she doesn't see me and I'm very sad.
Domestic Violence. Our kids were home alone one night. Our neighbor saw them in the dark. He saw them fighting with each other. He asked them to stop fighting. They did not listen.

The Cops. I was on my way home from work. I passed by a neighborhood of street performers. A cop was standing outside my car. He asked me if I would like to see a show. I was pleased and offered him some money.

Prayer. I prayed everyday when I was a teenager. It wasn't until my 16th birthday that I met my boyfriend. He didn't believe me, but we decided to marry. My brother and I moved out of the house that I prayed with him. He now says thank you to me and I hope he would change his ways.
Puppy Race. The puppy ran across the street. She ran straight through the street. She ran into a neighbor's dog. The dog chased her through the street. Finally the dog caught up to her.

Movie Night. Maddie was trying to decide on a movie to watch. Her friend recommended that she watch a comedy. Maddie saw a movie that was very scary. After her watch, Maddie was very scared. Maddie decided she would not watch a scary movie again.
Turning The Drone Against Him. Bobby wanted a new drone. He thought the prices were too high. He went to Walmart to see one. He bought a drone. He took it home and set it up.

Holy Frame. There was a hot air balloon that went down a ravine. While up there, it crashed into a tree. It was so hot, the engine started to smoke. I got out of the car to get my glove on. After I was safely out I took a look at the damage on the tree.
Golf. My friend and I played golf one day. We played in a little park. One day there were several dogs in the park. One of them hit me in the head. I had to go to the hospital to get stitches.
The Miscalculation. Jane wanted to take a nap. Her alarm hadn't gone off. She snoozeed to check. She saw the lights turned on. Jane realized she overslept and she was late.

The Book. Kia had just started to read the new book. She wasn't sure where to start. She was worried about missing something important. Then, she realized she hadn't checked the first chapter yet. That was the first chapter she could find!

Arranging the place cards. One of my coworkers and I decided we were going to a restaurant. We went to the place and ordered a large platter meal. We found a nice table, the best we ever had, and a full drink. When we were done eating we each bought a drink. We all ended the day with the bar, waiting for the next day.
Dog. Dale loved his dog a lot. One day, Dale's dog ran away. Dale searched everywhere for the dog. In a few days, Dale found the dog in the trash. Dale was very upset when the dog never came back.

Trading Lunches. Tom didn't like his job, but he had to be a good worker. One day his boss didn't like him at his job. Tom decided to give up and quit. He decided to go back to the office and keep looking. After a few months his boss found him again.
An Unexpected Rodent. Tom was walking home from work. He saw a rat in the alley behind him. He looked closer. He saw an ugly, dirty, black snake. He decided to leave the rat.
Game Night. Bob decided to go on a date with his girl friend. He told her he would take her to his house. His date came home. He got into a fight with his girlfriend. They broke up.
Unsweetened. Tim was very picky about his food. He rarely ate sweets. Tim tried to eat one but it was delicious. His friend gave him some to try. Tim loved the taste of the sweet caramel.

Graduation. Joe had wanted to do a great job for a long time. One day, he started planning his last year of school. He had lots of friends from his first year of college. Joe did great on graduation day! He was proud to graduate high school with his family.
Kobe's Last Game. Kobe went to the game. He got the ball. He ran as fast as he could. He scored a touchdown. Kobe was very happy with his final game.

The Passports. The family had been preparing for months. They were about to leave for the Bahamas. They loaded up their suitcase and headed on their flight. They were ready to board the plane for the Bahamas. They all packed up and went to their destination.

Boston Trip. The students went on a trip to Boston. They went to the Charles River and to the MBTA. They also went to the Boston Zoo. They also saw the Boston Symphony Orchestra concert. The students had a great time on their trip to Boston.
Army. The man joined the army. He didn't realize how tough life was. He made many bad decisions. He came back from the army early. The man realized he couldn't do the work.

ADHD. My daughter had a rough childhood and was very fussy. The school counselor did not like this, and tried to talk her out of it. My daughter did not want to listen, and she tried to hide from the counselor. The counselor asked the counselor if she was okay, but she said it was no big deal. My daughter had trouble at school the next day and needed help.

Bad Friends. Mimi's friends were having a fight. She knew it was wrong, but she still went out. Mimi tried to talk to them again but they wouldn't stop. The next day, her friends apologized, and said she was sorry. Mimi's friends stopped being mean.

The Fabric. Jill found a great new fabric on the internet. She immediately tried it on. It was a little stiff so she cut it. When she returned it it looked great. Jill was glad to be sewing something.

New lab gig. Tina wanted to start a new job. She applied to a lab, and it accepted her. Then she got a call from a new job! She got an interview for the job right away! Tina got the job of her dreams!

Fitness Competition. Alex always felt that he wasn't fit enough to enter a fitness competition. However, Alex decided to give it a shot and try to compete. Alex trained his entire life for this opportunity. Alex could not wait to compete in the competition! Alex was very proud when he won third place in the competition.

Gas and Money. I needed gas for my car. I decided to drive to the gas station. When I got there, I found out it was out of gas. I was so annoyed I stopped in front of the station and put the pump in my car. Now I am able to buy gas at the gas station.

My new Sister. My sister in law had a small baby. She was about 9 months pregnant with a 9 month old baby girl. She kept calling me names but I did not like her. Then one day I heard her say she was just happy to be with me. I finally went on a date with my sister in law and she loved me.

Street of 3G. Nina was driving her car in the middle of the highway. She was watching the street with her mirror. Suddenly a car sped by. It looked like it was headed for Nina's lane. Nina quickly moved to the next lane.

Peanut butter and jelly. My brother and I decided to eat some peanut butter and jelly. It was my brother's favorite food. I had made my brother peanut butter and jelly sandwiches. I made the peanut butter and jelly sandwiches. It was the first sandwich he ate after lunch.

Tickets in Texas. I was playing music with my friends at a concert. My brother tried to find tickets in Texas. He couldn't find any tickets, so he took me to a music store. The music store was so nice that I bought some music. When I got home, my brother took me to dinner.

Moses Went to Church. Evan went to church for the first time. He wasn't sure which church to go to. He looked in the menu and realized he didn't know which church to go to. He was afraid of getting lost. Then a man offered him a ride home.
Bathing suit. Tina was at the pool with her friends. There was a new bathing suit that she loved. She decided to try it on. But she did not have enough time to try it. She decided to just go home.
The Wholesale Club. Tom was at a bar. He was a pretty good bartender. He made a special deal to give away free drinks. People bought a lot of drinks at his bar. Tom made a hundred dollars that night.

The New Kid. A new boy was walking down the hall. He was nervous because he wasn't sure he would make any friends. When he walked past a girl, she smiled and told him hello. She even had a cute black cat and she asked him to keep up. The new boy ended up making some pretty good friends.

Football Pals. I tried to be a football player. In high school, I tried out for the football team. I did well for my first try, and learned my lesson. I wanted to play football more. The coach said I needed to be more physical.

Babysitting nightmare. One morning I noticed my cat had been scratching herself. I got up to the cat's door. When I opened it, I found my cat scratched her. I panicked and ran out of the house. I was glad I wasn't hurt and I felt better afterwards.

A Used Car. Samantha has to pick up a car from the dealer today. Her sister drives a very nice car. Samantha doesn't want to drive that car. She went to the garage and got a used car. Samantha now drives a used car that she likes.
Tyler's huge mistake. Tyler went to a club. He didn't realize he was getting drunk. He passed out on the dance floor. The next day he woke up to a black eye and red nose. His parents were furious.

Marco Makes His Bed. Marco has always been a very poor man. He always wondered how to make his bed. Finally he decides he should make it himself. He buys all the materials and builds a bed. It is a great bed.
New Shoes. The woman put on new shoes. She was very happy with them. She showed her husband. His friend noticed the shoes. His friend complimented the woman on the new shoes.
Off to the Races. Norman wanted to go to the races. But he had to work that day. He was exhausted by the time he went to the races. He felt guilty. He decided to go to the races without work.
Rent. Jane needed a place to rent her car. She could not afford a new one. She asked her boyfriend to help. His dad decided to buy her the car she wanted. Jane got to keep it.

Celebrity sighting. I went to the beach with my family. While we were out, a group of kids walked by. They were walking to the water. I turned around and found my neighbor. When I introduced myself, he was very friendly.

The Long Bike Ride. Joe was on his way to work. He noticed that there were a lot of cars. The kids were riding bikes, too. The road was filled with traffic. He rode back home without riding the bike all the way home.

Ticket. Jenna had her driver's license for ten years. A cop pulled her over for speeding. She gave the officer a ticket for her reckless driving. Jenna was upset she got pulled over. She vowed never to drive drunk again.

Rent Money. Anna was looking through her budget. But she couldn't afford to pay rent. So she took a long day off from work. But when she got back, she decided to use her money. And she finally got the money she needed to pay her rent.

The Rain. Today I went to play on the playground. A huge rain came down in the middle of the playground. My little brother and I spent a lot of time getting wet. We also got lots of sand in our faces. The kids said it was a fun day, and left early.

Fake. Tommy came to the door. He got on the ladder and opened the door. His mom said he didn't have his license to get to the car. She went to Tommy's parents house. She asked for his driver's license.

Final Moments. After my son was born, he started to crawl, he was still young. He began crawling like a little child. One day my son noticed he was slowly crawling all the way down my legs. My son started crying and I was scared. After about an hour of fear I finally got the courage and asked my husband to stop.

Kitty Keeper. My cat likes to hunt mice in our backyard. She will go hunting with us for mice for mice traps. One time, she found a box that was full of mice. When she was cleaning it, she found one mouse trapped inside! Now she is taking her cat with her, so she can chase the mice.
Sleep. Tina's sister didn't sleep well all day. She tried to get her to sleep. She gave her a teddy bear. The bear was too small. Tina gave the teddy bear back.

Mechanic. I bought a new bicycle for my birthday. When I went to the store, I didn't know how to assemble it. The mechanic told me to try to get on the right side. He also gave me some new stickers to hang on it. It was a lot of work.

Too Many Dogs. A group of girls went to the beach with their dog. When they got there, they noticed that there were way too many dogs. As soon as they saw it they got in the car to go home. The girls thought it was hilarious how many dogs there were. Now they only have one dog each.

George visits the comic book store. George decided to visit the local comic book store. He went into the store and bought a comic book. George then went into the store to look at the collection. He also checked out some of the characters in the store. George left the store satisfied with the purchase he bought.

Rick Nick and the Bee. One day Rick was stung by a bee. He got all his things together and went to the hospital. They ran tests on his wound but to no avail. They gave him a band aid and told him not to come. Rick ended up getting the bee out of his wound.

Painting. The painter went to the fair and bought some art supplies. He came back home and painted a mural. Afterwards, he tried to draw another mural. Unfortunately the painter didn't see his mistake. Instead of a mural, he bought a painting from a shop.

Food. I really hated the taste of hot dogs. They were so hot that they were painful to eat. One day I went to a bar to order a hot dog. I asked the waitress if I could have one. She smiled and said yes!
Climate Change. Jane wanted to help the environment. She tried to start a garden at work. Jane grew vegetables. She planted more crops. Jane and her colleagues were proud to have a good garden.
Cancelled. I took my daughter to the school. She asked for a pencil. I told her she could not have one. She started to cry. I brought her to the principal's office.
Parade. The kids went to the park. They saw the parade. They got a few food samples. The kids ate them all up. They got home.

Mexican Restaurant. My friend asked if I wanted to eat at a Mexican restaurant. We went there early and waited for our food. My friend was very good and made a great meal. The restaurant was crowded. But I did not enjoy my food.

Lost. The man put on his shoes and went outside to walk. He ran into a man trying to steal a car. The man tried to stop the car to get away. The man was too fast and the man hit him. He learned that people need to learn to be more patient.

New Printers. I found out a friend was working on a new printer. They had it in the garage to see how to use. When I opened it, I noticed the ink was thin and sticky. The only thing I liked about it was the printer. I decided to buy the printer and use it everyday.

Dress Code. Sally and the girls were watching TV. They had a crush on a boy in another room. Sally asked the boy for permission to watch. He said no and they both walked away. The boy was confused and ran off.
A baby's fall. The baby crawled into the crib. His mom was worried that he might fall. Her mom took him to the doctor. The doctor examined the baby. The baby was safe and sound.

Frozen Food. Tom hated having frozen food. But it was the only thing he could afford. His freezer was all the way full and he had no space. He couldn't afford freezer space so he had to use the freezer. Tom regret it later.

Friends of Mine. John wanted to make friends with new neighbors. He decided to start a blog. John was surprised to find his friend group. They all started writing their own posts. Soon John was making friends.

Affair in Storage Room. Gina and her friends had been at her grandma's house all week. She noticed a huge plate of chicken on the table. Her grandpa was on his way out of the house. She went to grab the chicken. But she got back when her grandpa stopped and ate the plate.

Ultrasound. Sally had an ultrasound for her baby. She was nervous that the baby might have some developmental problems. She called the doctor and asked for a few extra hours. The doctor came over the next day and gave her an extra hour. Her baby was born healthy and Sally was relieved.

Running out of time. I sat at my desk working. I noticed that there was a big crowd. I did not have time to go to sleep. Therefore, I walked out of my room to walk to the school. I then found out that there was a running.

Jogging at the park. It was a warm spring day. Jenny decided to take a walk with her dog. Jenny and her dog ran out onto the busy park. Jenny's dog had a great time playing. Jenny was happy that she decided to take a walk with her dog.

Abandoned Home. Mia was playing video games with her friends. She wasn't paying attention and her friend was trying to help. Mia's friend started talking to her. She ended up talking to her friend. The two friends were upset and went to Mia's parent's house.
secret. Ana had a secret. Her husband loved her secret. She told him the secret every day. Her husband never found out. Ana had to tell her secret to her husband.
