The Horse. Jim loved riding horses. One day he rode a horse into the woods. He fell off and got hurt. Jim went to the doctor. Jim got stitches in his leg.

Imaginary Boat. The boat trip was a long, grueling, boring ordeal. One day we were all in line waiting to be picked up. The captain had a beautiful boat and we were all very lucky. We were all excited to get off the boat and start our lives! When we finally arrived, the boat was gone.

Waitress. Kate wanted to try out for the school cheer squad. But she was not very good at it. She practiced everyday for hours. But she still didn't get the cut. Her mom told her she had to wait a few months to try again.
Broken arm. Tori was out for a jog. All of a sudden she tripped. She fell to the ground. Tori's arm was broken. She was sent to the hospital.

Lost Tooth. Tim was playing basketball. He went on the court and scored one of his points. He ran to grab his tooth and realized he had missed. His tooth flew all the way off his face. The dentist told Tim he was lucky and gave him a sticker.
Bad Dog. Tom was out for lunch. He decided to buy a dog. He went for a walk in the park. A dog started following him around. Tom was embarrassed but still ate it anyway.

Flee. Cameron and I walked through a field and spotted a large black cat. We felt it was very nervous. We tried to calm it down by giving it food. It didn't work. We realized that the cat's collar was on, and it wasn't our.

Bad Skyler. Tom wanted to build a skydiving skydiving toy. He thought about using a ladder and a chainsaw. The ladder and chainsaw weren't the best. He then decided to put a big wooden box in the basement. Then he attached a skydiving toy to it!

Dog's Behavior. Tom was a dog that liked to bark a lot. He barked all the time. One day he wasn't barking at the right time. Tom was able to talk with him and he stopped barking. Tom now avoids the window when he wants to be quiet.
Too many kids. Today was a big day. It was time to take the kids out. There were so many kids. We had so many fun. I am so glad.

Saving a cookie. Molly wanted to make a treat for her boyfriend. She decided to get some chocolate into the pan. She added a sugar and cinnamon. She put the pan in the oven to bake it. When it came out of the oven, Molly realized that it was empty.

The Old Man. James was tired of the old man next door. His dad started taking care of him when he was younger. James' dad bought a new house. He bought a new car and was more excited about it. The old man had died a few years back.

Computer. It was the first day of school, and I had a computer. I had never used it before. I was in class with another girl when I ran into my friend. We were both curious about the new computer I was getting. We began to laugh at each other as we swapped computers.
new kid. A new kid came in. He looked weird and scary. My wife was afraid. We decided to give him a week to learn. He learned very quickly and never showed up again.

bored. Janet was bored on her lunch break. She decided to take her dog for a walk. They spent the rest of the day playing fetch. After they were done, Janet had a cup of chocolate. She was happy to be finally bored again.

Fire. Kirk was cooking a pot of beef stew. Suddenly, he smelled something burning. It was the pot of beef stew. He grabbed the pot and threw it on the stove. Suddenly, it stopped and he went to investigate.

Dive Bar. There was a diving bar at the high dive. They let you jump off and then dive down the pool. Everyone loved to dive down and do laps. One time I did a dive and landed in the middle of the pool. My friends were amazed.

Terrible Name. Sam's girlfriend was called Stacy. She was a mean girl and she got Sam really mad at her. Sam asked Stacy to come over and help. The mean girl ended up being so mean. Sam realized he was just getting used to being called Stacy.

A Towel. My daughter asked for a towel for her hotel room. She wanted one from the kitchen drawer. My daughter grabbed a towel from the laundry room. We were both so happy to see each other. We couldn't wait to bring her a towel again.

Dang Cat. My sister in law bought a pet dang cat from the pet store. I did not want her to let me get a cat. I gave her the cat for her birthday. She took me to a restaurant. She said she was afraid the cat would eat her food.
Target. Tim was trying to eat a banana. He got really sick after chewing it. He tried getting some salt in the flavor. Unfortunately the salt was way too salty. He didn't make a banana after that.

The Eater. Lizzy was eating a delicious meal. She felt a bit sick and ate too fast. Lizzy felt so bad. Her mom went to the hospital to give her medicine. Lizzy ate the rest of her meal and felt better.
Walk. Bobby's mother said he needed to walk. So she took him to the park and led him. While he was on the walk he started feeling sick. He couldn't walk. Bobby decided to go home for the day.
Performing a concert. I was at a band concert with my band. We had a few songs to play. We played an old song and it was really good. The audience cheered for us. It was a good show.

Janitor Job. A new janitor was hired to work at our apartment complex. The janitor was very good at what he did. He stayed a very long time in the building. He never complained about it or didn't help the residents. I think the janitor had a lot of good work to do.

Jack's Dog. Jack was driving his dog outside. He decided to show his dog how to use the leash. When he was done walking around his neighborhood, he noticed a cat. He thought the cat was going to eat the dog. However, his dog did not want to go back inside.
Cleaning the yard. Tom needed to do his yard work. He hired someone to come clean his yard. Tom got his yard professionally cleaned. He paid the person. Tom loved the job and hired that person again.

He will pay. When he was ten Year's old he wanted to ride a roller coaster. His mom bought him a ticket to ride one. He got on the roller coaster and it went upside down. His mom came back and told him to go get it fixed. He cried for days.
Swing Time. Roxy wanted to get in shape. She got a trainer and worked out. Then she went to the park. There, she tried swinging on the swings. And she fell many times.

Jeff's A Lost Cause. Jeff is the manager of a fast food restaurant. He has a long list of customers who never come back. He also has trouble with the IRS and the bankruptcy law. Finally Jeff takes his business to bankruptcy. Now Jeff can use the fast food business to focus on his family.

Old diary. It was Tim's birthday and he was not having a party. He went to his brother's house to find a present. He opened the door and took out the present. He was surprised to see that his brother had used an old diary. Tim was sad that his birthday was ruined by a diary.

Christmas lights. I woke up at 5 AM to open my new Christmas tree. I was looking for the right tree. I looked at all the lights, but couldn't decide. I finally decided on a tiny oak tree with six lights. I was happy to have the tree.

The Appointment. Tim was taking his medicine for a cough. His doctor had him write down what was the cause of his cough. The doctor said Tim's throat was being inflamed. Tim had his prescription filled out. The doctor gave him his medicine, then went back home.
Pajamas. The man washed his clothes. He put on his pajamas. He put on his best clothes. He slept well in his pajamas. He was glad that he washed his clothes.

The warning. Jorge was at his local bar. While drinking, he had a small talk with a young woman. She offered him a cigarette, and he gave it to her. She tried to smoke it, but he kept it as it made her feel sick. She took him home, and his parents got upset.

The Old Roller Coaster. The family was going to an amusement park. The first stop was the old roller coaster. They looked at the tickets. The ride was on the wrong track. They rode it home and vowed to be more careful.

Big Test. My brother took me to see the big test. The teacher was not familiar with me. I felt confused as to how to answer several questions. A girl in the class was helping me out. It helped me to pass the test and make my parents happy.

Bonding Time. Randy was trying to bond with his sister. But he couldn't figure out what he was talking about. His sister suggested he talk about her behind her back. Randy's sister suggested that he be quiet and avoid discussing. Randy was able to discuss things with his sister behind her back.
Adler. I had a cat that loved my house. I put her on a fence. After a while she moved out. Now she is on the other side of the fence. I have no clue what happened to her.

The Castle. There was a small castle in town. One day a thief broke in and stole it. He got out and chased the thief all over town. He eventually caught the thief and put him in jail. The thief did not like his detention.
New dog. I bought a new puppy. I named him Max. We played fetch with the other puppies. We took Max to the park. We had so much fun!
No Donuts. Tom was at a friend's party. Tom didn't have any donuts to bring. He went to ask them what was going on. They told him they had already ran out. Tom had no choice but to leave early.
Buying another car. I went shopping. I wanted a convertible. I went into the car lot and looked at cars. I saw a convertible and wanted to buy it. I picked one and it was my new favorite car.

Wood Wins. I went to the local grocery store to buy some wood. I had no idea what kind I wanted to get and what was more expensive. I decided to buy a bunch of the cheapest wood available. I put the wood in the back yard and walked around to pick up things. Eventually, I managed to get everything I needed on the first day of work.
Snorkeling. My dad went snorkeling. We went into the water. He had a very high dive. He said he liked how fast he could dive. He took me with him when he was ready to dive.

Randy gets the girl. Randy has been dating a girl for a few months. It's been a really nice relationship so far. While on a date the girl asks if she wants to go home. Randy says okay and they have to get ready to leave. Randy's date is the best he ever had.

Steve Becomes Just Like The Others. Steve wanted to be just like everyone else in his small town. He often walked to the local grocery store and would take all the same food. His friends were surprised to discover this and he became popular. Now, he is a big star in his small town. Steve has become successful and he never looks back.

Frombo. I was sitting in front of the library. The library is pretty empty. A girl from another class asked me to sit with her. I sat down next to her and said hello. After that, we stayed friends and I enjoyed hanging out with her.

Responsibility. Gina always wanted to get her own bike, but her mom said no. She begged her mother and her grandma to buy her one. But when she finally got a bike she realized it was not for her. She felt it was more responsibility than she could handle. The bike didn't even come close enough to fit her.

Major Regret. My niece in law has 2 children. She took her son to see the children after the first visit. After a few minutes, she noticed her son crying. He started running around the room and crying. My niece in law got him into his car and drove him back home.

Deer Huntress. One day Tom and his friends decided to go hunting for deer. It was his first time so he was nervous. They spent the next 3 days chasing each other in their jeep. By night time they were both exhausted but happy. Tom and his friends spent the night looking for deer.

Self Esteem. Kenny was the class clown. He had a crush on a girl in his class. He decided to take a picture with her. The girl was horrified. She told him it was inappropriate and he should get his picture.

Ross The Gamer. Ross wanted to learn how to play video games. He signed up for online learning classes. His first lesson was playing the new game that was coming out. Ross learned so much he had to take his first tournament. Ross now plays online games for a living and loves his job.

Cherries Jubilee. My sister-in-law is a grandmother. Last week she posted pictures of a cherry jubilee in her garden. The photo went viral and was posted on Facebook. She made $100 to donate to the Boston Red Sox. She made it to her donation and thanked me.

Pothole. Tom was driving his car one day. A truck came speeding along. He kept his eyes open while driving on the road. He heard the truck revving its engine. He was late to work but had no time to brake.
New Handle. Janice had her dog. She realized that she had no handles. She went to the store to purchase new ones. She found a beautiful looking one. The dog was thrilled with the new handle.

After School Getaway. Mandy was at a local middle school. One day, she found out she would be getting an after school getaway. She could not wait to spend time with the other kids. The kids took the getaway with her. Mandy was happy that she could spend the next week with the kids.

Candy. My wife bought a bag of candy for my daughter. She was very excited to receive her candy. But I told her she could have only one piece. She picked out two bags. She thanked me and walked away happily.

Chemistry Lab. Sasha was working in chemistry lab when she got a text. The professor sent her home to see what she could do. She studied for a week before the text arrived. Her lab teacher handed her a chemistry kit. Sasha was able to make a simple batch of chemicals.

Condo. Joey and his friends were looking for a new place to live. They went on a few interviews, but none of them seemed right. After many meetings, they decided to buy a condo. Joey and his friends were excited when they received the news. They couldn't wait to move into the new home!

The Date. Jill was going to the club with her friends. She was having a good time. Suddenly her date appeared. They spent the whole night talking and talking. They didn't think it was the best date of their lives.

The Early Baby. Mary had just had her first child. She didn't want to have kids right away. Her husband didn't want to have kids too. They started to watch tv together. Soon they were having lots of fun and making plans for a baby.
Volcano. Tim loved exploring. He wanted to explore a volcano. He invited a group of friends. They got in their cars and drove around for hours. They saw lots of strange and beautiful scenery.

Crushing Like a Frog. Amy decided to crush a classmate in science class. She made the classmate drink water and put Amy's crush on the wall. She waited patiently as the bully approached Amy. The boy slowly approached Amy. The boy gave her the nickname Crush and she crushed him.

Crush. Joey was playing basketball with a few friends. He had a crush on his best friend, Fred. Joey started talking to Fred. Joey talked to Fred the whole game. Joey was able to convince Fred to ask him on a date.

Bumping into old friends. Tom was an elderly man. His family lived in a big apartment with a pool. He would often spend hours looking for people to hang out with. Tom would call random people from random phone numbers. He finally made a new friend and became a friend.

The paint compromise. Jenny's husband asked her to paint the living room. She agreed and was very excited. She put on a nice shade of pink paint to match the color of the living room. As soon as it dried, she tried to put on more paint. She kept losing her balance and almost fell on the floor.

Test. Nathan's friend was doing poorly in school. Nathan decided to help him out by tutoring him in math. They went over the homework together. Nathan showed Nathan some pictures of math problems to make sure it was correct. He was able to help Nathan a lot by helping him grasp math problems.
Diet. My friend had a good diet. She would only eat a few foods in the first week. She went to her first class one day. We did the same. Now she only eats vegetables.

Annoying toy. Manny was walking around his house. He saw an annoying toy. He told his mom that it was out of the toy. Manny's mom tried to hide the toy in the closet. After a long search, Manny finally found the toy.

Harper Gets Lost. Harper is visiting the farm. Harper doesn't know where the barn is. Harper goes up to look around the barn. He sees the man there looking like he's lost. Harper follows him, hoping he's found the barn.
Cake. The lady put on the white clothes. She then decided to wear makeup. She then put on her makeup. Her friend had a party with her. They went on and on.

Back Breaker. Ben has a hard time going backwards. He tries to get the ball but can't move. He tries the back door but it doesn't open. The back door is open at home and he tries the front door. He finally uses the front door to get the ball.
Dog Bath. Tina and her puppy went for a walk. The two were playing in the mud. Tina saw a dog poop in the mud. She yelled at the dog to stop. The dog got away.

The Soup. Sally decided to make her mom something special. She bought a box of soup. She cooked the soup and brought it to her mom. Her mom loved it and started to feel better. Sally took the soup to her mom.

A Movie. Liam and I went to see a movie. We were both excited for the movie. We were both too nervous to say our names. Eventually we decided to just go and sit down. We were so glad that we didn't say our names.

The Lunchtime Pizza. I had to take a quick break from work. I walked into my home and looked in the fridge. I saw there was a giant pizza in my fridge. I didn't know what pizza it was, but I opened it up. I took it home and put it into the oven.

Hooray for Lisa. Lisa got a call one day. It was a knock on the door. It was a family that Lisa's friend was visiting. Lisa was in the audience at the party with her aunt. They were having a great time, but Lisa wasn't enjoying it.

Hoop. I found a hole in my front yard. I went to the hole and noticed something inside of it. I looked around the hole and found a baby hobo. I took him in and gave him a little blanket. I called him "The Child Hoop".

Acid rainy. Tim woke up to find it had rained. He was still wet and muddy. It was a sunny and very warm day. Tim ran outside to see what it was like. It turned out that it was only acid, not acid rainy.

Go to the Store. Amy and Beth were waiting in line for the candy store. There was a long line. Amy wondered what was so special for the special girl. When she saw the girl, she wanted to buy her something. The girl's name was lily and the girls went home to find it.

Crafting a Business. Jenny and Mark were going to start a craft store together. They started their business by selling books at a community library. They also sold the books at a thrift store. The shop's first day went well. The store started out doing well.
Costume Contest. I have a costume contest with my sister. She asked if she could enter. I had to agree. We got together and made plans to have it. Our costumes won third place!

Silverfish. It was one of my favorite meals as a child. One night I had a really delicious piece of silverfish. It tasted so good I had to go and eat more. I ate for hours. But I regret it later, as it was gross.

Renee goes Camping. Renee and Tim went camping with friends. The girls had fun but the friends were scared. They told them they had not been seen all day. They told them to come get their equipment. They came up with their plan and never camped in that area again.
The Chairs. Kate needed new furniture. Her room was really full. She finally decided to get new chairs. The chairs were the best they ever bought. Kate decided to buy them more often.

Bus still waiting. One day the bus never came. The driver tried to get the bus to go by. The driver tried to talk to the driver. The driver had a few more minutes to talk to the driver. The driver drove to the next stop.

Picking Flowers. I decided to pick flowers for a friend. I went to a flower store and picked some pretty flowers. When I got home I realized that the flower store had no flowers. I went back to the store to ask for some flowers. I found some pretty flowers and took them home to be put in the garden.

Big Fishing Trip. Joe was excited to go fishing with his dad this summer. But when he got there, he saw a sign for a big, big fish. There were thousands of fish at the lake! But it only fed one guy that night. Joe learned to be more considerate about fish.
peanut scare. Kelly was very allergic to peanuts. When she was on a flight she was allergic to peanuts. She was really scared. Thankfully, her boss helped her relax and eat. Soon she was much calmer!
Winter coat. The weather is very cold. Winter coats don't last very long. She needed a winter coat. She went to the mall. She bought a warm coat.

Inheritance. Toby wanted to be a successful lawyer. He saved money from his savings and saved his money. He would work harder than he ever had before. He learned a lot from working hard. He ended up being successful because of his work ethic.

Driving at Night. My friends and I decided to drive to a baseball game. The traffic on the way was very poor. As we drove a car was rear ended in the street. I called the insurance company. The insurance man called me to say that he would fix the car.

Judy's pastry. Judy went to the bakery to make some delicious pastry. The baker brought out a beautiful pastry. Judy took a bite and saw that the pie was very dry. She took the pie home and put it in the oven. The pie came out good and Judy was very happy.

Annual Trip. Sara decided she would take her family on a yearly trip to visit a theme park. She worked at the park for five hours every weekend. On each day they rode on rides, enjoyed games, and swam in the water. On their fifth anniversary they visited the theme park again. This year they got a free day at Disney World!
Kimmy's Cookies. Kimmy had to make chocolate chip cookies. She put them in the oven. Then, she waited for them to cool. When they were cool, she placed them in the oven. They baked the cookies.

Xerxes's Xenophobic Xeroxes. Xerxes has been having trouble in the office. He has made a few strange gestures lately. The secretary found them on his computer. She reported Xerxes for making an inappropriate touch. The Xeroxes are going to be a lot more polite.
Bhishma. The boy heard the man yelling. He began to panic. The boy looked out of the window. He saw his neighbor was holding his neighbor's baby. The boy ran home to tell his parents what he saw.
History Test. Tom's history test was tomorrow. Tom didn't study at all. The day of the test Tom did not study. Tom failed the test. Tom was not allowed to retake the test.
My Cat Fluffy. My cat Fluffy is not a very nice cat. She likes to come inside and lay down. Last night I heard my cat purr. I picked up the cat and put her on my lap. Fluffy now stays on my lap.

The Joke. Caleb was an English major in college. Caleb's friends decided to play a joke on him about his English classes. They made a joke about Caleb getting into English in college. Caleb was confused, so he decided to go back and tell his friends. However, Caleb's friends refused to accept his joke.
Doing a good favor. The man did a favor. He felt bad afterward. He made a different kind of help. He made sure to feel better. He was grateful for his gratitude.
Gerald. Gerald was very hungry. Gerald looked for a sandwich. He went to the store. Gerald bought a sandwich. Gerald ate the sandwich.

The First Grade. When I was a little girl I always wanted to ride the bus to school. One day my mom asked me if I would be a part of the first grade. I said yes and had a great time and didn't know any kids. I got so used to riding the bus that I was no longer afraid of other kids. I decided to be a part of the first grade by the end of the year.
Too many shampoos. I got a new shampoo yesterday. It seemed to help. After a while I noticed it was very expensive. I decided to get another bottle. I ended up buying ten.
The flat tire. I was driving down the highway. I noticed something weird in the road. It was a flat tire. I went to fix it. I took the car to the mechanic.
Free. Kate was at a mall with her family. They were not supposed to do it. But they were trying to sneak away from the mall. But they were caught. They were grounded for 2 weeks.

Precious. She looked over her shoulder at her dog. She wasn't sure if it was beautiful or not. The dog sat up in the grass looking at her. He had some very lovely red eyes and had a very big dog collar. She knew right away he was pregnant!

silence. There was an evil child named Mark. He was a mischievous teenager and he would often be found. One day, a little girl was sitting in front of a window. She asked Mark what he had been reading. Mark told her that he loved to write music in a garage.

Locked out. It was a night with my friends. We decided to go for a walk. We left our car in our car and went to the park. The park was very dark and we were worried about it. Thankfully my friends got back in a few minutes.

home ec. Sally wanted to make her home ec more pleasant. She began by getting some bulbs. Then, she carefully cut each bulb in half. She then put them back together. Her home ec looked so much better, she bought more bulbs.

A mix up. Tina was planning on going to the beach with her friends. On the way there, she realized she had left her purse at home. Tina tried to find it. She decided to call her friends back to say it was lost. Her friends didn't believe her when she told them about it.

One day of Starvation. Sally is starving after school. She doesn't want to go to school. She decides to call her friend Beth to have some drinks. They all eat at Beth's house. Beth decides she is going to go get food tomorrow.

Getting Fired. Barry was working as an accountant in his office. He would sometimes be late for work. Barry's boss thought he was being lazy. Barry got fired by his boss. Barry decided he would not go to the office again.
Bye Dad. Mavis's dad is gone. She is very sad. She begins to cry. Her friends are surprised to see her cry. Mavis is happy that her dad is coming back soon.
Sign Me Up. Tom signed up for a class at his school. The first class was an English class. Tom was interested in English. Tom became interested in German. Tom ended up passing the German class.

The Cow. Cynthia wanted to have a cow for her children. She thought that cow would be a very quiet, peaceful creature. The cow was very active, and she was concerned about it. She took it to a vet that said it was healthy and had worms. After seeing the vet, Cynthia decided to let it have her!
Sick. I went to school today. I got a stomach ache. I sat on my desk and was sick. I threw up on the ground. I made up a bad grade on my report card.

The Trapeze. Ava had always wanted to be a trapeze dancer. She wanted to impress a young boy named Jake. When he asked her to dance, she was excited. She practiced every day for two weeks. Jake loved it!

From Girlfriend To Landlord. Bill moved into his first apartment. He was worried he would be evicted by his landlord. But his landlord said he didn't need a permit for the house. Bill got in trouble for sleeping in his new bed. He still lives in that apartment now.

Santa Claus. When I was little, we loved to ride rides. We had a lot of snowmen and snowshakes. When we went to bed on a Christmas day, there was Santa. We went downstairs and found the lights and the snowman. When we got home, we had a pile of gifts, and presents.

New Car. Mike was so excited for his 16th birthday. He wanted a new car and would have it all by Christmas. His parents told him it would be in the mail that day. Mike was so excited he started to cry and cry all day. Mike got to pick out the car for him.

New Boss. John hated his new boss. He decided to work harder to get over him. He put his best foot forward. John's boss was impressed and offered John a promotion. John became a new boss and loved it.

Computer Programming. Ned worked at a large company. He got a call from a very popular tech company. He wanted to learn how to code for the tech company. Ned studied hard and bought a computer. Ned learned how to code at the tech company.

Bubble Bubble. The kids were playing in the sandbox. They jumped out to see what bubbles were floating around. One kid had a bubble that popped! The other kid picked it up and started playing with it. They had a lot of fun and decided to do it again.

Soft Serve. Tom was a soft serve player at a high school. He would go to a lot of tournaments to play. He wanted to play at tournaments that were lower than his high school's. Tom took the summer off of work to practice for the tournament. Tom lost the tournament after the loss.

grades. Tina got a terrible grade. She tried to apologize but she had no luck. Tina then had to explain her grade. She explained to her parents the bad grade she got. She was told she needed to do better on her grades next time.

Smart Move. John moved to the city. He wanted to be the smartest kid in his class. John spent the entire day working on his math skills. He was tired of studying and his grades didn't improve. John decided he didn't want to be smart anymore.
Son. My son went to the doctor today. His doctor was a very good doctor. He waited until he was home. He was examined by the doctor. He was found to be healthy.
Grass. The grass had gotten very dry. There were long grass patches everywhere! He took his mower and began to cut it. Soon it was almost clean! The lawn was now looking much better.

Lace Looks Good On Everyone, Darling. Joey's grandmother was sick. She did not care that Joey did not know how to tie a lace. Joey's grandmother had passed away that night. Joey came up to her. He told her it was just as important as knowing how to tie.

Carlos Weeds His Garden. Carlos notices that his flowers are becoming wilted. He decides to take a trip to the nursery to buy some weed killer. At the nursery he buys some weed killer and makes some preparations. After a few weeks Carlos has weeded his flowers. Now Carlos is very happy that he no longer looks like an infomercial.

New fast food. Allie was waiting at her favorite fast food place. Her favorite was going to be very popular. So when it opened they were able to get a lot of orders. She had not seen the place for the first time. Allie ended up ordering a dozen eggs, chips, and soda.
Accident. Tom was late to work. He pulled an all-nighter to prepare. He realized he wasn't at work as planned. He drove through an intersection. He hit a pole and had to be hospitalized.
Dream. I was lying on the bed in a hospital bed. There was a man next to me. I could tell he wanted to speak to me. My eyes lit up. I was going to have a wonderful conversation.

Building a dock. Juan wanted to build a dock for his house. He didn't have much money. He decided to sell his things on eBay. He bought everything on eBay and made a nice profit. Juan decided he wanted to do the same thing every year.

Painted Lines. Sally was painting her room. She got a flat tire and couldn't stop. She ran to the neighbor's house and asked for help. Her neighbor let her borrow a painting supplies. Sally painted the garage floor instead.
Clothes. Jane needed new clothes. She went to the mall. She found a bunch of cute clothes at a clothing store. She bought the outfits. She had no problem wearing the clothes.
Too Tired For Work. Jake had to work that night. He was going to be late to work. He stayed up too late to get ready. He slept through the alarm. Jake didn't get his job because he overslept.

Signs of Spring. My little cousin is four years old. He started to show off his Christmas decorations in the living room. He didn't know what to expect when his parents opened the box. He pulled out all the things he found inside. When he opened the box he saw all kinds of colorful Christmas decorations.

Losing Weight. Cindy was a very overweight woman who had never lost weight. She had worked at the local health center for several Year's. One day Cindy decided she would visit the doctor about her diet. Cindy's doctor told her she needed to lose weight. Cindy lost weight and is happy she did.

Comics. One day my best friend and I decided to make comics together. We met in our garage and got a few books. We started making strips and working on a logo. When the first one was done, we shared it with friends. Everyone loved the comic and made it a huge success!
Plums. Lois loved fruit. She would eat as many as possible. One day she found out that the plums were unhealthy. She decided to try to stop eating the plums. She was surprised how fast it was.

Funny Face. Bob sat in his room. He noticed a lot of faces he was staring at. He was confused because the faces were all funny. So he asked his roommate to get some more face paints. Now Bob had a new set of eyes that he loved.
Tooth pain. Ricky was playing outside. He began to feel pain in his mouth. He tried everything he could think of to fix it. Eventually he took a bath. Afterwards, he felt better.

Too Tall. Tom was on a hike in the woods. Tom was eating a hot lunch when he noticed a large bear. Tom was terrified and stayed close to the ground. Tom's friends told him to be still and wait. After several minutes, the bear finally stopped walking.

Not on your Side Today. Karen was eating a delicious cheeseburger in the cafeteria at school. She was eating one of the cheeseburgers when she felt something weird. She realized that she had been having a stomach ache for the past 2 hours. She immediately spit it out and ran to the bathroom. When she got to the bathroom, she realized that she had contracted the disease.

Zoo trip. Cheryl was very excited for her trip to the zoo. They took her there for her birthday. She took a picture of her face with her new baby. Then they walked through the zoo. She couldn't wait to return!
quick trip to the store. I walked to the store with my friends. We walked in and got everything. We looked around. But we saw no stuff. We walked home with no stuff.

The Baby Shower. Alicia was about to give birth. She got the baby into her room and started walking. Alicia realized there wasn't any time to do anything, she was rushed. Alicia went to the bathroom and went through her baby's bathroom. Alicia found the baby shower and began to remove the baby.
Crust. Tom was driving home from work. He noticed a large crack in his car. Tom could not afford to fix it. He took it to the dealership. Tom got a new car and his car was fixed.

Rich Family. I took my family to the casino on Friday. It was the only thing I could afford. I had the best time in the casino with my family. We bought a huge game and had it for hours. The family was proud of me and we decided to do it again next week.

Cheating. Gina wanted to be good at sports. But her mom insisted they play sports that day. Gina asked if they could play a game with a different boy. His mom agreed. And Gina and her siblings had a great time.

Birthday. Last year I was turning 30 years old. I decided to have a birthday party. My friends and I decided to have a birthday party. We drank all the time and ate cake and drinks. We also played a game of games for a lot of fun.
Store. Nina went to the store. She picked out some items she would like to buy. She bought a bag of cereal. She also purchased some bottled water. Nina went home.

Cavities. Bobby didn't like his back teeth. He decided to have them fixed. The dentist told him he needed to get more exercise. Bobby practiced for several months. Bobby's back teeth got better and he loved his new exercise.

Walking in the rain. I was hiking with a group of friends. When we finally saw a waterfall I froze. I thought I would never go to the bottom. A guy told me I could swim instead. I didn't mind that much because I loved it.

Best Christmas. Tia was at her sister's house for Christmas. She hadn't seen her sister in a year. She was sure she was dying to see her. She told her sister that she was happy. Tia was thankful that her sister was happy as well.
Karen. Karen went out for the day. She noticed a stray dog. It wasn't a friendly dog, but it was a very mean dog. Karen brought it home and he was nice. She decided she didn't like him any more.

Fued. When my cousin got her first car she always wanted a fenced in area. She tried to get a neighbor to fence in her, but they couldn't. My cousin finally gave up and bought her a new car. When she drove to the yard, she saw the garage. She parked her car and climbed into the fence.
The Tie Choice. Tom had been dating Jenny for a year. He had decided on going to her wedding. Tom showed up early at the wedding. He brought a tie to tie the tie in her hair. They both looked great.

Cracked Screen. Kate was getting ready to go to the store. She was trying to swipe her card. The screen cracked and she couldn't get it to work again. She had to call her card company and get it fixed. Luckily the fix was fairly inexpensive.

The Chalk. Nancy had made a nice cup of chalk from scratch. She added some of her own flour to the mix to make a smoothie. She began mixing it up with her hand. She thought that it looked great. Nancy decided to add more flour from scratch.

The School Year. Mary and Mark were both going to school for the first time. Mary wanted to be a teacher and Mark wanted to be a football player. After meeting the school board, the school district decided they would make a decision. The board decided to not let Mary teach or play football. Mary was excited to find out she was allowed to play football.
The Missing Keys. I noticed something weird on my car. I looked all over the place. I didn't see anything that looked like my keys. I called a locksmith. After a long walk, he found them.

The Last Towel. It was a very rainy day. Rita was having a hard time finding her favorite towels. She kept calling around and never finding a single one. Her husband decided to give her one last towel to throw away. Rita was so excited about the last towel she was going to throw away.
Circus. John was a kid who loved to ride the merry go round. He would go every Sunday after school. One Saturday his mom took him to the carnival. They rode for hours. They played some games.

The Music Lover. Ben was the top of his class. The music teacher played a lot of songs. Ben listened very attentively. He felt the music teacher was very funny. Ben learned that love makes sense to the world.

Old Dog. Seth's grandfather left him his old dog when he was little. He told his friends that they should keep it. Seth got really tired of seeing his old dog around. One day Seth saw the dog for himself. Seth was so happy he got to keep the dog.

Ice Cream Truck. Linda's family was driving down the road one day. They heard a strange noise. Linda knew it was an ice cream truck. She tried to look inside but was too afraid. Eventually she had enough and ate a huge chocolate sundae.

Skating Lessons. I wanted to learn how to skate. The only way I could skate was through ice skating lessons. I signed up for lessons and learned my lesson. When the lessons were over, I had a skating accident. I learned that lessons were really not for me after all.

Gambler. Tina loved to gamble on games. She would always try her luck on the slot machines. Tina even spent money on lottery tickets. It made her very rich and famous. She is now a millionaire thanks to all her lucky picks.
The Jail. A young man was running from the police. The police officer got him a weapon. The police officer held him in the jail. The prisoner began to shout and play. The prisoner was very cute.
Talk. Sandra was in class. The teacher was talking. She asked if she was talking too loud. Sandra was not pleased. Sandra went and left.

bag. Ben's friend brought him a bag of treats. He went through the bag to find one he liked. As he opened the bag, a huge spider bit him on the hand! He quickly covered the bite with honey. Ben's friend was so happy that he didn't feel like crying anymore.
Starbucks Wi-Fi. I was walking to school. I had no internet. I walked by Starbucks. I walked inside to look around. There was no wi-fi in the building, so I left without the phone.
Doll Show. I was at the mall with some friends. We saw a small display of dolls. We bought some and brought them home. I put them in a closet. We all played with the dolls and ate some food.

Personal Dignity. I was being bullied by a group of girls. I tried to fight back but I was beaten back. I had to ask my friends to stop being so mean. However, the girls just kept mocking me. I realized I should have stood up for myself.

Boredom Sets In. Boris was bored one night after work. He decided to watch some movies. When he went to the living room, he was still there. He spent the entire day watching TV. Boris got up and went back to his work.

Push on the Swings. Anna was at a pond with her sister. They wanted to climb on the rocks to get in the pond. Anna decided to do this instead of climbing. She pushed them up to the rock that was next to the pond. Anna climbed up to the rock but fell and broke her arm.

Fixing my car. I was trying to fix my car one day. I had an old oil cap that needed to be replaced. I was sure it wouldn't be hard to replace. It took me forever to do it. I finally had to finally do it.

Yancy. Yancy has a crush on a girl in her science class. She decides to ask her teacher for permission to see her. Her teacher says yes. Yancy gets her makeup done and her crush. She is thrilled to see him in her science class!
Broken mug. Lisa was doing her makeup. She was drinking a soda. She spilled it down her chin. It was pink. It broke right away.

Doing laundry. I have been working hard to do laundry for my family. I made plans to do laundry on Saturday. On Monday I started my chores. On Tuesday I had finished all the work. I was excited that my family looked at the clean clothes on Monday.
Car wash. Dan had a lot of old cars. He hated washing them. The car wash would get dirtier. The only way to wash them was to get a car wash. Dan got a nice car wash and had less dirt.

prison. Nia was in the third grade. She didn't really like the school and wanted to run away. But her mom told her she was grounded until she learned her lesson. Nia went to the library and asked for a book. She found a nice book and read it right away!

Attitude. I was a good employee in my job. However, I had attitude problems. It got really bad when I was sick and got angry. I learned to try harder at work. The boss understood that and he never treated me poorly again.

girlfriend. I was playing football with my friend in the park. We were tossing the ball around. We were trying to catch it but it was too late. Our ball went sailing over the fence and onto the street. Luckily a passerby was just there to get it.

Lunch. Tom loved his job. He was on the floor eating lunch with a group. Tom's boss came to check on him. Tom's boss fired him on the spot. Tom was very sad.

Snowstorm 5. Joe and his family went to sleep on a snow day. When they woke up it was very dark. They all got up to shovel the snow out. They made it all the way to school on time. Joe and his family went home and had fun.
diving. Samantha wanted to dive for the first time. She asked her mom to take her. Her mom thought she was too young. She signed her up for a class. They dove at the local pool.

Eating Fish. I decided to go to the sushi restaurant for lunch. I didn't really know what to order. My wife suggested I order a swordfish. I thought she was very smart. I gave her my order and she was very pleased with it.

poison ivy. Beth decided she wanted to eat healthy. She went shopping for items she could eat regularly. Beth saw a great looking cream she wanted to try. She purchased the cream and tried it, to her dismay she did not like it. Beth learned her lesson and stopped buying such cream from that store.

tired. I was running in the woods. I tried to run. But I could not catch my breath. I was so tired I fell on the ground. It was hard for me to sleep.
Mary rides the bus. Mary's family was driving for her birthday. Mary asked her mother to take her. Mary's mother took her out to the bus. Mary rode the bus. Mary rode home.

Lunch box. I bought a lunch box. I put the lunchbox on my desk. The lunch box was too big for the office. I put the lunchbox on my desk. I used the lunchbox at my desk.

plastic mold. When she was in school, my daughter's teacher brought in a plastic mold. I couldn't wait to get a bowl of food. We got on the bus and headed back to the house. She took a large bowl of food out of the microwave. We ate at my cousin's house and had an awesome day.

Internet. I went to the grocery store with a grocery list. The cashier took the list and gave me a coupon. I was excited to use the coupon, but I forgot about the list. I used my list and got a bunch of groceries. The cashier gave me a full refund.

Cookies. My husband and I used to make cookies on Sunday mornings. We put them in the oven and went to bed early. That was one of my favorite days. My son's friend, who is 10, is very good at it. I still bake the cookies and he loves them.

School. Jenny always hated going to school. She hated the people and the classes. She did not want to get in. One day Jenny's friends invited her to school. She was so happy when she got in that class!

Chess. Tom wanted to play chess with his friend. Tom challenged his friend to a game. Tom's friend beat Tom very easily. Tom played better to play against his friend. Tom beat his friend at chess.
Goo Rue Food. Goo Rue was a new restaurant. It opened in town. Everyone loved it. Goo Rue went out of business. They were unable to return.
Doing the Exact Opposite. I was out running. I ran into some of my friends. I ran to keep some distance. I ran into some friends in the same direction. My friends got out to the side of the street.
Weight loss. I always felt like I weighed way too much. I decided to start dieting. I started eating healthier foods. I also reduced my drinking habits. After a month, I lost five pounds.
Trip. Ned was going on a camping trip. He rented a camper. The trip was very relaxing. Then they went to the beach. Ned had a great time.
Swimming. Tina was bored. She decided to join the lake. She brought her swimsuit and towel. She then put on her bathing suit. Then she swam in the water and had a great time.
Pregnant. Molly wanted to become a mom. She wanted a baby. She decided to get pregnant. She had a blast. Molly is pregnant and a mom.

Summer Reading. My friend Beth works at the summer camp. One day she was sitting in the cafeteria with a group of teens. They were talking and making signs. One kid made a sign about being a summer Reading Champion. Beth said that the person who made the sign was her ex-boss.

Job. Mandy always wanted to be a doctor. She went to college to study medicine. After college she went to medical school and started her job. She practiced medicine for years. Mandy was finally a doctor.

Green Grass. I was driving to work one day. I drove down the highway and saw a large green grass patch. I stopped my car to check it out. I decided to cut down the grass. This helped me get to work on time.
The Tattoo. Lily wanted a tattoo. She wanted one for her leg. Her mom decided to get her one. When Lily got the tattoo it was very painful. Lily had to go to the nurse and get it fixed.

A Bounty of Soda. Joey loves to make sure his house is clean. He would often clean up the house and clean it again. He noticed the soda machine was broken. He took it to a repairman to get it fixed. The repairman fixed the machine and Joey was happy.

I'm a Bad Goalie. In my younger days I was bad at basketball. My coach took me to tryouts and I thought I was going to be the team's goalie. I kept asking him about how to kick the ball in. The coach asked me to get back into the game and he started coaching me. I was embarrassed and went home for being a bad goalie.
Suspension. Tom was riding in a car with friends. He was going really fast. He was thrown off of the car. It was too late for him. Tom had to get his leg broken in several places.
Cops. My friends invited me over to watch a movie. It was very scary. The cops came in and they saw my face. They said I had no idea I was so young. So I left immediately.

Ramen. Nina wanted to make ramen for dinner. She got all the ingredients ready. Then she thought of a cool idea. She put in some veggies and made a huge pot. After she added all the veggies, she made her famous delicious soup!

Loose Cage. Tiffany was walking in the woods with her dog. They walked for a while when a loose dog tried to chase her. Tiffany tried to chase it but it kept chasing. Finally, the dog was able to get close to Tiffany. The dog let go of her.
Bike Race. Tina wanted to bike. She had never done it before. Tina asked her friend to go with her. Her friend agreed. They raced the fastest bike race ever.

The New Drink. Tom wanted to improve his morning coffee. He looked at the ingredients in his cupboard. He decided to get some new coffee. He tried a few at work. He loved the new flavor and felt much better.
Hunter. Jack was a great hunter. He had many hunting gear and trophies. He was going to enter his hunting competition. He prepared and prepared all day. Jack won the competition and won a trophy.

Angel at Work. Angel was a manager for a department store. Angel had a bad day at work. Angel decided she would take a break from her job. She went home and read for hours. Angel felt much better at her work now that she was home.

The Game. The man had his hand on the football. He tried to throw it as hard as he could. The ball went through his hands and flew into the ocean. The man looked back and was disappointed. The ball had rolled into the ocean.

Problem Solver. Amy and Beth were struggling with math. Their teacher asked them to do the homework together. Amy did not want to go with Beth. She wanted her teacher to help her. Her teacher signed her up for a tutor to help.

Sara's New Friend. Sara had recently moved into her first apartment. One day Sara found a stray dog in her yard. After taking the dog for a walk, Sara decided she was ready to adopt him. Sara adopted the dog and took it home. Now, Sara has a new pet cat and a new friend in her apartment.

Wedding Day. Jane and Dan went to the wedding. They danced all night. When the wedding day came, they realized it was an evening. They walked back home and cried. They were glad they weren't married that day.
Car Wash. Ava had been driving to work. She noticed the car was filthy. She took it to the car wash. She let the car wash. She was able to have the car wash without any issues.

First Day of School. Bella walked across the hall and walked toward the front door. She was waiting for the bus. The bus was coming to her stop. Bella sat at the stop waiting for the bus. The bus arrived and Bella got off the bus.

Wish. I loved to dance and play sports. The problem was my grandmother thought I was a little weird. She had to take me shopping and took me to a dance shop. I practiced dance moves, while she watched me dance. When I returned home, she made a wish and made me dance again.

Sleepover. A friend of mine invited me to sleepover. I told her that I wanted to. The next day, I met up with the friend at the park. We had lunch and watched movies for an hour. Now, I'm in the same class with her!
Pilates. The man was out running. He lost his pace. He ended up running slower than before. He had to use pilates. He never ran faster again.

The Canal. Lori went to the canal with her cousins. They were going to walk back to the house. Lori tripped on the grass. She had to crawl on the pavement to get back to the car. She was embarrassed about her bumpy walk.

Test. The test was postponed due to a snowstorm. The students were worried about the test. The teacher postponed the test due to the snowstorm. The students were relieved when they got to school. When the test was over, they were able to study.
Shut Down. Tim was late for work. He had to shut the car down. He called in sick to work. Tim was upset about it. Tim was never late again.

Need A Ride. I was going to get an Uber from the garage. I drove my car to the garage to get my keys. My car started to move. I looked out my window. There was a homeless man who had run out the door.

The Girl Scout. Benny liked girls scout cookies and decided to go to the store. He bought a lot of girls scout cookies in a new jar to help with money. He made a nice dinner for himself with cookies and candy and sodas. The girls scout girl scout cookie jar was very full, so he made more. Benny was thrilled to get to work with this little girl scout cookie jar.
Bought new sheets. Kelly needed a new bed sheet. She shopped around for a while but couldn't find anything. Then she decided to go to bed with new sheets. They were perfect! Kelly slept very well!

The Haircut. Mitch was feeling lonely. He was not sure what to do. Then, he asked a friend about cutting his hair. The friend suggested shaving it to make Mitch feel better. Mitch cut his hair and was happy with his look!

Marco's Big Goal. Marco was playing on the soccer team. He was a very good player, but he didn't know how to score. The coach was looking to get someone to score more goals. Marco wanted to get one more goal and get to play more. Marco's teammate gave him the ball and Marco scored the goal.

The Glass Bottle. Lucy had to buy a glass bottle for her new boyfriend's birthday. She went to the store and found a nice bottle. The bottle was for her boyfriend but it was for her brother. Lucy went home and opened the bottle and got scared. She decided to keep it for her brother.

Weird Channel. Jim didn't like playing the Xbox. He spent hours sitting at the controller and playing. One day, he found a weird channel. The channel played many bad videos. It took him forever to stop playing the Xbox.

Trash. I went to a garage sale to find a few items. I saw some of the items I wanted. I found some stuff I thought was great. Then I put my things in a pile. My mother told me to get rid of the stuff.

Shiny Red. Tom was a very picky eater. He loved certain things like mint. He was walking home from work one day when he saw something shiny. It was a shiny red ball of yarn. He wanted to wear the ball of yarn to any occasion.
One shot. Kelly was going for a long time. She had a long shot at the last second. She ran as fast as she could to get it. Unfortunately she missed. She was sad.

The Abandoned Car. Molly had an old car. One night she heard some strange noises. She checked the car and found some wires were stuck. Molly went to the garage and unplugged the wires. She felt more comfortable at home.

Competition. I went to an outdoor market yesterday. I saw a lot of interesting items. I tried on different items. I picked up a big box of cans. I brought the cans home and put them in the recycling bin.

Louis and the computer. Louis wanted a new computer but his older one was breaking. He decided he would ask his older brother for one. When his brother offered, Louis accepted the offer. His brother showed up at Louis's house and told him he couldn't afford a computer. Louis decided he didn't want to have a computer.

High School Football. I used to love football. My favorite team was the one I loved the most. I played football during my senior year of high school. My team was undefeated and we won the championship. The whole town clapped when we won!

The Play's the Thing. The kids were waiting at the park for the play. The teacher announced that there would be a play to watch. All the kids got together at the park and went to play. The teacher announced that the play was postponed due to rain. After the play was over, the class waited out the rain.

Painted House. I painted the walls of my house yesterday. I painted a bunch of colors. I put the colors on the floor and put them in the paint box. I am going to hang some photos on the walls. It will look a lot better when I show it off.

Happy Birthday. Randy was playing the new game on his phone. His family celebrated his birthday by eating cake. Afterwards, they took a walk around the block. Then they played some more games on their phones. Randy was very happy.

Quinn and Rowen at Recess. Quinn and Rowen are best friends and they go to the park everyday. One day they decide to play hide and go seek at the park. They hide behind the trees and the barker searches around for them. In the woods they find both of their friends hiding. Quinn and Rowen are very happy they played hide and seek at the park.
The New Dog. I was walking through a store. I saw a dog walking around the store. I went to pet the dog. He jumped up on my hand. He immediately barked at me.
Hot and sticky room. Tim was walking around the house. His hands started to hurt. He tried to stop them. Unfortunately it didn't help. Tim got in trouble at school.

The Fly. Cory's teacher told him not to play outside. Instead, he was given a fly to play with. He caught the fly and brought it inside. His teacher smiled at him for doing such a good thing. He went to play inside his house more often.
New job. Kia had just graduated high school. She had applied to many jobs. She was accepted to a part-time position. She was happy. She now had a job to support her family.
Rick is hurt. Rick was playing football. His team was tied and the game was almost over. The team was tied with only seconds remaining. Rick's team had the ball. Rick threw the ball over the catch.

A Friend's Thanksgiving. A family from Ohio had just recently moved to America. They didn't know any of the local families. They were invited to visit a family from a different state. They met up at the Thanksgiving restaurant and had a great time. They were glad that they decided to make Thanksgiving a family affair.

Treat. Sue's family wanted to go to the carnival. Sue asked her mother to go with her. Her mother drove them to the carnival. They found a teddy bear in the middle of the carnival. Sue's mother bought her a teddy bear as a gift.
Olivia. Olivia was going to be a teacher. Her school was having an assembly at school. Olivia did not know what to expect. She got in line for a test. Olivia did not pass the test.

Apple Pie. Sandra was a famous baker. She baked her first pie. It was a chocolate apple pie with whipped cream on top. Her family was enamored with the delicious treat. Sandra was happy to be sharing her first pie with her family.
Motorcycle Accident. John went to ride his motorcycle. It started to rain. John got hit by a car. His motorcycle got wrecked. John had to get it fixed.

Car. My car broke down on the way home from work. I got home from work and called my friend and he went out to fix it. We headed back home and he came back with an estimate. He asked for a lot of money and i refused. He said his car is totaled and had to be towed to the shop.

First Time Shaving. I used to always shave my legs before going to the barber. I would often shave until the hair was very long. One night I noticed I couldn't hold my hand very long. I didn't know what was going on so I shaved myself quickly. Now when I shave I always hold my hand very short.

Registry Wit. We found an old man who was a registered voter. He has three sons who were 13 and 17 years old. We sat on his porch as they talked to him. He showed them his voter registration card. We told him we were proud of him for being honest.

All Work, No Play. My daughter and her friends had a soccer game on Saturday. It was an intense game and they had a lot of goals. One of the goals was for a goal against our neighbor's dog. Our dog was outside playing and ran in front of the ball. She hit the ball and had to go the ground.
Too Drunk. Dan was out with friends on a date. He was drunk and passed out. He had an amazing time. When he woke up the next morning he realized he was sober. He realized he was never sober again.

Winning. Gina needed to buy some lottery tickets to play the drawing. She had never won, and it was time to win. She took her money to the gas station, hoping to win. The gas station manager told her she had won a prize of $50. Gina was happy with this, and she had won $50.
Movie Night. The movie was really popular. I wanted to see it. I found some friends to go with me. They decided to go together. It was the best movie they'd ever seen.

Bicycle Accident. When I was young I rode my bicycle down my driveway to school. One day my bike fell down a crack and scraped my knees. I got my bike out of the driveway and went back home. When I got home I realized I left the bike on the driveway and forgot about it. A few hours later the bike was found by the garage clerk.

The Pianist. Julie was a pianist who loved to write and play songs. She had written many, many songs. Julie had recently had a baby boy. She couldn't play the piano anymore and had to switch to the pianist. Julie now writes the piano and loves it.

Speak To His Mom. My cousin brought a lot of books to school. My mom asked for us to talk to the librarian for a few minutes. I refused, since I was already out at the end of the day. However, the librarian listened to what I told him. Then she told me to go back inside and leave my books on the table.

The Birthday Party. Molly and Joe had a birthday party to attend. Molly invited all her friends to her house. She also invited her friends from work. Molly and Joe also bought gifts for all the guests. Molly was happy when her friend's birthday party was over.

A Crazy Sandwich. My wife makes the best peanut butter sandwich. Last week she took her favorite pepperoni to work. She made a peanut butter and jelly sandwich. I told her it was way too salty. She said she could make me the peanut butter and jelly sandwich next time.
Pancake Time. My roommate loves pancakes. One day he was out for a few days. I decided to have pancakes with milk. He agreed to eat one. I then made sure that he did not eat the other.

The Basketball Showdown. A big game was happening and Jon was excited. He would be watching the big game with his friends. Jon knew he would do his best to make sure he got to watch. The team had a good game but Jon was excited to watch. Jon was glad he was excited.

The Bucket. Miles found a big bucket on the ground. He picked it up and saw a broken bottle of pills inside. Miles went to the store and bought the pills. He took them back home. He put the pills into his bowl to drink.

Floating down the river. Yesterday my cousin and I went down to the river. We were walking around the lake when it started to rain. The river was so deep that it kept freezing water in it. We decided to stay on the shore until the water stopped. After that we were able to walk along the shore without going down.
Alan's Eulogy. Alan went to his funeral. It was with his family. At the funeral he told them a very sad story. After he was done with it, they clapped. Alan had a great time at his funeral.

Credit Card Debt. Jim went shopping at the mall one day. He used the money he spent on a credit card. Jim took a credit card to buy a house and then had his credit card debt pay. Jim paid off his credit card debt. He was able to purchase a house.

Trip to the beach. I decided to go to the beach. When I got there I realized that there was a hurricane outside. My car started to rain and the beach was closed. I had to walk all the way back to the car. I got soaked and had to take a lot of pictures.

Ralph's Dog. Ralph's dad found a stray dog in the park. He brought it home and gave it a bath and food. The dog loved it and played with Ralph every day. His dad said that his dog was very special. Ralph's dad gave the dog to Ralph's new best friend.

Hiking up Hawksbill Crag. Barry was hiking through the woods with his girlfriend. His girlfriend loved the view. As they hiked up the mountain, they encountered many wild birds. Barry noticed a bird that started chasing the couple. He pulled up to the bird and the couple turned around.

The Playground. Tommy liked to play at the playground. He would take turns kicking the ball. Tommy and his friends loved playing the same game. They would sometimes play with each other in the street. They had a lot of fun.
Lawyer or prosecutor. Kia had a friend named Bob. Bob was a prosecutor. He did not like his client. Kia had no idea what to do with Bob. So she asked him to run away.

Food Truck. We had a very large food truck downtown. The food truck was in the same building for several years. One day the truck broke down. We called the police and they came quickly. The truck is fixed and we are now looking forward to returning.

First kiss. Sam was excited to be in high school. She decided she was going to ask her best friend. They went to the new school and went to the bar. They had a lot of fun. They planned to see one another in their next year.

Cruise. Tom was on a cruise. He had to stay on the boat in a cabin. He made it to a cabin and it was full of beautiful scenery. He fell asleep in the cabin and woke up on the floor. Tom never made it to the next morning.

Baby Bottle. I woke up in the middle of the night with a baby bottle in hand. I opened it and found out that my brother had taken it. We started getting worried because I could not sleep at night. I asked him where it was. He told me that he had gotten it from my sister.

The Big Test. Gina was taking a math test at school. She was worried the answers wouldn't be correct. She was convinced that she was doing a bad job. She kept a pen with her. As she looked up the answer, she realized it was correct.

The Dog Bowl. The dogs dug a big hole. They had brought a huge dog bowl to play in. They filled it with water and food. The dog bowl was so full that they had to go and retrieve it. The dog bowl became a big part of the family!

Peach Ice Cream. My friend's mom made peach ice cream. We decided to have it in a peach cone. Everyone thought it was disgusting. One person was surprised to see it at a school party. Everyone laughed and thanked the lady.
Strange massage. Tom had been working on a massage. He hadn't been using his hand. He accidentally bumped his friend's hand. His friend felt uncomfortable. He didn't massage Tom anymore.

Four Minutes. We had to walk four minutes to the store to get supplies. It took us three minutes to get to the store. The store was packed. The line was very long. We finally got to the store in one minute.
Horror Film. Tom was scared at a Halloween party. His friend dared him to go see a scary movie. Tom said yes. They went to the cinema and sat down to watch the movie. Tom had an amazing time.

Old Jeans. Tom hated his old jeans. So he decided to spend a lot of time washing them. Unfortunately he did not have any clothes to wear to school. So he was very sweaty and tired from washing his clothes. Tom decided to wear his old jeans to school.

Eggplant. My mom told me I had to put an eggplant in the oven. I had never done it before, so I was nervous. After a few minutes, the eggplant was completely cooked. Then, it was beautiful and juicy. It was delicious!

The Rescue. Sandy was on her way home from work. She was walking along the side of the road when she saw a woman. Sandy approached the woman and asked what happened. The woman said she was being towed to a rescue. Sandy was relieved that the woman was ok.

The Divorce. Devin was married for 12 Years. He and his wife got divorced and he filed for divorce. He went to court and got an eviction notice. He was forced to get a part time job. Devin was now unemployed.

Finally Alone. Tina and her friends were alone at the park. They were bored, so Tina offered them soda. It was their turn to pick their own drinks. Tina was the one who didn't want to pick out her soda. She was sad when she chose a soda she didn't like.

Put on Your Pants. My daughter went to the park on Sunday. She was playing in the grass with some friends. One of her friends got a bit too dirty to play. The next day, I had to wear her pants to play in the grass. The day after that, my daughter always wore her favorite pants to the park.

The Science Experiment. Dawn always wanted to be a scientist. Dawn always dreamed about building a glass bowl. Dawn worked all summer making the bowl. Dawn ate the bowl one day. Dawn now owns his own glass bowl.

Cass. Cass was a very poor man who didn't have much money. One day he decided to rob a store. He tried to sneak a gun in and got caught. Cass decided to run to the bathroom and tell his mom. Cass was caught and taken to jail.

Tina's Dinner. Tina was having dinner with friends. They were planning on eating at a local restaurant. Tina's friend decided to try to buy a couple of the dishes. Tina bought a large cake with two different cheeseburgers. Her friend ate the cake but had a bad stomachache.
Car. Jim wanted to buy a new car. He found a lot for sale. He decided to get one. When he bought the car, he liked it. He wanted to buy another.

The Irritating Neighbor. Jenny had a new neighbor. They played lots of games. The neighbor was a jerk and Jenny was constantly having fun. Jenny tried to call her mother but the mother wouldn't respond. Jenny was angry about it and she went to her neighbor's house.

Camel Ride. Anna went on a camel ride. She got on the camel and the camel started to charge at her. Anna panicked and rolled her eyes at the beast. The camel kept coming at her. Anna ran off and got away safely.

Horace Eats Donuts. Horace had a craving for a delicious breakfast snack. He found a can of donuts that looked just like normal donuts. After thinking about what he wanted, Horace decided on the donuts. Horace ate the donuts as he ate the rest of his breakfast. Now Horace is ready for his next breakfast.

Early Breakfast. Jasper woke up in the middle of the night for school. He was eager to eat breakfast before school started. He called his parents for an hour before starting school. After an hour, Jasper still hadn't finished his breakfast. His parents picked him up for a ride to school.

Getting the last ipad. Jasper wanted the iPhone. He was impatient to get the last one. He spent a lot of money on it. Then he tried to wait for it to arrive. When it finally arrived Jasper was elated.

Brought Lunch. Kathy went to the grocery store to buy some food for school. She needed to buy some milk, so she brought some. Kathy didn't remember she brought the milk, so she walked back to the store. She tried to get some milk but the shelf was empty. Kathy went back to the store to get another milk, so she brought the rest.

The catch. Nancy was out on a fishing trip with her father. Nancy felt a tug on her line. She got a fish hook and put it up to the hook. Nancy cast her line and it hooked up well! Nancy reeled in her catch and got her dinner!

Sober. Eli went to the bar to drink. He was drunk and began to dance. Eli started to flirt with a girl from the bar. The girl became uncomfortable and left the bar. Eli went home and felt worse than before.

The restaurant. We decided to go to a new restaurant. We arrived and took a seat in the restaurant. The waitresses took orders and waited. They asked us some questions and gave us our orders. We left the restaurant and went home.
Hat. Kate wanted a hat for school. She did not have enough money for one. She went to the store and asked for a hat. She found one she liked. She bought it and it was perfect.
The snakebite. Molly was walking through the woods. She noticed a huge rattlesnake. She didn't want to kill it, so she stayed. Then she saw how it was hurt. She had bitten him on the arm.

Birds. Anna lived in the woods. She had always dreamed of hiking with her friends. She thought she would be able to find birds on the trail. Anna realized she would have to wait in the woods a lot longer. She decided to go hiking alone.
Teeth whitening fail. I had an amazing smile when i was a teenager. I had really good teeth. When i was a teenager my tooth whitening was horrible. It tasted awful. I had to have them whitened.
Going to the Zoo. My friends and I went to the zoo. We got a big balloon. We then started to ride it. We also went on rides. We had a great time.
New Camera App. My family bought me a camera. It was waterproof. I could keep the lens cap off. One day I tried to snap a photo without the cap off. It snapped, but the photo was still on the screen.
New dress. Tina wanted a new dress. She looked at lots of different stores. She finally found one that was perfect. When she picked it up, she loved it. She wore it to school and loved it.
Wrong Number. Tom was at a party with friends. He was trying to find a date. Unfortunately it was a different person. Tom didn't realize the person was a different guy. He wound up asking the girl.
Mean Dog. Tom was at his friend's house. He didn't like his roommate. He called Tom's friend over. The other friend noticed Tom. Tom got his roommate kicked out and gave his money back.

The Tower. Tina loved gazing out the window and watching the sky. The tower was her favorite part of the house. One day the tower caught on fire and Tina had to get out. The fire department arrived and put out the fire. Tina was thankful and happy that the tower wasn't damaged.

Fish Tales. My family likes to eat fish. We have the usual type of fish we buy. We have all types of fish. My family bought the biggest fish I have ever seen. When we were eating I had never seen such a fish!

Newspaper. The mailman came to my door today. He was carrying a huge paper bag with a big red paper. I picked up the paper and it fell and fell down. I picked it up with some tape. I put the paper in my mailbox and threw the tape away.

Driving to the beach. Lucy wanted to drive to the beach. So she got her car and went. She stopped at a gas station. She picked up some snacks and sat down. The beach was beautiful and the sun was so high she smiled.

The Apple Orchard. Sam decided to plant an apple orchard in the backyard. He planted his favorite seeds and waited for them to sprout. When they finally sprouted, Sam watched them all grow. Sam bought an all-natural fertilizer to ensure they would thrive. Sam was happy to see the big fruit begin to grow.

David forgets about the sandwich. David wanted to get something to eat for breakfast. He put the sandwich in his pocket and went to get something else. The bread was not wet so he threw the sandwich away. After that he got to work on his sandwich. He finished his sandwich and ate breakfast.

Bad grades. Sally was failing her math class. She kept doing it over and over again. She talked to her teacher about it. They discussed it with Sally's teacher. She promised to keep an eye on the grades next time.

The Show. The radio stations wanted to make a play for the county fair. They gathered their equipment and tried to figure out what they wanted. They all got together at a local park. They had to make their own song, but they did it anyway. The radio stations were happy to be playing at the county fair.
Beach. Today, I went to the beach. I laid down on the sand to enjoy the water. I looked in the water. I played a game of volleyball. I went home exhausted after playing.

Bad Tooth. Lilly has a bad toothache. The dentist told her she needs to stop chewing. Lilly is starting to pick her tooth less. She knows she will miss a lot of money with the extra money. Lilly finds a dentist appointment before she leaves.
Day Off. Tom was getting ready for work. He decided to take a day off to work. After going to the store he got his supplies ready. Unfortunately he forgot to pack his lunch. Tom didn't get a break.

Making Out at the Movies. It was the weekend and I was at the movies. My friends and I went to the comedy section of the theater. We were having a good time. We all decided to get some ice cream. When I left I went back to my friends and told them I'd come back.

Charlie Helps Paint. Charlie had always wanted to learn to paint. He decided to go to a local art gallery. Charlie bought a few pieces of canvas and canvas paints. Charlie worked hard all day long painting some great paintings. Charlie received an honorable mention in the painting class.

Black and white party. Kelly was having a party for her new baby. She was having a black and white party. She had all her guests dress up in their favorite colors. Everyone had a great time. Unfortunately they all got in trouble.

Unhappy about the gift. I got a new tv for my birthday. But it was too small and the room on top was full. I decided to have a friend put it on top of my TV. So I had the tv on top of my TV all day. After that, I did not need to complain to the TV store anymore.

The Gay Sister. James had a little sister named May. James was very embarrassed by his sister. His mom made his sister wear a dress so James could look nice. James's sister liked the dress and looked very pleased. James was happy that his sister was so proud of him.

Water. Lenny had a really thirsty. He decided to drink some water from his cooler. He went to get some water and realized he needed more. When he got home, he was thirsty again. He decided to go to the store and get more water.

Visit. My uncle has been visiting me this week. He has been going to visit all of my friends. They have a lot of fun playing video games. He is also going to a restaurant and eating with them. I am so glad he came.

Back to School. Today was the last day of school. The school had a sale on supplies. My mom bought me a pair of slippers. I was very happy with my new slippers. I was going to wear them every day from now on.

Late Night TV. It was the last day of school, and Timmy loved his class. He wanted to watch a movie, but the movie was so late. He stayed up all night to study. When it was time to go to sleep, Timmy was so tired. He fell asleep in the living room on the couch watching the movie.
iPhone reveal. Yesterday I got a new iPhone. I was excited to see it. When I got the gift I was elated. Unfortunately it was not the iPhone I wanted. I returned it and the Apple Store was so mad.

Thrones. My sister in law's sister has diabetes. The sister lives in California. My sister in law took her to a TV show about diabetes. She hated the subject and told me she would skip the episodes. The sister said she would make up a excuse for missing her show.

The Brave Fireman. Tom was on his way to work one morning. He noticed an odd shape in the road. It was an old woman lying on the road. Tom walked past and asked her what was going on. She told him the man she had died in was her husband's brother.
Met at a Bar. The man met a girl at a bar. They hit it off really well. He proposed to her. She said yes. They planned on married!

Shirtless. Tina wanted to become a better driver. She decided to cut down on her driver's license. She decided she needed to shave all the skin off her legs. So she went to the barber to shave them. She is much less careful with her driving.

Big Change. James was trying to find money to go shopping. His bills were piling up and he felt overwhelmed. James then found a way to make some extra money. James decided to make some money and bought a lottery ticket. James won the jackpot and made a nice new extra money.
glasses. Tom was taking his eye exam. Tom had trouble seeing. He looked over the glasses to see the lens. Tom saw a bright flash of light. He turned on the glasses to see.
