Team Morale. We had an active team. We had to play in the final game. The other team won. We didn't want to go back there. We stayed home.

A Bad Cut. My mother cut the grass on our lawn. After she was done, the lawn had no grass growing on it. She took out a few pieces of cardboard and put it on the grass. I was able to grow several inches tall. I put the piece of cardboard back in the box and went inside.

The Bad Hair Cut. Tom hated his new hairstyle. He had long hair and he decided to get a haircut. He went to a local barber for the haircut. After the haircut he was shocked. Tom's hair was very short and unruly.

Santa Claus. Sam thought Santa Claus was really nice. One morning he awoke to see all his friends asleep. He crept downstairs slowly to the house. His mom was waiting for him outside of the house. He took her inside.

Cabin Fever. I had an extremely large family. The kids were playing in a very large home. They kept knocking over everything everywhere. Their mother had a plan to move them out of the house. It took them six months to move in.
Cold Pizza. Sara was hungry. She wanted pizza. She went to the pizza shop and ordered one. When it came she put it on the table. She ate it quickly.

Eggs. My husband and I wanted to make oatmeal for breakfast. We went to a grocery store and bought all the ingredients. Then we bought all the eggs, milk and a recipe. We mixed all the ingredients in a big bowl and began cooking. We found the recipe and we made oatmeal and eggs.

Clancy Makes Toast. Clancy decided to make toast for her friends. She got all the ingredients out of the cabinet. Clancy then poured the milk into a big mug. Clancy then put the hot wax in the bread. Clancy's friends complimented her delicious toast.
Jumping. Tina didn't feel like jumping for a while. She wanted to be more active. Then she decided to take up yoga. It was hard work but she felt better. Tina felt more like jumping again.

Peppermint Bark. Lily decided to make herself a delicious mint bark. She poured the ingredients in a container. Then she added water, peppermint powder, and cinnamon sugar. She mixed the ingredients in a bowl and let it sit for a minute. Then she poured the bowl and added the cinnamon sugar.

Hospital Visit. Jill had been sick all week. Her mom and dad told her she was going to the hospital. They were taking care of Jill as best as they could. They drove to the hospital, and there, Jill was able to see her doctor. After the visit, she was diagnosed with the flu.

Miniature Dining Room. Jenny wanted to be a model dancer. She practiced every day, and finally became a model. After school, she got the chance to audition for a dance company. The day of the audition, Jenny was nervous, but prepared. She got the job - as the lead dancer!

The Snow. A storm hit while Ben was out driving. The snow turned to a stormy blizzard. Ben couldn't drive and was stuck in his snow truck. He began to shovel and shovel. He made it to his truck just in time to help the snow.

Nathan. Nathan had a crush on a girl. He had a crush on her for many years. When he finally met the girl, he found out she was a girl. He learned to cry when they met. He moved on with his life as if he had never met the girl.

Door Slamming. It was so hot, the air conditioning had to be shut off. I couldn't believe it. When the door slammed, it was so loud. The fan started screaming. It's now cooler, but still hot.

Reading. Lori had been assigned to read a children's story. It was so scary! Lori was afraid she would cry. But she got a lot of candy and candy gummy bears. She still had nightmares about the story.

Illegal Street Vendor. There was a street vendor walking around downtown. He was selling things that no one should buy. It was a hot summer and the vendors were hot. All of the vendors were on the sidewalk. The vendors were banned from downtown.

Strong Beer. I got home from work one night to a terrible smell. I looked inside my home, but there was no beer. I searched everywhere, but I found nothing. I looked in the kitchen cabinets, but it was empty. I found the beer fridge, and I got the beer.

Basketball Tryout. Cathy had a basketball tryout today. Cathy had never played basketball before. Cathy practiced every day at the gym. Cathy went to the gym and tried out. Cathy was excited to see that she had made the team.

Stuffed. It was time for the first day of high school. Jed was the first student to go to school, he was excited. He got to be first to ride a school bus, they were all crowded. Then he got to walk in the cafeteria. He was going to have a great time and couldn't wait to return.

Salt in the pepper shaker. Julian was making tacos for lunch. He got the ingredients out of the pantry. He got the salt shaker and started mixing the ingredients together. He added the spices to the taco shells and put them in the dishwasher. He finished the tacos and left for lunch.

Firing employees. Cameron was a great employee. He worked hard and did not want to quit. His boss was very strict and the next time he fired him. Cameron decided he would give up. He found another job but was disappointed.

New shoes. Sam's favorite brand of shoes were on clearance. They only had twenty dollars in his account. Sam didn't need the extra money. He went to a local shoe store and purchased a new pair. Sam now was able to afford new shoes.

Falling at the rink. Jasmine was out on the water with her friends. The girls were drinking and talking. Jasmine started to slide. She started to fall out of the water. Jasmine broke her arm and had to go to the hospital.

Beanie Babies. My girlfriend had a new baby boy. She decided to buy me one. I decided to play with the baby in his box of beanie babies. It turned out that the baby was actually cute. We ended up having fun playing with the baby.

Random. I saw a girl and her sister yesterday. They were sitting together in the park. There were kids running around. I started walking towards them. I ended up falling.

Try. Cathy was very nervous to be a bridesmaid. Her hair was so long that the best she could find was a ponytail. Cathy was going to walk across the room bare. Spicy Food. I love spicy food. However, there is a problem with spicy food. My kids really hate it. I tried to make them eat it. I ended up with a big bowl of rice.

Trash. The yard was covered in trash. There were bags full of trash everywhere. We found some cans and bags full of garbage. We found a few small pieces of garbage as well. We ended up getting two bags full.

music with sticks. Fred was in the car with his friends. He needed some music to listen to. They all tried different songs. But when they got tired of it, they couldn't play anymore. Fred was so bored he didn't even play any more music.

The Belt. Tim got new pants. They were very nice. He thought he was cool in them. He wore them to a big party. Tim had no problem finding himself in the crowd.

Messy Hair. Katie loved a girl named Tina, but Tina made a habit of messy hair. Katie was told Tina would never be allowed to have messy hair. Tina knew she was in trouble. Tina kept being so messy and Katie decided to take her to the salon. Katie left feeling guilty about her mother's advice.

Scared. My brother in law was born with a genetic disorder. He was given medication for his condition. In the months following the medication he had trouble sleeping. The medication also made him very tired. I had to go to the doctor for medication.

Easter Egg Hunt. I went to the local Easter egg hunt. I found a lot of eggs, but no prize. I didn't want to give up and get a prize. Eventually I found a prize. It was the winner of a free trip to a Disney resort.

College. Mary had just finished college, and was applying for a job. Her teacher asked if she had any extra time to study. Mary studied as hard as she could. Mary finally finished and applied for the job. Mary was accepted for the job.

Live in Person. A man invited me to watch a football game in person. I accepted the invitation. The man wanted to play his favorite team. I was excited to see them play, so I took pictures. I had a great time in person.

Thud. Jim heard a rumble in the bathroom stall. He turned the light on to check what the sound was. The stall had a thud. The thud was coming from his wife! His wife had knocked the thud out of the shower.

Logan's Mistake. Logan and Tom were best friends. They loved to play video games together. One day Logan accidentally left Tom's house. Tom's house was damaged and Logan got arrested. Tom was never able to play video games again.

The Baby's Toy. The little baby was excited about his new toy. It was a new puppy. It was pink and purple. He played with the puppy all day and night. The little puppy got so used to playing with his new toy.

Safe. Gina had lost her purse and was upset. She'd left it outside by the dumpster when she got home. Her sister helped her get her things back. The next day Gina found a new purse at the store. Her sister had let it slip out of her pockets!
Pee Break. I had a really bad cold. I needed to take a hot shower, but couldn't. My roommate helped me take the shower. We sat outside and drank our tea. When I was done, I didn't feel so bad.

Potato. We had an old potato on our farm. My brother and I would use it everyday to chew on. One day my brother broke the potato by throwing it. It was destroyed. We went out to get the next one and get it.

Drag Racing. Dan was a terrible drag racer. He always lost and was always late to work. One day he was pulled over. Dan had been late for work and it was in front of his wife. Dan got an award for being late to work.

Freeway Speed. I used to drive on the highway. I was going 100 miles per hour in the 80s. I was so close I was in the middle of a curve. I went on a highway exit to try to change my mind. I had to drive my car down the ramp to get home.

Kicked out. Rachael was at the bar with friends. They had a really good time until they got too drunk. Rachael got into a fight with a stranger. The girl called the cops and cops picked her up. Rachael had to go home.
The backup singer. My favorite singer was in concert one night. I was so excited that I started singing. He started to cry. I tried to cheer him up. I couldn't, he cried the entire time.

Dumping for someone else. I met the boy who I liked on a dating app. We spent the next few days together for a few months. I felt a sudden sense of need for a new boyfriend. I decided to end the relationship with the man I liked. The next day I dumped him and I have a new boyfriend.

Meet The Manager. The girl sat down at the coffee shop. She was waiting on a man with a large cane. The woman was walking by the girl, and offered to stop. The girl declined, but she didn't want to disappoint the man. She decided to accept her apology and walk out of the coffee shop.
Business. I started my own business. It took me three months to get everything started. I had to learn how to sell ads. Finally I had a month of business. My business started with the help of my son.

Ice Skating. Joey took his parents ice skating last Saturday. He did a really nice job on his back. His parents told him that they had to go get ice cream. Joey didn't care. He decided to go to the store and buy ice cream.

Doing the Dishes. Toby had the house chores to do. He got to the kitchen. Then, he went to the bathroom. Finally, he went to work. Toby finished doing his chores and went home.
Tea. Tom bought a new tea kettle. It cost $50. He decided to use that money for some good tea. He brewed a pot of tea. He added the pot of tea to his tea kettle.

Claire and John. Claire and John have been married for a few years. When John gets married he wants to be a father. John makes a vow to raise Claire and they become great parents. Now they are married to each other and raise a beautiful family. Their love for each other is unmatched.

Reading the diary. Bobby always loved to read. One day he had an idea to share it with a friend. He wrote down a short story about a boy who loved to read. The boy told his mother and he began to read it aloud. Now Bobby can read all of his books!

Peppers. Nathan went to the store to buy some peppers. He couldn't find a good deal so he bought cheap. Nathan went home and ate the beans. He went back to the store and bought more. Nathan ate the beans again and found another great deal!

Charm bracelet. Anna's favorite bracelet was missing. She looked everywhere for it. Then she heard a noise. She went outside and looked everywhere. She was finally able to find her bracelet in the kitchen.

Makeup Artist. I wanted to be an artist but never thought I could. My friend taught me the value of practicing makeup. I practiced for months on my own makeup brushes. I got my first professional job with my art class. Now, I am a professional makeup artist.
Pigs. Chet was a great hunter. He wanted to go hunting. He gathered his rifle and shot a rifle at a big animal. The animal bit him. He stopped hunting so he didn't have to get stitches.

Pencils. I needed to go to the grocery store but I didn't have pencils. I was very upset that I couldn't borrow one. I decided to make a pencils list and then walked to the store. When I got there, I looked at the list. I found the ones I needed and bought them.

Bob Nearly Gets a Ticket. The police officer stopped Bob and gave him a ticket. Bob paid the ticket as fast as he could. Bob ran from the police officer and out of the parking lot. Bob got into a car accident while speeding. The police officer gave him a warning.

attention. Tom went to a football game. He had never been to one before. He was excited to go because he had never been to one. He was able to find a place where he could sit and watch the game. Tom was pleased to have a good experience.

Shopping at Target. Kim bought new clothes at Target for a couple of dollars. She was excited to try on some new clothes. She went to Target to shop for the clothes she liked. When she walked into the store Kim was excited. Kim bought all the new clothes she liked.

Reading. Jim wanted to get in better shape. He had been overweight for a few Year's. Jim decided to start doing better. Jim started to exercise more. After a few months he had lost twenty pounds!

project. I was very tired from work. My computer was sluggish. I had to take a short break from work. I sat down and worked on my laptop. The computer made great progress after two weeks.

City. I met up with some friends from work. I realized I hadn't made plans for the weekend. We spent the day hanging out. We then went to the city for a fun day. I couldn't wait to go back.

Christmas shopping. The Christmas was coming fast and I didn't have much time left. So I made a list of what to get. I got everything I needed on the list and packed everything up. The last thing I did was get my car so I can work on the list. By Christmas I had everything I needed on my list.
unrealistic. The man asked for money. His wife told him to put his life savings. He did not want to. His wife gave him some. He used it.

Games. The other day I was playing video games. I had been playing them for hours. I was in a good mood so I played the game. All of a sudden I had to turn off the video games. I was very tired after that.

Cook Work. I was going to the grocery store today. It was a cold and rainy day. I made sure to bring a hat. I bought my favorite hat. I walked through the grocery store looking at my hats.
Chess. The boy played chess with his brother. He lost a lot of games. His brother tried to teach him the rules. The boy did not understand. He lost his brother's game.

Survival. One day, Sam heard about a new TV show. He decided to go and watch the show. He was very surprised by how great the acting was. He learned a lot about the culture of television. Sam loved the show.

Tired in the line. It was the end of the day. Tina was at the grocery store. Tina couldn't believe she was in the last line. She was so tired she fell asleep. When she woke up the line was gone.
Case. Sam wanted to be an attorney. He studied very hard in college. Sam graduated high school with honors. He got a job as a lawyer. Sam was able to pay for college and to move to California.

Reenactment. One day, I decided to try my hand at reenacting a movie. First, I decided to make the scene involving me. Next, I made the scene involving my friends. Finally, I made the scene with my parents. I made a terrific impression on my friends that day!

Brad and the water life. Brad was playing with friends. His friends were making a boat out into the ocean. They tried to go under it. Unfortunately, it wasn't enough. Brad was hurt and he needed to go back to shore.

Taxi. I went to the taxi stop. A woman with a black coat asked me to pay. She asked for the last dollar I had. I decided to not pay and go home instead. I did not pay for a taxi the rest of the way home.

Nature. Sam and his friends wanted to go on a camping trip. Sam asked his friends if they wanted to go on a hike. His friends said they didn't want to go. Sam and his friends camped out in the woods. They had a fun time playing in the woods together.

Christmas Morning. My family is planning on having Christmas dinner. I am a stay at home mom and don't have much family. My mom says it is a good idea to invite all of my friends. Everyone arrives at the house to dinner. My mom is very happy about all of her guests that I have.

Tabby. A man took a large kitty to the pet store. The kitty was a very playful and playful kitten. The man thought the kitty would like a new toy. He bought the kitty a cat and took him home. The kitty is now happily living in the basement.

Homemade Cards. I decided to try making homemade cardigan fabric. My grandmother loves to knit and made me a cardigan. I was excited to start making cardigans and making them myself. My grandmother gave me a bunch of fabric and it's all I needed. Now I have a cardigan that I love to wear and make.

On the Subway. Tom was taking a bus to his local city. He was stuck on the trolley because he didn't have his headphones. Tom went to a nearby store to buy a better pair. He bought new headphones at a local store. Tom was able to go on the trolley without any problems.

No Kenny. Lester wanted to try out for the football team. He went to a local tryout. After one hour, Lester felt bad about how he looked. Lester went home, and changed into his best outfit. The coach saw Lester, and Lester was selected for the team.

Gayle's chores. Gayle wanted to be a housekeeper. She went to the store for supplies. Gayle picked out new pink clothes and shoes. She went home to do her chores. Gayle's house is now a comfortable place for Gayle.
Working hard. Sam was doing his best at work. He worked for days. He was exhausted. He wasn't sure what to do. He decided to go to sleep instead.

Metabolism or illness. I had a very high cholesterol, which I am now trying to lower. I am trying to exercise regularly for four hours at a time. I have been feeling very sore all week. I am hoping this will not be a diet. I'm doing well on my diet though.

Can't see who's calling. Sam was at work. He was doing the floor to check the door. He noticed a woman using her phone. He thought it was the woman of the restaurant. Sam yelled at her and told her to call him back.

Animal safari fun. I was at the zoo one day. My favorite animal was a camel. While I was looking at it, a tiger attacked it. They went inside the zoo and then they both went for a swim. I really enjoyed being around that animal.

Being rude. Gina decided to go outside to be alone. But she didn't have enough time to run. So she stood on a swing and watched a basketball game. And she became more excited after watching the game. And she continued to look out her window.

Clean Up Your Toys. I played catch with my son last night. We spent hours throwing things out the window. After playing catch for an hour, we went home. When I got home, my son came back with the ball. I cleaned up my toys by cleaning them.

Cleaning Up. Jane got an email from work that said she was supposed to clean up. She picked up her phone to check. She had forgotten about it and left it on her desk. Her co-workers saw and decided to clean it. It was too late and Jane lost her job and her phone.

mike is angry. Mike is very angry at his roommate. The roommate got in trouble. Mike told his roommate he was sorry. Mike got his roommate another roommate. He was more forgiving to his roommate.

cotton candy. Sara was in line at a store. She had to get some cotton candy for her tummy. She was very excited and waited patiently. Finally, her tummy began to swell. Sara reluctantly put a piece of the cotton candy in her tummy.

Books. I bought a new book today. It was the newest in the series. I was a bit excited to see the new book. After I read it, I fell in love with it. I plan to buy the sequel.

So she tried to focus on philosophy alone. But after a few weeks she had enough degree knowledge to go back.

sky. The sky was dark and gloomy. The air conditioning was broken. Terrified, I decided to try to sleep in the car. However, my eyelids did not get back open. The next day I had trouble opening eyelids.

Tonight's Supper. Cindy was going to her first dinner party at her friend's house. She was excited to meet the girls before dinner. Her date made reservations at a nice restaurant. After dinner, Cindy picked up a slice of cake. Cindy loved it, and hoped her date would call again soon.
Interesting Run. Kelsi was on a jog. She had a good run. Yet she saw a dog. Kelsi stopped to watch the dog. She was very glad to see the dog run.

Jana Looks For A Home. Jana is single and has an apartment. She decides to look for a home in her town. She meets a young couple living with their kids. Jana asks them what they thought of her house and they agree. Jana is so happy that she found a home in her town.
Fajitas. Anna had to make some fajitas. She had never made them before. She bought all the ingredients. She followed her recipe. Her fajitas came out good.

Earl gets in trouble. Earl was having trouble at school. He didn't listen to his parents. He would often forget to put his homework on the table. One day his parents told him to put his homework on the table. Earl did not listen to his parents and his parents got in trouble.
Train Ride. When we were kids we rode trains. My dad had the biggest train he had ever owned. One day we didn't get enough of it. We missed a couple hours. Then we got to get on a train again.

Sharks at the Aquarium. I once went to the aquarium to take a photo of the sharks. I had a good idea of where they were swimming and where the shark's teeth were. The sharks started swimming towards me as soon as I saw them. The sharks immediately started biting me right in the middle of my body. Afterwards, I got a painful sting on my leg.
Jealousy. Tim was at the bar with friends. All of a sudden one of the girls in his friends made a scene. Tim didn't care. It turned into a big fight. Tim had to kick her out.
The broken arm. Nathan had a favorite bike. One day he got a horrible shock. The chain snapped off and Nathan fell to the ground. He was severely hurt. He sued the store and they were fined.

Pepper safety. Tom had just been playing football in a football league. The game was going pretty good until he went to pass the ball. Tom's helmet flew off of his head. Tom didn't get injured in the concussion but it still hurt. Tom took off the helmet and got a new one.

Mike's Mountain Adventure. Mike was taking a mountain hike with his friends. It was time to leave the trail. Mike noticed that the trail was getting slick. Mike decided that he would stay on the trail for hours. Mike came back and had a great time with his friends.

Baby Passport. Ava was going to her second-round baby passport ceremony. She was in for a surprise when she went to the front. There, she realized she was waiting all alone. Ava tried to call her sister in a panic. Unfortunately her sister was busy when she got there.

Media Day. John and I decided to do a video game night. We had a small collection of games so we could play them. We bought the most expensive game we could find. We played it for hours and hours. We got so into the game we passed out after a while.

The Ring. One day, Amy went out to get ice cream. She picked a strawberry flavor. She was enjoying the taste when she realized it was missing something. Amy realized she had dropped the ice cream cone. Amy was upset that she had to clean it up.

Simple Hunger. Kate wanted to start a diet. But she didn't know what she wanted to eat. She asked her sister, but she wasn't very good. Then she decided to just go without meals. And she ate less and less food than ever.

I'm Sorry, Baby. I found out that I am pregnant. I went into labor right away. My mom took me to the hospital. She gave me some pills. Since I didn't drink I was really happy that I had been conceived.

Hoping for a snow day. John was worried that he would not be able to play with his snow board. But then he woke up and it was snowing outside. He went outside and saw a plow truck pulling up. John decided to play with his snowboard and sled instead. He found it much less fun and had to play in the snow.

President. Gina's teacher had told them to go to the library. She didn't have a ride but she was afraid to go alone. She decided to sit in a nearby office. She asked her teacher for a ride home. The teacher let her go home.

Visiting Santa. We went to see our little neighbor in January. We were going to take him to visit Santa for the holidays. He was only 8 and a half years old. We waited for the Christmas morning to see if he woke. He woke on the way to the bus stop to surprise us.

Bicycles are Fun. Tom bought a new bicycle. He liked riding it because it was a lot of fun. One day he went down a big hill. He crashed into a tree and crashed his bike. Tom had to pay a lot of money to buy new parts.

Knockout Gas. A group of protesters were marching in the city. A man started running towards them. He knocked the woman down and threw her on the ground. She was unconscious for 20 minutes. It turned out that she was trying to break her window.

A grade. I was studying for a math exam. I knew there were going to be lots of answers that I didn't know. I practiced my answers over and over again. After a few hours of studying, I got an A on my exam. I felt proud to have done so well on my exam.

Creepy Basement. Lori was scared of the basement. Her parents got her a new flashlight for her birthday. She wasn't scared of it anymore. She was too young to remember the old light. But when she saw it again it scared her even more.

The Mailman. I needed to check my mail and my mailbox was empty. I drove down to the post office and parked in the grass. I walked through the mailboxes, then waited for the mailman to call me. I ran upstairs to the porch and heard him running by! He had just left me a letter from the post office!

Vineyard Blues. I was walking along the river in the South End of Boston. A group of people had begun to dance on the side of the road. I got to see the dance. The person dancing was a man who looked like a boxer. I didn't even say a word because I knew this person.
Cat and Dog. Our cat's name is Max. She loves to eat catnip. She also eats other catnip. She has eaten more catnip than her owner. She seems to like being catnip-only, but she hates it.

Alternative. Jill always hated when her husband took it easy on her. The most difficult thing was getting out of his room. She would always get up to go over her bed, but he always refused. When he would finally move on, she was very disappointed. She would go out to the park and relax and watch tv.

Law Breaker. Sam wanted to get some more privacy. He bought a privacy camera for his house. The camera kept a constant recording of his thoughts. Sam put his camera away and let his wife take a picture. Sam's wife was amused, and he was glad he took the camera off.

Mario. Kenny loved playing video games. One day, he decided to make a Mario game. He made one out of cardboard and paper. When he was done, he submitted the game to a local competition. He felt very proud to be so good at playing video games.

The Closet. Joey's closet was a mess. So Joey decided to clean it out. He organized all of the things he liked to wear. He got rid of everything he didn't need. When it was clean, Joey was happy he had organized his closet.

The Surprise House. Garry and his friends were in New York. Garry was feeling lonely so he asked his best friend Jim to come over. Afterwards, they went to the house where Garry lived. The house was a huge surprise and Garry and Jim immediately fell in love. Now Garry lives at this house, and Jim is his best friend.
Fair. I used to go to the fair. There were games to be played there. I went to the big slide, but I could not get on it. So I went to the small slide. The ride there was very fun.
Hungry. Gina wanted food for lunch. She wasn't hungry so she ate her soda. She drank the soda quickly. In the lunch she felt very sick. She sat on the couch for an hour and was glad she did.

Grilled cheese. Sally's mom cooked the best grilled cheese ever. Sally was eating it all by herself. Sally took the cheese to her sister's room. She didn't want the cheese to go bad. Sally sat on the bed until the cheese melted on the floor.

The Tulips. Sarah loves to pick tulips in her yard. When she is in the yard she notices that the tulips have fallen over. Sarah goes outside and finds all the tulips missing. Sarah puts them in a bag. She picks them up and puts them in a bag.
The Call. John's mother got a phone call. John didn't answer the call. The call was an advertisement. The ad asked the boy out on a date. John didn't ask her out on a date.

Intern to Director. Jason wanted to become an intern at a film company. He began to learn some of the jobs and how to apply for them. Jason applied for a position in the production department. Jason met with the director and worked hard. Jason successfully applied for the position in the production department.

Boredom. Lydia was bored. She was watching her friend's show. She got so bored she decided to watch the same show again. She watched that show. She eventually watched the same show over and over again.
A Day at the Beach. Jill's boyfriend took her to the beach. They met at the water. Jill then walked into the surf. She also put on her sunscreen. Jill felt great at the beach.
Stomach. It was a horrible day in town. I had a very upset stomach. I sat in the office and was feeling very sick. I vomited all over the bathroom. I had to go home early to get rid of the sickness.

Lingering Cramp. Janet was having trouble sleeping in her car. She had to drive a few miles to the hotel for a meeting. While she was at the meeting, she was feeling restless. Her husband tried to change the subject and she kept trying. It was getting so awkward and she ended up sleeping through it.
The Bonfire. The friends were sitting outside. They decided to put a bonfire in the yard. They gathered around it. Then they decided to try and make music. They had a lot of fun.

Shin. Tom loved having a strong sense of self. He loved his skin so much he didn't feel a single pain at all. One day, his friend was having an accident. The accident caused Tom to have a large shin. His friends immediately made an appointment to get it fixed.

Out of battery. I had a lot of books to finish when I got home. I tried to keep all of them in place. I placed the books away from a lot of things. However, my phone died. My eyes started watering as I realized I wasn't going to finish.

Raging Rivers. Hank and his friends were driving to Las Vegas. They wanted to do something exciting. They chose to take a cruise across the river. They had fun every day after that. They were glad they decided to go.

The Broken Pot. Sally's pot broke. She tried to fix it but it was too small. Sally went to the store and bought a new pot. Sally didn't know which one she wanted. She decided to splurge on a better one.

Aliens. Jim went into his yard to check the mail. A small baby alien was laying on the ground next to his mailbox. He grabbed it and held it against his chest to make it move. The baby had just turned into a baby. He continued to hold it against his chest as the baby got older.
The Fender Bender. Tim was driving down the road. He got into a bad accident. The car was totaled. Tim didn't realize what he had done. It turned out Tim wasn't paying enough attention to the road.

First dibs. The girls were excited to get a dollhouse. They were going to build their own. They would have to work for 2 hours to build it. It would be their first day. They couldn't wait to play with the dollhouse!

Losing the mail. It was almost Christmas. Sam's school was about to start a new year. Sam's dad had a lot of boxes. One day Sam opened all the boxes he got. Sam's father had forgotten he was sending him the mail.
Gerry. Gerry was very lonely. He decided to call his friend to see if they would see each other. His friend called his name. Gerry hung up the phone. Gerry cried because he was lonely no more.

The Coming Out. John was a young boy and his mom was getting older. His mom went to her husband's funeral. The funeral was over, and John came out. He told all his friends about the funeral. His friends all started making fun of him.

Runny Makeup. Sarah was tired of getting in shape. She started using less water. Soon she started running in the morning. She tried running a few miles every day. By a month Sarah was running 10 miles a day.

The Promotion. The promotion was going to be given to the newest employee. The employee was new to the company and needed to learn. The employee was nervous about the promotion. He started his first day with a smile on his face. The employee was excited to be promoted to a Manager!

Charlene the Song Bird. Charlene had a very difficult time singing at her home. She went to the music store to buy some tape. She practiced every day until the day she could sing. On a Saturday night at night, she went to a party. She sang an amazing song on Saturday night.
Heart Attack. I was at the park today. I noticed something moving on my arm. It was a baby raccoon. It had a heart attack and it died. I was very sad about it.

ice cubes. Rita wanted some ice cream. She decided to buy some ice cream cones. She decided to eat them and then she wanted to work out. Rita then began to run. She was exhausted but still finished with her workout.

Struck. It was a hot day and Tom had no air conditioner. The day turned really hot. Tom left the windows open for a week. His car got so hot it ran out of coolant. Tom had to call his insurance company to fix the damage.
The Anime. The kids were excited. They were going to a big anime. They were going to the big movie! The kids were very excited. They could not wait to get home!

Oliver's Birthday. Oliver was sad because he had no friends to play with. He decided to make a new friend by taking her out. Oliver was excited to play with his new friend. He went to the store and bought lunch. Oliver and his friend were playing a video game for a long time.

The Lightning Storm. I was outside on the road with my family when the thunder struck. There was a loud crash that scared me and I jumped out my car. The rain began to come down so I started to run to the door. The wind blew and a loud boom came. A lightning bolt hit and I ran inside.
Fleas. Ralph lived with roommates. Ralph never got a bath or brushed his teeth. One night he left for work. When he came home he was in pain. His roommates were scratching all over his clothes.
England. My husband and I visited England in 2010. We took a tour of the Tower of London. Then we went on tours. We had a very fun time! We thought we would do it again in 2015.
Camping Trip. I love going camping. My dad took me this summer. We had a lot of fun exploring the woods. We had to camp in the woods overnight. This is the only time I can spend a weekend camping.
Fast Playing. I went to the playground to play with a few friends. They played a game of golf. It took about an hour. We decided to go home. Everyone else was happy.

The Contest. Jasmine was a great swimmer, but she was a little bit nervous. She challenged her friend, Molly to a race. Molly said yes, and the two swam for a few hours. The day came to race, and Jasmine won first place. Molly thought Jasmine was just playing and she was very embarrassed.
Heavy rainstorm. Tom was at home. He was watching a movie. A heavy thunderstorm started to hit. Tom ran inside and made his wife stay outside. It was a very rainy day.

Home Work. Randy loved playing his piano. He could play it all day without any complaints. So Randy was offered a home job as a tutor. Randy accepted the job. He was able to play piano every day for a year.
Sea Turtle. Timothy went to the beach to have lunch. He saw a turtle in the water. It was very beautiful. Timothy decided to take it home. He loved its beautiful red shells.
Dinner. It was time to cook dinner. I grabbed all the ingredients and the cook book. I got out all the meat and vegetables. I put the food in the oven. It took about an hour.
The Vest. Lara wanted a new, fancy new dress. Her mother took her to an outlet mall. Lara found a great looking red vest. She bought the new vest and a dress. Lara now has a lovely new look.

Baking a Cake. Anna was baking a cake. She was trying to get the cake out of the oven. Then she was distracted and forgot to check the temperature. The cake was baked too high. Anna didn't get the cake.

Dentist. The dentist gave us all a filling. My niece had an appointment. She got very scared and refused to leave the dentist's office. The dentist said to be gentle and we're going to be fine. The dentist gave us a refill and then left.

Regrets. My girlfriend's cat is very sick. She made him take some medicine. He started coughing and acting strange. He didn't realize it but started throwing up. We tried giving him a different type of medicine but he never got better.

The Shower. Lisa was tired and tired of cleaning up. She decided to take a shower. She was very excited when the shower finished. Her hair was dry but her mind was still clear. When she walked into the kitchen she was able to relax.

Mugged. Tim was walking down the street. He didn't see a guy looking at him. The guy was wearing a gun and Tim wasn't expecting it. He decided to run and called the police. Tim wasn't hurt that night.

Protest. Jenna and her friends wanted to protest the school's decision. They made signs and chanted. People gathered around the park. They yelled at the school. The school decided not to ban protesters from the park.

Carson Wins the Game!. Carson wanted to play the local soccer team at the big game. He practiced his soccer skills and ran drills every day. Carson was nervous when he stepped on the field. Carson's coach told him to go play! Carson scored the winning goal that day!

Late Flight. Tim was late for his flight. He was waiting for half an hour and was annoyed. He eventually called his friend to tell him. Tim was late again, and waited an hour. Tim decided to take a bus instead.

The GoldFish. Jenny wanted to buy her first goldfish. She went to the pet store and picked out the fish she wanted. Jenny went home to put the fish in its new tank. Jenny set up her aquarium in the back yard. Jenny's goldfish lived out her life and she had a pet.

Rose and Her Rose. Rose had always wanted a rosebush. Her mother said no, they'd be hard to grow. Rose bought a rosebush from the nursery. Rose planted the plant in her backyard. Now Rose has a beautiful, big rosebush!

Desert Journey. It was a great day when a woman went to the desert for a day trip. She met a nice man there and they went to the water park. They drank a lot of water and had fun swimming. When she got home, she called the desert man and said she had a good day. The two of them had a good day together.

Molly's Beau. Molly had been feeling very lonely lately. Her friend Beth was taking her to dinner at her friend's house. After going to dinner Beth brought Molly a bouquet of red roses. Beth said Molly was getting a gift from a boy who had just dumped her. Beth offered Molly a rose pet and said it was her boyfriend.

Race. I entered the local race to show my support for my friend. It was a race to see who could complete 50 pushups. I was able to complete the first 100 pushups. I was able to complete the next 100 pushups. My friend won the race!
The Scissors. Ben's sister was cutting hair. She asked for scissors. Ben gave her scissors. She cut off about an inch of her hair. Ben apologized and let her borrow one from him.

Tom Gets a Mechanical Keyboard. Tom needed a keyboard for his computer. Tom went to Best Buy to get a mechanical keyboard. Tom was not able to find one that he liked. Tom went back home and saved up money. Tom went to Best Buy and bought the mechanical keyboard.
Movies. We went to the movies. The tickets were very expensive. They charged $50 for each ticket. I had to give them a tip. They got the tip.
FB Affair. Tom was a lonely man. He decided to get married. He began dating someone close to him. He asked her on a date. She agreed to marry him for the second time.

Sinking Boat. Tom was out with friends at the lake. They went boating around. Tom threw the boater out of the boat and got the boat in trouble. He tried to swim out as fast as possible. Unfortunately the boat eventually sank.

The Man with the Cane. Ned had a cane. The cane he carried was really old and worn. He would put his cane up in the air and toss it back and forth. No one noticed how dirty the cane was. Soon the cane was covered in mud and dust.

Girl Scout Cookies. Karen's mom would have Girl Scout cookies every week. One time, her mom took her to get the cookies. Her dad explained that the cookies were for the boys. Karen's dad's wife was not in a hurry. She bought cookies for the boys.

Car accident. Nell was driving to work one day. A car crashed into her car. Nell called a tow truck for help. When the tow truck arrived she was very worried. Luckily it was all just a small minor damage.

The Turkey Leg. Benny's dog loved eating turkey legs. He always used to try to catch them in the tree. Finally one day he saw a bird and caught it. His dog was excited but he still didn't know what to eat. When the dog was finished, it ate them all.

A lost wheel. Alfred drove to work one morning. He was going to turn the wheel and drive home. All of a sudden, his car's tires went flat. Alfred drove to the store to buy a new tire. Alfred drove home safely with his new tire.

Cavities Galore. Kia started noticing that her teeth were getting clogged with cavities. Her doctor told her she needed to see a dentist. She was excited to go see the dentist. After she had the appointment she had to have emergency cleaning. The dentist gave Kia the cleaning and cleaning medicine she needed.

The Proposal. Julie was meeting her husband for their first anniversary. Her boyfriend walked up and started to kiss her. Afterwards, he asked Julie to marry him. Julie said yes and took a long picture together. She later revealed that her boyfriend was a total sucker.

Exchange. Kate didn't like her best friend and was afraid to tell. Her friend asked Kate to the fair in an exchange. Kate went to the fair, but she was so afraid she wouldn't want to come back. Her friend went out the next day to the fair with her. Kate was so happy to get back to school with her best friend.

Secret Smoker. Lily was tired of having to get ready for work every morning. She decided to start a secret smoker. She snuck out and tried it with a little more determination. It turned out to be very difficult, but she managed to smoke it. Lily now felt much less tired.
Down the Stairs. I have a crush on a girl. I decided to ask her out on a date. I thought she would not go with me. Then, I got up on the stairs and saw her. She turned me down.

Spaghetti. It was the perfect day to cook spaghetti. We went to the store and bought a dozen ingredients. We sat down in the kitchen and started cooking the sauce. We watched the noodles cooking for 10 minutes. Finally, we were done and we went back out to enjoy dinner.

The Track Meet. Jill's best friend had a track meet. Jill knew she would do better on the track. Jill decided to train every day. Jill ran track and tried to beat her best friend. Jill and her friend both made it to the meet!
Used Books Suck. Jim bought a used book. He wanted to sell the book. He put it up for sale on eBay. Nobody bought it. Jim had to pay a lot of money.

The Burger. Jane loved a food brand called Burger King. They were selling a special Burger King recipe. Jane went to the store to buy the recipe. She had it for weeks and months. She got the recipe just the way she wanted it.

The Accidental Crime. Brent found a wallet on the street that he thought looked important. He went inside the house to see if anyone was inside. Inside the room, Brent saw the wallet belonged to an old man. The old man was very angry at Brent for finding it. He started to throw his own clothes on top of the wallet.

Making Music. Mike was tired of the way his music sounded. So he decided to start recording it. But then, he was very disappointed. And so he decided to listen to the song on his own. And that made him realize how important recording it was.
System Failure. Tim was playing an online game. He kept losing. Eventually he got a system error. He had to reboot it. It took days to fix.

Trick or Treat. Joey loved trick or treating. He dressed as a kid with the neighborhood kids. He walked around his neighborhood with candy and candy bars. The kids started to laugh and scare him. He decided to just let it go and leave.

Football. My girlfriend is a huge fan of football. Last night she was rooting for her team against the team from another city. She was cheering when the game started. But the game was tied when the score was tied. She was very upset she couldn't watch the game.

A Wild Zebra Attack. The zebras loved the grass in the park. They would run around the grass. One day a zookeeper spotted a zebra chasing a rabbit. The zookeeper shot at the zebra with a gun. The zebras ran away and they left the park.

Food. My son and I had to have breakfast at the cafeteria. We went to the cafeteria with a variety of snacks. My son ordered the chicken breast. I had to go back to the store for my son. We left the cafeteria hungry.

Walking in the store. Yesterday I went to a store. I wanted to get something good for breakfast. I found something good but it wasn't cheap. So I decided to go shopping for something more expensive. I made a lot of extra money buying things I didn't want.
Busted Pipe. Dan was going over his yard. He was trying to get his pipe under the fence. It was very heavy and his neighbor saw him. He hit the pipe and knocked it down. Dan had to call a repairman.

Justin's Job. Justin was working in his garage doing some cleaning. The garage doors were open but he couldn't see a thing. He had to open the garage doors to see what was inside. The garage door was broken and he was in trouble. He didn't know what to do but decided to go back home.

Like father like son. Samantha has always been a very good runner. She entered the state state meet in high school. At the state meet she ran a personal best. Her parents were very proud. She made it all the way to nationals!

Bad Weather. Bob decided to ride the bus to work. During his drive, the weather started to get bad. A car ran into him. Bob was scared and decided not to get on the bus. The driver took him home safely.

Marty's Roach Problem. Marty noticed he had roaches everywhere in his apartment. One day, Marty decided to clean his apartment. Marty was disgusted when he saw how many roaches were in the apartment. He decided to throw out all of his roaches. Marty was so relieved that his apartment no longer had roaches.
Making chili. Lois wanted to make chili. She was going to make the best chili ever. It was for her boyfriend. She put it in the oven. Then she started to wait to heat the chili.

First Snowfall. Toby had lived in Kansas for 20 years. He had recently gotten a promotion and moved to New York. Toby was excited to see that he could finally walk into the city. He had never experienced such a snowy day in New York City. The first snow day was very beautiful.
Gas pump. My dad has a gas pump on the side of the house. He used it once on a day in the summer. He went inside the house to look for gas. The pump had expired. He decided to buy a new one.

The Playdate. Sarah wanted to ask a girl out on a date. She called her friend Beth and asked for a date. Beth said yes and then Sarah went to pick her up. Beth picked her up and Sarah met her friend and had a wonderful time. Sarah and Beth are planning their second date.

New Shirt. Karen needed to get a new shirt for school. She found some that were nice. She decided to shop around at the store. The store did not have her size. Karen finally found the shirt she wanted.

Last Minute. Sam needed to buy a new car. He couldn't afford a new car, but he needed a new home. Sam put an ad on craigslist. He heard back from a potential buyer. He accepted the buyer and got new furniture and supplies.

Tired. My dog was running through the living room. He tried to eat everything but me. He jumped out from behind the sofa and bit me. I had to give him food to make him sleep. He now sits down and waits for me to pick up.

Delivery Mistake. Tom was late for his first job. He didn't realize it until the day before. He was late because he had forgotten to have his car checked out. When he left work, he had to get in his truck. He had to take the long way to the delivery house.

Peapod. I just got my new Peapod job. I love it, but sometimes it's confusing. I've asked for help before asking questions. But it's still taking me several minutes to get started. I think I may just go back to Google Reader.
Game. Jim was a little league baseball player. He was at a baseball game. He had the ball. He hit a homerun. His team cheered.

March. Gina and her friends were outside. It was a beautiful day and they all knew it. They decided to march through the park. They began marching down the hill. They finally made it to their campsite.
Angry. Jim was eating fast food. The waitress wasn't paying attention. The waitress came up to her and tried to speak to her. However, Jim didn't like her. He ended up leaving the restaurant.
Food Sale. Kate was at the store. She was browsing through her food. She saw a sale. She decided to buy a lot of food. She spent the whole lot on food.

off the beach. Allison loves to go to the beach. When she goes to the beach, Allison finds sand everywhere. Allison decides to clean it up. However, Allison becomes very messy. Allison decides that she will never go to the beach again.
Loud Music. Gina's teacher yelled at her for not quiet. Gina turned to her desk. She heard the loud music playing. She ran to the teacher. She sat in front of the music.

No Knife. I used to use a knife on a daily basis. One day my mom told me she was going to get a tooth pulled. I refused to go to the dentist. I did it anyway. The tooth was pulled and I learned to use a knife for now on.

Lexie brings breakfast. Lexie decided to bring breakfast to work the next day. She took her bag to work and started to cook. Lexie spent all night cooking the eggs, bacon, and pancakes. Lexie was nervous but finally finished and went to bed. Lexie was happy she had brought breakfast to work.
Vegetables. Tom was really hungry. He decided to make a sandwich. He put the sandwich into the toaster and went to bed. While he was sleeping the phone rang. The hungry dog had ate the sandwich.
Grocery store. Tom had no cash. He needed to make some quick cash. He decided to get groceries from his local grocery store. Tom paid for it. Tom was able to purchase everything he needed.

Store Clerk. I was shopping with my mom. The cashier came to my mom and asked where we were. She wanted to see if I bought my brand new CD's. I handed her a CD to show her the new CD I wanted. She bought the CD and returned the rest to me.

Revenge. Kate had been teasing her teacher. She tried to take her test without her teacher. But she was so nervous that she got caught. She learned that she had to be more careful when she took tests. She was relieved when she found out the principal would give her a note.

The Book Fee. Maggie was going to take her book to the library to check it out. She needed to check it out at the front desk. She had been waiting 30 minutes so she had no excuse. Finally she decided to check the library back out by herself. She was relieved to have it done at her local library.
Baseball Fever. The other day we went to a baseball game. My brother tried out for the baseball team. He tried out for the baseball team. They let him. He made the team.

Climbing. Mike was the tallest kid in the house. Mike would climb to the high-rises to see what he saw. On one day, Mike was climbing to the top of a large skyscraper. Mike's face almost slid down the stairs. Mike's dad and brother, Mike and Steve, went and saved Mike.

A sad day. I was so excited to be a dad. I was in the shower when my son called me. He said he was sad and needed me to come help him. I agreed and we took our son to the hospital. We spent the night there.
Camping. I went camping with my family. I was hoping that I would sleep in a tent. I fell asleep in my tent. I awoke with my back to the tent. I ran up and down the campinggrounds for two hours.

New Running Shoes. My old running shoes were very worn out. I went to the mall to buy new running shoes. I found the perfect pair of running shoes. They came in the mail the next day. They fit me perfectly.

Reuniting. Kate and her friend Beth were friends for a few years. However, Beth was still single. Kate tried to keep her up but she just wouldn't listen. In the end, she decided she wouldn't be dating Beth anymore. She decided to take Beth on a date to a new restaurant.
