The Investigation. Tina had been walking with a strange man for about 3 days. He had no idea what he was doing at the time. He had been on the sidewalk but was trying to look away from her. She was scared that he was dangerous so she walked home. When she got home her mother was waiting for her.
Berry gets hurt. Berry is a baseball player. He gets hit in the head. The hits were hard and he had trouble hitting them. One day the team comes up against the Marlins. They win the game for them.
Too tired to remember to pay. Allie needed to pay her rent. She decided to get in trouble at work. She showed up late. Allie was forced to pay it all off. She then made sure to pay it off.
stray. I walked outside of the house. I heard a sound coming from the yard. I walked closer to it. It was a stray cat. I brought it inside and fed it.

Land Surprise. Amy went on a walk to her friend's house. There was a neighbor next door who looked like her mother. She was dressed and was holding a glass. Her mother smiled and said she wanted to visit. Amy got a picture of the woman on the porch before she left.

The Trampoline. The kids were playing with the trampoline. They were having so much fun that they began to play in the house. When they were done, they couldn't wait to get back. They would go outside every time they went out to play. They were going to have so much fun, they wanted to do it every day.

Best job. Jackie worked in the factory as a cook. She enjoyed cooking but her dream was to have her own restaurant. As the restaurant was failing, Jackie was told that she would have a job. She took the job and was a better cook than she ever was. Now Jackie is the best cook at her home and makes a lot of money.

Dishes. Tina was cleaning her sink. She didn't find a good spot to start the dishwasher. She realized that she was not going to be able to get it to start. Tina tried to look at the cabinet for a better spot to start. The cabinet ended up in the trash.
Cancer. Aya was diagnosed with cancer. She was very scared of the diagnosis. She went to a therapist. He told her she would be okay. Aya was so relieved she told all her friends.

Fashionista in Training. Sally was an aspiring fashion designer. Sally began designing the new design for a clothing line. Sally began to put together her design for the company. The line was a hit and Sally got a good commission. Sally continued working at her new job in the future.

Cat at the  window. A man looked outside the front of his house to see a cat The cat was looking at him with catnip The man ran inside to get the catnip. He sprayed the cat with catnip. The cat jumped up and barked at him.

The Dented Car. James had driven his new car all morning. He was very tired and had just made it to work. On his way into work he had a flat tire. He could barely keep up. James was late to work and had to replace his car.

Large. Liz had the biggest hair in her house. Her friends and family didn't like it. One day, her hair got caught in the laundry machine. The machine broke and she was so upset. Liz then decided to just wear a ponytail.
A new bike. I just bought a brand new bike. I couldn't wait to try it out. I rode it everywhere I went. My friends complimented me on my new bike. Now I've a new bike as well.

Phone Service. The phone service in my neighborhood is terrible. I decided to buy a new phone. I decided to walk to a small phone store near my home. I browsed the phones. After purchasing my phone I was able to use the service.

Bee. My grandmother used to keep a bee garden in her attic. She would hide it in the garden so she could see the bees. One day the beekeeper came and started to pull the garden out. We all ran outside and screamed at each other. Now I think it was time for her to get a broom.
Painting. Anna went to her class to paint. She was pretty bad at it. She wanted to be a good painter. She painted her nails and nails. Then she sat down and began to paint.

Shark Attack. Gertrude was in the ocean with her friend. She had just left her car and was driving to shore. Suddenly a shark swam right into her lane. Gertrude swerved into the water to avoid the shark. Her car got swept away.

Beach. The Smith family loved to go to the beach every summer. However, they did not go on vacation in that time of year. They talked to their doctor about a solution to this. His suggestion was that they move to a different location. The family moved from Boston to Florida.

Life is No Beach. Gina's brother and his cousin were at the beach. She tried to catch him when she could but he had gone down to the water. He didn't mind being in the water but Gina didn't think it was the right thing. Then she saw him walking around the water. Gina knew it wasn't the beach.

Loud Neighbors. Tim's neighbors didn't want him to make noise. He tried everything to convince them not to. Eventually he bought loud speakers. He moved everything out of his yard. His neighbors were so upset they stopped paying him.
Found Change. Jared was walking down the street. A cop saw him. The cop pointed out a small quarter. The cop gave Jared his change. Jared brought the money home.

Out to lunch. Tina went out to eat with her friends. Her friend asked her if she wanted to sit down. Tina said okay. Her friend told her they were coming back with food. They got to the restaurant and Tina got her meal.

Songwriter. Bobby was a great songwriter. He tried to write some songs but he wasn't very good. One day Bobby decided to take lessons and improve his writing. After a while, Bobby improved his songwriting skills and was good. Bobby is now a popular songwriter.

Defensive Driving. Rachael drives home from work. Her car breaks down at a red light. She pulls over to the side of the road. She parks the car behind a store and uses the car. She gets to drive home in her new car.

Just Order Pizza. Kylie always wanted to go to the pizza parlor. She decided she would order a pepperoni pizza. When Kylie arrived she was disappointed. The pizza was very plain. She decided to order something more exotic.
Rock climbing fear. One day I went rock climbing. It was very cold. I was sweating all the way up the mountain. I started to cry. It was so cold it made me cry.

Accidentally. Gina was walking her dog. She walked up and down a busy street. As she was walking she saw a woman being mugged on the street. She didn't want to be part of it, but she felt she had to help. Gina helped the woman get away with her and helped the woman move.
Robbed. I once got robbed. I felt really scared after being robbed. I called the police to help me. I saw my neighbor standing by the door. He had his gun and a bag of cash.

Embarrassment at the Mall. Nora bought a new dress for her sister's wedding. The dress fit her and showed a beautiful pattern. However, the dress got a tear in the bottom. Nora tried to fix it herself but couldn't. She couldn't get her dress to fit again after all.
Bench. Eddie loved to build things. His favorite toy was a bench. He wanted to build the bench in his yard. Eddie was so excited about his bench. He brought the bench to his yard for his new project.

Warm Milk. My friend used to milk his cow every morning. Every day he would wake him up in the morning. He would milk him and the cow to see how tired he was. My friend would let him milk it while he watched his television. I would sneak out of the room to see his milk.

Ghost. Jody and her family were on their way home from school. Jody began hearing strange noises. The noises seemed to be coming from behind a tree. Jody ran inside to investigate. Jody screamed and screamed and her whole family ran away.

New Chromebook Laptop. Allie needed a new computer. She looked at the price and it was far too expensive. She found a discount for a discount on the Black Friday. She decided to splurge. When she got home, she was excited.
The Good. Tim always had problems at school. He always failed his classes. Tim tried to study harder. He studied everyday. He made the final.

Tough burn. Susie was eating out with friends. All the sudden she started getting her eyes burned. It turned out she ate too much. Susie got her eyes burned badly. Thankfully she was able to wear it off quickly.
Objection. The man had to do an X-ray. He didn't have any insurance. He thought he was OK with that. The technician found a tumor. The tumor made him a little anxious.
Gym. Sandy wanted to join the gym. She asked her friend to join. They went to the gym together. When Sandy arrived, she saw the gym was empty. Sandy left the gym and went home.

First Female Football Player. The other day I played in a game of volleyball. I was nervous about playing a game with two guys. When I stepped on the field I tried to do a good job. But then my teammate tried to steal the ball from me. She ended up breaking my leg.
Bird Feeder. Ben and Jane wanted to feed the birds in the house. They checked every day for them. Ben found them. They found a bird feeder. They installed it.

New School. Cindy's daughter's friends started to go to different schools. One day her daughter's friend was moved to a new school. Cindy was worried the new friend would not make friends. She tried to get her daughter to join the new school. She was happy to be friends again.

Funny Girl. Amy was in high school. Her friends were all very funny. One day, the girl she liked was a girl in her class. She asked the girl why the girl made fun of her. Amy was not amused and punched the girl.

History. Sally had just come out as lesbian. Everyone in her community liked her, but not her friends. She always wondered why she didn't come out before. One day Sally found a good way to get friends. After that, Sally never had to ask for a friend's opinion about her life.

Angela's Essay. Angela was failing a college essay. She decided to take an extra credit class. She tried to write an essay about her experience. However, her essay was a little unfocused. Angela wasn't able to pass her essay.

The Phone Fiasco. I was playing my phone in class. I accidentally left it in the phone case and the screen cracked. The school called my teacher. He took the screen into the office. The office replaced the screen and the case.

Moused. John and his girlfriend went for a walk. They decided to walk around the local park. John spotted a pair of mama and baby monkeys. John was excited and decided to pet the baby monkeys. John and his girlfriend both felt very happy when they saw the monkey family.

Karen's help. Karen needed some help with homework. She asked for help from another student who knew her. The student let Karen borrow his calculator and calculator. Karen went to the store and bought the calculator and calculator. Karen completed the assignment on time.

One Man Circus. I recently visited the local circus with my son. My son is a toddler, and had never been in one. He loved the circus, but was too young to see anything live. My son learned a new trick that I learned from a kid at the circus. That was one of my favorite acts of the show.

economics class. Ethan needed a job and needed money to buy groceries. Ethan found an accounting job at a local store. After he got the job, Ethan did not pay his rent. Ethan spent his money on rent. Ethan got evicted and his car was destroyed.
sailing. The man went sailing. He caught a small boat. He floated the boat to a dock. The man took out his sailboat. He fixed his sailboat.

Trip to the Vet. The puppy ran into the vet's office. She was covered in spots and was very dirty. The vet asked if the puppy had puppies before. She shook her head and pointed to a box. He gave her the puppy and she was then allowed in.

Baking. Gina's mom decided to let her go to a baking class. She baked a cake that Gina liked. When she got home she took the cake to her brother. He couldn't believe it when he tasted it. He agreed to come over as well.

Not Impressed. Eddie and Sam were friends. They were having a good conversation. But Eddie noticed something. The guy was rude and did not have any respect for Eddie. Eddie left Sam alone and left him alone.

James and the Driving Test. James has been studying for weeks for his driving test. His teacher asked him if he is ready for the test. James went to the car to drive. His car started to smoke. James learned to never take a driving test again.

The New Puppy. It was time for Sally to pick out her new puppy. She looked through every toy store to find one she liked. Sally chose a small puppy for her puppy. She took the puppy to a puppy shelter where the puppy was adopted. Sally's puppy is now her favorite puppy.

Birthday Cake. Lucy woke up with her parents and sister to the grocery store. Lucy found a dozen cake mix and began to mix them together. Then she realized that there were too many pieces for the cake mix. The girls decided to make cake for their own birthday. Lucy couldn't believe they could finally have her birthday cake.

Rebooting The Network. Tim was having trouble with his internet. He kept turning it on but it wouldn't reboot. He called his internet company and they said they needed to reboot it. He made sure it was fixed. Tim was so thankful when they fixed it.

Visiting Family. Jane was sad about the death of her parents. She wasn't sure if they would be living well. She felt terrible about this. She thought about going on a road trip. Jane decided to visit her family to visit.

Bottom of the sea. Tom was with his wife. Tom went on a trip to the bottom of the sea. The ship he was on was at least fifty miles from shore. He took a break and watched a beautiful sunset. He fell asleep in the bottom of the sea.

Chef Tasha. Tasha loved cooking. She wanted to open a restaurant. She got a bunch of food to cook in her kitchen. Tasha was nervous about starting the restaurant. But Tasha learned how to cook a great dinner!

Hamster. Tia got her hamster for her birthday. It was really big, and fluffy. Tia's mom and dad loved eating it every day. Tia knew she couldn't eat it forever. But she was really happy to finally get it home.

Allergic. When I was five, my mom and I had to put on masks. My mom put on the black one, and I put on the white one. They said that we were going to the store and we weren't. We walked up the stairs and we hid under the tree. We waited until we were inside, then we went out!
Doll. Joe needed new toys. He wanted a new doll to put in his room. Joe went to the toy store. He found the perfect one. Joe put it in his room.
Getting Fat. Tom loved to eat fast food. He thought he would lose weight. Tom started working out and eating less food. Tom went on to lose twenty pounds. Tom never ate fast food again.

Nature. A man wanted to learn to ride a motorcycle. He spent a lot of time learning how to ride a motorcycle. He finally became able to ride his bike without training wheels. He decided to go for a bike ride. He rode his bike to the lake.

The Big Storm. Linda and her family drove to a local lake to surf. They waited to see the big storm come. The winds and rain began to pick up. The family huddled under a log for shelter. When the storm passed Linda and her family made camp for the night.

Haunted?. Jim was walking home one day. He saw something dark on the ground. It was a large, black bat! Jim yelled out to his friend who was outside the house. He called the police and they said someone had turned in the bat.

The Ski Trip. Tim and Dan had a ski trip. They wanted to get away and do something new. Tim bought a new sled so they could go all the way around the mountain. The ski trip was not a success. They decided to go home instead.
Muffler. My roommate Joe was in charge of a room. He would go to his favorite places for music. He would record all the songs. Joe would turn the volume down. Joe liked to turn the volume down.
Class. Today I decided to go to a class. I made a list of things I needed to do. I took the day off to go shopping. The class started at 6 PM. The class lasted until 2 AM.

Ears Pierced for the First Time. Diana really wanted her ears pierced for the first time. She thought it would be a pain, but luckily it was painless. After a bit of waiting, she waited a long time. The piercing was done. Now she's thrilled with how they look.

mermaid. The mermaid had to get on the ship. She ran along with the crew, but she could not get through. Suddenly, the mermaid ran back out of the way. She ran through the bowels of the ship. When she was done, she ran to shore to hide.

Tomboy Ballerina. Lila had always wanted to be a trombone player. She practiced hard for years to learn how to play the trombone. She practiced so much she grew a bit nervous. She finally decided to try out for the trombone team. Lila's name is now Tomboy Ballerina.

Garbage Man. Billy wanted to clean his closet. He had tons of things to move around. He decided to put it in the garbage man. He made it take forever but finally it was done. When he walked back into his house he felt much better.
Poor artist. Kya was an amazing painter. But her husband wasn't impressed. He often complained about it. But Kya kept up with her skills. They finally got a good divorce.

Roasting Session. Cindy's family was planning a picnic. Cindy was a little worried about getting to go. They all had to decide on which family member to roast. They made the list and they went to the supermarket. Cindy had the most fun roast of them all!

Flat. Kate had a flat tire on her way to work. She took the flat tire to the mechanic and asked for help. The mechanic called her back a few minutes later. Kate waited an hour while he changed the flat tire. Kate was back to work on time.

His Feet. I bought a pair of shoes at the mall. I got home and put them on the shelf. When I was done, I took them out to get dressed. I went downstairs to the kitchen and put them on the floor. Then, I turned the lights off.

The last chance. Tim was waiting in line for a game. His favorite player had come through last. His team was trailing. Tim finally got to see the player play. Tim was glad he finally got to see the player.
Horse Races. Tim went to the horse races with his friends. They all had their horses. He had a horse that did not know how to race. Tim taught the horse to race. Now they can have a show.

Homework. Sam was writing a report for a class. He needed to come up with an answer for every question. When he got to the final question, he was very nervous. He decided to ask for help on the question instead. Sam's teacher was glad he gave him assistance.

Fruit salad making. I wanted to surprise my friend at her birthday party. I bought a lot of fruit salad mix for her to make. When she got home, she was disappointed. The salad was way too soft. She didn't make it.
Cake. Cathy wanted to have a great birthday. She spent all day baking. Then, she realized she had no dessert! She was so disappointed! Cathy was not happy when she realized it was over.
The Lipstick. Amy loved to make makeup. She got a new lipstick today. It was red and very pretty. She showed off her new lipstick on her friends. Amy had won an award for best makeup artist!

Fred. Fred was really excited that his friend was coming over for dinner. It was his friend's birthday so they were going to get some food. Fred had a great time and couldn't wait to see his friend. Fred's friend came over and he got a lot of presents. Fred was happy when his friend had a great time at his friend's party.

Figuring out the story. Lisa was writing a book. She needed to figure out the ending. Lisa looked up the ending online. She went over to her friends house. Lisa was able to figure it out with her friends.

The Wedding Announcement. Cindy and her boyfriend had been married for 12 years. She was excited to make it official. She got a call the day before the wedding and heard the news. They were getting married! The wedding day was a big deal and Cindy was thrilled.

Billburg. The billburgers put out a huge BBQ to celebrate their victory. They also made a huge bowl for the kids. They called the kids billburgers' names. They told them to put out a BBQ with a hundred people. The billburgers were really happy to do something for their children.

A few drinks. John was at the bar. He was drinking alone and thought it would be funny to share drinks. He decided to share a shot of water. The next morning, John woke up feeling a bit sick. He went to get a shot of water, but had no luck.

Snow Storm. Bill had a snowball fight in the street. A strong snow storm hit him. Bill had to shovel the snow out of the street. He made a big snowmen as well. Bill was happy to get home to see his snowball fight.

Hypnotism. I had a big crush on the girl in my class. I thought she was my classmate. When I sat next to her in class, she looked at me strangely. She said that she didn't have anything to say about me. I became scared that he would tell everyone his secret.

Hail Storm. Jane was driving home from work one day. The rain began to fall hard. She tried to change the course but had no luck. Jane eventually decided to make it home safely. The next morning the hail stopped and the storm ended.
New Name. Abe was bored one afternoon. He decided he needed a new name. He asked his friends what to name his new dog. They gave him a blank list of names. Abe was pleased with the list he was given.

Last Letter. Jim had been working at his job for six months. He received a final letter from his boss. Jim knew he was going to quit and never go back. Jim's wife called him and he told her he was leaving. He was very sad about it, but Jim was proud of his decision.

Smash. Tommy was playing at a friend's house. He was playing with a large plastic cup. Tommy smashed the cup with his hand. The cup fell and broke its window. Tommy was angry and threw the cup on the floor.

Moving Out of State. Fred was in his old apartment. He missed his best friend. They decided to move out of state. Fred felt like he was moving away. He packed his bags and headed back to his apartment.
Torn Shorts. Tom was out with friends. They didn't realize the weather. They all got a pair of torn jeans. Tom tried to avoid it. It didn't work.
Tony Grills a Fish. Tony loves to grill. He has a few different types of foods to grill. Tony decides to grill some fried chicken. The chicken is delicious. Tony is glad he grills chicken now.
Sam has a fall. Sam was hiking in the woods. While hiking he decided to go for a walk. He fell off his path. Sam ran down a hill. He was scared and barely made it back home.

Alarm. Tim had been up all night trying to stay awake. He decided to set an alarm so he could sleep. However, the next morning, he was very sleepy. He got up and looked at the time. Tim discovered that he set the alarm for 5 hours too long.
Food Poisoning. Nate was eating a hamburger. He started feeling sick and threw up. His stomach growled. Nate had food poisoning. He had to call in sick to work.

Bowling Champion. There was an old man who was a professional bowler. He would throw all the way across town to try and make his city famous. On the final day he was expected to be the champion. He got everything right and did his best to win. After the game the city got a free ice cream for being so good.

Quiz. When my math teacher gave us a quiz, I didn't expect anything. I wasn't even sure that the quiz would be long enough. I did the best I could to make it through the first part of it. It turned out to be extremely easy and I passed. My quiz was aced!

Check Again. Tim was looking for a new phone. He wanted to check reviews and recommendations online. He found a nice review. Tim ordered a new phone. After two weeks Tim was very happy with the phone.

The Cubbies. Candy was having a hard time finding a job. She decided to look at Craigslist ads. She found a job selling blankets. Candy put her blankets on the website. Soon, her resume had several offers!
Good enough. Tom bought an expensive watch. It was very fancy. Tom kept putting it off. He kept finding it was not that great. Eventually Tom realized he needed a new watch.
Laundry Cash. Sam needed cash to pay for his laundry. He didn't have enough. Sam's neighbor offered him some. Sam accepted the money. He got to pay his laundry.

Piano lessons. Nancy was a new student at her high school. Her school had a piano instructor who was her first lesson. The instructor taught Nancy everything she needed to know. He also worked with her for her next piano lesson. Nancy was happy to learn how to play the piano.
Hair Loss. Tim had long hair. He decided to shave it off. His hair was shaved in an attempt to cut it off. His hair started to grow back. Tim had to shave off again.

The Fair. The girls loved to go to the fair. They had fun on their favorite rides. They even got to see all the different rides! They rode their favorite ride for hours. They would never forget that day!

Out of Deodorant. Tom noticed a strange smell in his apartment. He took some deodorant and put it in his room. After a few minutes the smell was gone. He then found his roommate had used deodorant in his room. Tom felt much better after.

Lost and Found. I had a friend who was lost and worried about his lost dog. The dog was very dirty and I didn't know what to do. I called for help to get him to my house and got help. He came home to a huge mess. He had left his pet in the bathroom with water in it.

Uncertain about Lecture. The students had a lecture. They watched movies for several minutes. They did not know much about the subject. They spent time researching on the internet. The teacher gave the class an A.

Running in a race. My friend is a big race fan. His favorite race is the marathon. He came up with an idea that would work in his favor. He ran a 5k marathon. He was excited when his results came back.

Riding a Bike. Tom wanted to learn to ride a bike. He went to a bike shop and asked for help. He was told he would need to learn his own skills first. Tom spent hours learning. It took him weeks to master riding on his own.

Weight Sadness. It was the beginning of the holidays. My mom gave me a box of candy bars to eat. I ate all of them but my stomach was sore and piggish. My wife went to the doctor to get my temperature. He said that I had a minor stomach ache and I threw out the candy.

Norma Cleans the Fish Tank. Norma notices that her fish tank is messy. She decides to take a cleaning spray and clean it. Once she cleans the tank, the fish looks much better. She is happy to see that her fish tank is much cleaner. Norma is happy that she has cleaned her fish's tank.
Manicurist. Dan took some manicures. He thought he looked great. However to his dismay he realized he had a terrible rash. Dan spent the rest of the week scratching it. Finally the rash cleared up.

Smoky Barbecuing. Jim and his friends were having barbecue. Jim wanted to use charcoal instead of water. Jim's friends told him not to use charcoal. Jim went out and bought charcoal from the store. Jim used charcoal instead of water and had a great time.

Exam. My teacher announced that there is a quiz in the class. The students got out of their desks and walked to the front. The teacher announced that there will be an oral exam. After that, the class decided to bring snacks to the classroom. On the way to class, my teacher took out several candy bars and cookies.

The Windy Day. The weather was blowing in the wind. The dog jumped over the fence. The dog started jumping all around. The dog ran in the woods and kept jumping. The dog ran in the woods and jumped in the water.
The Lightning. Tom was out on a date. They had gone to dinner. They were dancing all night. Tom's girlfriend was impressed. They left early and went for a walk.
Building a House. Tom wanted to build his own home. He researched building houses online. He bought all the materials. He took the home apart and built a base. Tom loved his new home!

She Understands. Gina wanted to tell a story about a bully. But her teacher told her no. The bully wouldn't listen to her. Gina wanted to tell the story. Gina decided not to tell the story and decided she didn't want to be a teacher.

Too Drunk. One night at the bar I saw a drunk man. He was so drunk that he had a beer in his hand. After getting the drink out, I ran out to the corner. I ended up getting knocked down. I landed in the street and I was taken to the hospital.

Molly. Molly was a teacher who had a bad reputation. Her reputation was based on her reputation of teaching the most. Molly would only work with students if she was nice. One day, she saw a student getting bullied and asked to help him. She worked with the student and the boy was never bullied again.

Bear. Bill had a big surprise to give his dog when he got home. His wife was very upset with him. She told him it was time for a change. Bill got ready and went into the backyard. He found the most amazing bear he had ever seen!

Cold Morning. Tim woke up this morning feeling really cold. He decided to wear a coat. He did not want to wear one because he didn't want to get it wet. Tim's mom did not want him to wear his coat. Tim went to the store anyway.

Cat Poop. Bob had a cat named Sneeze. He noticed Sneeze would use the bathroom. One night he noticed his cat pooping the ground. Sneeze looked up and ran to the toilet. But Bob found the cat had pooped on the floor.
Mark Cooks Dinner. Mark wants to cook dinner for his family. He decides to cook pasta. Mark tries it. He thinks it is delicious. His family loves Mark's pasta.
A Fun Trip. Nell wanted to go out. She got her things together. They got to the park. They went all day. It was a fun day!
Johnny Runs a Marathon. Johnny loves to run. He practices everyday. Finally he finishes the marathon. He was so happy he couldn't believe it! He is so glad he ran the marathon.
The Sore Loser. Maggie was a great football player. She went on to play a professional. She played for many years. She got injured in an accident. Now she needs help with the concussion.

The Cookies. The woman made homemade cookies for her children. They ate a huge slice when they were done. They wanted another slice. They kept eating until they had two bites. They realized that it's their favorite part!

Helping Out. Jane was a waitress in a diner. One of the regulars was rude to her. Jane gave him a dirty look. Jane's boss told her to not make such a rude patron. Jane was then given a promotion at her job.

Baseball Throw. Kelsey loved playing baseball. She practiced every day for many months. She was in the top five on her school's team. Her last game came and she was nervous. Kelsey threw the perfect double to win the game for her team.

Hard Work Pays Off for Alexis. Alexis had wanted to get her driver's license for Years. She went to the DMV to take the test. She passed the DMV test. She was excited to get her driver's license. Now she drives her car every day.
Broken. Tom didn't like going to parties. He didn't care for the smell of alcohol. He went to a party without smelling. His friends got drunk. They were too drunk to drive Tom home.

Copy. Kelsi asked him for a copy of her favorite book. He said he'd do it for free. The two headed to the bookstore to get the book. He handed her the book, and took it home. Kelsi happily sat at the counter and read her book while he slept.

Martini. Drake had never been to a martini bar before. He was excited to try the martini at a bar near his house. He ordered a big, stiff and red drink. Drake got into the barroom with his food and drinks. He loved it and decided to go again.

Swept by the wind. Sarah went on a walk on the trails around her town. She walked past a field of grass. The grass grew so long that it was swept away. She tried to get back but the wind swept the grass away. Finally she was able to find her place and her belongings.

Fred Collects Stamps. Fred has never had any stamps or stamps collecting hobbies. He decides to get a stamp book to make his collection more organized. He picks out a handful of stamps he wants to collect. He spends several weeks collecting stamps. Fred is happy he has finally had a stamp book.

Canned Peas. The Johnsons loved their can of peas. They decided they wanted to eat more vegetables. They went to the grocery store to buy more. There were so many different types. They ate all the canned peas that night.

The Bad Sitter. Tim's babysitter was rude and unhelpful. Tim's mom decided to kick her out. He got upset at her, and called the babysitter's parents. The babysitter was sent to a different school. Tim decided to ask a different babysitter to watch the baby.

The Wet Paws. I decided to brush my paws the other day. I thought they would be fine. Yet when I saw the paws it was soaking wet. I was so angry I had to rinse them. I decided to never brush those paws again.
Clowns. Tom was a clown at a carnival. He got paid a hundred dollars for his services. He would wear a black hat and white shoes. One time Tom ran up a crowd of kids. He jumped off and ran off again.

Pie Eating Contest. John and Joe wanted to see who could eat the most apple pie. They decided to see who could eat more apples and how far they could eat. They had pie eating competitions over and over again. They were determined to get through the whole contest. Unfortunately, John and Joe could only make about ten slices each.

A good fit. Molly was walking home. She noticed a cute man walking towards her. Molly decided to introduce herself and let him take her home. Her friend told her the guy seemed like a good fit. Molly became a better friend to this guy.

Running into old friends. The other day I was walking through the city. My friend went out to the park with me. After a few hours I noticed my friend was there. We were both running into old friends. I made it home with them and they all said hello.
Red Sorghum. I took my daughter to the Red Sorghum concert on September 10th. It was in my home town. I took the kids to a local music venue. The music was horrible. My daughter went home early.

Don't Give Up. John had never been a huge basketball fan. He played basketball all his life. He got a new team together. He wanted to make sure they had a winning record. He finally convinced them to win and they won the league.

beach. Lulu was in the mood to go to the beach. She took her car out and headed to the store. She picked out a beautiful spot and put on her clothes. Lulu walked out of the store and took a taxi. Lulu was happy to finally be gone on a beach trip.
Wedding. My daughter's high school was scheduled for Saturday. We had the reception on Saturday. She had invited all of her friends. She had to work and could not go. We had a good time.
The Bus Fight. Diana and Bill were in the hall. They were fighting each other. A group of the bus drivers stepped in. They called the fight off. The driver stopped Bill and they stopped fighting.

Time to cook dinner!. I was tired of making dinner for my family. I decided to cook dinner tonight and get ready before my family got home. I got a plate, and some noodles, and started cooking. Everything was going well, but I noticed something. My entire family was asleep, and my chicken had died.

Sarah Flies On An Airplane. Sarah decided to go on an airplane ride to Australia. She booked a flight to Sydney, Australia. When she got on the plane she was nervous. She took a seat and listened to the radio for a bit. Afterwards she flew back to her hotel in Sydney.
New bag. A man bought some bags at the grocery store. He needed a new bag to move the clothes to. He spent all day searching for the best one. Finally he found the perfect bag. He was happy with it.

Cheap sale. I was shopping on the internet one day. And my wife saw some ads for a sale on the site. We looked around the site and found several. Then we saw that they were for 50% off. We decided to go for it.
Sparky. Sparky was bored. He decided to go outside. He climbed up on the swing. Sparky ran and jumped over a branch. Sparky fell off the swing and busted his knee.

Tarts. My family always went on vacation to our hometown for Thanksgiving. We have always loved visiting the local farms. One year we went on a camping trip. I was shocked at how beautiful the fields were. Now we love going to the local farm with my family.

Losing religion. One day I met my friend in the hall. I wanted to introduce myself. However, I decided to leave and go somewhere else. I ended up leaving my home and finding a new church. When I got back home, my friend was still sad.
The Striker. I took my son to a professional baseball game. A pitcher threw the ball across the field. The bat was thrown to me. My son ran to first base. My son ran across the field with the ball.
Browser. The man wanted to browse the internet. He did not have a browser. He asked his friend for a browser. His friend gave him a browser. The man liked the browser better.

The talk. I had a talk with my parents. My mom explained that I had a gambling problem. She then told me that I need to go to rehab. I was so confused, I didn't know where I was going. Luckily, I ended up not gambling after all.

Mommy's Sick For Now. Maggie and her mom were not feeling well. Maggie's mother started to make her a bowl of soup. Maggie's mom took her to the grocery store. She bought her a bowl of soup and a soup for her. She made her soup and her mother got better.
Wresting. I wanted to wrestle more weight. I could not find any weights. I decided to wrestle without any weight. I did not win. I learned my lesson and went to the gym.

Julie Gets a Trainer. Julie wanted to be able to exercise. She went to a gym to get a trainer. She found a trainer that did things for her. She was able to exercise at the gym. Julie was proud of her progress.
Arrows. Jules loved to hunt. One day, she went out to shoot arrows in the woods. When she was done she had caught four! She returned home with her trophies. Jules was so happy!

Carpet. Tim's dog had been getting along poorly with his carpet. Tim tried to buy a new carpet, but could not afford it. He spent hours picking out a carpet. Finally he bought a rug. He loved his new carpet.
Kids trip to the mall. Kelsi was very excited. She was going to go to the mall. She bought a lot of fun things. Kelsi spent the day looking for a toy. Kelsi went home satisfied.
Bad Landlord. Travis had a job. He was paying rent. Travis's landlord kept making late payments. Travis complained to his landlord. Travis sued his landlord.

Snacks. Sally was playing in the school gym. She was having fun making a new game on her phone. She was doing well until her friend knocked on her door. The person was bringing a snack she'd forgotten about. Sally was not happy to eat the snack, but her friend was happy.
Card games. Joe is on a poker league. He started winning a lot of money. Joe made it to the finals. Joe won the championship. He gave all of the money to his parents.
Oscar's Onions. Oscar had his hands on some onions. He pulled them out of the fridge. He sliced some onions. Then he put the onion back into the fridge. Oscar ate some onions that night.

Kick in the Shin. One day my friend invited me to play kick in the shin with him. We went to the park and started to play. I accidentally kicked him in the shin and his leg was broken. He went to the hospital and got his leg bandaged. I got a great story to tell.

Burnt Pizza. Sally and Mike were on a date with each other. They were at a pizza shop. Mike took the pizza out of the oven. Sally smelled smoke and went to the restroom. The two got back together and ordered pizza.

Comedy Show. Jim thought he was a great comedian. He put up signs and sold his act on a radio station. He put a video of himself in the video. He got a call from an agent. They wanted to sign him to the Comedy Channel!

Beer for Breakfast. I woke up and decided to brew some beer. I looked in the refrigerator and I wanted some good beer. I got out my brewing kit and brewed two beers. My brew batch was good but it was so burnt that it was not good. I decided to start brewing my own beer and made it my everyday brew.
Getting fit. Sarah was feeling very thin. She wanted to lose some weight. She tried to eat less but it was harder. Sarah tried to do push ups. She realized she needed to get fit.

Erin and the water bottle. Erin was walking home. She noticed a water bottle on the ground. She looked at it and saw that it was a water bottle. She picked up the bottle and took a water drink. She was able to drink her water without spilling it.

Malaysia. I was visiting Malaysia today. I went to the airport and looked around at all the exotic sights. I bought some amazing souvenirs, and took them home. The airport security found all my souvenirs and banned me from returning. I felt very sad for the rest of the day.
Thunder. It began to rain outside. I decided to stay inside. I took the cover off my windows. I got up and left my room. I was soaked from the sky.

The cool rental. It was time to rent the home we were looking at. They told me they were taking a family there. They called my son and I and they said we had a surprise for us. It was going to be a rental car so we were in for a surprise. They showed up with some of their old stuff, and we got to use a mini van.

The Stuck Stroller. Ned wanted to buy a new stroller for his home. He went to several stores and could not find one he liked. He tried to take it off the shelf but it stuck. He called a professional who was able to remove the stroller. Ned purchased the stroller and was able to use it in his home.
Break Up. Joe was dating a girl. Joe thought he had a better chance of dating her. He broke up with her. He met her new boyfriend. She dumped him.

Cabin. Ethan took a new cabin on the outskirts of the state. He lived there for four years. When he was young he heard a rumor about ghosts there. Ethan always wondered why he heard that. He went back to his old house and was very sad.

Wedding. We had a small wedding in our backyard one year. It took a lot of work and planning but we had a great time. We met at the church for the ceremony and exchanged vows. When we got there our guests were great and had great time. We will do that again soon.

Rick's Day at the Waterpark. Rick wanted to go to the waterpark. He bought a ticket to the waterpark and was ready to go. He was ready to go as soon as he got on the plane. Rick and the other people were having fun. Rick spent the rest of the day at the waterpark.
Vacation Time. My family was looking forward to vacation. The weather was good. We were planning to go fishing. We rented a boat. My dad decided to take his family out.

Earrings. My coworker Tessa was wearing earrings. I told her to stop wearing earrings. Tessa was very upset at me. She said she loved them but it was hurting her ears. Now Tessa wears earrings all the time.
Pills. Tom had an important meeting. He had a headache for several days. He decided to take pills. Tom felt much better by taking the pills. He got to the meeting on time.

Clarence's Project. Clarence wanted to be a pro tennis player. He trained a lot and watched videos. He finally played at a tennis match. Clarence was very excited. Clarence's tennis performance was good.

Twin Feud. I love the sound of my wife's twin baby boys. We've been married six years. Last month my wife's twin boys had a baby. They were just 2 years old. They are still the loudest baby we have ever had.

We're Gonna Need A Bigger... John and John's parents were fighting very loudly. John and his friend tried to be quiet, but John couldn't. One night, his mother called the police. She told John's dad he had to stay in the basement until her Mom could clean. John and his dad became friends to this very day.

Upgrade to first class. I was getting ready to go on my first class flight to California. There were two different seats available and I chose first class. On the way, the flight attendant came over. She gave me a free upgrade to first class and I was happy. I flew to California and felt happy about my decision.

Learning to swim. Jane was afraid of water. Her father wanted her to be able to swim but he could not afford one. He found a water park and taught her how to swim. Jane felt confident in her ability to swim. Jane was so happy with her swimming ability.
Hyacinth. I was on a bench. I saw a hyacinth. It was a beautiful thing. I picked it up and placed it on a ledge. It seemed more special than I had imagined.
No Swim in the Park. Tom was an avid swimmer. Tom wanted to go to the park. Tom didn't like the water. Tom had to swim around the pool. Tom decided he would never go to the park again.

Pickpocket. Tom was in high school. Tom liked to go to the library. Tom decided to steal a book from the library. Tom picked a book to read and left the library. Tom was caught and kicked out of school for a week.

New Pajamas. Gina had to spend an extra $5 in order to buy her new pajamas. She wasn't sure which pair she wanted. Her mom decided she would go with one pair, but they looked too expensive. She asked Gina if she would buy the same. Gina was so happy she bought the same pair.
Magnet. I found a magnet in the garage sale. It worked. I bought it from the seller. It worked great. I was excited to use it.
Long-Winded. It was a long day at work. I ran out of work on time. I called my boss to schedule an early meeting. She agreed to that. I met my boss at the meeting and we had an exciting discussion.

Bar Fight. Tom was having a bad day. He decided to go to the bar and get drunk. He began to get drunk and began to fight. Eventually he got pushed and punched. Tom was so embarrassed that he left the bar early.

Buying a suit. Sam wanted to go out to the mall. Sam asked his friend for some ideas. Sam then remembered about a suit at a store. He wanted the suit but he didn't have any money. Sam's friend was able to buy the suit for him.

The Dam. Jim was working on his car in the driveway. Suddenly he saw something dark under the hood. He didn't know what it was. Then he heard a crack and saw it was a dam! Jim went inside and fixed the dam.

Clashing Color. Jim had a crush on the red girl in his math class. They were always fighting over the biggest test. Jim decided to prank her by copying a part of her test. His teacher caught him. She made Jim write her the test again to get back his feelings.

Charity. Cindy went to the local community church to volunteer as a youth minister. On one of her classes she saw some kids being mistreated. The kids were beaten by the teachers and kept in detention. The kids went to court to have their cases reviewed. The court ruling led Cindy to support their cause.

Tooth Fairy. The Tooth Fairy was looking for her lost tooth. She found her left side of her tooth in the toilet. She looked at it for a long time. She then found the missing tooth on the other side. The Tooth Fairy was happy to have found the missing tooth.

Christmas. Sue and her family went to the Christmas tree farm. Sue had never been on one before. At first it looked like everything was going fine. Then Sue saw something, a large, fat, baby squirrel. She was happy that it was there that day.
The Acorn. Amber needed to buy a new house. She found an empty box in her house. She opened the box. She found a nice box of acorns. Amber was pleased with her new house.

Old book. Lana wanted to buy an old book. She looked through several stores. Then she found one that was free. When she went to check out, she saw it was gone. She was sad she had to read an old book.

Kenny loses the girl. Kenny is in love with a girl. She likes Kenny very much. One day Kenny goes to the park with his friend. He walks along a picnic table and sees a pretty girl. Kenny goes to talk to her and tells her that he is in love.

When A Family Visit Isn't. The Johnson family visited their grandparents in the middle of the year. They all went to the pool. The water had been frozen and was still cold. The Johnsons then took the kids to the park. They sat in the sun and talked for hours.

Open relationship. Nola wanted to find a boyfriend. She had a really bad case of love issues. She decided to try out for a date with a guy. But then she noticed the guy was very attractive. Nola felt happier and confident in her ability to be a relationship.
Foggy. My sister was driving home. She noticed the windshield was foggy. It was dark and there was a long road. She got stuck in the fog. She took a long time getting home.

Free Drinks. I went to the local store to buy some drinks. The cashier told me to put my credit cards in. She told me I could only buy free samples. I bought a lot of drinks and gave them to the cashier. I gave the cashier my credit card back.

A Man and His Dog. Greg wanted a pet dog for his birthday. But the puppy he wanted was too small to hold him in its arms. He called his dad and asked for a puppy and a bowl of treats. His dad agreed and he got a puppy. Greg and the puppy were very happy.

Disney World. Today I took my kids to Disney World. We saw the Lion King and the Magic Kingdom. The other things we went to were the Magic Kingdom. They saw the Epcot as well. I think I will take them every year.

Choices. The teacher announced that tomorrow will be a history lesson. I chose to read the History of England. I started reading the books, but was not paying attention. I read a few other books, but my mind was still wandering. I decided to read a book instead of a class.

Bob's Business. Bob wanted to open a restaurant. He was really poor but he thought it would be a good idea. Bob had several employees work on a new restaurant. Eventually Bob made enough money to open the restaurant. Bob started selling his new restaurant to other restaurants and businesses.

The Tiger and the Goat. One day, Joe went to the zoo with his family. He was in awe of the animals and their large bodies. Joe was fascinated by how large they were. He decided he would stay after hours and days until he was full. Joe decided he would stay after hours and days.

Planking. Anna's mom was taking her to the gym. Her trainer warned her that she would have to do pushups for a month. Anna practiced her pushup technique for a month. She started to feel confident, but she still couldn't do them. Then, after her month had ended, she managed to do 50 pushups.

New Place. The new place in town is beautiful. The manager there made sure we all had a good time. She also gave us free hot dogs when we arrived. After all that, we walked to the new place to get our things. It was such a lovely place.
Peas. Alicia was on a field trip. She had to go to a farm. She picked up her peanuts. She was too shy to share the peanuts. Alicia's teacher made her take them.

The Yellow Gauntlets. A girl was going to school in the winter. She was walking across the sidewalk. A car pulled out behind her. The driver asked her where she was going. She pointed at the yellow gauntlets and said that they looked cool.

Doggy Love. Tom had a dog named Pepper. Tom loved Pepper very much. One day Pepper started chewing on Tom's shoes. Tom had to buy pepper a chew gun to stop Pepper chewing. Tom still loves Pepper more than any dog or girl.

Lobster. Jim loved lobster so much he wanted to see all the lobster spots. He saw a lobster parlor near by and decided to go. Jim went to the parlor to see the chef. The chef offered Jim one of the lobster spots. Jim enjoyed his lobster spot.

Competition. Beth was having a hard time trying to pass her math test. Her teacher decided to give her a competition. She was forced to write her way through a 100 pages essay. She tried hard to stay focused. She managed to pass her test and make her first choice.

The bike tip. Cindy rode her bike to school. She had dropped her bike on the ground. She was riding and suddenly it tipped over. Cindy broke her knee and wasn't able to walk the bike. She walked home.

Dinner plans. Kelly wanted to go out for lunch. But she didn't have the money for a fancy lunch. She decided to go to a fast food place. She got food and went to a buffet. She had a great time at her restaurant and was happy.
Unending Sadness. Gina was in the school cafeteria eating lunch. But she couldn't stop crying. Her mom tried to cheer her up. But her tears were just too heavy to control. Gina had no other choice.
Errand. The boy was on a mission. He was supposed to walk on the beach. He went there and waited for an hour. A group of people was walking along the beach. It was almost lunch time.

Rita passes. Rita was walking down the street. She passed a store and a few other people stopped. Rita had no idea who the people were. Then one person stopped and gave Rita a dollar. Rita really appreciated this.

Brad gets revenge. Brad takes his friend Joe out on a date. After dinner they went out for the bar and watched a movie. Joe went on and on. After awhile he had a headache and started to cry. His date gave him some pills so he won't forget it.

Brainstorming. I had an essay to write for class one day. I needed a plot device. I went to the library and browsed the book. I was able to find a plot device I liked. I took my plot device home and started writing.
Bored Mike. Mike was very bored. He decided to walk around the city. When he left his house he noticed a large empty park. Mike took a walk there. There was no one there.

Coming or Going?. Lana had been dating Dan for six months. Dan was planning on proposing soon. Lana got nervous because she didn't want to miss him. She went to her boyfriend's apartment to make sure he was going to propose. To her surprise, Dan's girlfriend walked in with him and kissed him.

The Investment. I was walking my dog through the park. All of a sudden a cute kid asked me for an iphone. I accepted, and the next day I got a phone in my hands. It's nice and pretty, and it's made me think of how great I am. I'm going to get an iphone for myself soon.
Changing the Sheets. The family loved their new house. They decided to get it redecorate. They bought a huge assortment of new sheets. After some deliberation, they made their choice. They loved it!

Free Food. I had been going to the store for a few weeks. I couldn't afford a lot of stuff so I bought things in bulk. When I went home I had a week's worth of items on the counter. I went back the next day and saw my food was gone. I realized that I had spent too much on it.

Vikings. Tom was visiting Iceland. He was amazed by the amount of Viking sites there. Tom decided to spend the money to travel to Iceland. He took a train to see all the sites. Tom had a great time exploring Iceland.

Beth wins the lottery. Beth was tired of being poor, and she always had to work. She thought of a way to help people she felt loved by and loved by. Beth decided to start a charity. She put up a sign that said she loved the people and was poor. Beth's charity made a lot of money and she was happy.

Ferrets. It was a beautiful day in the city of Chicago. I decided to walk home and look for ferrets. I walked past a sign advertising free ferrets. I saw a ferret standing out front. I decided to buy the ferret, and took it home with me.

Honeymoon. Bill always wanted to see the world, as he always dreamed of. He decided to try out the travel business that was very lucrative. He found a travel company that was very cheap. Bill made his plans and the flight to Hawaii was in two weeks. Bill was very proud of his successful business trip.

Cheerleading. Kelly had a crush on John and wanted to try out for the team. She was the prettiest one on the team and wanted to impress him. So she asked John if he would join her. John said yes and practiced hard for weeks. When tryouts came, she got the lead cheerleading squad.

Procrastinator. Ricky was an avid compulsive eater. He usually ate too many foods. He decided to work on his food intake. He stopped eating the foods he normally ate. Ricky lost 15 pounds and his obsession ended.

Wrong Phone. Tom was having trouble finding work. He wasn't sure where the phone was. He finally had to ask his coworker. He had been holding the wrong phone. His coworker took the wrong one and gave Tom his job.

heavy box. Sandy was walking to school with her class. She got stuck in a small box by the end. Sandy cried and tried to call her teacher. Luckily she was able to get it unharmed. Sandy walked to school with her backpack.

An Old Sword. Dan found a sword in a closet. Dan thought the sword looked very old. Dan asked his friend to help him look it up. His friend was very nice. Dan's friend found the sword and gave Dan a great sword.
Symphony. My friend's son is in kindergarten. His daughter played the violin for awhile. Her son plays the trombone. She loves to sing. They call me the trombone in the band.

Adopted Friend. Jill had to adopt her first child at the age of 9. She brought him home early to avoid giving birth. Jill was worried about him. Then she found him at the adoption agency. She realized that his name was John.

Dolores the Therapist. Dolores wants to become a therapist. She has been studying hard to become a therapist. Dolores takes a field trip to the doctor's office. Dolores has lots of responsibilities during her visit. Dolores now teaches other students how to deal with stress.

Cheesy madness. Ava was a great cook, but her friend could hardly cook! So Ava went to the store to buy ingredients for spaghetti noodles. There, Ava could find the best sauce. She carefully made the noodles and put them in the oven. Ava was surprised that spaghetti turned out just perfect!

Amnesia. Cathy was in a hospital with a very bad car accident. She remembered most of it only from the moment she was there. She remembered that she was told she had been paralyzed. But she went to see a psychologist about it. She realized she had been in a coma for quite awhile.
Stuck Paper. Jane was doing homework. But it was a sticky book. She tried to get it to stick to paper. But it would not stick. Jane decided to skip it.
Building a treehouse. Fred wanted a nice treehouse. He was going to build a treehouse of logs. He got some supplies. Fred then got to work. He built the treehouse in no time.
Curtains. Lucy was going to sleep. She got some curtains to put on her room. She turned the curtains on. They were so pretty. She was glad to have some good quality curtains.

Typing. Linda was tired of her typing speed. But she knew it would be worth it. Her boyfriend's birthday was coming up. She had to stay up past her bedtime. Linda still managed to type faster than anyone else.

Bored. The teacher took the class out for ice cream. She told us to leave after 10 minutes. We took off our shoes and went inside. She had to get ice cream as well. The class ended up spending the rest of the afternoon bored.

Where Eggs Come From. Rufus didn't know if he could ever hatch an egg. He was at a supermarket and they had eggs. He asked the store manager if they knew what that meant. The manager told him it's like a tiny baby's heart. Rufus got so sad he threw the eggs out.

Big Fire. Gina was at the mall trying to shop one day. But her dad wasn't having it. When he didn't show up, he told the manager. She immediately told the manager that her dad was a jerk. She was afraid of losing the chance to shop.

Laura Does Homework. Laura had a lot of homework to do. She made up a short essay that she wanted to get done. She looked up a website that was giving away a lot of homework. She called the website and ordered a copy. Laura finished all of her homework and got a book signed by the author.

Nursery. I was taking care of my mother's grandson in my backyard. He was quite overweight. He would climb over our fence, and I would take him. The neighbor's dog liked to try to chase him. We were able to get a fence up around his home, which keeps him safe.

Navy. Lori wanted to be a Navy Sailor. Her parents wanted her to be a doctor or an engineer. But Lori was not into science and she wanted to be a sailor. She applied to a Navy Academy and got a job. Lori now lives in the Navy and is a sailor.

The Candy Store. Barry was excited about Christmas. He decided to buy a candy store for his house. The candy store was so good that Barry ordered a dozen of it. The candy store's stock was selling out right away! Barry ended up ordering more!

The Ocean. Gina and her friends were on a vacation in Jamaica. The girls took a long beach trip. They found a nice spot with a large lake. They walked around the lake all day. The girls had fun swimming and playing on the beach.
A Day at the Beach. I went to the beach for the day. My mother let me use the beach water. I was so excited to go swimming. I spent two hours out in the sun. I still felt so good!

Train Trip. The railroad was building a new track. They invited a tour group to come see it. The group arrived at the new track. They learned the history of the railroad. The group was very impressed with the railroad.

Unprepared. Benny has a test tomorrow. He decided to pull an all-nighter. He went into class, but he didn't have time to study. Benny also got caught and made a bad grade. He still felt bad for not studying.

Quitting smoking. I tried to stop smoking years ago. I made a vow to quit cold turkey. I also made a vow to go to the doctor. After that, I was proud of my body and my decisions. I didn't have to get cigarettes anymore.

The Doctor. I called the doctor. He said I had a terrible fever and needed an shot. He gave me the shot and I fell asleep. He picked me up the next day. He called me the next day to say he had found a cold.

Making a garland. Jill's grandma had a small farm out there. Jill loved going by and watching the farm. One day, Jill's grandma went by and she told her how she made the garland. Jill's grandma said it was a lot of hard work. Jill spent the rest of the day going by and laughing.
The bad veggies. I was trying to make vegetables. I saw an old man make them. I wanted the vegetables. I couldn't decide which one to get. I ended up getting the greens.

Mixed Mail. Lara had to deliver some letters to her friend. Her friend asked for the package with a wrong address. Lara decided to mail the letters anyways. When she received the mail, the letter was not for her friend. Instead, it was sent to her old roommate.

Fish Tank. Dan wanted a new fish tank. Dan searched at least twenty pet store for a fish tank. Dan went home to try his hand at assembling his fish tank. Dan found a great looking fish tank and assembled it right away. Dan was proud of his fish tank that night!

The Gem Stick. A boy walked into the school looking for a toy. The teacher couldn't find anything that he wanted. He found an old toy he thought he might use. The boy picked up the toy and began playing with it. The boy then went back into the classroom to look for another toy.
Sunny's Pooch. Sunny's parents took her to the park. She saw a litter of dogs. One of them had pooped on the sidewalk. Sunny felt bad for the dog. She offered the dog a ride home.

Salesman. A man came to a bar to buy a drink. The bartender asked if he wanted to speak. The man was embarrassed and went to talk to the bartender. The bartender asked if he wanted to speak for a second. The man just smiled and said okay.

Headed to the movies. My family took my sister in law out of the house to go see a movie. When she arrived, my sister in law wanted to see a horror movie. My sister in law was a little scared and decided to check out a romantic comedy instead. Her sister in law was not scared and decided to watch the romantic comedy. They ended up having a wonderful time and decided to come back.

Steve Visits The Aquarium. Steve wanted to see a great looking fish. He went to the aquarium and saw many fish. He tried to get the perfect pet. He chose a goldfish. He bought the fish and it is now his new pet.

Lopsided House. It was a stormy and windy day. A strong gust of wind ripped the roof of our house. A large plumber came out to fix the roof. The plumber went through the roof with his tools. The plumber removed the roof from the house.

Randy and his Grandfather. Randy's grandmother passed away. His father came from the states to visit Randy. Randy's father took Randy to his grandmother's grave. Randy hugged his father and took a photo. Randy will always remember his grandmother's smile and joy.
Sore throat. Janet was eating some ice cream. She was really enjoying it. Suddenly, she began to feel sick. It was unbearable. Janet had to lie down to take a sip of water.

Low Patience. John and Bob had their first kiss at the park on a bright sunny day. It was over as they stood and the park was quiet. Bob had to sit in the shade while John kissed John. Afterwards, they sat in the rain on a bench. They had a nice stroll.
The Pets. Kenny was feeling lonely. He saw a little black and white cat. He took the cat home and fed it. He loved having pets. Kenny loved spending time with his pets.

Misha's Mirrors. Misha was a great painter. She had just bought some mirrors. She hung them up in her house. One night, Misha forgot to put the mirrors back. Her mirrors fell to the floor and broke apart.

What to Choose. Joe wanted to make an art show for his school. He wanted to paint an abstract landscape of mountains and a river. Joe decided to paint a portrait of a small man. Joe sat down to paint the portrait. When he finished the portrait, Joe showed the painting to all of his friends.
Basketball Match. Jim was a high school basketball player. During a game he was fouled by a teammate. Jim took out the ball and kicked it. Jim got a foul. Jim scored two points for his team.

Swarming with Flies. I walked down a dirt road. I got out of my car and noticed a small flock of birds. I stopped and got closer to the bird nest. When I looked closer, I saw several babies. I didn't think there were any birds, but a swarm of bees.

Walking and Talking. Bobby has been playing outside for hours. He sees some friends sitting by the creek. They're talking and drinking water. He wants to go and join them. He joins and they have a fun time.

Mom and the Car. I got a new car the other day. I couldn't wait to go to my garage. The only problem was I had no money. My Mom finally made the deal. She got me a car loan.
Breaking the laptop. Tom was using his laptop. It would not turn on. He tried to get it to turn on again. Unfortunately it would just not work. Tom had to give up.

Jane's Diary. Jane had been writing a diary for several years. She had loved it so much that she took it to her family's Christmas party. After her family ate, Jane's mom read the diary to Jane. Jane didn't want to share her family's Christmas gift with her parents. Instead, Jane decided she would write a whole journal for herself.

The Basketball Game. My daughter went to a basketball game. She played on the first floor. She was playing on the second floor. The crowd started chanting for her. She was so happy to see her fans and her team win.

No More Swimming. Sue was afraid of swimming. Her friends told her to get over her fear. They all signed up for swimming lessons. Sue went out swimming on the first day of her lessons. After a few days of being able to swim, Sue felt much better.

Luscious. My mom told me that I can have my new dog Luscious if I clean my room. I began by cleaning out the fridge and under the couch. Next, I threw away my dirty clothes in the closet. Next, I organized my bed. Finally, I organized the kitchen.

Talking Smack. Tom was at a baseball game. He was in the dugout with a teammate. Tom had a conversation with the pitcher. Tom was still in the dugout when it was time to throw. The ball was thrown right to Tom.

Illness. Jordyn had been sick all day. She got home at midnight, and began coughing a lot. She took a shower and took a lot of medicine. She had to lay in bed all night to take the medication. She slept all day and felt better once she started sleeping again.
The Hat. I put on a hat. My sister noticed. She thought I was looking too silly. She asked me to leave. I felt really silly.

Pilot. Mike was a high school pilot. The plane was taking a turn and was about to move to another runway. He began to lose his grip and almost landed. Mike started to cry. His parents came to pick him up.
Shopping. I was out shopping for food. I found a frozen lasagna. It was delicious. I ate half of it. I thought it was delicious.

Password Woes. Tim was trying to use his internet password. The first time he had it was fine. Then the third time it kept failing. He decided to try using a new password. After all that didn't work, Tim's password was no longer working.

Haunted. Alfred always wanted to go to a haunted house. He was a bit scared, but he went anyway. There were so many scary places in it. After hours of walking around, Alfred couldn't help but laugh. He finally realized that it wasn't so bad after all.

Sam's Tomato Plant. Sam planted a tomato plant. The plant blossomed and grew. Sam planted several more tomato plants. The tomato plants grew taller and larger. Sam had enough tomato plants to last his whole life.

The empty theater. Kia went to a movie with her friend. The girls were getting hungry and wanted to eat. They went to a theater. There were no food in it. Kia had to go to the store for a snack instead.

Dandelions. Gina was walking down the street when she noticed a lot of dandelions. She thought she saw them growing in her garden, but they were growing in her yard. She knew her neighbor would have to plant a dandelion to plant. Gina was sad, because she hated dandelions. But when her neighbor gave her a flower bouquet, she smiled.

Purse shopping. Molly's sister was shopping for clothes. Molly went to her sister's to purchase a purse. She picked out a purse from a jewelry store. She took the purse home to store it. Molly paid for the purse and left the store.

Meg's Field Day. Meg had a lot of homework to do at school. But she really liked to play video games. She thought she was going to play video games all day. Then she got a surprise. Meg found out her teacher had planned field day with her!

The New Car. John needed a new car. He looked at many dealerships and decided on the Mustang. He called the dealership and made an offer. They accepted the offer and took John to the dealership. The dealership helped John get a new car.

Troubled Child. Beth was upset at her son. She'd been through a lot of bad things. When he got into trouble with the police it was over a year ago. She didn't think anything of it. Then the police arrested her son for domestic abuse.

Making Tea. Bob wanted to make his friend some tea. Bob searched online to find the best ingredients. Bob found the best recipe and bought all the necessary ingredients. Bob mixed all the ingredients together. Bob's friend loved the homemade tea with all the compliments.

Too loud of a vacuum. I was sitting in the living room and my vacuum stopped working. I looked around and saw the broken vacuum handle. The handle had come off and I was so happy to see that. I went to the garage to get it. I opened it up and it was not there but I guess it would be tomorrow.

Ear Buds. The earbuds my dad bought me in the mail were bad. I tried to open them, but they wouldn't budge. They also didn't keep the plug in. I tried everything. Finally I tried the plastic wrap instead.

The Rookie. Alex was nervous about starting at quarterback for his first time. He wasn't sure what to expect, but he did the best he could. The coach asked everyone how the team looked. Alex's team started off very poorly and didn't do well. Alex was given the starting spot and a new play to work with.

My Trip. My first trip to France was in 1975. I got a job in the city and got a job in a bakery. The bakery was a big success. I was lucky to find a few jobs and got to work there. My first trip was fun, and memorable.

Sylvia's Change of Opinion. Sylvia was going through a hard time in her life. Her parents were taking her to the store. While they were there, Sylvia decided to get into a fight. When her parents confronted her, she tried to turn her life around. Her parents forced her to spend the next week with a therapist.

actor appearance in show. Yesterday I was doing an assignment. I needed to make a prop for the tv show. So I went to the prop store and bought the prop. I went home and made a prop with it. I made the prop a big fan favorite!

The Party. Lance went to a party for his friends. He brought his girlfriend with him and they had a lot of fun. Lance went home, so his girlfriend did not want him to come. They went out that night instead. Lance's girlfriend was upset.

Setting Up Her Sister. Amy's sister Sue got a new bike for Christmas. Amy wanted to help Sue start riding on the bike. Amy bought all the supplies she needed. When she came over to Sue's house she told her she would help. Sue happily rode the bike for hours and was happy she helped.

Prom Pals. Ida was the prettiest girl in school. She had lots of friends, and always asked to go to prom with them. When her friend asked her to go, she said no. Ida and her friend had an argument. Her friend had to go alone to prom, and Ida was upset.

The Artist. Sara was a terrible artist. She spent hours drawing and painting every day. Her teachers were all sad about her and encouraged her. One day, Sara went to the art gallery with her teacher. She was so happy to see her peers, she was happy to see them too.

The Acorn. One day, the farmer plowed his field. He was excited to see the sweetest tree in the land. He pulled the branch out of the ground and looked at it. It was very shiny. He couldn't wait to see more acorns!

Yo yo. Linda wanted to learn to yo-yo dance. She bought a kit and got a pair of jeans and slippers. She took off her shoes and went for it. She had to get it all done in a couple of minutes. Linda decided she could do it easily.

Best intentions. Tom was excited to go to Las Vegas. He was there with his friend. It was going to be a great night. He went up to the bar and drank and gambled. He went home and had to drive his friends.

The hostage situation. Nathan was being held hostage in a local restaurant. He had been robbed the day before and had lost his money. He was forced to fight back to his car. Then, the police came to the restaurant and arrested Nathan. The police arrested Nathan, and now Nathan has money back.

Crystal Chandelier. My niece's grandmother had a crystal chandelier. Her son liked the picture of a lion. She always told him to be careful. She said he could fall off of it if he hit the back of it. He broke her window with a ball and was now afraid to sit near it.

The Wheelchair Death. Amy was sitting in class and reading her text book. She was playing on her favorite game console. When the screen froze, she was unable to move. Amy ended up getting a wheelchair for her accident. She now sits on the school's wheelchair.

The Gift. I opened my birthday present. I saw an old video game I used to play when I was young. My boyfriend said he loved it. He said he would be selling it on eBay. I was thrilled and I asked my boyfriend to get me one.
Pokemon Go. I wanted to play Pokemon Go with my friends. They never played Pokemon Go. However, I had a lot of fun playing. Eventually they gave up. I was sad.
Past Ghosts. I was visiting my uncle's house. I was there to look at his antique farm house. All of a sudden a figure walked out of the room. It was a ghost. I was freaked out and ran out.

Using a Coupon. Bill was shopping with his wife. Bill spotted a coupon he liked. He decided to use the coupon to buy some toys. Bill was able to buy many toys from the coupon. He was happy about the coupon.
Gift. Diana wanted to be a princess for Halloween. She didn't want to ask her mom for permission. However, she begged her mom. Diana's mom finally gave in. Diana got a princess costume for Halloween.

PIE. My mother was having a party. She brought out her food and desserts. Everyone had a plate full of pies. One person had pineapple, and everyone else had potted. My mother gave me an apple pie instead.

Driving on the highway. Tom was driving home from a party. He noticed something weird on the side of the road. He drove closer to see what it was. Tom saw his friend's car. Tom parked the car on the side of the road.

The Holiday. Jill's family loved going to her aunt's house. Every holiday they would make a big mess. Jill knew she had to help them clean up. She made lots of dishes and helped them put up furniture. They never had to mess with the house again.

New Job. Jim is very unhappy with his job. He tries to quit on his own but gets no work. He decides to get a part-time job. He works hard but can't find any pay. Jim finds another job and gets paid to work in the summer.
Gym Error. I went to the gym today. I forgot my wallet. I went straight into the gym. I walked straight to the line. However, the line was long and I got to the door.

Best Friends. John and his girlfriend were friends. He would pick her up at 5:00am. One day he ran out of time and his girlfriend was late. He had to wait 20 minutes. She apologized and he still picked her up at 5:00am.
Road Trip. Barry decided to take a road trip. He drove to a new city he had never been to. There, he visited some famous landmarks. Then he went home to unwind. He was glad to go.

The Don Becomes King. Don was a very good football player. He had an important game that was coming up. Don practiced for weeks on his football game. He was very confident and ready when the game began. He was happy to win the game and his team won.

Time Capsule. Gina's family has a time capsule in the basement. She wants to look for a time capsule. She decides to look around the room for an item. She finds some books. She searches for a time capsule with her books.
Starbucks. The woman put her hand down the cashier's counter. She needed money. The cashier asked for money for gas. The woman offered to pay for the gas. The cashier accepted.

The Refund. I had to take a taxi home from work. On my way, I had a flat tire. I realized I was late for work. I called in to ask if they would take me home. I was sad when the driver finally dropped me off at my house.

Medal. Troy wanted to be in the best way in the world. He worked hard at doing many push ups. He also wanted to do twenty push ups each day. But he also wanted to be in the best shape of his life. So he began lifting weights and slowly began to lose weight.

The Parade. The kids heard a noise in the distance. They walked over and the sound came from a parade. The floats were in the middle of the parade. The kids ran in line with candy and hot dogs. They had fun until the parade stopped.
Cindy goes out. Cindy went out with her friends one night. They all met at a party. They drank a lot of beer. They all hung out and had a lot of fun. Cindy felt great going out with her friends.

The Author. I once had a friend who loved reading and writing novels. He said that the best novel was one that I had never heard of. One day, he was writing it in his free time, and I found out it was terrible. I told him how I'd never heard of anything like that. Now, I'll always say my name first before anyone else, even my friends!
Paris. I went to Paris with my best friend last month. We had a blast. We went shopping and ate a lot of food. But it was the best time of my life. I'll never forget that experience.

Wedding Troubles. It was time to propose to Jessica. She met her husband and they had a great time. Jessica left her friends and was away for a few months. Her boyfriend never told her and made her sad. Eventually, she accepted the proposal and felt a sense of joy.
