Great date. Alicia was so excited for her date with Matt. When they got to the movie the tickets were sold out. All the girls were very excited. They took pictures together. The end of the night they had a great time.

Javier Wears Cleats. Javier had always been a shy boy. He was shy about how he looked in a formal uniform. Finally, Javier went to a bar to look good. His friends all commented on how handsome he looked in a formal uniform. Javier was happy to have found a way to look good in a formal uniform.

Pizza place. It was a hot day and Joe was hungry. He went to his favorite pizza place for a quick lunch. He ordered a large pizza with chips. Joe thought it was a delicious hot day. He ate the entire thing at once that night.
The Bike. I have a new bike. I decided to take it for a ride around town. I got into my bike and looked at my wheels. I could not find them anywhere! I ended up riding home that day.
Harry. Harry just bought a new car. He decided to race it all around the yard. His friend ran over and hit him. Harry was out for the rest of the day. He drove his car home afterwards.
Ruined Vacation. Tim was on vacation. He noticed the sun was shining outside. He tried to hide from the sun. All of a sudden it began to rain. Tim was soaked and ruined his trip.

Compulsive Liar. Lucy was a child who often lied for her parents. Lucy would say something to her mom if she felt that way. Lucy's mom would tell her to stop and go back to being honest. So Lucy began making the right decisions for her. However, she kept doing this regardless of her mom's instructions.

Second Home. In the beginning of our relationship, I could never decide where to go. I asked my husband about what he was doing for money. He told me that he didn't know what he was doing and had trouble in the world. I asked him if he had the money for the second home. He told me to stay away from him since he's only 23.

Samantha's Flight. Samantha was nervous about going to college. She had just started school and feared she would make new friends. She walked into her first class. She met a nice girl in her class. She really enjoyed her first class!

Bad Pasta. Benny was preparing a pasta dinner for his girlfriend. He mixed everything together and then took it out of the oven. When he came back it was burnt and still cooked. His girlfriend was upset and upset. She gave him a bad tip.
Ebay. I found a really cute sweater on eBay. The sweater was very cheap. I paid $5. The next day I received the sweater. I bought the sweater and it fit me very well.

Football game. Joe and his family had just got tickets to a football game. They drove to the stadium to get their seats. They were so excited they got to meet the quarterback and cheer. They enjoyed the game so much they wanted to see it again. The next time they went to the same stadium they bought the tickets.
Cat leash. There was a cat. He was very good. He liked to sit in my yard. I gave him a leash. The cat followed the leash and slept on my porch.

Stage Props. I have to build stage props. The trick is to put glue on them and then add props. I used to make the prop props for a living. It was very fun. It got so bad that I quit and went back to the store.

The Mine. The mine in our area is in the mountains. I went there in 1963 to collect a few rocks for a lab project. One of the rocks I had found was a diamond ring. My sister and her husband wanted me to buy it as well. I bought it and put it in the back of my dresser.

The Sick Boy. I worked hard at my new job. I never felt sick or nervous after my first day. I felt like a lot of people had told me not to go. I felt like a lot of people had said I should go. My new boss gave me an assignment to work on.
The Dress. The girl was so excited to go to prom. She had her favorite dress. It had a hole in the back. She was scared of losing it. Thankfully it was a tight fit.
Charlie. Charlie wants to be the new girl at his school. He decides to be a bully to get his way. He goes into a group of people's group. Charlie is the new boy. He is so happy to be the new kid.

The Dune Buggy. John was a boy with a love for toy cars. He was exploring his neighborhood one day when he stumbled across something. It was an old, ugly car that he was intrigued with. He played with the car for hours until he realized he lost it. He found it when he got home and returned it.

Beating the Game. Ben decided to go for a drive one day. He went through all his favorite neighborhood. Then he saw a sign advertising a contest. He decided to go to that day's party. To his surprise, he did win the game!

Alphabet. My daughter and I were in the sixth grade. One day, my daughter found an alphabet. I showed it to my daughter and she loved it. Later, her teacher gave us a special award. We were happy to receive the award.

Spilled medication. I needed a new prescription for my pills. I went to the pharmacy. The pharmacy had a lot of things in it. My favorite was a bottle of pills. The bottle was a mess and had my name on it.
Obsessive Sam. The man put a ball on the ground. He told his wife not to play with it. Her husband played with it. His wife tried to get the ball back. It ended up falling on her head.
Backyard Tennis. Ben loves playing tennis. He wants to play tennis to lose weight. Ben practices everyday. He finally becomes a great tennis player. Ben is now a very fit, healthy tennis player.
Pool. My sister-in-law loves swimming. The local park has a pool. She went one afternoon. It was a nice, clear day. She went and had a great time.

Drugs. I got arrested for selling drugs on the street. I decided to be an adult instead of selling drugs. I got the idea of doing drugs but I didn't know how. I was in jail for ten months, in a terrible situation. In that time I learned to have my own life.
New Cat. John adopted a cat at a shelter. He wanted to give it a home. John decided to put the cat up for adoption. After a few days, John adopted a new cat! John loved his new cat very much.
Rax. Jim wanted to watch a movie. He turned on the TV. But it didn't play any Rax. Jim had to go online and get Rax. It arrived on his television the next day.
The Book. Barry found a new book on Amazon. He didn't like the book. He took it to the library. The librarian liked it. He bought the book.
tired. The dog walked past the car and got very tired. She started running. The car drove back to the parking lot. The dog had slept in the car all day. Now the dog's ears were ringing loudly.

IHOP. I went to the iHOP yesterday. I ordered a dozen steaks and some fries. I couldn't decide which place to eat. I ended up making two different choices. I went home with the extra money for two steak dinners.
Apartment. I went to my friend's apartment for a party last night. We played games all night. We ate food that night. I bought my friend a brand new car. She showed off the car on the sidewalk.

A light Jog. Sam wanted to jog with his friends one day. Sam was only 8 years old. Sam and his friends did not have a car. Sam decided he would walk home. Sam's friends were relieved that he would be around.

Bingo. Evan loved to play bingo. He was good at one game and not so great at others. Evan was on his last shot with his cards. Evan kept missing but kept rolling. Evan was so excited that he lost his last bingo card.

Surgeon. Gina's mom was an excellent surgeon. She gave her a bath and a pedicure every day. But Gina still got a few cavities. So she wanted a new cleanse. She had an appointment at the doctor the next day.

Gym Visit. Dan loved to go to the gym. His mother asked if he could do some of the drills there. Dan told his mother that he was very clumsy. She told him to go first instead of next. Dan was glad to have some practice.

Job Interview. Mitch was nervous to interview for the job of secretary at a large company. He always had a fear of meeting new people, and making new friends. As soon as Mitch got on the interview, the company was very polite. Mitch ended up getting the job of secretary, and felt relieved. The company was very impressed with Mitch's performance at the interview.

Yevgeny gets a flat tire. Yevgeny was driving with his friends. Yevgeny was going to the mall with his friends. Yevgeny got a flat tire. Yevgeny put on his spare and it didn't work. Yevgeny changed his tire at a gas station and got back on the road.

Fancy Dress. Ella wanted a new dress for the prom. She asked her mother for one, but she said she couldn't afford it. Her mother offered to buy her one with a coupon. Ella was so excited she nearly cried. Luckily, she won the coupon and got her dress.
Cheap as dirt. The man searched for his shoes. He was searching for the sole of a pair of shoes. He found them inside the laundry. The man went to the store. He bought the shoes on sale.

Cheater. Rita was looking for a date. She went to the movies but the girls all laughed. After the movie the girls were going to the movies. Rita's friends didn't want to date her. She tried to get away with it but to no avail.

Food Critic. I went out to a new local restaurant last night. The place serves great food. I ordered the most expensive item on the menu. I got a large steak for only $80. I was not surprised at how expensive the steak was.

The Plan. Gretchen had a long list of chores. She decided to start planning them out. Gretchen began each day and started working. After a week she had over fifty chores. She was able to complete them all!

The New Neighbors. Tim had been having problems with loud neighbors for years. Finally, he found an apartment where he didn't have to worry about noise. He moved in and thought it would never work. He decided to call the city and complain. His neighbors were so quiet, Tim was happy.

Birthday. Sammy was really excited. He was going to have his birthday dinner with his mother. When the time came for the meal he was excited. When he arrived at the restaurant he was shocked. The food was amazing!

Orange Juice. My son's boss brought in a bottle of orange juice. She thought it would be easy to mix. She put the orange juice in the freezer for three days. When she checked the fridge she saw the bottle was empty. She left it to cool overnight in the fridge and brought it in again.

Fall. My neighbor Sue was a beautiful woman. She had no health issues, she was just overweight. One day Sue got her fall and got in a lot of pain. She went to the doctor who gave her medicine to stop. After the medicine was given, Sue's fall became even worse.

The Old Lady's Boots. Gina found a pair of old lady boots in the garage. She took them to the old woman. The old lady put the boots on and smiled at Gina. She asked Gina if she was going to wear them. Gina took the boots and gave them to the old woman.

Bookmarks. My niece in law has bookmarks. She used to sell bookmarks to her neighbors. They sold her bookmarks. They gave her bookmarks to use for her new bookkeeping books. Now she has bookmarks as a part of her bookkeeping business.

What Shade. I bought my daughter a new dress. She liked to wear it because it was pink. Her mom did not like it because she didn't like pink. I gave it away to her sister to keep. She wore the dress and no one was upset.

Feeding Frenzy. I sat in my car in the middle of the road. I heard a large noise. I looked outside to see what it was. A huge swarm of baby birds were laying on the grass. I didn't want to feed them, so I went back inside and called a cab.

Math pride. Caleb was really proud of his math grade. He thought he could always get a perfect score. But every year, he would get a lower score. After one year, he had lost 10 points on his math test. Caleb stopped being so proud of his math grade.

Computer Problems. Jim's computer would not turn on. He tried to restart it, but the problem was worse. Jim checked several websites. He finally found a helpful tutorial online. Jim was able to fix the computer and get to work.
The Futon. Tommy was an adventurous kid. He bought a new futon. He was playing with it. It got into his brother's room. Tommy cried when he saw it was broken.

Ghost Sheet. My mom told me to make a ghost sheet. She had made a sheet for her husband. When he saw it, he fell in love with it. We both had a good time making it. We gave it to him as a birthday present.

Cooking Class. Joey decided to attend a cooking class for his cooking skills. Joey loved going to cooking classes. Joey made several friends at the class. Joey got to work at a cooking school for a few months. Now Joey is very good at cooking.
Ronald's Speech. Ronald had a speech tomorrow. He prepared a lot of speeches. He also worked on the speech all week. It was all very long and boring. Ronald got an A on his speech.
Hot sun. Tom hated the sun. He wanted to wear makeup, but couldn't afford it. One day the sun came out. Tom looked out the window at the sun. It was absolutely beautiful in the sun.
Walking in the woods. Nala was walking by the stream. A little boy ran past her. The boy threw his ball. Nala chased him down the stream. The boy ran away.
Movies. Tim was watching TV. He was very bored. He didn't think to watch any movies. He was going to watch a movie. Then he remembered that he had already missed his next one.

Cell Phone. I decided to get a cellphone for the first time. When I finally got one, the battery lasted all day. I left my phone on the bed and forgot to turn it off. After my roommate left the room, he stole my phone. I was sad, but decided to buy a new cellphone.

Dad's Comet. Jim loved his dad's comet a lot. He was excited to see it in the sky. He would be playing in the snow one day when it fell. Jim thought he saw the moon and heard a big crash. He was sad to see it disappear.
Trouble Board Game. The man took his son to play a board game. The son picked a game they'd never played before. They didn't think anything of it. A game was played. The son got a black eye.
Ring. I have a wedding ring that is a few inches long. I lost a lot of it when I was out and walking. It fell off and hit the ground. Now it's missing. I'm not sure I will ever get a new ring back.

Puzzle game. Timmy wanted to play puzzle games with friends. He wanted to get his friends something to do. Timmy's friends wanted to play the board game Monopoly. Timmy got a board game. Timmy and his friends played puzzle games.

Taking my cat to the vet. My cat was feeling very sick. I decided to take her to the vet and he was diagnosed with cat food. He needed to take medicine and I took him home. After taking her to the vet, he started to feel better. We took her back home and now he's healthy.
Healthy. I was at a restaurant. I ordered a cheeseburger. It was unhealthy. I complained and my food was given away. I ate it at a grocery store instead.

Power House. Cathy's family visited a Power House in Las Vegas. It was their first time going. The Power House is a small building. Cathy and her family walked in and took a seat. The power was amazing.

New Job, Old Fear. Cheryl was laid off from her job. She was nervous to find a new job. Cheryl had to find a job quickly. The next day, Cheryl got the new job. Cheryl learned the hard way that there were new ways to survive.
New Jersey. I went to visit my mother. I bought a new coat. I was not happy with how I looked. I wore the coat anyway. I gave it to my mother and she smiled.

The Peace Corps Beckons Again. The Peace Corps had been in Kenya for about six months. They decided to return home. They called in their wife and children. The family moved in together. The kids learned how to play.

Money. Lois wanted to earn some money for her birthday. Her mom told her she could earn money. She decided to get her schoolwork done. She learned how to draw and use pens. Lois was able to earn money that week.
Smell. Tom smelled something foul. He got out of the shower. He tried to find out what it was. It smelled awful. Tom had to go back to the tub to get the smell.

Infestation. There were many rabbits in the country near my house. I did not think that they had a large family. I took them to the vet. He told me they have an infestation. He said it will take awhile but I should see him often.

The Walk. Tim was walking through the forest. He was following a path that was really scary. When he got a corner, he saw a wolf on top of it. He ran as fast as he could, but it wasn't enough. Tim ended up falling on his face.

Cheater Cheater. Alex loved to eat sweets. Alex decided to try to cheat. His family did not find out he had a secret plan. His parents were furious. Alex was grounded for a month for his poor decision.

First Day of School. John was very nervous for his first day of school. His mom let him bring a bottle of chocolates with him. John was really enjoying the treats. He was happy to have everything he needed. The next day, John had a very good first day of school.

Jasmine gets her car stolen. Jasmine had her car taken off at a parking lot. After she returned home she found it in the parking lot. Jasmine couldn't figure out how the car had been stolen. Then Jasmine heard her alarm. Jasmine was sure her car had been stolen.

Being Missed. My friend went on a date with a girl last night. She was waiting on her boyfriend until he was home. When they got home, she realized she missed her date. She was sad that she missed her date, but not upset. She thought it would be okay to tell him to leave so she could be happy.

Martha's Reward. Martha took a bath in the bathroom. She forgot to wash her towel. Martha was soaked by the time she finished. Martha asked her mother for money to get her a new towel. Martha's mother gave her $100.

Stress reliever. I was working hard in my yard. I started to work on the grass. After a few minutes, I noticed the grass was getting tired. I decided to use a stress reliever. The stress reliever helped me clear my mind and relax.

Fool's gold. Fool was a poor man who loved to go for gold bars. He bought a very big chunk of it and was selling it to the people. All the people in town decided to bet on the gold. Fool beat them all and then made his own gold bars. The people in town are amazed by his amazing collection.

Waiting. I walked into the kitchen. The smell was bad. I decided to put my nose in the oven. When the oven was hot, I saw the smell of burning chicken. I left the stove stove on, and it burned for hours.

The Girl. The girl wanted a new car. She told her parents she was going to be responsible for the car. One day she showed her parents the car she made. The next day she got her car back. The car was a brand new white Chevy and they were excited to show it.
expensive troubles. Anna went to the beach. Then, she wanted to rent a surfboard. She went to the surfboard shop. It was expensive, but she bought it anyway. Anna ended up breaking it within hours.

The Art Thief. Charles liked to paint. He painted a lot of abstract landscapes. One day he went to paint and found a painting he left outside. He didn't notice there was a mouse in the painting. Charles left the painting in his car for an hour.
Dental work. Sara was not having fun at the dentist. Her tooth felt like it needed to be pulled. They did a couple of flossing. Then they started cleaning up. Sara finished up and went home.

Sign Language. Janice was learning how to sign. Her teacher said it would be fun to teach Janice sign language. They took a class for a month. At the end, Janice was fluent! Janice felt very proud and happy.

Pregnant again. Janelle was a very pregnant woman. Her husband never wanted to be the father of their 2 children. He decided to have an ultrasound. When it was time to have their ultrasound he realized she was still a baby. He was shocked at how much he had changed his perspective on life.

Kate. Kate was having a horrible day at work. She had forgotten to set her alarm and was late for work. The morning came and her boss was calling her into his office. He told her it was time to come in, or to go home. Kate went home and had a happy and productive day at work.

First Day of School. One day there were no cars in class. Amy went home with her new friend Tami. They walked the hall and found the front desk. Amy walked to her desk and met the teacher. She was told to walk back and return.

It was his call. One day in high school, I got a new phone. I immediately took it home to start texting on it. I accidentally dropped it into the toilet. I decided to clean it all up. Then I learned to never throw things down the toilet again.

Blind Date. John and Jane decided to go on a blind date. They both met at a restaurant. The two of them both ended up getting along very well. They decided to meet up again the next day. They had a nice dinner and had a great time together.

Paying off credit card. I am going to pay off my credit card. I am going to buy some cheap items online. I am also going to use the cards to pay my bills. My girlfriend is very upset about this. I hope we can work things out.

New Phone. John really wanted a new phone. But he didn't know where to begin. He went online to look for the right deals. He eventually found the best deal and bought it. Now he never has to worry about a phone again.

Fast Food Party. I decided to have a fast food party for my friends. My friends and I went to the burger bar. After we ate, we decided to drink. Afterwards, we decided to leave. My friends were really sad.
Out of Hot Water. The water had been hot. I was making a pot of soup. I went to use the bathroom. When I did I realized my water was out of cold. I put it back in the pot and it worked again.

Belly. I've always been afraid of getting pregnant. I had a very low body fat percentage. I decided to see a doctor about it. She took me for a biopsy. The doctor told me she was going to do a lot of tests.
Late Night Swimming. I just turned thirteen years old. My dad and I went swimming after school. My dad got really tired. He couldn't swim so he had to stop. It took us an hour to get to the car.
Big Moose. Tom was walking in the woods. He noticed a big moose. Tom tried to climb a tree. Unfortunately it got too tall. Tom had to stay away from it all night.

He Returns. Tom bought a new video game. He didn't know that the game would turn out to be awful. Tom was so upset at how the game turned out. Tom returned the game to his store. He paid the store five dollars for the game's return.

Snow Day. I used to love snow days. My school had an entire day of snow day. I spent a lot of time outdoors playing games and working on snowmobiles. I even got snow spray from my neighbor to go in my car. That day was something I will remember.

The Great Coach. I am looking forward to the big game. My friend Tom is a great coach. He is going to get my team into the playoffs. They were going to have their first game this year. I am going to be watching them play in the playoffs.

Laughing At Good Price. Tod's brother, Jim, wanted to laugh at the new kids on the playground. Jim asked Tod to join him at the swings. Tod went up the slides and into the fountain. Jim's brother laughed as Tod stood there. Tod had a great day at the park.

Jenny. Jenny just finished her first day of junior high. Jenny had many new friends, many of which weren't her friends. Jenny asked her new friends if they wanted to go to school the next day. She had been with her new friends for years. Jenny was happy she was going to school.

Musician Signs Himself. Billy is a musician in a local band. Billy works hard to learn the drums and get better. Billy begins practicing at a local club. He finds his drum playing very challenging. Billy ends up not finding a job after his band quit.

The World Series. Last night I was watching the baseball game. The game was tied. The game was tied in the bottom of the ninth. The score was tied with one minute left in the game. The team with the ball won the game.
Hopscotch. Cathy loved to play hopscotch. She played a few times a week. She started to get dizzy. Cathy finally got dizzy enough to stop playing. Cathy didn't play hopscotch the rest of the day.

Dax's Decisions. Dax decided to buy a new truck. He was sad that he couldn't afford one yet. Then Dax had a great idea. He decided to put the truck in his garage as a place to shop for his items. Now Dax's garage is filled with his prized goods.

A Trip to the Store. My parents brought home some of my presents for Christmas. I got them and was excited to open them. I immediately opened the gifts, including the book I had chosen. I opened the book and the first chapter was so good! I could not wait to finish the entire book.

Bill's Big Break. Bill was having a hard time finding a steady job. He had tried all of his classes in school and was in debt. He decided to go back to college to study for a job. Bill landed a job as a manager at the local bank. Bill started his own business with his new job.
Phone case. Lucy was shopping with her family. She was looking through some cases. One she saw was for the iPhone. She loved the case. When she bought it it worked great.

Quentin Tastes Cheese. Quentin has always wanted to try eating cheese. He decides to go to a local cheese shop. He orders his favorite cheeseburger cheese. He eats it with glee. Quentin is very happy he got to try cheese.

Kitchen. I used to have a house in the woods. I decided to build a kitchen there. I gathered all the materials and started to work. I built everything the first night. It came out just as it should have.

Mary's Flower Basket. Mary loved making beautiful flower baskets. She made beautiful ones for her mother. When she died she left the baskets to her mother. She couldn't afford to buy flowers anymore. Mary used her grandmother's old flower basket to make them.
Tennis. Joey liked to play tennis in the park. He would play a game with other people. The park's tennis court had a small lane. Joey would play in it, too. Joey played very good at the park.

Kids in a Pool. Liz and her family were at a pool party. A man was pushing a little girl into the pool. The little girl tried to jump into the pool. Liz pushed her to the bottom of the pool. Liz jumped in, and got her little girl back.

Buying Water. My mom wanted me to buy water for the house. I did not want to buy water because it's expensive. Finally she relented and bought me water. It cost more than she needed to. I will not go buy water from her again.
First Credit Card. Ava got her first credit card. She went to the mall to get a credit card. Ava shopped at the mall. Ava found the perfect credit card for her. Ava got her credit card at the mall.

Inventor. Dan wanted to become a successful inventor. He learned how to hack into websites. He then invented the idea for a new product. However, he couldn't figure out how to write code. He had to wait until he could make money from the product.

Rude Joe. Tom was working in the garage. He noticed a guy yelling at him. He stopped his car to avoid any more trouble. He didn't care, Tom continued working. It took him several hours to get to work.

Arm Wrestling. Sandra wanted to do something with her younger sister. Sandra's little sister loved arm wrestling. Sandra told her sister to try it. Her little sister agreed to try arm wrestling with Sandra. Sandra and her sister did a great job and had fun!

Job Promotion. Sam was excited for his company's new hiring manager job. He arrived early to get on the first train. The train station was crowded, but Sam did not want to be late. At the end of the trip he had a new job offer. Sam was happy he was getting the promotion.

Noise Complaint. Cindy had her neighbor complain about her son's noise. She refused to listen, and continued to argue. Cindy tried to ignore him, but he kept knocking on her door. Eventually, Cindy became so tired, she fell asleep. When she woke up, she realized her neighbor had left his music up!
The Drunk. Tom was drunk at the bar. He tried to talk his way to the ladies. He was trying to get his girlfriend to go home. Eventually he started throwing up. He was kicked out and left the bar.

Doug has a problem. Doug is in love with his wife. His wife makes him go out and meet his ex. Doug meets his ex and her ex-husband and asks her out. Doug declined and asked his ex-wife out on a date. Doug went out with his ex-wife and her ex-husband.
School. I really hate school. I never want to go to school. One day, I met a cute girl in the school library. We made a date. Now, we are going to school.
The White Dog. In the spring of 2011 my family and I went for a walk. We were walking the same street I had always walked. I saw a white dog in the street. It ran away. I never saw it again.

The Reporter. Kenny loved to write stories about local news. He would often write a story about crime in his area. One day he lost the plot for his story and couldn't find a new one. Kenny's friend gave him a story that he had written the night before. The next morning he checked out his new story and began writing.

Too much. Tina got home late from a party. Her boyfriend had gotten home early and was leaving. He left a lot of things but Tina got mad. When she confronted him about it she ended up breaking up. Tina was disappointed but never let him get that upset.

Elms College. Elms is a high school and community college that offers courses in the arts. I just applied to be a teacher there. Elms has a good reputation, so I took their recommendation. I was accepted into the school and begin training students. My students love Elms and I hope to be a teacher soon.
The one that perseveres. A man went to an outdoor market. He bought a great pair of shorts. He wore them all the time. The other people were very jealous. The man bought a new pair of shorts.

The Fruit Juice. Julia went out to the store. She was walking past a fruit stand and was drawn to the fruit juice. Julia sampled a few fruit juices. She found out one juice was very sour. Julia returned home and took it back.

The Wild Cat. Kendra took a trip to the wild for a night of camping. She took a nice spot on a hill. As she started to lay down she heard a growl. She went up to the sound and it was a kitten. It had started chasing her down and trying to catch her!

Rude Awakening. A man woke up to the sound of a large noise. A little boy approached him, saying it was a cat. The little boy ignored the man and grabbed the cat by the collar. The cat bit the boy, causing him to bleed. He started crying and the little boy was happy.

Caterpillar Panic. Randy was always worried about a cactus in his front yard. His mother took him to the store to buy some fertilizer. They bought a cactus sprayer. He sprayed the cactus and hoped it wouldn't grow back. To his dismay, the cactus began to grow back.
Gross Mold. The man put some stuff in a mold. He kept it in there for a long time. He couldn't tell it was there. He then had to clean it up. He then cleaned it up.

Monument. Milton's son wanted to play with his rocks. Milton brought his son to the park with him. When he showed them where the rocks were they were ready. He told the boy to take a look. When he did they decided to build a big monument.

The Tire Machine. A woman drove by the tire shop. She heard a noise, and pulled over. She realized it was a broken machine. She checked the tire and the gas gauge. It was broken, but she didn't have to replace it.

The extra cookies. Susie was at the store and wanted to buy some snacks. When she got out of the store, she noticed a big bag of cookies. She really wanted to try all of the cookies. She grabbed two bags of them and ran to the checkout line. When she walked in she noticed the cashier wasn't there.

Shoes. Gina wanted to buy a pair of shoes for the dance. But she was scared of heights. She looked through her closet, but there was no shoes there. Her mom bought her some shoes at the mall. Gina wore the shoes to the dance.

monster. Bob was always afraid of monster noises. The monster sounds scared him. So he decided to try to conquer his fear. His friends told him to stop being so afraid. So Bob listened to them and was never afraid of monster noises again.

Ray. Ray wanted to be the fastest runner in his neighborhood. He would run really fast every day. One day, he started to run faster than anyone else. But soon, his friends noticed and tried to catch up to him. Ray ended up beating all of them.

Music man. James was going to be a musician. He was in charge of creating his own music. James called himself the Music Man. He would write and record music for others to listen to. James was so successful that he made a million dollars from his music.
Lost. The man lost the compass. He looked for it again. He found the compass. He put the compass in his pocket. He never lost the compass again.

The Bird. I was sitting on the bench reading a book. I saw a bird flying across the sky. I didn't want it to go away so I got closer. I saw the bird fly into the bush. I took the bird home to my parents.

Bird Friends. We had to move into a new house today. The apartment complex has a bird park. There was a huge nest of eggs on the ground. My daughter took out her broom to pick the eggs up. I found one nest and it was completely full of eggs.
Playing by the Pool. Liam was trying to get in the pool. He was getting frustrated. He tried to jump into it. He didn't get on. He had to go back home.

Max Cooks an Omelette. Max was hungry after going out for a week. He was looking forward to getting home, and dinner was on the table. He decided to cook an omelette. He decided to eat a big, juicy piece of salmon. When he got home, he finished the whole thing.
Breakfast. Tina was out and hungry. She went to her kitchen. She made some eggs. She put the eggs in the toaster. She then proceeded to eat.

Peanut. Milton made his brother sandwich. He gave him some peanut butter. Then, he put his brother in his room. The food came in and went all over his room. His brother got angry and kicked Milton down the hall.

Dan loses a bet. Dan is walking with friends at the beach. They decide to bet on a game of basketball. Dan bet the guys who won that he could beat them all. Dan got nervous and decided to forfeit. Dan was upset he lost all his money.
Erica Trips. Erica was walking home from school. She tripped and fell on the grass. Erica had to get a band-aid on her. Erica was crying for help. She was crying as she put her band-aid on her.

Casual Friday. My friend and I decided to make some fun Friday night. We started playing hide and seek and hiding behind a tree. After a while we went to a neighbor's house. We waited for the cops to arrive and waited for them to stop. They didn't show and the cops never got there.

Too many favors. Molly was doing some research. She wanted to buy a textbook but could only afford a $30 credit. Molly got a phone call from her friends and they wanted to buy her a book. Molly did her best to ask for her books. Her friends got back with $100 to purchase her the book.
Snoring. I went out to a music festival yesterday. My ears were hurting terribly. I could not sleep for a week. I decided to have an ear infection. After the infection the pain got better.
Gold Digger. Rita was looking for gold. She got a bunch of buckets from the bank. There were a lot of them. Rita dug a few, but found no gold. Rita went to bed disappointed.

Poisonous Mushroom. I was hiking in the woods. I saw a large, yellow cactus growing in the dirt. I felt a sharp pain on my leg and realized I had a poisonous mushroom. I tried to kill it, but I didn't know how. I finally killed the cactus by spraying a poisonous spray in its habitat.

Cupcakes. Kendra and her grandma decided to make cupcakes. They had all of the ingredients. Then, they got out the flour and sugar. Then, they mixed it all up. Finally, they put the cupcakes in the oven.

He Wasn't Much of A Fan. I took my nephews for a walk in the woods one day. They found a sign that said I could rent one of the trails. My nephews saw the sign. They wanted to go as well. My nephews were happy they got in.
Lessons. Sam was a big kid. He never got in trouble with the school. One day he did some bad things. Sam was punished by the school. They grounded him until he apologized.

Uncontrollable. Sammy was a great baseball player. He could throw many kinds of pitches. He challenged his friend to a game of baseball. His friend agreed to a game of baseball. Sammy threw a strike to his friend.
What color. Allie decided to pick a color. She went to a store and picked a pretty blue. At home, she thought it was a mistake. But it wasn't. Allie decided she liked it.
Shelly's Lunch. Shelly was eating lunch at work. Her co-workers were talking. They all wanted to eat lunch with her. Shelly wanted to be quiet. Shelly told the co-workers to leave her alone.
Visit to the Doctor. The baby's mom brought him to the doctor. They waited in the waiting room. The doctor examined the baby. The baby was fine! The doctor took the baby home.

4K TV. My daughter had a 4K TV installed in her basement. She has it hooked up to her tv. She could see the screen, but she did not like the sound. It could be loud and distracting. She bought a surround sound speaker.
Jerky. John was hungry. He decided to buy some jerky. He got the meat and cheese. He cooked the jerky. He ate it after eating it.

New Friends. Ally was a lonely and depressed girl in her town. She decided to go out to the local restaurant. When she got there, she had a great meal and sat at the table. She introduced herself and tried out her new friends. She had a good time with her friends and she was glad she went.

Anything for Pizza. Sam needed pizza for the upcoming night. He decided to make it himself. Sam spent all day baking the dough. When he got home, he started to slice the pizza. Sam was thrilled with his delicious pizza.

Unemployed. Sally was very unemployed. She had been laid off of her job. She was looking for a job to pay her bills. After many months, Sally finally found one. Sally was very happy to finally work again.
Major Switch. Tom's car broke down often. He decided to go shopping. He found a used car with a major swap on it. Tom bought the car. He was thankful he wasn't upset about the repair cost.
No Free Money. Sally went to the grocery store. She was going to buy candy. When she went to check out, she was shocked. She was told she didn't have money for candy. Sally bought candy anyway.

The Upset DJ. Timmy loved listening to the radio. He played all sorts of beats. One day he found out that his favorite DJ was a rapper. The DJ played a song called The Upset. Timmy felt uncomfortable by hearing the song on repeat.
Check on it. Dan was taking a bath. Suddenly, he felt a sharp pain in his foot. He was very nervous about it. Dan went to the hospital. Luckily, Dan was fine and soon felt better.

Butch Awakens. In 1975, we saw a man get on a train in Belgium. He was carrying a suitcase of candy. When he came across the border, his suitcase fell off. We were amazed when we realized what happened. We never found out who left the suitcase.

Binge Watching. I was in the mood to binge watch some TV. I decided to watch one episode from the first season of season 7. My friend wanted to watch one more episode. I turned on a show that she had to think of. She watched two episodes from the first season and left the rest.
Lion. The family went to the zoo. They saw all the animals. They got lots of pictures. They decided they were going to go back. They saw more lions in the future.
Mopping the Floor. Nancy was mopping the floor. She had two loads of dirt left on the floor. She put on gloves and gloves. She went to take a few hits. She got a good amount of dirt.

Cooking. I decided to start making my own hamburgers one day. After some research I decided to get a crock pot. The crock pot is a plastic item that will not cook hot. I went to a hardware store to look for a solution. I bought some cheap plastic pot that would heat and cook my hamburgers.
Fired. Tim is a teacher. He always tried to please the students. The students did not like Tim. He was fired at work for being so bad. He is still at his job.

Hotel Lobby. Toni wanted to see her favorite hotel. She checked in at the lobby and waited to go on the road. As she arrived at the hotel, the room was cold. It was too hot for her to stay in the hotel. Luckily, she was able to get a hotel room at the nearest hotel.

Boot Camp. In September the Smith Family went to camp. Their camp had a lot of things they would do. The Smiths built a cabin in a wooded area. They spent all the time learning the land and the animals. They made plans for a big, successful camp in the future.
Pantsuits are great for work. I wore my pantsuit to work. When I left work I was getting very hot. I had to cool off. I had to wear my pantsuit to work again. Now I wear them for work as well.

Hurting my mouth. My friend had a big party at her apartment last night. She let my wife in to get a beer to drink. I got really drunk and started to hurt my mouth. My sister came over to see what was going on. It turns out my mouth was on fire.

Diapers. John wanted to save money. So he got rid of all his diapers. He bought diapers for children. And he was very proud of his purchase. But he decided to keep using diapers when he had the money.
The Perfect Couch. I went to the furniture store. I saw a couch that was black. I decided to buy it. I spent a lot of money on it. I could not wait to take it home.

Lunch box. Ivy was eating lunch at lunch. When she came inside, her lunchbox was gone. She searched all over for it. Finally she realized that she had left it at home. She was sad that she couldn't go to lunch.

Midnight mass. The man was a bit out of shape. He decided to have a mass to help with his weight. The man gathered his friends at midnight mass. Everyone sat around eating. The man felt so much better after that.

Broken Heart. Tom was in a bad car accident. Tom broke his heart and never spoke to anybody. One day a girl he knew was sad. They ended up dating and he got the girl over for her birthday. After the two were married, he was very happy.

Teaching French. I had an English class this week. I used to love French. I thought I would learn French, but didn't. My teacher suggested I try learning French in a French class. I was reluctant at first, but I started and learned French.
The Dance. Kara was going to the dance. She was nervous to go. She called her friend to ask her to accompany her. Then she made a new friend at the dance. Then Kara could not wait to go again.
Mean women. There once was a mean woman named Gina. She was very rude to everyone she met. People started to get tired of her. She had a bad reputation. People stopped giving her any money.

The purse. I bought a purse at a thrift store. I brought it home to put it in my purse. I thought the bag was very pretty. I took it to a local store for a better look. I found a nice silver purse and bought it.

The Easter Present. Lori was excited to get her parents a new iPad for Easter. They hadn't yet had it delivered so she was eager to see it. She waited all day until they came back and opened it. She loved looking at it and playing with it. When she got home she felt happy that they were so excited.
Love Song. I love to sing love songs. I sing them everyday. I am going to do this forever. My friends really love it. They are going to sing it all day long.

Eyeglass Debacle. My husband's niece visited the Doctor today. She was very excited and brought a new pair of glasses. Her parents were upset about the glasses but she smiled. Her sister came in wearing the glasses. The glasses fell into a box of clothes.
Cold Sore. I went out on the beach. It was really cold. I got a hot soup. I put it on my foot. It felt really bad.

Headed to France. One summer my family and I decided to take a vacation. We decided to go to France. We stayed at a nice hotel near Saint Thomas. We had a lot of fun and had a lot of fun. We made plans for next summer as well.

Pain in the Back. Tom had a flat tire. It was frustrating because he couldn't see in the back. He decided to call someone to come fix his tire. Tom called and got a truck to come help him. Tom got his tire fixed and continued driving.

Mild Food. I worked at the store today. My manager brought in some vegetables. She put them on a plate with cheese. When she placed the plate on the floor, it fell down. The floor of the table was dirty.

Seeing an Ex. Liz was having a hard time seeing her ex. Her ex would always hold her hand or walk behind her. When she would look up she would say hi. She was starting to feel sad. She tried to pretend that she was just seeing a guy.

Joan. Joan was very upset. She had a friend who had recently broken up with her. Joan talked to her friend and tried to fix things. She eventually called her friend and apologized. Joan and her friend began dating again.
Keyboard. I used a mechanical keyboard at my computer for about a year. I loved it. The keyboard worked really well for years. Then it stopped working. I had to have a new keyboard.
Baking Hand Pies. Karen loves to bake. She made some new hand pies. She invited all her friends over. They all tasted them. Karen loved her hand pies.
The wrong cake. Tim was at a party. He bought a cake. He started to eat it and realized that it was different. The cake tasted strange. Tim had to take it back.
A New Pet. The kids decided to get a dog. They thought about the dog all the time. They bought the dog a litter box. They loved playing with the dog in the litter box. They got to keep the dog.

School for the Blind. Cara had been blind for 2 years. She wanted to go to school for the blind. She went to school and got a job teaching. She soon had students who were deaf and blind! Cara was very proud of her work.

Mom's Cookies. A little boy named Ben was looking forward to Christmas. His mom wanted to get him some presents. The presents were coming from Santa. She surprised Ben with a box of presents. Ben loved the gifts.

From New to Broken. Amy took out her car to go to work on a manual transmission. She realized her keys were in the ignition. Amy went to the local gas station. She bought a spare key. Amy put the spare key in the ignition.
A cat. There was a cat in the park. The cat liked to play in the water. One day, the cat jumped in the water. The cat jumped into the river. After that, the cat was happy again.

Unorthodox Choice. Ben was looking forward to the concert. He didn't know what band to join so he waited. It turned out that he wanted to see the opening acts. He also loved the song so much that he decided to stay after. As soon as he finished, he jumped for joy and thanked his parents.
The Story. The man wrote a story. He told his story to his friend. His friend read the story. The man wrote a new story. His friend told the story to the man.

Kind Words. Maggie was at the mall with her friends. A man came up to her to give her some help. She thought he was talking to her. He turned out to be talking about her, but it was a joke. The man left a tip on the spot.

Barefoot. A little girl went barefoot in a park on a Friday afternoon. She was very excited to try to balance on the swing set. She found she couldn't balance, so she fell. Her mom was so mad at her. She grounded the little girl for two weeks.
Never too late. It was her first day of college. So Emma decided to drink. She went down to the bar with friends. There was a few people drinking. She got drunk so she had to leave the bar early.
Tree. The man climbed a tree. He fell off the tree. He broke his leg. The tree was a tree trunk. He went home.

Teacher Leaves. One day a new teacher walked into the school. The students were excited to see their old teacher leave. But the teacher hadn't been seen for months. The students called their old teacher the teacher left. They all were relieved to be back in the class.

Strike. Amy was working in a clothing store. She was doing laundry when she heard a loud boom. She went into the laundry room and saw her son had hit a bag. Amy began yelling at him to clean it up. Amy decided it would be best if she put the bag in a closet.
Swan. Tim was swimming in the pond. He swam to the edge of the pond. Tim went back to his boat. He started paddling again. He swam to the edge of the pond, and went back in.

Cat Food. I put cat food into a bag and left it outside. The cat never came out to me. I saw that it had eaten some of the cat food. I decided to get cat food for the cat next time I leave. The cat stopped eating my cat food.
Tired workout. Jed was very tired from a long workout. He decided to take a break. He sat down for an hour to think. He got a few beers from his fridge and went back. Jed got back into the workout.

Driving after my stroke. I had a stroke in 2011. We had to learn how to drive for 10 weeks. After the first 5 weeks, my vision started to improve. I could see my friends and family. I was very happy to learn to drive.

Halloween on the street. My friends and I decided to go trick or treating on the street. We decided to go to a neighborhood bar to find a spot. While we were at the bar we sat down and waited in line. We walked in and sat in line for thirty minutes. When we got to the door we decided to leave.
Birthday Cake. I decided to make my friend a cake. I made a chocolate cake. My friend liked the cake. She was very happy. I gave her a birthday cake afterwards.
The Tree. Tim's dad had a huge tree in his yard. It was large and heavy. Tim played in it everyday. One day it snapped and fell over. Tim was so mad that his dad had to pick it up.

The cook off. Jill had always had a bad relationship. Her boyfriend wanted to try to fix it. They decided to have a cook off. They both cooked their food on the stove. Jill won first place in the cook off.

Wedding Day. Today was a very special day. Tina and her family went to the wedding. They looked up at the sun and all the lights. Then they all waved as their parents walked in the door. They said a big goodbye and went home.
The Big Test. Travis had a big test the next day. He didn't want to pull an allnighter. He stayed up late. He got an A on his test. Travis was so happy.
Banging Noise. I heard a car stop. I looked out the window. There was a bird in the window. I didn't know where it was. I decided to go to a friend's house.

Freshly baked rolls. I wanted a fresh looking rolls for breakfast. I grabbed my dough and began to roll it out. I began to put it in the pan and watch it cook. It was a slow motion, but it was pretty quick. I had a delicious breakfast that morning!
Zoo. I went to the zoo yesterday. The lions made me very excited. They showed me all their tricks. They also played with me when I went home. I have always loved going to the zoo.

The present. Jack always wanted to get his mom something. He had a little bit of money saved but needed one more. His mom decided to get a car, and Jack agreed. His mom bought him the car and it was the perfect gift. Jack loved the present he got from his mom.
Wrong Change. Tim was walking. He noticed a small change. Tim looked around. He found the wrong change. Tim put the wrong change in his pocket.

Bad Back. Tom was a good basketball player. His teammates had to go to the hoop to shoot. Tom didn't take a chance and kicked the ball as hard as he could. The ball hit his back and he got injured. Tom was unable to play for the rest of the season.
Guys. I was in high school in 1995. I had a crush on a guy I was talking to. I wanted to ask him out. I asked a girl, but she said no. We walked home and broke up, and never talked again.
New York. My boyfriend is an American, and I am from Canada. Yesterday, my boyfriend took me on a trip to New York City. We went on a subway. It was a fun ride. We decided to stay in New York longer.
Shareholder. I was walking down the street. And a woman approached me. She told me how much she liked the music I played. I felt very happy. I ended up with a lot of money for shares.

Family Photos. Timmy went to a Christmas party. He didn't want to hang out with the family. His family invited him to hang out in the back. Timmy agreed. Timmy hung out by the family and had a great time.

Too Fast. Bill was going too fast in a big truck. He tried to accelerate past the stop sign but it didn't work. The driver hit his head on the gas and they hit. Bill got hit and fell on the ground. He had to go to the hospital to get a concussion.

Bad Pie. Tom had never been to a pie shop before. He was going for the first time and he wanted to get a slice. The woman behind the counter was very rude. Tom didn't like her but tried to get the slice anyway. He ended up paying 20 dollars for it and walking away.

Plumbing Problems. There were problems with the plumbing in the bathroom. It was getting old. It was time to get it fixed. My brother and I made a decision. We chose to pay for it ourselves and fix it ourselves.

Missing. Bobby was walking to school in his car. When he stopped, he noticed that he forgot his keys. He called his mom to pick him up. His mom picked him up just in time. His mom was happy he wasn't late.

First Day of School. My daughter was starting school this morning. She had not been excited for a long time. She came over to my house and gave us a few pats. We had a good breakfast for her. She got a good start and is very excited.
A Bad Movie. Tom was watching a movie. He thought it was interesting. He didn't pay attention and kept watching. Tom thought it was bad. He decided to never watch that movie again.

Double Rainbow. Tom had been playing the double rainbow game on the playground. He was just getting used to it. One day Tom's dad told him to go outside and throw on the swings. He jumped in and fell right down. Tom was so scared he didn't realize his dad would come by.

Jesus the great. Jesus loved playing with his toys. But he was very slow and not very athletic. His favorite toy was his basketball. He would sit in the hoop with his basketball and throw it. He was named the greatest player in the country.

Violin. Randy was very nervous to enter the city's symphony. He had been training for this moment for a long time. He stood up, looked out the window and sang. The crowd applauded, clapping and clapping. He had been a great violinist.

Distraction. When my husband was a child he loved to watch cartoons. I sat by his side and read his cartoons. He told me not to watch the cartoons anymore. When I told him the truth, he started to play with my arm. I realized I was not going to let him watch cartoons any more.

Registering to vote. Sarah and her mom decided they wanted to register to vote. Sarah and her mom went to the voting booth. They registered as soon as they arrived. When they got to the voting station, they tried to register. Sarah and her mom were able to vote because they were registered to vote.

Lemonade Stand. Candy has worked hard for many Year's. She recently opened a lemonade stand at her job. Her coworkers had a lot of fun with it and purchased her items. One of her coworkers bought a car. Candy received a call from her employer saying they would purchase the car.

Saturday Cartoons. My sister in law works from home. She is a freelance writer. She wrote a Saturday morning cartoon yesterday. She submitted it to her friend who wanted to share it. She has not yet received a response.
Dinner Proposal. Tom was eating dinner with a girlfriend. She wanted to propose. He told her to go ahead and then he kissed her. Tom's girlfriend was impressed. She proposed to him.

Sushi Roll Prices. Ruth was sick of her Japanese family having to buy all the meat from the market. She decided to take her kids to a sushi shop. Her kids enjoyed sushi rolls with extra sauce. Ruth decided to go back to buy sushi rolls for every meal. Now her kids can choose the sushi rolls they want from the market.
Henry gets caught. Henry was a small boy. His father took him out for a walk. He was on a nice trail with a group of kids. He noticed a coyote. Henry tried to run but was tackled by the coyote.

New Beds. I had some old tables that needed to be replaced. I found a few that would hold three or four plates. I went to the store and bought the cheapest ones I could find. The boxes were made to hold 3 plates so I bought four. The box was very heavy and I had trouble getting it into the boxes.
Bra. Anna had a beautiful new bra. But she hated wearing it. She couldn't wear it. She decided to try wearing it a different way. When she wore it the bra fit perfectly.
Vacation. Tom wanted to go on a vacation. He saved up money for a few years. Tom decided he wanted to take a vacation to Asia. Tom bought a plane ticket to China. Tom finally had a vacation in Asia.

The bug bite. Julia's mother had a bug. She let it get out of her mouth. Julia felt something bad inside of her mouth. Her mother told her it was an ugly bug. Julia went back to the house and tried to ignore it.

The Cleaning Lady. Nancy is a cleaning lady. She arrives at the house and begins to clean. Her son's room is completely white and gross. She puts all of the papers on the desk. She is tired but happy to see that his room is clean.

Lost Book. Bobby was at his school library. Bobby got lost when he came in the library. Bobby found his book in the back of the room. Bobby searched his bag for his book. Bobby found his book and was able to return it.
Bonfire. I got up to make my own bonfire. I had a campfire. I got lots of wood. I spread the fire over the fire. My campfire was a nice warm place.

The War. The nation decided to build a big, strong military. They called up all their allies to help. They sent their men to various battles. The allies were all very proud of their work. The soldiers were very proud of their new army.

The Pizza. I went to the grocery store for some pizza. I got all the ingredients and set up the pizza and the food. The pizza got put on the ground and I waited. My dog chewed up all of the food. I had to throw the food away because the dog chewed through the food.

Bad First Day. My daughter's first day of middle school was the worst. She was excited to leave all of her friends behind. She went straight to the cafeteria, to eat with the other kids. There, her friends greeted her with nice smiles. She did not want to leave.

Icy Road. The truck pulled into the driveway and was backed up. The engine was starting to make a strange noise. The mechanic gave the mechanic some oil. He told me the oil was low and needed replaced. We got back in the truck and went home.

Fertility. I've been trying to get pregnant for over a year now. One day I was in a rush and decided to take a pregnancy test. The results showed I was getting pregnant. It turned out I was pregnant with 5 beautiful kids! Afterward I was ecstatic because I couldn't believe how blessed life has been.

Nerves for the date. Tom was a very nervous man. He thought about how he felt with a girl he liked. He also had trouble remembering her name. He thought about asking her out, but decided he couldn't. After many weeks of dating, he asked her out on a date!

The bad grades. Marissa was struggling in math. She wanted to be a high school teacher. She thought about taking a year off to study. She still made bad grades. She decided to work to get her grades back up.
Detention. The teacher gave us detention. I got a pop quiz. I had to skip class since the test is tomorrow. I ended up skipping the class. The next day I had a pop quiz.
Far too hot. Tom was on a cruise with his friends. They were so hot that it was hard to breathe. It made them nauseous. He was so embarrassed he went home early. His wife was so proud.

A gift she didn't like. Carol went to a friend's house to give her friend a gift. She went out there with her mom and dad. When they came back she was surprised. The friend didn't like Carol's gift. She was angry about it.
Startled Cat. Ben was sitting on his bed. A cat jumped up and snatched it by the neck. Ben got scared and tried to run away. The cat kept chasing him. He then yelled at it to stop.

Full Volume. I was at my grandma's house one day. She said she would take my ears if I turned the volume up. I thought it was a joke, but I got the courage to do it. She made a loud noise and it was as loud as a bear would be. I turned the volume up so I could sleep.

Back to Ukraine. It was time to leave Ukraine for good. He had lived there for many years. The first thing he did was move to the United States. His first few weeks there he had trouble communicating. He eventually moved back to Ukraine.
Knots. The wind picked up from the ocean. A knot began to form on the beach. There was a lot of water in the river. The wind picked up a large chunk of wood. The wood grew into a large tree.
The broken headphones. Mina was at a bar. She was listening to her headphones. Suddenly she fell asleep. She woke up to the sound of her phone broken. She panicked and went back to sleep.

Chicken to Car. Bobby was walking down the street. He saw a chicken being cooked in the hot sun. Bobby decided to buy the chicken. He drove the chicken to the chicken lot. Bobby had a great time picking the chicken he wanted.

Fish. Tom was on a fishing trip with friends. They all decided to try a new type of fish. Tom liked his first choice but wanted something slightly different. He decided to try some frogs. Tom loved his new pet and went back often.

The Pool. The boys love going to the local pool. The weather was so hot that they didn't realize how cold it would be. They had so much fun splashing around and having fun. At the end of the day they decided to go home to rest. They had a fun afternoon at the pool and had so much fun swimming!
Brand new phone. Yesterday I got my brand new phone. It was brand new. I immediately got ready to start my first day. I went to the store and picked out a new phone. It has been perfect.

Tennis Table in Tennessee. I went to a tennis table for the first time with a friend last week. I picked my favorite color of blue. The table was in Tennessee and we went there for a week. It had the most amazing tennis tables I've ever seen. I plan to buy a blue tennis table next year.
Flute. There once was a man named Dan. He played the flute. He would play until the sun came up. The sun would shine down and he would play. This was a wonderful hobby for Dan.

haunted house. One day I decided to go on a hiking trip. I set out from my house and began looking around. I saw a horrible shape and it looked very dark. I followed it out, and got a closer look at it. There was a horrible shape and I started screaming.

Loud Construction. Bobby and Jim went to a construction site. They sat on a hot tub and played games. The construction workers began to make a noise. They eventually began to play their music. The workers were so loud that the sound overwhelmed Bobby.
Lost and found. Tom got home after work from school. Tom walked into his house. He looked everywhere. Tom had put the clothes in the clothes hamper. Tom didn't notice that his clothes were missing.

Auschwitz. When I was young, I was invited to a camp. My mother had to let me be a part of a Nazi terror. We went on a train to Europe. Then, I went to the campsite to stay. When I got there, I stayed for six weeks, then returned home.

Carla's Phone. Carla's favorite thing to do is check her phone for new messages. She can receive them from all directions. Today her phone stopped working. It didn't matter how long she had it. She had to call her repairman and get it fixed.

Addison rides a ferryboat. Addison is on vacation with his family. He wants to get to the ocean and ride a ferryboat. His family wants him to sit on the boat. He decides to ride. He feels very lucky to be on his own.
The shadow. Tiffany was standing in her room one night. She saw a shadow. It was a very scary shadow. Tiffany was very scared. She turned on the lights.
Getting some running in. Allie wanted to get in shape. She decided to start running. She started her weekly run. Allie ran everyday. Soon she was fit and looked beautiful.
No service. Allie loved going on flights. Her favorite part was the service. But Allie missed the plane. She called the airline to complain. They apologized profusely.

Banana Split Fiasco. My family was planning on having a picnic. It was supposed to be with my sister and I. The idea was that the food would be split between two. I made a mistake though and the food was already split. Everyone got to eat their own food and I was left alone.

The Bad Rental. Tina needed to rent her car. She could not afford to pay for a rental. Her mom offered her a part time job. Tina took the job and enjoyed it a lot. After a while, the car was worth half a hundred dollars.

Saving Grace. I decided to try to save some money on my bills. I researched how to save money with my savings account. I found it wasn't as easy as I thought. I tried it because I felt good about myself. It was difficult but I realized that I didn't really want to pay the bill.

Copper Kettles. Mandy was excited to try corn coppers. She bought a big bag of them and waited. When she went to eat she realized it was too hot. She decided to eat them in a bowl instead. After that she never ate the corn coppers again.

Kite Flying. Linda wanted to learn how to fly kites. She watched instructional videos and read books. At first Linda was having trouble flying her kites. But gradually she practiced. Soon Linda could fly her kites, and learned to fly.
Dog. The dog ran out. He ran in the neighborhood. The dog saw a cat. The dog went to check it out. The dog ran after the cat.
Marty. Marty took a new job. He hated his job. His co-workers were mean to him. He told them to move out. They didn't care.

Traveling. Maggie was always interested in traveling. She decided to take a trip to Paris. Maggie packed up her bags and headed to Paris. She walked in the city for the first time. Maggie loved going to Paris!

Better Cardio. Jim was a competitive swimmer. He challenged his friend to a match of pool. Jim did not enjoy cardio. Jim challenged his friend to a race to improve cardio. Jim won by a landslide to improve cardio.

Metamorphosis. Kara was very shy at the park. She wanted to get a lot of people to come over. She bought a new metamorphosis exhibit for her house. Then her little sister and her friend all came over. Soon her shyness and pride were gone!

Friends at the Arcade. Timmy and his friends decided to go to the arcade. They loved to play games. Timmy went first and got a lot of fun. His friend however, wanted to play but wasn't allowed. Timmy and his friends then had to watch movies for the rest of the day.

New Science. John always liked to read about science. He read many books about different scientific topics. John began to get really interested in science. He decided to become a scientist. John is now an expert in science.

Ruined blanket. I was helping my husband clean up yesterday. I got a big bucket of trash and put it outside. He got a large blanket out of the closet. He also pulled out a huge roll of yarn. When I saw it my husband said it was ruined.

Grandpa Fish. Timmy lived with his grandfather. His grandfather had many fish that he loved dearly. He often took them fishing, and his grandfather kept the tank stocked. One day, his grandfather passed away. When Timmy was devastated, he didn't know he was left alone.

Windy Accident. Tom was playing with friends in the house. He was swinging from a bench. He swung on the roof and fell on the ground. His friends had to pick him up. Tom spent a lot of time in the hospital.

A Walk in the Park. The Jones family is visiting the local park. They're having a picnic at a nearby park. They can't wait to see the new additions. The Jones family can't wait to see their new playground. They all walk in the park all day to enjoy the new playground.

Yacht Story. Jill went to a yacht show at her local marina. She got on the boat and waited for the show. Jill could not believe how pretty the yacht was. Jill had a great time at the marina. Jill decided she wanted to visit every marina in the world.

Curly hair. When I was in my late 20s, I got my hair curlers out. I wore my curlers every time I went out and I got lots of compliments. My friends, who are much younger, laughed. I learned that my curlers got pulled out by my hair curlers. Now, I have straight hair.
Loud Alarm. Tom went to work on a Monday. He had to set an alarm. It never went off. Tom tried everything to wake it up. Unfortunately it never worked.
Online deals. Joe was at the mall. But he saw tons of great deals. He found a pair of shoes online. And he spent a few dollars to get them. Joe felt so great about how cheap the shoes were.
Crush. Jim wanted to talk to a girl. He went on the internet and looked for a girl to ask. He sent her a message. She replied back the next day. Jim got the girl's number and they went on a date.

Keys Overboard. I was playing with my keys and decided to go for the first time. I got a very good grip on a few of them and started to run. All of a sudden, the keys ended up on my legs. I quickly ran outside to find my keys were completely ripped off. I took them to the car to get replaced and was much more careful after.

Chef. Tina wanted to be a chef, and learned how. She attended a culinary school and followed it closely. She made lots of food and became a famous chef. She became famous through her food and was offered a job. Tina accepted the job and went on to become a very famous chef.
Don't Try This At Anywhere. Tom's mom made him clean a room. Tom felt sick. He decided to not clean the room. Tom's mom found out. Tom never tried it again.

Movie. Tia was so excited to go see the new Batman movie. She could not wait to see it in the theater. Unfortunately, it was sold out. Tia was so upset she could not find another place to see it. Luckily, Tia found a movie rental place that let her rent it.
The Shower. Tara was in her apartment. She needed a shower. She called her husband to come over. They went to the kitchen. They got a shower.

Salesman. Timothy wanted to work at the mall. He didn't like being in front of the other salesmen. He always told them that he'd rather be working. When his manager gave him a raise he was overjoyed. He worked there for a few more years.

Shoes. Tom wanted to buy shoes for the new season. He searched the mall for his shoes but could not find them. Finally he found a pair of shoes at the discount store. They were more expensive than he expected. Tom eventually gave up and purchased more expensive shoes.

Crime. Nate was robbed last night in the city. He did not recognize the robber, and called the cops. They came by and told him the robber was in the bar. They asked him how he could have known the bar owner's name. Nate said that he couldn't tell that was his bar owner's name.

greedy. Anna's family didn't want to eat at the fair. But she thought she would get away with it. She went and bought tons of food to bring to the fair. Then she tried to return it! But she had to throw it away and buy something else.

Camp. Sammy and Lisa went to a new camp for their summer vacation. The girls wanted to be friendly but not mean. They had to eat lunch but were not allowed to play. When they got home they were hungry but still nice to each other. They made plans for a new camp next year to be together.

Daniel Moves Out on His Own. Daniel wants to start a family. He moves to a small apartment in the city. He wants to live with his parents. Daniel's parents find out that he's moving out. Daniel realizes that he likes his own life.
Being sick. Tina had an asthma attack at work. She was having trouble breathing. She went to the emergency room. There she was given some medications. Tina felt much better after taking them.
Depew. The man tried to use the elevator. He realized he was in the wrong room. He was in the wrong section of the building. He looked around and saw a man. The man looked very familiar.
GENGHIS. The man read the newspaper. There was an article about genghis. He wrote that the man looked at his forehead and smiled. The man wrote a letter to genghis. The genghis said hello back.

The Blanket. Alyssa wanted to get a blanket for her Christmas tree. She found the perfect one at a craft store. She went to the store to get one. She put it on the Christmas tree. Alyssa's tree looked amazing!

Canceled Playdate. Tom was excited to have his cousin over for a playdate. Tom's cousin didn't bring his dog with him so Tom decided to bring his dog. The day of the playdate came and Tom was unsure how to pick his dog up. He asked his cousin and her dog's owners what they needed for a ride. The dogs owners brought their dogs to Tom's house and Tom took his dog with him.
The Paddleboard. One day Sally went for a paddleboard ride. She was out riding the river. She was on the edge. She slipped and fell into a deep hole. Thankfully her dad found her quickly.

Mark has a bad tooth. Mark has a bad tooth. He has tried to clean it out with some toothpaste. When he tries it again, he can't clean the bad tooth. Mark has to put the bad tooth under his pillow to be safe. He is thankful that he doesn't have a bad tooth.
Song. I heard someone singing a tune at work. I was not familiar with it at all. I thought it was really funny. I turned on my laptop and watched it. I felt like an idiot when the song came on.

The Doctor. Jill was nervous about going to her appointment with the doctor. When she went to the doctor's office, she sat in a room with a doctor. When she sat down, the doctor gave her the test results. He gave Jill some pills and told her she was safe to leave. She got to go home and rest for the night.

Collapse. Tom had a very big fan of the Beatles. He was really into all of their music. Unfortunately his old speakers were failing. Tom tried to fix them but it wasn't worth it. Tom wound up ordering a new pair online instead.
Nick's babysitter. Nick is the new babysitter for his nephew. His nephew is three years old. His nephew does not like playing. Nick does not like his nephew. Nick gets a new babysitter.

Ellen's Job. Ellen had been working as a waitress for four years. She loved her job and wanted to quit. Ellen decided to ask her boss for more money. Her boss was happy to give her a raise! Ellen worked hard, but didn't like her new job very much.

James Takes a Risk. James was feeling adventurous. He decided to go riding a roller coaster. James had never ridden roller coasters before. He rode all day. He decided to never ride roller coaster again.

Ruth wants to play too. Ruth decided she wanted to play football. She got her friends together to play. They met up with other friends and got to play. They all had a great time playing football. Ruth then decided she wanted to play football.
The Star. Tim was on a family vacation. They saw a huge, beautiful, bright star. It shone out all night. Tim couldn't sleep. He asked for more time to watch.

Cookie Trouble. Cindy and her friends were at the park. They wanted to see how many cookie crumbs the park had. Cindy grabbed two bags and began to get greedy. Unfortunately, Cindy could not eat any of the cookies. Her friend ended up giving her a small concession.
The Elephant. A new zoo opened in town. There were lots of new animals there. One day a baby elephant was spotted. It was very big and cute. It was so cute that a big animal came up and pet it.

Uber to the Rescue. Last night we went to a movie with my son in the car. The movie had a lot of action. A police officer pulled up in his car. He was upset my son was out of control. We had to stay in the car for a minute.

Big Sale. A man went to the mall and purchased a bunch of clothes. He got home from work and started working on them. He worked on all of them for hours. By the end of the day he had sold all his clothes. He was happy with his success.

Todd's nap. Todd was taking a nap. He was lying on the couch in his living room. His parents were outside yelling at him to get up. Todd decided to just stay put. He stayed there for the rest of the night.

Room with a View. I went to my bedroom, and I saw a bird. I asked my roommate, and he was happy to see it. I told my friend, and my friend laughed. We spent all morning on the phone. Now we are all on a plane with my bird.

Too Close. Jenny wanted to eat her lunch break. Her mom was going to pick her up, so she put her arm up. Jenny didn't think she could be at the same spot. She tried to walk but she tripped. Jenny ended up throwing her food all over the room.
Cello Practice. Joe has played piano for 20 years. He loves it and wanted to learn it again. His instructor suggested he take lessons. Joe bought a cello. He practiced hard and became very good.

Smoking or no smoking. There was a smoker named Jim who didn't like to smoke. Jim was at a party. A boy named Mike decided to bring him a cigarette. Jim was not happy about that and asked to quit. Mike was afraid that he would be in trouble.
the fort. The fort was abandoned in the woods. A hunter was hunting for food. He spotted a bear. He fired a gun at it. He killed it and brought it to his camp for his feast.

Yin's Chopsticks. Yin is an avid music listener. She loves to try out new albums and CDs. Last week, Yin found a new album and decided to buy it. She was very excited to try the album out and get her ears to it. Yin is so excited to get a new album to listen to.
Racer. We were playing football in our yard. I was the quarterback. I saw the ball move quickly. My friend ran up to catch it. We didn't run the rest of the way back to my house.

Mommy. When we were little I had my mom as a child. She was my best friend for over ten years. She always got me out of trouble with no problems. It was a bit hard to go away. But I love my dad and never wanted to leave him.

Crying Baby. My daughter's cousin gave birth to a baby in September. The parents tried to hide the baby from my daughter. One day the mother came over. She said her daughter was crying and said the baby was gone. I was confused as to what was going on.
ironing board. Allie needed an ironing board for her table. She went to the store and picked one out. Then she brought it home. When she set it up it fit great. Allie was so happy.
Cough Drops. The woman was trying to cough a lot. She had a hard time coughing. She went to the doctor for the cough drops. The doctor gave her a bunch of the drops. The drops helped with her cough.

Tough Allergies. Darryl always had bad allergies to pollen. He would eat a lot of pollen and get itchy. One day he got the flu so he had to go to the ER. The ER worker told him that it was not an allergic reaction. Darryl took a pill and the bug was gone.

Looking for Moutai. The man searched online for the best deal on moutai. He found a restaurant near him that offered them. He went to the restaurant to eat a dish of moutai. He loved it. He went back home to make it again.

gMail Spam Filter. My wife and I were at the airport. My wife thought we were getting an email from Google. I asked her if I could have the email. She said we could have it, but we had to send it again. She said Gmail was a scam and stopped letting me send it.

The Worst Doctor. The doctor was a nice man but he had bad advice. The doctor told his patient that it was because he was overweight. His patient was very happy with the advice and thanked the doctor. The doctor did not tell his patient that he was fat. The patient felt very uncomfortable and did not talk to the doctor again.
