The Forest. My father came home from work. He saw that there was a large amount of leaves in the ground. He walked up and picked up the leaves. Then, he carried them to the tree to cut them. When he was done, he gave them to me.
Potato Chips. The children ate potato chips at the table. Their mom was coming in. She asked to go with them. The kids refused. The mother said she could leave them with the chips.
Raw Dinner. Tom always made his wife dinner. He would always get some cheese. One night he made his wife a grilled cheese sandwich. When she got it she complained. Tom never made her dinner again.
Dog Grooming. Tom bought a new dog. He brought the dog to obedience class. He showed the dog how to roll around. The dog began to like Tom. Tom and the dog went to a park.

The Cable Bill. My phone bill was about to start up again. My internet service was going down. My router would not turn on. I was forced to go to a friend's house to use the wifi. The wifi was so slow I could barely talk for a while.

Freda gambles her paycheck. Freda was in the casino with her friends. They all decided to bet on how far they could go. Freda put her money into the slot machine. The machine gave her a million dollars. Freda's friends all bet on how far she could go.
Loans. Tom worked a long time. He was really bad at paying loans. He would get really little in the end. He finally decided to get a second job. Tom paid off his loans in time.

Jelly Bean Jar. Ida's friend wanted to buy a jar of jelly beans. Ida decided she would make one out of her old box. The box had many of the jelly beans. Ida decided she would make a jar with a picture of her favorite. When she finished making the jar she showed her friend.
Bird. I saw a bird fly into the kitchen window. I screamed loudly. It was only a small parrot. I got back at the bird for not putting on its nest. It was just a bird and no one ever noticed.

County Fair. Lila had a great time at the county fair. She loved all the games and contests and carnival games. But when she went home, she noticed something. The county fair was shut down because it was being shut down. Lila was sad and sad.
Poor Kelly. Kelly had a baby. It was a girl. Kelly wanted to have the baby in the house with her. But then Kelly was scared to have her baby with her. Thankfully her parents allowed it.
Lost Tooth. Tom was taking a road test. The next morning his teeth hurt. He decided to brush them out. He was nervous but it was worth it. The next day he was back with his favorite smile.

Poor Little Girl. My little girl was in the library today. She asked the librarian for some pencils. My little girl was sad because she did not have any pencils. Then the librarian gave the little girl a book of pencils. Now, my little girl is happy that she has pencils.
Mentality. Kenny was on a very high paying job. He was very sick and very tired. He told his manager about it. His manager was upset that he wasn't sick. Kenny never told his manager about it.

Playing a Video Game. My friend and I decided to go out. We decided to play a video game. We got together and played it together. My friend was having a fun time, I had a lot of fun. We had a good time at our game.

Going to the store. I was going shopping at the mall. I needed to get some food so I went to the store. I went inside and looked for something good. I saw all the types of things I wanted. I was so glad I got some food.

Rufus Visits His Son. Rufus feels sad that he has not seen his son in awhile. He decides to go see his son for the first time. Rufus has fun visiting his son. The visit is good for Rufus and his son. Rufus is happy that he had visited his son.

Fresh Baked Cookies. Maryann is making cookies for her family. She gets a few to bake, and then uses the rest. She goes to the store to buy all the ingredients. She finds out her husband has not bought enough. Maryann was very sad, but she made some delicious cookies.

Driving with no direction. Jim and Rob were having a great time out driving together. But it was getting dangerous. They were almost at a complete stop. Jim took them to a gas station to get the gas out. But Rob got into a wreck and was taken away for it.

Rico's Letters. Rico has always liked writing. His friend Tod told him to make up letters to a famous writer. Rico wrote some letters to Tod and mailed them to him. Tod wrote back that he would meet him for coffee. Rico and Tod became great friends and are no longer friends.

The Flight. Randy was flying home one day. He was going to see his grandparents for the first time. On the way, he got a flat tire. He was forced to pull over, and the driver got a flat tire too. Randy felt a lot better when he got home after the flat tire.

Sunshine. Joe was sitting at home when he felt a sharp pain. He looked in the mirror and realized he'd had a sunburn. He had to apply lotion to cover it up. Joe finally finished the application and went to bed. He was happy to feel a better sunburn the next day.

Caramel Apples. I decided to make caramel apples. Alas, I had no caramel. I looked in the pantry and my husband said he had some caramel. He said the store only had caramel. I was surprised to find I had to ask for it from his.

Rainy Days. I had to stay in bed overnight. I fell asleep in the living room, and woke up to the rain. I ran into my room and looked out the window. The clouds were dark, but the sun was shining. I could finally see the sun shining in my room.
Car Accident. Jane was driving home one day. Suddenly, she felt a loud thud. Jane was rear ended. Jane and the other car both were upset. Jane went home and cried all night.

Egg Donor. We have a small farm in the city. One day we were having trouble selling eggs. We decided we would sell eggs at the farm. We all made $50 selling the eggs. We were so happy we could do something fun together.
New rug. The Smiths decided they needed a new rug. They went to the store. They saw the best rug they saw. They bought the rug. The Smiths loved their new rug.

The Show. Sarah went to a music festival with her friends. The day of the concert she bought a ticket for one hundred dollars. Sarah went to the show and had an amazing time. She couldn't believe how many people she saw. The next week they went to a new festival.
Big Fright. Sam was riding his bike in the park. He saw a car coming. Sam decided to race the car. He didn't see the car. Sam crashed his bike.

Pretty Payback. Joe had to pick up a girl from the beach. He picked her up and headed to his car. When he got inside, the girl was staring at him. Joe didn't think she was interested. He decided to just leave without talking to the girl.
Earning money with music. Dennis was a musician. He did a lot of different things. His songs got really popular. People started paying him money. He eventually got paid a lot of money.

Gonna Fly Away. The kids were playing in their backyard. Suddenly, the wind picked up and knocked them outside. They ran back inside, trying to be safe. A man called the cops and they chased him down. The cops arrested the kids.

Too Much Time Out. There was a meeting on Monday. But there was a lot of work to be done. The man wanted to work overtime. He decided to spend a whole day on the office. He realized he would be fired if he didn't get more work.

Free Book. Jim was reading a book at home. His mother told him not to let his eyes close. But she told him to close his eyes and read. Jim did not listen and fell asleep. The next morning, his teacher saw that he had an F on the book.

Bad Smell. Kendall woke up and went to the kitchen to make breakfast. When she opened the oven, she saw something foul. It was coming from the food. She immediately shut it off and cleaned it up. She was able to go to work without being smelled of smoke.

Bad Move. Trevor was going to move to a new house. He had to find the best place for his new house. He asked the realtor what they thought it would cost. They came to an agreement but Trevor couldn't afford the house. He found a house he liked but hated.

The New Job. Joe wanted to change his life. He started applying for jobs at different stores. He applied to many stores and got a call back. The store he applied to was closing soon. Joe was heartbroken.
Overslept. Tim was going to sleep. He noticed his alarm wasn't going off. Tim's alarm kept going off. It turned off. Tim overslept by 30 minutes.
New kitten. The family went to the pet store. They looked at a kitten. The kitten was really nice. They were sure to buy the kitten. The family had a new kitten.

Liz's Passion. Liz and her sister wanted to write a movie. They went to a store to buy a plot. They decided to make a romantic comedy. They bought an extra camera and made a movie. The movie is doing really well in theater.

My first time rock climbing. I was very excited for rock climbing this weekend. I woke up in the morning to go up the mountain with my family. I got my gear and started to climb up the mountain. After getting on the mountain, I started to climb down. It wasn't long before I reached my destination and I was ready to rock.

The Ruined Dress. Lucy had taken her new dress out of the dryer. She was leaving the house when her clothes started to leak. Lucy couldn't believe it. Her dress was ruined. She couldn't help it, she couldn't stand being wrinkled.
The cell phone. Ivy needed to look at her phone. She grabbed it out of her pocket. Ivy turned the phone off. She began to play music on her phone. Ivy got up and walked away.

Race Day!. I walked to the starting line with my first-ever race in mind. The first step was to run a long and hard race. The second step was to run the long half marathon. I crossed the line on my own and went to the starting line. I ran with the other runners, beating my personal record!

Dreams. Maggie went to the beach on vacation. She walked along the shoreline and looked at the ocean. Then she sat and stared at the waves and the shore. She began to think about a wonderful future. She knew all this would be worth it.

Creepy Woman. Amy heard a loud noise in the apartment lobby. She walked to the bottom of the stairs. Amy heard a woman screaming in the corner. She checked the window to see if anyone was at the door. A man was standing on the window ledge.

Crusty. I started my new job today. I needed to make a change in my life. I went to a thrift store to find a new wardrobe. After shopping for months, I found a great one. It fit me well and I left with a new wardrobe.

Sally learned she likes mustard. Sally loved mustard. Sally wanted to be an American. Sally decided to learn about the different types of mustard. Sally learned about different types of mustard. Sally loved learning about the different kinds of mustard.
Prom Dress. Liza was at a high school dance. She was looking for a prom dress. She found one with sparkle. She tried it on in a store. It looked amazing!

Soda Pop. I am always at a party at a friend's house. I am usually a bit drunk but I think I will be fine. I wanted to try a soda pop. I took a small, sweet pop and popped it in my mouth. The soda pop was horrible!
Scuba diving. A boy went scuba diving on the lake. It was really cold and dangerous. He was scared of the shark. The shark attacked him. The boy was okay.

Plastic Life. Bob went to the store to buy some plastic for a living. He bought tons of containers. One container was only for plastic bottles and not for plastic cups. Bob bought a bag of coffee cups instead of cups. Bob was happy with his purchase decision.

Sick Days. Jim had a job, but he didn't want to quit. He tried to go to school, but it wasn't long before he got sick. He missed a lot of days of work, but eventually he got his bills paid. Jim was now back to work and loving the job. He decided to stay with his work even if he was sick.

Lost tooth. Lucy was looking at her tooth. She felt a sharp pain in her left side. She pulled on it but it was stuck. She then felt her finger pull it. She pulled it out and it was free from the clavicle.

The String. The teacher assigned us a string to play in the gym. I thought the string was very strong and tough. I was very proud of the way the string made my body tense. I got really sick at the gym. The teacher gave me a second assignment because of my sick.

Concert ADventures. Tom and his friends went to a local venue to go see a concert. They got in line at the very front of the line. After some time the concert began. Tom and his friends played their favorite songs. Tom enjoyed the night very much.
Weird Assist. Tom bought a new car. The car's gas tank was broken. Tom's car needed oil and it had a lot of stuff. Tom's car couldn't start. Tom had to get a new car and it took weeks.

Dance Myla Dance. My son loves to sing. The only thing he loves more than singing is dance. Last night he was very excited to dance. I told him we should make it a party. I am so excited to dance with him.

Logic puzzle beat. Tina was having a difficult time with her math. She needed some sort of game mechanic. She looked at the website for one. She then called her friend Joe to help her. He gave her the game mechanic and helped her solve her math.

Playing Hookey. I took a walk with my friend and his two dogs. I picked up a few rocks in the road. We started to dig through the rocks. We found a large bone and brought it back to my friend. He told me that he's not a hunter and I don't know what to do.

Lasagna. I bought my boyfriend a lasagna at a store last week. We had to wait in line for about 30 minutes. It wasn't worth waiting in line for. He ended up eating it. He got angry because he didn't want it.

Too many babies. Jed had been trying to have a child for several Year's. He finally got pregnant with his new baby. Unfortunately his parents made him get a vasectomy. He was scared he would have to cancel the pregnancy. After being nervous about it all day he was relieved it was over.

Disturbed. I found a bear in the woods. I decided to take him to the shelter to be rescued. My boyfriend told me that he felt sorry for it. He put it in a box. I gave it back to my boyfriend and left.
The Lazy Dog. One day I went to the park with a friend. I wanted to play on a slide. My friend said he had no money. He asked me if I had money to ride. I had no money.

Forgiveness. One day I went to visit my grandparents. My grandparents were very nice and friendly to me. However, one of my brothers found out that he left for a long time. This made me sad because I lost him over a year ago. So, I left, but I didn't know that he did.

Stolen fragrance. Kelly and her friends were having a party. Kelly wanted to buy some stables. She grabbed some but could not find the right one. It looked like her friend had stolen it. She had to get rid of the whole thing.

Test. Molly took a test for her chemistry class. She had been studying for this test all year. She felt confident that she would pass. On the day of the test, Molly felt nervous. Molly was surprised to see she got an A.

Loans. Kenny always wanted to move to Europe. He wanted to live with his grandparents. He worked very hard to save up his money. Soon enough, he had enough to pay for a house in England. He was happy he could live with his grandparents now.

Don't Bite. Dan's brother dared him to bite his chicken. Dan hesitated and then gave in. However, he ended up losing his grip on his chicken. He could not hold it back and ended up tearing it. However, Dan wasn't hurt.
Chocolate. Cindy had been feeling sick. She decided to see a doctor. The doctor told her to take some medicine. She was able to take it. She then felt much better.

Closet Game. Dan has a closet in his basement. Dan has been playing video games for a week. He finds that he has to stop playing for a while. He decides to play a game online. Dan plays the game and beats his closet game.

Alien Toy. I had a dog named Margo. Margo was very curious about something on my couch. She kept going to the living room and looking for a toy. The toy was in the living room. I told her not to touch it.
Fishing Time. Jim wanted to go fishing. He told his dad to take him. But his dad said no. Jim's dad showed him where to sit. They sat in the boat and had lots of fun.
Depression. Tim was very depressed. He had been trying to get help. One day he had a friend who talked to him about it. Tim started to listen to him. Soon he was back to feeling good.

Carl's Computer. Carl wanted to buy a computer to work with at work. Carl didn't have enough money to buy one. Carl went shopping in his local supermarket. He found the computer he wanted. Carl paid for the computer.

Smoking. Tom wanted to stop smoking cigarettes. Tom went to a local store. Tom tried a pack of cigarettes. Tom was surprised at how good the cigarettes were. He decided to stop smoking cigarettes immediately.

Music. My roommate was an electrician. One day, he knocked on my front door. He asked if I was ready for a party. I decided to go to a music concert. My roommate was impressed by the band's performance.

Camel. It had been an exciting day for the Smith family to go camelback riding. They made it a point of taking pictures. When they got to the ranch they were able to see all of it. They had a great time. They vowed to do it again this year.
Cost. Tim was at an expensive mall. He wanted to buy a pair of shoes. They were only on sale for a few dollars. Tim could not find the pair he wanted. He then paid them back and returned home.
Tag 2. Sam's friend played a game of tag. Sam's friend went too far. Sam couldn't see the ball going the other way. His friend got mad. Sam gave up on his friend.
Game at the Bar. Bob was going to a bar. He was going to have a beer. His friends decided to go with him. He had fun playing the game. He ended up leaving with five beers.
Rifle. Cathy always wanted to be a hunter. She learned how to hunt from her uncle. She started training for years. Cathy was finally ready to hunt. She successfully hunted all the deer she saw.

Missing the meteor shower. Timmy loved going to the park. He would go every time he got to the park. One day he didn't show up for the meteor shower. He got out of the car and searched the park. Timmy found out that it was just an accident and he went back to the car.

Tim's new love. Tim was in love with this girl at school. It was love at first sight. One day Tim decided to sneak out. Tim ran into her and asked for a spot in the school. The girl told him she would marry him because she loved him.

The Carrots. Kim's mom always made her clean the living room. She thought it would be nice to take Kim to the vegetable aisle. She bought vegetables for the house. Kim loved cleaning and ate the vegetables from the shelves. Kim was pleased with the vegetables she bought.

The kings defeat. The king of Egypt decided to conquer the city of Atlantis. He travelled to the city with his army and army. He was planning to invade when the day came to invade. He gathered his army and started his war. The king of Egypt was killed and his armies lost.
String Bikini. Nathan liked to swim. He bought a string bikini. He wore the bikini to school. He didn't wear a belt to swim. Now he's embarrassed for wearing the bikini.

Neck. When I got home my mother wanted to know if I had been wearing my hair. She was too scared to ask me. I was confused as to why she was asking. Finally, she told me to sit on the chair and listen. Now, I listen as my mother gives me some compliments.

my computer mouse. I was on the computer the other day and I needed to get ready. The mouse that I had I could not find anywhere. I went back and forth searching the entire room but I could not find it. I realized it was in my backpack the entire time. I looked under my bed and there it was.

Fish Story. Amy was at the beach with her friends. It was dark so they all hid in the sun. She didn't see a fish that day. When she woke up she knew she had eaten it. She thought her friends didn't do it as well.

Money Does Buy Love. Gina and Tami are best friends. The girls have a lot of good friends. One day Gina saw a guy who she didn't like anymore. She was heartbroken because she didn't like him. But Tami didn't let it happen.

Lost Dog. Sam lost his puppy. He couldn't find his puppy anywhere. Sam eventually had to call animal control. The dog's owner showed up at Sam's house to pick him up. The dog's owner came and was happy to see Sam's puppy!

Clowns. I got a new clown for my birthday. He was very cute and sweet. He wanted to join my Christmas tree this year. Unfortunately my dad said he can't have any clowns. I decided to get a puppy instead.

Child Visitation. Katherine and her husband moved in together. She started to feel sick. She wanted to go to the doctor to see what was wrong. Her husband said she needed to see a doctor. After a few months she found out she was pregnant.

Winter Break. It was February and the school was closed. They would be out of class for two days. There was a lot of snow on the ground and lots of ice on the ground. So I went to the mall to buy some snow shoes. When the school opened it was a snow day.

Free Samples. Kate was at a restaurant. She had ordered a sample of chicken nuggets. The waitress brought the food to Kate. The waitress told Kate she forgot her sample in her bag. Kate ordered the rest and got the free sample.

SnapChat Photos. My friend asked me to snapchat some pictures of our friend. The picture was of our friend's wife. I did not snapchat. I did not find out she died. My friend was sad and depressed that she did not snapchat.
Ticket. Amy was driving to work. She got a ticket. She pulled over and paid. She was able to fix it. The ticket was reduced and she felt great.
Swap Meet Sunday. We went to the swap meet today. The swap meet is in the park. There was a lot of traffic on the highway. The crowd was pretty empty. We were late to meet up.

Watching a Movie. I decided I would watch a movie one day. I got my laptop out and checked my phone. I realized my phone was broken and I would have to use an Xbox 360. I bought a Xbox 360 and had fun watching a movie. I still had a fun movie and went back to watching other ones.

Work Day. Bob was working for a new company on the computer. He was working on a program that would help the company. He spent all morning working on it. He was really excited that night when he had to go home. He knew that he would have to finish the program.

After the Fight. Kia went to a gym with her friend. There was a girl and a guy there. Kia was in love with both girls and wanted to know the other. She tried to ask them to talk to her but they wouldn't. Kia's friend made up her mind about both of them.

Wardrobe Malfunction. Jackie was cleaning out her closet. She was getting rid of her old clothes. She found a box with her old clothes. She began cleaning out the clothing. She was relieved when she found a broken robe there.

Jason's camping trip. Jason is out camping with his friends. He gets food poisoning. Jason is rushed to the hospital. He misses out on the rest of his friends camping. Jason gets sick after he gets home.

Golden Glow. Diane was looking through a store window. Suddenly, she saw her favorite candies. Diane ran out of the store, running the whole way. When she got back, she saw her wallet on the floor. Diane found out she couldn't purchase her candies because they were stolen.
Basement. I took my kids to the basement. It was so dark and dark. We all crept in slowly. We heard a loud crashing noise. It was my son's old teddy bear.
The carnival. Kathy was excited to visit the carnival. She had never been before. She bought lots of things for the kids. She had a lot of fun. It was a lot of fun.

Bitten by a Squirrel. Bobby was walking home from school. He heard a strange noise in his yard. Bobby looked into his yard to find a nest of a Squirrel. He found a huge, black spider and screamed. He realized the spider was a skunk.

Samantha Makes Breakfast. Samantha was feeling a bit hungry. She was looking through her cabinet for something to eat. Samantha found a bowl of cereal that was out of date. Samantha decided to make a bowl of cereal herself. Samantha was able to make a delicious breakfast for herself.

Ants. Tommy was playing in the dirt on his yard. Tommy's dirt ball landed in a patch of ants. Tommy ran inside to get his dirt ball. Tommy's mom told him not to play on the dirt. Tommy's mom was right.
Shaving Cut. Tom was shaving his head. He didn't know how to clean it. It was a little too big. He accidentally pushed too hard. It cut his head and he cried.
The Campfire. Tom loved the outdoors. He wanted to build a big campfire. Tom built a big fire. He had it lit by the fire. It started a fire and Tom had fun!
Brick. Lorraine was at the mall. She found a new store and went inside. The store was selling bricks. Lorraine picked a brick and took it home. It cost a lot but she was glad she got it.
Sparrow. Cora was playing in the park. She heard a small bird chirping outside. She ran home to see what it was. It was a sparrow! Cora decided to keep the bird so she could watch her friend.

Goals. Jenna wanted to be a dancer. She decided to get a part in a dance school. After many weeks of practice, Jenna was the best dancer. The school put her on a local competition show. Jenna got the spot on the show.

A Fast Ride. One day a lady decided to go for a fast ride with her son. She had to wait for her son to get to the destination. He was already there, so she drove fast through the lane. After a mile the lady was finally there and her son was there. Her son was so happy he took her for the ride.

Chinese Broccoli. I bought a container of Chinese broccoli. I didn't realize it would take so long to cook. I thought it would take me an hour. When I took it out of the fridge, it was delicious. I couldn't wait to cook it more.

Sand Castle. Joe's family was at a beach. He was bored and wanted to build a sand castle. He decided to build a small fort in the sand. He put on some heavy duty sandals. When Joe finished building the fort it was a giant success.
The Dog. The dog ran out the door. It ran all over the house. The owner opened the door to let it out. The dog chased the owner. The dog stopped chasing and chased the owner.

In the Dark, all Cats are Black. The man went to the park. It was dark and he was scared of dark. A cat walked out of the park. The cat chased him down the park. He then stopped running and it was night again.

Not funny. I was making breakfast. I was eating peanut butter and banana bread. I looked down to see that I had no cheese. I asked my daughter if she was hungry. She said she wasn't hungry, but she was happy with me.
The Roller Skates. Ricky went skating with his friends. He ran into a patch of ice. Ricky tried to ice skate across the ice. He got stuck in the ice. He had to stop skating.

Maya the Writer. Maya loved to read but had to turn the page quickly. She had a large collection of books and notebooks. One day she saw a cute, friendly dog and decided to adopt him. Her parents didn't think the dog would be friendly, but Maya insisted. She was so happy to have her new dog, and she didn't want to go home.

Skydiving. Sally took a trip to the lake. Sally saw a skydiver that she really liked. Sally bought a ticket for a skydiving trip. Sally was very excited to go skydiving. Sally had the experience of her life.

Innovation. In 1973, our condo had an open house. The building owner asked me to design a building with a new technology. I made an electronic system to display the board for visitors. We spent months with the board, creating a new floor. The new floor was called the Inovation, and the residents loved it.

Angry man on the bus. John was working on a project. He was working on an assignment for a big company. Suddenly, a man in a hat came to his work. John asked him if he needed anything. The man turned around and told John he didn't need anything.

Biking with Noah. Adam loved biking. He got his first new bike when he was ten. He decided to teach his brother how to ride. His brother was very good at it. Adam was happy to teach his brother how to ride his bike.

Paula Plays Harpsichord. Paula loves to play the harpsichord. However, she knows her friends will never join her. Finally Paula finds a friend to join her. Paula is happy to have someone to play her harpsichord with. Paula now plays her harpsichord every day with her friend.
Depression. Rachael felt depressed one day. She did not know how to get out of it. So, she decided to go to therapy. It helped her a lot. Eventually, she learned how to cope better.

Steps. The teacher asked all the students if they would do some tests. The kids took off their shoes and shoes, Then, they walked over to the exam. They took out their test papers. They did all the answers in the test and got a C.

Harp. Nora bought a new hairdresser at the mall. He was very nice and friendly. But he also was a very lazy hairdresser. Nora decided to save her money and buy a cheaper one. She was much happier with the cheaper one than the new one.

A Dog Savior. The dog ran up and sniffed the ground. I put some new toys under the dog and got him a treat. I told the dog that it needed a bowl and food and he ate them quickly. I waited for him to poop the next day. The dog has come a long time without pooping the ground.

Baseball Injury. My daughter played in a baseball game. The coach yelled to hit a batter in the head. She decided to try a fastball instead of the baseball. The coach hit her with the baseball after the ball. She was knocked out.
Jump Rope. Jane was walking in the park. She noticed a jump rope. Jane went up and caught it. It took a little while but she was able to jump rope. Jane was able to learn to jump rope.

Playing Checkers. I always hated playing checkers with my friend. So, when I saw a friend play checkers with me, I thought she was lame. I asked her if she had gotten in trouble for being a bad player. And she replied, no. I was thrilled when she told me about her good time.

Cats are crazy. Jim and Tina were at a flea market. They were in search of a good cat for their home. A local dealer offered them a black cat, with black stripes and a long tail. Jim bought the cat and Tina paid the dealer a lot of money. Jim and Tina decided to keep the cat as a cat friend.
Bad pie. Allie went to the store to buy a pie. The lady at the store had it in her basket. It was green. Allie didn't like it but the price was too high. Allie had to order it online.
Dare. My son went to the park. His friends dared him to go up to the water slide. He didn't dare to do so. My son got scared. He fell to the bottom.

Homework. Sam had to do homework at school. His mother was supposed to bring him a snack. He didn't have time to bring a snack. Instead he made cookies. His mom was angry at him for not bringing his snack.

The Bad Potter. Jack was a bad potter. He would always get into fights and hurt his friends. One day he found out about being sued. Jack decided to fight the lawsuit. Jack got a lot of money but the lawsuit was against him.

Test Drive. The salesman showed up with a salesman's test drive in his car. He took off down the road at a snail's pace. There was traffic on the road behind him as well as a truck stuck in the ice. As soon as the salesman exited the truck, the truck broke down. The salesman was forced to return the test drive and was forced to return.

Cutting School. My son started to cut up school supplies. He was supposed to cut down his own food. I complained to his mother. Her mother took him to see the principal. The principal got a bad grade on the report card.
Found Wallet. Tim got a call from a friend. He decided to look it up. It turned out it was in his wallet. Tim gave the friend his number. Luckily, they exchanged it right away.

Bad cold. It was the last day of school and allie was starting to get sick. She had to go to the doctor for a cold. When she got to the doctor she was sick. The doctor told her she had a bad cold. Allie was given a cold remedy.

Mail. I received a small package on Monday. The package stated the package was from me and was from me. I was extremely happy and opened the package. I found a large envelope in the bottom of the package. I opened the envelope and found a check in the package.

To The Bathroom. Eli had a very big dog. It would get up and down the tub in the house. Eli was always tired of it getting dirty. One day his dog got very sick. Eli had to go to the bathroom so his dog could rest.

New Sandals. Alicia loves to wear sandals. The other day, she got sandals she thought were too cool. However, she broke the sandals and realized it was very dirty. Alicia cleaned them to make sure they looked great. When she went out, she walked with a fresh new sandal.
Going to the drive in. Jenna wanted to go to the drive in. Her brother wanted to go. They argued over who should go. The two girls were not allowed to go. They agreed to watch a movie instead.

Waste of an Hour. A man took his car out for the weekend. On the way there he was hit by a small vehicle. He was taken home and told it was his fault. The insurance company gave him $500. The man was mad but he did it anyway.

Beach Trip. One day the Smiths decided to take a beach trip. They packed all their bathing suits and headed off. The first day of the trip they swam all around the beach. They relaxed and ate lunch and had a lot of fun. After lunch they had a good day at the beach.

First Day Treat. Manny's son, Alex, loves playing with stuffed animals. Yesterday Manny took Alex to the zoo. Alex was thrilled with his trip to the zoo. Manny gave Alex a stuffed penguin for his first day of school. Alex cried with joy as Manny gave him the penguin.
Jasper Makes Linguine. Jasper was thirsty. He was driving home one night. He saw a sign for free Linguine at a gas station. He decided to give it a try. He was surprised how tasty it was.

Thanks!. When I got out of bed, I was greeted by a strange looking man. I was very confused and worried that he could possibly be my dad. I had always had this feeling that my dad could be there. I sat down and watched his eyes for what seemed like forever. I couldn't see them anymore and the man turned and ran away.

Planting and growing. Randy was about to start his new job. His first job was as a planting planter. He loved having to do it. He would get paid five hundred dollars per day. He was excited for his first day.
Good Deed. I worked for an auto insurance company in 1974. I had a stroke in 2011. I was in rehab for a week. On my release day I had to use the restroom. I was paid $100 for my work.
Shark Attack. Mike went snorkeling in the beach. There was a shark in the water. Mike tried to get out of the water. The shark attacked him. Mike had a life changing experience.

The stealing friend. Karen was out on a walk with her friend, Melissa. They were playing near a store. Suddenly, someone grabbed Karen's purse and ran off. Karen ran after him, but he ran into the woods. He had forgotten to put a tag on her bag and ran from the store.

Small Town Jean. Janet recently moved to her first rural area of Oklahoma. She was in her new town for six months when a small town caught her eye. The small town has everything she could need to get by. Janet made a visit and visited the small town. She learned many things and found some new friends.

Stray. The neighbor who lives next door bought a dog. The dog loved to play in his yard. One day, the dog came back outside. The neighbor saw the dog and was too scared to play with it. He gave the dog away.

Checking the mail. One day I went to pick up my mail. It was late so I was waiting for a few hours. It had not yet showed. I heard it go by and was scared. When I finally got it, the postman was late too.

Face paint as costumes. Tim and his friends were playing pool with each other. Tim was really good at it. They started to paint each other different faces. Soon Tim was the best face painter in the game. The game became a great success.

Making pizzas. Mia was cooking pizza. She thought it would be best to make it from scratch. She used all the ingredients she had and then followed a recipe. The pizza came out perfect and they ordered more! Mia was happy about her homemade pizza.
Scholarship. Sally was going to college. Her grades were horrible. She wasn't eligible for any scholarships. Sally got a part time job. She had enough to pay for the tuition.

The Garage Sale. The town had a garage sale. It was filled with people selling old toys. All sorts of junk from past generations was sold. At the end, the town had a new house! The town was very proud of its new home.

Randy's Train Ticket. Randy wanted to ride the train to Chicago. He was not able to afford a ticket. Randy began to scratch off money with his debit card. He was able to buy a ticket for the train and a hotel room. Randy left the hotel room and was able to ride the train.
Pads. I got some new pads last year. I wore them to work. All of the sudden, I fell off my desk. I fell so much I broke my leg! I never wore the pads again.
Soccer. I played with my friends last night. We all decided to play soccer. I kicked the ball hard. I saw the ball was bouncing high. I threw the ball and it hit my brother.

China. My wife's coworker used to be a native of China. She got a promotion, and was able to travel to China every week. The company got very good at hiring the woman. I was in China with my wife in 2012. We had lunch at the company picnic table.
Chess. Tina was bored with her life. So she decided to join a chess club. She made friends and challenged herself. Tina felt she had accomplished something. She was glad she hadn't lost her friends.
The awesome batch. Tina was at a house party. And she was bored. So she decided to make a batch of bread. And she decided to eat the whole thing. But it was way too much to take.

Jennifer wins big. Jennifer is a girl that is playing the lottery. She is at a gas station with $1. Jennifer is nervous to begin the scratch off process. However she keeps trying to see if she can pull in. She eventually finds the winner she is looking for!
The Pop Quiz. My teacher assigned us a pop quiz today. It was a science quiz. We spent the entire night reading books about science. I also got to do a pop quiz. I had a great time.

Best Friend. Gina's friends invited her and her sister to lunch at a restaurant. Gina said she would go, but was afraid to go. But her sister invited her anyway. Gina agreed to go. Gina was excited to have a new best friend.

Bringing Home Baby. I brought home a baby last week. I am afraid I may not be able to take care of him. I talked to my husband and he is not feeling that much. It seems that my husband does not feel that I am keeping the baby. I am sad, as I am trying to do some of the care.

Grown Man Selling Barbies. Sammy's dad always told him to be a grown man. So Sammy grew up to be a grown man selling Barbies. When Sammy's father passed away his dad became very lonely. He sold Sammy's Barbies and took care of his cousins. Sammy realized that it was better to be a grown than not.
Crash. Sally was driving fast one night. She crashed into a ditch. She broke her leg. She went to the hospital and got put on cast. Now she drives fast and is never late for work again.

Impressing Girls Is Easy. Tommy was not an exceptionally good ballerina. He had a very good technique for hitting girls. Tommy was playing at a school dance. He was not feeling confident at this moment. Tommy's dancing technique did not impress girls.

The Wire. A small child was running through the neighborhood. She found a wire by the edge of a fence. It was an old, rusty wire with an old nail stuck in the ends. The wire got stuck and wouldn't budge. The child tried her best to get rid of it but it was useless.
College?. We used to take my daughter to Harvard. She was a freshman. She was really excited about going back. She even won a trip! I was glad she got the trip.

Olga. Olga was an only child. Her parents never had a lot of money. She didn't have a lot of money for school. Olga got a job and was able to afford school. Olga became the best student on her first day.
Poor Eyesight. John was walking down the road. He lost his footing on the sidewalk. John hit his head on a stone. John's eyes were very blurry. John decided not to walk down the street that day.
Smile. There was a cute girl in the hall. It was a boy. She smiled at him and he gave her a friendly hello. The boy was pleased. The boy got along with her nicely.

The Gross Seat. I took a seat in the office with my desk chair. I didn't notice the seat was covered in fur. I realized I had left it in there. I realized I had to clean it. Now I'm waiting until the chair is cleaned.

Too much fun. Sally went to the carnival with her friends. There was a carnival near her home town. The carnival had lots of different rides. When the carnival was over she decided to ride one more. When she got back to her home state she felt so much fun.

Dance Team. Sara was excited to join the dance team at school. Sara thought her team would do fine. When Sara got on the team her friends had doubts. Sara had practiced for this moment for two months. When the dance team came, Sara was surprised they did well.
Hockey Fan. Tom's favorite sport was hockey. He played goalie in a game last weekend. His team lost. He sat there sadly after. He wondered why he had never been able to enjoy the game more.

The Booking Failure. Jackie's favorite author is coming out with a new book. She has been awaiting this opportunity. When the day came she was told that the book was out of stock. The author was upset but she was still able to sell a copy. Jackie was happy that she made the sale and got to get her book.

Fried Trout. Tom wanted to eat his favorite fried trout. It was in season and he wanted to try some. He didn't have enough time to go to the store though. He just made a pot of fried trout. He enjoyed the taste.

Bicycle. I found an old bicycle lying on the sidewalk. It was abandoned and very dangerous. I took it home and cleaned it up. I took it back to the shop and bought a new bike. I rode my new bike to school every day.
New Style. Joey's friends were having a big party. They all tried a new style. Joey was the only one not in the new style. He was a bit awkward about it. But Joey had the confidence to wear it.
Fight on the Train. Tom was on a train. It was crowded. Tom tried to talk to someone on the other side. The guy kept trying to push Tom. Tom was left in a bad mood by the time he got off.
No. Gina was taking her friend Mary to a school. Mary's friend Tami was excited to see her. But Tami's mom was there. They weren't allowed to go to school. Gina felt sorry for her friend.

The Sheets. The woman needed some new pillows. She didn't own any, so she went to a store. She found the perfect pair. She bought them and wore them every night. They fit her perfectly, and she was able to sleep well.

Student's Nightmare. Tobias was having trouble falling asleep in class. The teacher kept hitting him on the head with her chair. Tobias felt tired and fell asleep in the library. Tobias awoke to the sound of the teacher laughing. He ran out of the library and never went back there again.
Stars. The star looked at the sky. He saw it was beautiful. He couldn't believe his eyes. It was a beautiful day. He looked up at the sky to see all the stars.

Impatient. Sam had to eat lunch with a friend. They were not eating fast food. The friend got sick before they could eat. Sam was the only one that didn't want to wait. Sam was glad to not have to go out.

The Run. Jack and Jill were friends at school. One day Jack tripped Jill while playing baseball. He fell down and hurt himself. Jack and Jill took his temperature. He was diagnosed with sprained knee.
Finding Cards on the Street. Tim was walking home from work. He noticed a couple of card stores. Tim bought two of them. After that he walked around the store. He bought more and more cards.

Cat Treats. Kitty was feeling very hungry for treats. She made the list of ingredients that she would need to buy. She took a walk to the nearest grocery store. She bought all the ingredients she needed. She got treats on the way home from work.

Presents. Sarah woke up early this morning and decided to check her mail. She opened the front door of her house and started her car. Sarah saw a package on the front porch and went over to the box. She opened the package and read what it was. She opened the gift and found a brand new puppy.
Jean. My friend Jean was pregnant. She came down with a baby boy. Her baby boy was called James. We were in love with the name James. After a year they decided to name him James after Jean.
Lost money. Rita lost her wallet. She was upset. She had no idea where to go. Rita was worried that she'd get hurt. But thankfully she was happy.

Curtain. When I turned 18 I was going to go on a date. It was supposed to be a romantic night. We went to a local bar for dinner. It was too crowded to leave so we left for the bar in the city. I'm not looking forward to going back there.
The Fever. I was feeling a bit sick. I threw up all over my bed. I could barely remember how much I felt. Then, my friend brought me some medicine. After taking it, I felt much better!
Lois gets a scare. Lois was sleeping. She was having a nightmare. Suddenly she heard a noise. She jumped up and ran into the hallway. She was scared and quickly took the covers over her eyes.

Tacos. Anna was in line at Taco Bell to buy the ingredients. Suddenly her phone rang. It was a sales rep for Tacos. They were offering her two free tacos. Anna bought the items and enjoyed them even more.
Basketball. It was time for the basketball game. John and Tim were playing. Tim went up for a shot and it went in! John was proud of the hoop. It was a goal to win the game.
Bad Breath. Tom was going to a party. He was drunk. He looked at himself in the mirror. He saw that his breath smelled really bad. Tom quickly cleaned it up.
Speeding. Tim was driving down the road. He passed a cop. Tim didn't want to be a cop so he took a shortcut. The cop was on his way too. Tim tried to hide from the cop.

Naughty Nancy. Nancy was a girl scout, and she was very good. Nancy was on a trip with her troop and a guy scout. Nancy was really good with her troops and they never had to talk. The girl scout came back with a lot of nasty stories about Nancy. Nancy decided to be nice to the girl scout, but not Nancy.

Grocery List. Amy was trying to remember her grocery list. But she was lost. She didn't know what to get. Finally she decided to use the online shopping site. Amy found a good list quickly and was able to buy the items.
Bad Crash. John got a new car. He loved all the details of it. One day it was raining. John got out and went into the garage. John ran over the wet paint and smashed it.
A Need to Pee. Tina was in the library. She went to use the bathroom. Tina started to get a puddle. She didn't know what was in the puddle. She realized it was water.

The magic trick. Cheryl was a magician. She was performing a magic trick on her friends. Suddenly, she lost her eyes. She did not want to see the ground anymore. She realized she wasn't as good as she thought.

Careless Mistake. Gina and her friends were running after a boy. They had to run across a large block of grass in the yard. A boy ran across them. He ran towards them and threw a tennis ball. Everyone in the group started to chase the boy.

Shooting Star. Dan was at his camp. He went shooting star gazing with his friends. He went into a shooting star and looked at it. The shooting star suddenly disappeared. Dan then had to find out where it went.
Tight On Brandy. My niece was pregnant. She was due in a few weeks. Brent and my wife gave her birth in a c-section. The baby is growing very quickly. My niece is being a great mom.
Prank. Gina tried to sneak in her room. She made a spiderweb. The spiderweb caught her attention. It looked like the spider she was holding. She took the spiderweb and ran out of her house.

The Interview. Lisa had just landed her new job. Her first day was to interview a young girl. The girl was shy and Lisa felt anxious. Lisa spent hours on the phone and then arrived. When she sat at Lisa's desk, Lisa felt relieved.

Football Match. We saw the first match of the season. The players were very excited. The crowd clapped and cheered when the team won. The other team scored an extra goal. They took the lead the rest of the game.

One Car. When I was a kid I always wanted to have a car. I had no idea where it would end up though. I decided to save up my money and buy a car. I had a huge car, but it was still expensive. I realized I wasn't as important as I thought I was.
Overtime. Sam went to work late one morning. He was still very tired. The boss gave him an ultimatum. Sam tried to avoid going in or out. Unfortunately his boss decided to allow him to stay in.
New Lamp. Tina bought a new lamp. She loved the bright color. She was surprised when it started to rain. The light got soaked. She was very disappointed.

Broken pencil. Nancy went to use her pencil at school. She didn't want to go without it. She put her pencil in her backpack. After she walked, she saw a piece of paper that wasn't there. When she realized she had forgotten to take it out of her bag.

Losing battery. Yesterday I was running for my dog. I was driving around the parking lot. When I came back to my car the battery was dead. I pulled over and picked up my dog. I fixed the battery and then I was back on my way.

The new roll recipe. Sue decided to make rolls for the school. She gathered ingredients and made them. She then took the rolls out and put them in the oven. When they were done she decided to try them again. They were great and she loved eating them!

Child Support. Jane's parents got a flat tire. She decided to go get a child support checkup. She was shocked to find she'd had $100 in a month. She called the support line, but it was down. She was angry, but understood.
Gargoyle. Karen's class went to the local aquarium. They had to find a way to find their pet. They brought in a pet gargoyle. They made it stand in the water. Then they let it go and went home.

Not The Best Class. Dora was not sure how she would pay for her school. She had a bunch of loans and didn't know where to go. She called a few loans companies and some said no. Dora went to her mom. She was surprised when her mom said the loan company could help her.

Anne and the Money. Anne was walking down the street. She spotted a homeless man begging for money. Anne felt bad for him. She gave him twenty dollars. The next day the man thanked her for her kindness.
Fair visit. Gina's parents were on vacation. The girls needed money. Gina told her dad she would pay him back. Her dad agreed. He took the girls to the fair.

He Can't Photograph. Jill tried to use her camera to get some photos. She tried taking a picture of her cat, but it had no luck. She tried using her iPhone, but she also could not get one. Finally she asked her sister for a camera to use instead. She used her phone to take the photos.

Dilemma. The man disagreed with a woman. He tried to fight the woman to get her to see his side. The woman told him it was okay. The man decided he would not fight. He was glad to be able to get rid of his opponent.

Makeup. Suzie was trying to make her first birthday in three months. Her mom made her a nice outfit. She looked in the mirror and looked in the mirror. She made the face she wanted to make and it looked bad. Suzie realized she just couldn't make the outfit herself.

Homework. I have been working for hours on my math homework. I decided to turn in the homework. When I got home I did not see it. I asked my mom what happened. She explained that I did not make a copy.

Exhausted. I felt tired and hungry all of the time. So I decided to eat a snack. My dad said I could eat a big sandwich with my lunch. He gave me a giant sandwich and some chips. After lunch, I felt great!

Scary Movie Night. Timmy wanted to watch a scary movie with his friends. The girls thought he was really crazy and wouldn't let him. Timmy was too scared to get out of his house. Timmy went to bed instead. His dad was upset that he never got to watch a scary movie.

Tami Joins. Tami was not enjoying herself as her mom had just gotten divorced. She wanted to try and fix things but was afraid of the house. Her mom told her to leave, and she left. Tami felt terrible about being away from her friends. She was glad when her mom came home with her.

Time Out. The kids were very excited. They were going to get a free day at school. They had planned out to play sports. They ran to their favorite field and started to play. They had a great time at school.
Run. The boy ran down the hall. He tripped. The boy fell. He was hurt. The boy learned to stop running.
No Address. Bobby was looking for a new job. He went to several interviews. He was offered one in his home town. He was excited for the job. He was excited to find it was a job as a janitor.

The King. There was a king in the kingdom. He had lots of money and had a good life. He was so happy when people came to him asking to see his life. He invited them over and they all had a great time. They gave him all of their money.
Old Lunch. The boy brought an old lunch. His friend was hungry too. They sat in a corner together. He gave the sandwich to his friend. The boy brought another sandwich.

Assisted Living. Kim was about to leave the assisted living center. She went in to check on her family. She asked about the family's health status. The therapist gave her answers. Kim's family was in good health, and she left.
Big Rain. The power went out in my town. My house stayed dark all night. The wind knocked the power out in my yard. My husband came home from work. He woke up in the morning and went to the garage.

Mark and the Author. Mark was writing a book about a boy named Adam. He was feeling very old and he didn't know what kind of author he was. His editor told him he should start writing about him. Mark sat down and worked hard for an hour. After his editor approved, he got his book published in the newspaper.
Squirrel. I went to my parents yard. They wanted me to go inside. I didn't want to. I started to cry. They let me out and said I was grounded for three days.

Wrong Recipient. Tim took his girlfriend on a date. After they arrived at the restaurant they were seated. They sat at a table and began talking. Tim was shocked that her boyfriend had picked up her. She was upset and asked him to leave.

Terry's love. Terry was very lonely. She was always sad because she didn't have anyone to play with. One day a classmate offered her the opportunity to play soccer. She agreed and played soccer for her whole year. Terry was now happy to be playing soccer with another person.
New necklace. Allie wanted a necklace. She was shopping with her friend. Allie got distracted. Her necklace was gone. Allie was so upset.

A new movie. Allie decided to see a new movie. But she was scared of all of the bad things. So she stayed out late at night. But at the end of the night, she had a nightmare about it. Allie decided to stay out and watch a new movie.
Ice Cream. Travis liked ice cream. He would try different flavors. One day he was feeling sick. He had never had an ice cream before. He took some shots to ease his stomach pains.

Getting into the NHS. Amy's family was very sick. Amy had never seen anyone get into the NHS. She went to the doctor to see if she could get into the NHS. The doctor told Amy she was eligible for a membership. Amy was happy when she got into the NHS.

Cat. Linda loved cats and wanted to adopt one. Her parents thought they would never get her a cat but they did. Linda asked her mom if she could get one. Her mom said yes and Linda was excited. She took care of the cat and named him Rex.

Please Go Home. The teacher made a speech to the class. He told the class to write down their names. One of the students wrote down his name. The teacher saw him write down his name. The teacher asked if the student had any homework.

Pool. Diane went to the beach with her friends. When she went in the water, she fell and sprained her ankle. She spent the next few weeks in the hospital. When she returned home, she noticed a huge pool in her backyard. Diane's friend had let her use the pool, and she went swimming!
Date. Tim met a girl. They had a lot in common. The girl asked him out on a date. Tim agreed to go to dinner. They talked all night.
The church. The church was huge. The students had a lot of fun. They were going on a field trip. They were learning the ropes of building a church. The kids loved the church.
Red. Red was a big dog. He loved to chase things. He chased her all the time. One day a man decided to walk by and catch her. She stopped chasing after the man and was more careful.

Dog Love. Lester was getting lonely, and didn't have many friends. He decided to adopt a dog and had it adopted. Lester began to love the dog. He felt much better with his new friend. Lester had more friends and friends in the future.

Mailbox. Sara hated her mailbox. It always felt like the mailman had not dropped it. She decided to see a new mailbox. When she bought it she was happy to see it. She was happy that her mailbox looked different.
All Too Common. The kids were out on a field trip. A bully named Tim was sitting on a swing. Tim threw the bully's soda at him. Tim was furious. The bully laughed and kept walking.

Drinks. I wanted to buy some nice drinks. I went online and found the best ones. They were too expensive to buy myself. I found a coupon to use for $25 off. The discount was half off and I bought the drinks.

Tragic Vacation. Jenny's family loved to take vacations. She wanted to go on a cruise. She saved up the money for years. When she finally saved enough, she went on the cruise. When she landed, Jenny felt horrible.

Box of almonds. Tina had a box of almonds. She had to use a knife to cut some off. She used the knife on her knife and cut her almonds. She was disappointed with the result. She decided to use scissors instead of a knife.
The Smoking Gun. The kids were playing in the yard. A loud noise rang out. They had heard the wind was blowing. The wind was so bad it shook the kids from the ground. They ran outside screaming.

The Rancid Ketchup. Linda was eating her lunch. She had a nice big lunch with fries and ketchup. Suddenly she noticed her fries were starting to smell funny. She took them out of the toaster and discovered a terrible smell. They were out of time and Linda threw them out.

Frog on a log. I went to a haunted house in Chinatown. I walked on a log while a large dog jumped onto the log. The dog ran up and attacked me and my dog. The dog bit me, and then the dog licked my face. I was so sick that I never went back there ever again.

No Internet. Ida's internet had gone out last week. Her house was dark and dingy. Ida tried to use her internet but couldn't work it. She decided to go to the library to check out a book. Ida's library library had Internet service so she was able to use her computer.

Albert's Boat. Albert was building his boat. It was about to be put on the water. He spent a long time trying to make sure it was done. Finally he was done with the job and the boat was ready. Albert spent many hours on the water and did everything he needed.

Spit When You Talk. Bob was a manager at a department store. One day, Bob overheard a co worker, who was bragging about stealing. Bob confronted the co worker about her bragging. He tried to argue back but the co worker refused to listen. Bob made the co worker apologize by throwing his manager a surprise party.
Weather. Bob had never been to a hot day. He was so thirsty. He opened a can of hot water. He poured the hot water into his jug of soda. Bob smiled as he watched the clouds roll in.

Sailing On. Sam always wanted to sail on a cruise ship. When he was younger he wanted to take it. His mother got him a job at a sailboat. He saved his money for six years. Sam is now a sailboat master.
The Game. The team was tied with their opponents. The ball came towards the goal. The opponents tried to pass it back. They scored a goal. The team scored two more goals.

Aiden and the lost toy. Aiden's dog, Jack, always followed Aiden around. Aiden decided to give him a toy as a reward. He searched the house for the toy. Jack wasn't home for many weeks, and Aiden went to look for him. Aiden came back from searching and found Jack under his bed.

Play Together. My son and I used to have a lot of fun playing with the Nintendo in our basement. We had a Nintendo console that was very rare and special. After a while it was stolen one day and our dad took it. When it was returned he told us that it wasn't broken. We now have a new Nintendo console and we are very happy.

Marlee was almost late. Marlee was starting her first day of school. Marlee decided to wear a dress. Marlee's mother walked in the room and caught her. Marlee's mother gave her detention. Marlee was so mad, she ran from her mother.

Huge Convenience. John came home and found his dog on the couch. He knew there were three dogs, not one or two! His dad showed him how to feed them, get up, and come down stairs. The dogs didn't like the new exercise and slept on the couch. Now John and his dog are best friends!
Window. A man was walking home. He saw a cat on the street. He noticed the cat would not stop moving. The man took the cat to the vet. The vet said the cat had a broken window.
Clouds. It was a dark and windy night. The kids were playing in their yard. Some clouds got around. The kids ran into them. They ran and fell into the dirt.

Afraid of Heights. The dog was scared of stairs. He would bark at anyone who stepped too far. One day, the dog stepped too far. He barked at the stairs again. The dog got tired and tried not to bark again.

darkness. I went to sleep last night with my eyes closed. I was very tired the next day. I went to the doctor to get my eyes checked. The doctor said I had dark eyes. I learned not to do that in the dark.

Flat tire blues. I got a flat tire last week. I put my car on the side of the road. I drove a few miles and got out of my car. I saw a guy who looked like my friend, who was in the same car. We then became close friends.
Ice Skating Accident. Tim was out skating. He jumped up too high and fell. He landed on his hand. He looked up to see a bloody chunk of his hand. He had cut himself on a slippery ice.

Magnesium. My brother and I went to the grocery store. We were in the produce section. I noticed I needed magnesium. I went to the produce section and bought magnesium. After we were done, I felt great.

Swim Shorts. I was swimming in the ocean at the beach. I wanted to swim so I went into the water. The water was very cold. I got in and started to jump in. It was amazing, I had a great time swimming.

French Press. Anna wanted to make a French Press cake. She bought all the ingredients and began to make it. When the cake was done, it looked good. But when it was served to her family, it was awful! Anna had forgotten about her French Press and it wasn't good.
The first drink. Tim was at the bar. He saw someone drinking a beer. He didn't think it was legal. He tried to drink it anyway. Tim got drunk and didn't have a job.

Over Drinking. Barry and Frank were best friends. Barry drank way more than Frank. Barry had a drinking problem and became intoxicated. The police searched for him and he was finally caught. Barry is now in jail for drinking and driving.

Rat-A-Tat-Tat. The couple was bored one day. They both got on the porch to play. They all noticed the large rat near their fence. The husband ran into the yard and jumped on top of the rat. He held it tight until it got out of the yard.
Eye Drops. Kate was taking a shower. She noticed her eyes looked swollen. She grabbed a pair of eye drops. Then she washed her eyes. Afterwards, she looked in the mirror again.
The Lost Puppy. The Johnson family adopted a new puppy. They named him Moose. He loved playing with the family cat. Moe would take them for walks and play fetch. He always brought them chocolate.

Drew wants a girlfriend. Drew was walking down the street one day. He found an adorable girl he really liked. He stopped and tried to talk to her. She really liked him. Drew decided to ask her out on a date.

Friends for Life. Tom was a lonely boy. He was not very popular. He had friends but nobody he was talking to. One day he realized how much he wanted to get friends. Tom was finally able to have friends and friends again.
Know When to Fold. Tom was doing his laundry. He noticed his clothes wouldn't fold properly. He had to find a solution. He got a roll of quarters and cut them into quarters. It worked great!
Bad dye job. Kelly wanted to dye her hair purple. The only problem was that the dye she wanted was red. When she got home the dye looked great. She was happy. But it was not as good as she thought.

Dog Attack. Samantha was walking her dog. Suddenly, she felt something sharp. She looked around to see what it was. She found a branch on the ground. She had stepped on it and was attacked by a snake!

Training. It was time to take the kids to the beach. The weather had promised sunny and bright days. They packed up their towels and umbrellas. They drove to the beach. They had fun with the sun and sun-dishes.
The SUV. The man was in the middle of the road. He heard a crack and tried to stop. He couldn't get the wheel back to spin. The truck had flipped over. The man was able to drive his car to the side.

Foreclosure. Tom had a very large dog. One day a foreclosure started going up. He was really unhappy that it would cost so much money. So he found a way to get the dog out in a cheaper way. It didn't work as well as Tom thought.

The Truck. Jane loved trucks. One day she decided to buy a truck to take her to work. After getting her truck she took it to the store to get paint. The car that she bought was painted black. Jane now knew her truck wasn't very nice.

Started a garden. I decided that I wanted to start a garden. I went to the store and bought all the supplies. I put all the dirt and dirt in the dirt. I watered it everyday for a week. After that, the plants grew tall.
Basketball Season. The season had been off for a week. The game was coming up. The ball got to me in the 3rd quarter. I ran back for the shot. I made the shot and the game was tied.

The Windy Day. Alfred and his family were on a road trip. They went to California to see Santa Claus. They stayed in a hotel for two nights. The wind got so bad that the family had to stay in another hotel. The next day they found a place to stay in and waited for Santa.

Horatio's Fencing Trip. Horatio had always wanted to go to the city's annual fencing competition. However, he was afraid to attend. Finally he decided to face his fear of attending. On his first day at the city, Horatio loved every minute of it. Horatio decided he would visit the city again.

A New Cat. Gina wanted to get a pet. She saw a cat with fur on its head. She went to the pet store. She picked out a kitten that she thought looked familiar. The cat was a new cat and Gina got a new cat.

Mud volleyball. Tim played a game with his friend. They decided to have a mud volleyball match. Tim tried to play but his hand got muddy. Tim had to go to a bathroom to help him clean up. They didn't end up going back.

Kylie gets famous. Kylie is an up and coming musician. She has been asked to play at an open mic. Kylie arrives to the mic and she plays a great song. The crowd at the open mic is huge. Kylie is a popular singer!

Toner. Dan went to the store to buy some Toner. He wanted to look good but could not find it. After some searching Dan went home and bought more. He was now able to look good in his new makeup. He put the new makeup on and looked great in the mirror.

Bidet. Anna needed to get her toddler a hat. She searched for one online but couldn't find anything. Then she remembered she had an old one in her garage. There it was hidden in a corner, and Anna bought it! She was happy to have a hat of her own.

Online Store. We used to have a small shop in our town. Our old shop shut down because it had very poor management. We hired an online store to run our store. Our new store worked great, and it made our shop great. Now we are in the best place in town.

Mary Had a Little Lamb. Mary decided to buy a lamb. She went to the local animal store. Mary found a lamb that she liked and purchased the lamb. Mary went home and cooked the lamb. Mary ate the lamb after cooking and felt good about it.

Getting Annoyed. I took my son to see the doctor. The doctor asked my son questions and it was time to go home. When the doctor turned on the tv I yelled at him. He immediately went home. He decided to buy me dinner instead.

The Lesbian. Amy was in the library with her crush Ray. Amy had been told that Ray was straight. Amy felt betrayed. Amy decided to walk in her room while Ray watched TV. She was relieved that Ray understood her feelings.

Ant Friends. I was walking home from work one day. A stray cat was looking at me. I decided to pet the cat, and pet it's tail. I went home to pet the cat. After that I was able to feed it with the tail.
Unhealthy Salad. Tina's boyfriend had gotten fat recently. He decided to go on a diet. He was making a salad to go along. Unfortunately Tina wasn't able to eat it. It was a terrible salad.

The Borrowed Car. Lana's father was poor and did not have much. Lana always took things to a pawn shop because she had no allowance. One day, Lana decided to borrow her father's car. Lana's father didn't notice the car, so he drove off. Lana and her dad lived in the same place and he was happy.
Amnesia. Tom was watching TV. He became extremely drowsy. His mother noticed he was getting fidgety. She decided to give him some special syrup. Tom went back to sleep for a while.

Kate. Kate and Steve had a baby boy. One day Kate was so excited she ran to the doctor to have him vaccinated. But she was nervous and afraid that he would not like the vaccine. Kate was afraid of how he would react if she was not vaccinated. But when she got the baby she was proud and thankful.

Statistics. I worked hard at my statistics classes. Every day after school, I worked on the math. One day I was late for work and my math teacher was angry. The next day I told my boss about the missed time and he was mad. We all laughed and made up.

Serial Killer. I was walking home one night. Suddenly, I heard a noise coming from behind a trash can. I slowly turned and found a woman, naked and covered in blood. She was standing in the trash with a knife. The killer had been caught, and the woman was arrested.

A Very Tired Happening. A woman was walking around her neighborhood. All of a sudden, her neighbors heard the sound. A group of guys with guns came out and started shooting. Everyone ran away from the place and called the police. They called the cops and the police made them leave.

Walk the Dog. My dog loves walking the dog's leash around the house. He likes to sniff the ground. He also knows to jump up and down for the grass. Today he was a bit more excited than usual. I think he was finally able to walk the dog's leash around the house.

Coin collection. Bill wanted to collect coins. He started to collect coins from every coin collection he had. Bill bought a few coins every week. Bill eventually had 100 coins. Bill was glad to have one more coin collection.

The Tea Cups. John was in a tea shop. He wanted to get a cup of tea. John bought all the ingredients. John set up the table and tried to brew the tea. He was shocked that he was not able to brew the tea correctly.
Satin robe. Samantha bought a new white robe. The colors were all lovely. The only problem was the price. She couldn't afford it. Luckily her friends let her borrow one.

Salespad. We purchased a computer in 2010. We bought a salespad for our keyboard. We put the salespad in our front office. We used the keyboard on the computer, all day. We had a lot of people buy the salespad.
Hidden Box. The mailman delivered mail one day. A box was delivered to a house. The box was buried in the yard. The mailman had no idea it was there. He was never seen again.
Workflow. It was a very humid day. I turned on the air conditioner to get rid of the air. The room got much cooler. I was happy to see that the air conditioning worked. Now the room is much cooler.

Big Brother. The father walked into the house. He was shocked at how big the boy's hands were. He had no idea what to say to him. He asked if he could make them like that. The boy smiled and said yes.

Felix Lights Candles. Felix notices that his apartment is dark. He decides he needs to light his room. Felix buys all the necessary lights. He has them put in the window. Felix is glad he took the chance to light his apartment.
Riley gets an A. Riley is nervous about her science project. She decided to do it alone. However, she was not ready for the grade of an A. She was very sad. Her friends decided to go to help instead.

Silver Fox. One night, a fox ran into a tree. The fox had fallen from a branch and was still in the tree. Suddenly, the fox began to jump. Eventually, the fox's nose pierced the tree. The fox died that night.

The Scary Hike. Cory took his kids on a camping trip. His oldest was scared and had nightmares all night. His youngest and youngest went to the front of the campground. His younger son went through the campgrounds and went for a hike. He and the children had fun running and having fun on a hike.

record player. Joe lost his record player. He took it to the repair man. He asked the repair man how to fix it. The repair man helped Joe repair it. Joe bought his new record player and was very happy.

Jury Duty. My uncle was arrested for drunken driving. He got a warrant for his arrest. He was arrested for contempt of court. The court ordered his arrest. He is awaiting a trial for contempt of court.

Happy Lifetime. In a large city, he never missed a single day of work. He took the long time to find a job he was good at. However, once a year, he was called back to the city. He spent all his paychecks and weekends in the city. Now he spends his life working in the local government.

Dry Dry Dry. Katherine was using the dryer in the living room. But the clothes started to smell bad. She tried some vinegar but it didn't help. Then she tried vinegar and salt water. To her horror, she was too tired to dry anything.

Like Mommy. My husband and I decided to go to visit my cousin. He lives in Florida so we were worried about flying. My husband had never been to Florida before and was scared. He decided to wait and watch as a small plane passed over our heads. It was like being in a different country!
Rose and Juliet. Neil had been assigned a book for English class. He was really excited about it! He had never seen Juliet before. He loved all about the book. He ended up liking it even more.

Classical and Modern. Lola loved to listen to classical music. She loved hearing classical music when she was younger. However, when Lola grew older, she started to dislike classical music. She thought that it was too hard to be a classical musician. She never even went to the symphony club.

Pottery. Lucy had been a potter and made a bowl. She went to the store to buy some clay. The clay was expensive and had no pottery clay. She bought some glass and added it to the potter. When the potter was ready, Lucy made a glass bowl out of it.

Senior Year. Amy was failing all of her math classes. Amy was forced to stay up late on weekends to make up for it. Amy worked hard on her grades and worked in the library. She felt better and finished all of the work. Amy was accepted into the college of her choice!

Big Sister. It was the day of my child's big sister. The big sister was due in a few days. I had to stay in the car all day to make sure. I called the number of the mom so she would call me. She called me just in time and I was able to make it to the hospital on time.

Boyfriend. Tom was dating a girl from work. Tom decided to buy her a sweater to wear to work. Tom wore it to work on the date. The girl asked him if he was wearing it on a date. Tom said yes and they went to dinner and got drunk.
Stew. Tina was very good at cooking. She made a big stew. She forgot to add the veggies. It tasted horrible. Tina never made that again.

Poker Game. It was a hot and humid summer. My friends and I decided to play poker. I tried to go first, but my friend thought I was bluffing. We decided to be quiet while we played. We ended up having a good time and both of us got to eat.
Hungry. Gina was hungry. She looked in the fridge. She couldn't find anything to eat. She went to the kitchen. Gina found her favorite cake.
Stomach Virus. Tom's stomach started feeling queasy. He had to stop eating. Tom tried taking pills. It didn't work. Tom had a huge stomach bug.

Miseducation. Alfred was a very athletic child who loved running. His mom was always trying to keep him on his feet. Alfred would stay out of trouble to be with his mom. One day he was kicked out of school by his mom. Alfred is now an introvert who only uses his own time.

Weather's Always Wrong. Today was a very hot summer day. The sky was clear and clear with no clouds. As soon as I stepped outside, I saw two trees in the distance. I decided to take a look at them. One of the trees was completely black and the other was green.

Sick of meat. The Smith family was eating at a Chinese restaurant. They were eating the steak that was served in a special way. Suddenly, a nasty smell came across the kitchen. The smiths immediately became sick. The family made sure to make it clear it was not meat.

A win for Bob. Bob went to a hockey game with friends. They were excited to see the team play, but he wasn't. His friend challenged him to a game, and Bob accepted. The game went on and on for 3 hours and he was tired. But then, in the nick of time, Bob won the game!

Linda's doughnuts. Linda made chocolate doughnuts. She poured milk on the doughnuts. She then put the doughnuts in the oven. When the doughnuts were done, Linda ate them. Linda was happy to make homemade doughnuts.
Special Delivery. Kenny got into a fight. His mom sent him to the hospital. He was in a coma for three days. Kenny was allowed out of the house. He came back home the next day.
A Night Out. A woman came into my house one night. It was a woman. She said I could see her. I did. She had gone to the movies.

Future Cat Lady. Lila has been looking for a new job for months. Lila decided she would apply for an office in her home city. One day, Lila went to the office and heard the manager was there. Lila was excited to hear she was going to be a new cat lady. When Lila walked in she saw her future cat lady.

Grandma's Cookies. Kia's grandma made cookies every Saturday. It was Kia's favorite part of the family. One day, she got a bad tooth. Kia broke her tooth. She had to go to the dentist to get it fixed.

Card Game. The kids played cards. They were playing a game called Monopoly. The rules stated you could only have one card per piece. The game was heated and their mom took them to a hotel. The family went back home to rest.
