New neighbors. Susie and her new neighbors moved in together. They were always loud and annoying. Susie was getting tired of being the one to complain. Finally the neighbors apologized and gave her a gift. They promised to not be so obnoxious again.

20 years and still in love. Bobby was an 11 year old boy. Bobby was really happy when his parents were buying him a puppy. Bobby and his parents went into a store and bought a dog. He was excited and excited. He was excited for his puppy to come and they played together every day.
Sick from a taco. I used to be very hungry. But then I realized I could eat no more tacos. I ate them all at once. But I started to get sick. I realized that I should never eat tacos again.
Fear of Water. Nina went for a swim in the lake. She swam to the end and realized she was getting sick. She began to vomit. She decided not to swim in the lake after that. She learned her lesson.

Dodge This. Gina's family was going to a ball game. Her sisters didn't want her to play, so they threw paper balls. They would get the ball out of the park. Gina caught the ball and returned it to the park. She then made sure she had a new ball to play with.

The Poor Student. Gina was in the seventh grade. She was not getting enough work done for her classes. Gina wanted to earn extra money so she asked her mother for money. She put extra money in her wallet and was excited to have more money. Gina felt like a grownup and was able to work more.

Baby Aubrey. When baby Aubrey was 3 months old, the family was very nervous. They were going to take him to a very tiny hospital. Aubrey would need a microchip and would be diagnosed with microdiving. When they got there, they made sure they did a good job. Aubrey didn't feel that nervous for the first time that day.

Big Fish. Derek and Jim had a fish. They decided to try a new kind of bait. The bait they used had a lot of fat in it. They ended up having to replace their bait. Jim felt bad for Derek and the fish and they went fishing with a new bait.

Ray. Ray is a very quiet kid. Ray decided to go to the beach and play with other children. Ray was playing in the sand with his sister. He was playing in the sand, but was hearing a noise. A shark was swimming next to him!
Singer. My friend is deaf. She wants to sing with me. We signed up for lessons. Now she is singing with me. I can't believe she is singing for me.

Speed Walking. Nancy really loved to speed walk. She went on a speed walking adventure this summer. She took a trip to Hawaii and flew to Hawaii. Nancy walked and walked in the desert. After a week, Nancy had completed the speed walking adventure.

Snow day. There was a snow storm last night. The school had to close for the day. As a result, the school was closed for a couple hours. I was stuck in traffic and got bored. Luckily, my friends let me use their car to get home.

Trip to animal kingdom. My cousin and I decided to go on an animal kingdom trip. We packed up the car and drove around the neighborhood for a week. We got lost when we went to the zoo. We didn't know the address where we were going. We eventually found it in the parking lot.

She Can't Wait To Stuff It. Kia was very hungry for some food. She decided to make herself some eggs and toast. She mixed the ingredients into a large bowl and then heated them. Her mom made her some slices of toast. Kia ate a large slice of toast and started crying.

The Long Hike. Mark was walking along a trail in the woods. He saw a woman crying as she saw the other hikers pass by. When Mark looked around the area, he realized it was his. He was relieved that he didn't get lost. Now he has a new friend at the base of the trail.
Weight. The man ate a lot of calories. He got really fat. He tried a diet plan. He went on it. He lost some weight.

Building a Sand Castle. Jim and Mary were best friends. They decided they wanted to build a sand castle. They got together and went to the sand castle. They spent about five hours building the fort. The friends were proud to be building their own sand castle.
Missed Bus. Tim was going on a late night drive. He noticed the bus didn't arrive. Tim called his friend. He was the only one with the car. His friend came over and fixed the bus.

Not as Real as it Seems. Dina liked to collect candy bars. She found an old box with them in it. She realized it was missing the plastic label. She went to the store to find the missing label. She found it and got a free coupon for it.

Brave Ben. Ben and his friend were playing games one day. But Ben's friend played really well, so they played every game. Ben didn't want to play video games at the same time with his friend. So he turned on his TV's remote and turned on his video games. He played video games and played games with his friend.

Aging Parent. The old man was looking at his grandson. His grandson was getting older. The old man said he might not like his grandson anymore. His grandson was not looking forward to the visit. The old man decided to take his grandson to a doctor for help.

Rocks. Cathy loved to watch the news. She would always watch the news with her friends. After school, Cathy went outside to play with her friends. Cathy was scared of the woods. Cathy decided she didn't want to be a reporter anymore.

The Fraud. Gina was going to the library on her way to school. She was checking out the books to find a book. It was a book she really liked, but it was a mystery. She waited in line for ten minutes before a woman came up to her. Gina decided to check it out and just go to the front of the line.

Antwan's story. Antwan went to the fair with his sister. They went on a ferris wheel. They were amazed by the spinning and fast movements of the ferris wheel. They got on their rides and began to ride the ferris wheel. They had a fun day.

Simon. Simon and his parents were on a road trip. While on the road, the rain started to pour. When they arrived at their hotel, they decided to stay in their hotel room. In the hotel room, the room was dark and a little blurry. When they went to check out, the hotel room was full of people in bathing suits!
